1b1(rgyud): rgyud 'bum pu ti ta pa bzhug so//
2a1(rgyud): / Ar+ya ta thA ga ta sarba tatras
2a2(rgyud): gra h+Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa de bzhin
2a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus
2b1(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba/ theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po dang po//
2b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo//
2b3(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
2b4(rgyud): thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
3a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dus
3a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig gi
3a3(rgyud): ye shes sems dpa' rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin
3a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis/ khams gsum gyi
3a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbang brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad
3b1(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes/ rnal 'byor chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
3b2(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud cing / thams cad kyi dgongs
3b3(rgyud): pa mdzad pas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba
3b4(rgyud): thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rdo rje che ba rnam par snang
3b5(rgyud): mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing / skra dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje
4a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dus
4a2(rgyud): lta bur gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs
4a3(rgyud): shing bsngags pa/ bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos smras pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril
4a4(rgyud): bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang //
4a5(rgyud): zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i/ 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na/ byang chub
4a6(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na
4b1(rgyud): rdo rje dang / kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal gzhon
4b2(rgyud): nur gyur pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs
4b3(rgyud): thams cad rab du 'joms po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye phrag dgu bcu dgu dang /
4b4(rgyud): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i
4b5(rgyud): gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa grangs med pa de dag gi skus til gyi gang bu bzhin du kun du gang bar snang ngo // de bzhin
4b6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i sku re re las kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mod tshad med pa rnams snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na
5a1(rgyud): yang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid do// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po// namakha'
5a2(rgyud): dbyings thams cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing / sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
5a3(rgyud): thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas/ rdo rje dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa'/ nam mkha'i
5a4(rgyud): dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin du bu mo'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po// de bzhin gshegs pas
5a5(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin po che'i dbang du gyur pa/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rgyas pa'i de bzhin
5a6(rgyud): gshegs pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas/ mngon par byang chub bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa tham
5b1(rgyud): cad kyi ngo bo nyid dag pa'i phyir// chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag pa thugasu chud pa/ nam mkha'i khams khyab pa'i gzugs/ thams
5b2(rgyud): cad du yang sangs rgyas par bstan pa mkhyen pas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'dul bar spyod pa mchog tu
5b3(rgyud): gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis don yod pas/ thams cad mnyam pa med cing / bla na med pa'i 'brin las thams cad
5b4(rgyud): mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan dran pa'i
5b5(rgyud): dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
5b6(rgyud): legs so bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi
5b7(rgyud): ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gsheg
6a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dus
6a2(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gsheg
6a3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
6a4(rgyud): dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
6a5(rgyud): cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha bzhin du brtan po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i gnod sbyin dang /
6a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnams so// kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za/
6a7(rgyud): bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang // mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang // rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen
6a8(rgyud): dang / 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus ma lus dam du gzung // rdo rje lcags
6b1(rgyud): kyu mda' gzhu dang // rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan gzung // pad mo ral gri 'khor lo gsung // las dang gro cha 'jigs byed bcangs/ thog ma tha ma med cing ni/
6b2(rgyud): ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che/ gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo dbang po che// u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i gtso// gtogs 'dod rgyal
6b3(rgyud): 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dang sa// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// gtogs
6b4(rgyud): 'dod dgu langs tshangs pa dang // 'khor dang mya ngan 'das dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum
6b5(rgyud): rtag pa'ang de yin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang // bde spyod gtso bo rab 'dul mdzad// rdo rje gtso dang sa rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin
6b6(rgyud): ba'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyod// sangs rgyas don dang sangs rgyas thugs// byang chub kun dang
6b7(rgyud): bla med pa// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i mgon// rang 'byung gzungs dang dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' chen dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas
6b8(rgyud): phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs rgyas kun bdag nyid// sems can rtag don rtogs mdzad pa'i// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po
7a1(rgyud): de nyid ##/ bde ba che// thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po// bcom ldan byang chub sems dpa'i thugs// byang chub
7a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sangs
7a3(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te// byang chub sems dpa' sems
7a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub snying por bzhugs pa ga na ba der gshegs te// byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du longs spyod rdzog
7a5(rgyud): pa'i sku bstan nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs pa
7a6(rgyud): bka' ba spyad pa thams cad la spros pa bskyed cing // ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya snyam//
7a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin las
7a8(rgyud): bzhengs te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// de kho na nyid
7b1(rgyud): ji lta bu lags ji ltar na bsgrub par dgyi// bka' stsal par gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung
7b2(rgyud): cig du 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// rigs kyi bu rang gi sems so sor rtogs shing mnyam par bzhog la// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ji dgar
7b3(rgyud): bzlos shig grub par bgyis shig/ oM tsa ta pra ti be tad ka ro mi// de nas byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
7b4(rgyud): cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// bdag gi snying kha nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis
7b5(rgyud): rtogs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bstsal pa// rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar
7b6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po chen gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas
7b7(rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir// oM bo d+hi tsi ta ud pa tra ya mi// zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de byang chub kyi sems
7b8(rgyud): bskyed par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
8a1(rgyud): sa #/ rgyu ba'i dkyil 'khor la bu mthong ba gang lags bdo zla ba'i dkyil la d+mo skyid dumabyu nga // du bzhin gshegs pa rnams
8a2(rgyud): cad kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyi mngon tu gyur gyis// de legs par bsgrub
8a3(rgyud): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po de dgo brtan par bya ba'i phyir// sngags 'di rang gi snying kha'i zla ba'i dkyil
8a4(rgyud): 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su bsoms shig/ oM ti s+thi badz+ra/ byang chub sems dpas gsol ba// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zla
8a5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje bdag gis mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po'i
8a6(rgyud): sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis brtan pa dgyis shig/ oM badz+ra ad ma ko ha// de nas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs
8a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems
8a8(rgyud): dpa'i rdo rjer zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grung pa
8b1(rgyud): de la/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/
8b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag gi legs par mthong lags so//
8b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems dpa' chen po de lta bas ni sems dpa'i rdo rje de rnams pa thams cad kyi mchog thams cad dang
8b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dga' bar zlos la sgoms shig/ oM ya tha sarba ta sta tha a haM/ de nas 'di skad
8b5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
8b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis
8b7(rgyud): brlobs la mngon par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings
8b8(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' rdo rjer zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis skad cig ma de nyid kyis chen/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
9a1(rgyud): nyid #cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa
9a2(rgyud): nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig du bzhugs so// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid
9a3(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig du bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin
9a4(rgyud): gyis dag go// // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi 'byung gnas
9a5(rgyud): su gyur pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
9a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i rdo rje de'i lus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed/ nam
9a7(rgyud): mkha'i snying po las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen pos dbang bskor bas dbang bskur/ kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/
9a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la mnyam pa nyid rab tu bzhag nas/ ri rang gi rtse mo ga na ba dang / khang bu rtsegs pa'i rtsa
9b1(rgyud): mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che la gsogs pa las byas pa/ gang na ba der gshegs te byin pas// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin gshegs
9b2(rgyud): pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad seng ge'i gdan la zhal bzhugs kun tu brtan te bzhugs par gyur to// na
9b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i
9b4(rgyud): rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/
9b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
9b6(rgyud): dmigs nas phyogs bzhir bzhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
9b7(rgyud): nas ring por ma lon par// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun du bzang po zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi na mkha'
9b8(rgyud): las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan ras gzigs dbang po chos kyi ye shes
10a1(rgyud): dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad gdon mi za ba thams cad ston pa/
10a2(rgyud): thogs pa med pa dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid kyis bsam pa'o// cho ga yongs su rdzogs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis
10a3(rgyud): brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa'i byin gyis
10a4(rgyud): brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya bo 'di/
10a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sad tA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs kha nas byung ma thag
10a6(rgyud): pa 'di ni// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin po de nyid de/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sems can thams
10a7(rgyud): cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su mkhod do// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
10a8(rgyud): de dag las kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ rdo rje
10b1(rgyud): sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du brtan pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ de nas
10b2(rgyud): nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad dang mazhom par 'jug pa'i 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams rgyud kyi sku dang gsung dang
10b3(rgyud): thugs rdo rje lta bu'i dbyibasu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kho nas byung ste/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nis rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer du
10b4(rgyud): gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo // rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer dang de dag gi rtse mo las
10b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / na mkha'i
10b6(rgyud): khams kyi mtha' gtugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
10b7(rgyud): ye shes mngon par byang chub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po skyed pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs grub pa dang /
10b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin
11a1(rgyud): ##/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen po mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji bsrid
11a2(rgyud): du sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa/ bde bar mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
11a3(rgyud): ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub du bsgrub pa la sogs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sem
11a4(rgyud): dpe'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun du bzang po yin pa dang / shin tu brten pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun bzang po'i skur gyur
11a5(rgyud): te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang 'byung ba'i// kun du
11a6(rgyud): bzang po'i sems dpa' brtan// de ni brtan phyir lus min yang / sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
11a7(rgyud): pa'i sku// bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing zhug
11a8(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
11b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos kyi
11b2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems
11b3(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/
11b4(rgyud): ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bla na med pa'i/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i grub pa'i
11b5(rgyud): mchog thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba nyid du/ sangs
11b6(rgyud): rgyas kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / gcod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de de'i lag par de bzhin du byon no//
11b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lags na rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
11b8(rgyud): bo phyag na rdo rje// phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bgyid par bzhugs// phyag g.yas par rdo rje thugs khar gsor zhing 'ben pa'i tshul du 'dzin cing ched du 'dzin cing
12a1(rgyud): denyid 'dus / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyis grub pa yis/ rdo rje bla na med pa 'di/ bdag ste bdag gi lag du byon/
12a2(rgyud): rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'
12a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ de bzhin
12a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo // badz+ra ra dza/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag
12a5(rgyud): ba nas ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
12a6(rgyud): su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas yang rdo rje lcug
12a7(rgyud): kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams 'byung ste/ de bzhin
12a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
12b1(rgyud): ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po nyid yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon
12b2(rgyud): mi za' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje
12b3(rgyud): las byung ba'i lcags kyu'i nges pa'i rgyal po bdag/ gang phyir kun du sangs rgyas khyab/ 'grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren no// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
12b4(rgyud): chen po shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas phyung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil
12b5(rgyud): 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang pa dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes
12b6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyis khams ma lus shing lus pa
12b7(rgyud): med pa thams cad dgug pa dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa
12b8(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po'i lag par de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gsheg
13a1(rgyud): detid #/ ba thams cad kyis/ rdo rje 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'gugs pas/ rdo rje
13a2(rgyud): lcags kyu des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi/ ye shes bla na med pa 'dis/
13a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir/ kun nas spyan 'dren dam pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdad ces bya ba'i tshig las byung
13a4(rgyud): ba'i sems dpa'i byin brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig
13a5(rgyud): ces bya ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra ragA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs
13a6(rgyud): kha nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das
13a7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhug ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas// rdo rje'i 'da' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis na gnas so// de nas rdo rje
13a8(rgyud): mda' de'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
13b1(rgyud): cad mnyes par bya ba la sogase ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du 'dad byed pa
13b2(rgyud): dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
13b3(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni rang bzhin dag/ rang 'byung ba dag dges byed pa// 'dod chags
13b4(rgyud): bral rnams dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags kyi ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud de'i lus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas
13b5(rgyud): byung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
13b6(rgyud): ba thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdud
13b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin
13b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir// rdo rje'i 'da' de byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'dud
14a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dusaces bya ba de'i phyag du de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang gis
14a2(rgyud): dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i mda' des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed
14a3(rgyud): cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni dri ma med// 'dod chags kyi ni chags bral bcom// bde ba thams
14a4(rgyud): cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang // byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i
14a5(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa
14a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra sa d+ha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni// bcom
14a7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/
14a8(rgyud): rdo rje dges pa'i dbyibasu gyur te/ phyag gnyis na gnas so// de nas rdo rje dges pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
14b1(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legaso zhes bya ba la sogs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho
14b2(rgyud): 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa dang / rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir gcig du 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems
14b3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/
14b4(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi/ legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam rtog bral ba de dag gi/ nges par dges
14b5(rgyud): bar bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i sku de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung te// de bzhin gshegs
14b6(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
14b7(rgyud): mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu dges pa'i// de bzhin gshegs
14b8(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rab tu dges pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu
15a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dusabar bya ba dang / thams cad bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir
15a2(rgyud): rdo rje dgye ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po de'i lag du de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
15a3(rgyud): rdo rje dgos pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgyes pas/ rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de
15a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dges par byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi legs byin pa/
15a5(rgyud): 'di ni rab tu 'jug pas na// rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed/ lhar rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
15a6(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dam tshig dang / dgyes pa chen po dang / 'dri bzhin ni de bzhin gshegs
15a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po na mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin
15a8(rgyud): po che'i byin gyi brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba//
15b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra rad na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la byung ma thag pa
15b2(rgyud): 'di ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid
15b3(rgyud): de na mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo // nam mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas/
15b4(rgyud): thams cad na mkha'i dbyibs lta bur gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis na mkha'i dbyings de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das
15b5(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgom pa yin pa'i phyir/ yang na mkha'i khams thams cad las 'byung ba/ 'jig
15b6(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad du snang ba mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin rje chen po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis
15b7(rgyud): su gnas so// de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/
15b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul cho 'brul rnams byas nas// 'jig rten gyi khams
16a1(rgyud): de nyid#/ thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gi na mkha'i khams thams cad snying po las shin tu byung ba dang / rab tu brtan
16a2(rgyud): pa'i phyir gcig du 'dres par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung nas/
16a3(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang // khams gsum dbang por dgongs pas na// rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi// dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin
16a4(rgyud): no de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na zla ba'i dkyil
16a5(rgyud): 'khor la gnas nas/ yang dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu rin po che ni rdo rje zhes
16a6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi
16a7(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don thams cad yongs su grub par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
16a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi don phun sum tshogs pas grub pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po// rdo rje rin po che'i snying po 'khor
16b1(rgyud): lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gi dbang bskur nas// lag du rdo rje'i nor bu de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po zhes bya
16b2(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i ming dbang gi dbang bskur nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rdo rje nor bu de rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing / ched du
16b3(rgyud): brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyings/ dbang bskur de ni bdag yin te// bdag gi lag tu phyin pa yin te// rin chen la ni rin
16b4(rgyud): chen bzhag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rin po che
16b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i// rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba/
16b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kho nas byung ngo // badz+ra te dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma
16b7(rgyud): thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/
16b8(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyings su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis na gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de las/
17a1(rgyud): da'adu#'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdal shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs
17a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu
17a3(rgyud): gzi brjid che ba nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu gzi brjid che ba nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems
17a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// /
17a5(rgyud): e ma'o sems can khams kun tu/ snang byed gzi brjid dpe med dag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa'i// 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyong bar byed// de nas byang
17a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs
17a7(rgyud): kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas ste/ dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od gyis dkyil 'khor gyis byin gyi
17a8(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi 'od thob cing / dngos grub de dag grub par
17b1(rgyud): bye ba'i phyir rdo rje nyi ma de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i
17b2(rgyud): 'od ces bya ba'i rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od de rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snang bar byed
17b3(rgyud): cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di// mi shes mun nag 'joms byed pa// shin tu rdul ji snyed pa'i/ nyi ma'i 'od pas
17b4(rgyud): shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba/ rin po cher byin gyis
17b5(rgyud): brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dam
17b6(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gis thugs kha nas byung ngo // badz+ra ke tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
17b7(rgyud): las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rgyal mtshan gyi gzugs dang / rgyan dang dbyib sna tshogs su gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan
17b8(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig du 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibasu gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnaso// de nas rdo rje
18a1(rgyud): @#/ rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las// 'jig rten gyi khams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams/
18a2(rgyud): byang nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phral rnams byas nas/
18a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rin po che chen po'i dpal dang / shin tu bstan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig du 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin
18a4(rgyud): bo che dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o/
18a5(rgyud): don kun grub pa dang // dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// dri med dpal ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po dpal gyi sku// bcom ldan
18a6(rgyud): 'das kyi thugs kha nas byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas// yang dka' nod cing bzhugs par
18a7(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
18a8(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
18b1(rgyud): ba rnams kyi reg pa thams cad yongasu bskang bar bya ba dang / thams cad bde bar myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po'i dngos grub dam pa grub/
18b2(rgyud): pa thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu dag gi phyir rdo rje rgyal mtshan de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin
18b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtsha
18b4(rgyud): gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs
18b5(rgyud): ba kun// yong su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan 'di/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
18b6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
18b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byu'o// badz+ra has/
18b8(rgyud): de bzhin gsheg pa tham cad kyi thug las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gsheg pa sa cad kyi 'dzu bar gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sna
19a1(rgyud): de cing rdzas / mdzad kyi drugs su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gan so// de nas rdo rje 'dzub
19a2(rgyud): pa'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdal shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung /
19a3(rgyud): ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtad
19a4(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
19a5(rgyud): kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di che du brjod do// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir/ e ma'o bdag ni mchog kun gyis//
19a6(rgyud): bzhad chen rmad du byung ba yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin
19a7(rgyud): gshegs par mas cad kyi rgyab kyi phra ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang dka' don cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
19b1(rgyud): kyis rmad dbyung ba'i byin gyi brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba'i bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems
19b2(rgyud): cad gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i thams cad kyi dbang po bla na med pa thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang po yongs
19b3(rgyud): su sbyong ba'i ye shes mngon par thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen por rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzub pa de
19b4(rgyud): de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
19b5(rgyud): po rdo rje dga' bas rdo rje 'dzum pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dges par byed cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rmad 'byung bskyed pa
19b6(rgyud): brton pa po// dges pa chen por byed par mkhyen/ bcug lag bzhin gyi shes mi nus/ dbang bskur ba chen po dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mdom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don
19b7(rgyud): dang / dgyes pa chen po'i don dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba chen po'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
20a1(rgyud): / ga smra sa da sems ma pa byang ma
20a2(rgyud): zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs bcad kyi chos kyi ngom tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+harma/ de bzhin gshegs pa
20a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtog
20a4(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung ngo // dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun du snang bar byas pas/ chos kyi dbyibs lta bur gyur ro//
20a5(rgyud): chos kyi dbyibs de dag thams cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhags te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ na mkha'i khams thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa'i
20a6(rgyud): tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad ma chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje pad me'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
20a7(rgyud): de bzhi gshegs pa mas cad kyi sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
20b1(rgyud): 'bral cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ni shin tu kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig
20b2(rgyud): tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i skar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad/ kyi thugs
20b3(rgyud): la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang 'byung gdod nas dag/ dam po'i don ni bdag yin te/ gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las/ rnam par dag pa
20b4(rgyud): dmigs par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i lus de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin
20b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas te/ dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge
20b6(rgyud): 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shos kyi dam tshig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i tinge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par spang
20b7(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ sems cad gyi 'ams la lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnams la dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba myong bar bya ba na/ de bzhin pashi
21a1(rgyud): @#/ pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzig
21a2(rgyud): kyi dbang po dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas/ de'i lag tu rdo rje pad mo'i de de bzhin du byin no//
21a3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje spyan zhes bya ba rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje pad me'i 'dab ma kha bye
21a4(rgyud): bas 'dod chags rnams par dag cing / mi chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs pas gzigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi/ de kho na nyid
21a5(rgyud): rtogs pa 'di/ bdag de bdag gis lag tu byin/ chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jal dpal gyi dam tshig las
21a6(rgyud): byang ba/ chos byin gyi brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces
21a7(rgyud): byig/ de bzhin bgegs pa mas cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi bugs/ 'a nas byung po badz+ra tig k+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brags las byung ma bag 'di ni/
21b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ shes rab kyi ral grir gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ rdo rje ral
21b2(rgyud): gri'i dbyibasu gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas// de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/
21b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas
21b4(rgyud): te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu 'jam pa'i dpal yin pa dang / shin du brtan pa yid pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal
21b5(rgyud): gzhon na'i skar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs lag na ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ 'jab dbyangs bdag ni yin par
21b6(rgyud): dgongs/ deng phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang / dbyibs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin
21b7(rgyud): gshegs pa bams cad kyi galas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang dka' dod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de das bcod ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bams cad kyi shes
22a1(rgyud): de lus 'cha/ rab kyi ye shes kyi dmacig las byung ba chos kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par nags nas/ de ni gshegs pa bams cad
22a2(rgyud): kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa'i dang tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong
22a3(rgyud): bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjesu 'bring ba'i shes rang dam pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du nas 'bras du de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i ral gri de byang chub de sems
22a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ rdo rje'i blo zhes bya ba rdo rje ring gi dbang gi dbang bskuro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
22a5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bros// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ral gris 'debs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
22a6(rgyud): rol byin pa'i tshul/ ngag rnams thams cad gcod byed cing / sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems chen po sems bskyed pa thag du/
22a7(rgyud): chos kyi 'khong lo 'askor ba'i da ba cig pas byung ba/ chos kyi byin gyi brlabs pa'i dzi rjezhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stsoms pa zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bams cad kyi 'kho
22b1(rgyud): bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gis thugs kha nas byung ngo // badz+ra te du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/
22b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
22b3(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyib
22b4(rgyud): de nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung te/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa/ sangs
22b5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ sems bskyed ma thag du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin
22b6(rgyud): pa dang / shin tu brtan phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
22b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rje dpa pa chos chen gyi/ e ma 'o rdo rje 'khor lo'i bdag/ gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang / chos kyi 'dod
23a1(rgyud): / wA#/ lo bskor bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
23a2(rgyud): thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
23a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus
23a4(rgyud): shing lus pa med par 'jug pa'i phyir/ phyir mi zlogs pa'i 'khor dang / bas cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
23a5(rgyud): lo dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i 'khor lo de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas
23a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyis rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rdo rje'i 'kholo de'i/
23a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bas cad kyi/ rdo rnams thams cad rnam par spyong / phyir mi ldog pa'i
23b1(rgyud): 'khor lo yang / byang chub snying po yin par dgongs/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gsungs pa'i dam tshig chen po las byung ba/ chos kyi
23b2(rgyud): byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
23b3(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra b+ha la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lus byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gsheg
23b4(rgyud): padams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ rdo rje zla ba'i dbyibasu gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas
23b5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje zla ba'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
23b6(rgyud): chos nyid la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'bral la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu dab tshig ma yin pa dang / shin du brtan pa'i phyir
23b7(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dang tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du/
24a1(rgyud): ##/ brjod do// em 'o rang 'byung rnams kyi gsang / ldem po dag du bdag dgongs ste/ gang phyir dab pa'i chos mchad pa/ thig du spros las rnam par bral/ de nas byang chub
24a2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po tshig pa yin pa'i sku de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyang na rdza ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas das/ dka' dod cing
24a3(rgyud): dazhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gsung rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gsheg
24a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsungs gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba dang /
24a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyi gsung gi gsang ba nyid thob pa'i dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje bzla ba de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa lag tu de bzhin
24a6(rgyud): du byin do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i tshig zhes pa'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tshig gis/
24a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje'i ngazas pas yang dag par smra ning / ched du brjod pa 'di nyid du brjod do// 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje'i bzlas pas brjod pa yin/
24b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ sngags 'di myur dgrub par 'gyur/ rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang / ye shes dang chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor
24b2(rgyud): ba'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnam par ldog pa'i ye shes dang / 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes sems dpa' chen po'o// de nas
24b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// las thams cad zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlab
24b4(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di
24b5(rgyud): rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra karma/ de nas rdo rje sems pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ las thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs paSh+Ti/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
24b6(rgyud): kyi thugs las byang ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i 'dzin pa de nyid// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer dugyur te byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa banas
24b7(rgyud): cad phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams snang bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs lta bur 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs/
25a1(rgyud): ##/ pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyis dbyibs ma lus pa de yang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs ste/ namakha'i dbyibs/ 'jig rten gyi
25a2(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku rnams byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin
25a3(rgyud): las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi mtha' ya
25a4(rgyud): pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i bskur gyur
25a5(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas rnams kyis nges/ phrin las mang po kun bdag yin/ sangs
25a6(rgyud): rgyas don ni lhan grub phyir/ rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus/ bcom
25a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi bugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar za ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
25b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gying rlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lam
25b2(rgyud): mchod pa bya ba la sogs pa gdod mi za ba'i tshad med pa dang / las kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyi las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad
25b3(rgyud): kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phrin las nyid dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos po grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras
25b4(rgyud): bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ming
25b5(rgyud): gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de'i lag las kyi rdo rje de bzhin du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad rdo rje thams cad ces rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang
25b6(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje rang gi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sbyor zhing / ched du brjod
25b7(rgyud): pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag du byin/ las rnams kun ni byed bcug/ de nas pang bcom ldan
26a1(rgyud): @#/ 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub par dka' ba'i dus dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya
26a2(rgyud): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sring po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo //
26a3(rgyud): badz+ra rAk+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi cho ga brtan pa'i phyir byung nas/
26a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje'i go cha chen po'i dbyibasu gyur nas/ phyag gnyis gnaso/ de nas rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de
26a5(rgyud): las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa pa thams cad kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsrung ba'i cho ga rgyas pa
26a6(rgyud): la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul cho 'phral rnams byas nas/ rAstems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub par dka' ba dang / shin du brtan par bya ba'i
26a7(rgyud): phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sebs dpa' chen po rtson 'grus thub par dka' ba'i lus gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang dkyi bugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod
26b1(rgyud): pa'i ched du brjod do// e ma'o brtson 'grus gor ni/ brtan pa'i bdag nyid bar brtan phyir lus min yang / rdo rje'i lus byed pa'i mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
26b2(rgyud): chen po thub par dka' ba de'i lus/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur te/ yang dka' nod cing zhugs par gyur to// de nas
26b3(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud rdzas cad 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje
26b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thug
26b5(rgyud): kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra yak+Sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen
26b6(rgyud): por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhug ste/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis gan so// de nas
26b7(rgyud): rdo rje bache ba'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang bajam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
27a1(rgyud): @#thams cad kyi bdug pa 'dul ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud
27a2(rgyud): thams cad rang du 'jobs pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa
27a3(rgyud): lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/ thugs rje can
27a4(rgyud): gyi thabs chen te// zhi yang sems can don du ni/ ma rungs par ni ston par 'gyur/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus
27a5(rgyud): su/ bcoms ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ dka' nod cing bzhags par gyur to// de nas
27a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu gtum pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa
27a7(rgyud): 'dul ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus med par byas pa dang / thams cad bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi babs chen/
27b1(rgyud): po'i ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa cing / dngos grub dpa pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje'i mche ba'i mngon na de byang chub sems dpa' chen po// bdud pam/
27b2(rgyud): cad 'joms pa de'i lag du de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
27b3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bos/ rdo rje mche ba'i mchod cha de rang gi snying khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
27b4(rgyud): 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon rdo ste/ thabs dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis//
27b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba
27b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang thugs rdo rje bcings pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
27b7(rgyud): bo'i da rang gi thugs/ nga nas byung ngo // dadz+ra san ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bugs las byung ma bag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de ci /
28a1(rgyud): don smras@#/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bcing bar gyur te/ byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugasu zhugs ste/ cig tu 'dres nas/ rdo rje bcing
28a2(rgyud): ba'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyi suganaso// de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs de las 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa
28a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams
28a4(rgyud): byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin du bcing ba dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems
28a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thug su zhugs ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
28a6(rgyud): e ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i/ dam tshig bdag ste rten pa'i bdag/ bsam pa thams cad rab grub phyir/ grol ba rnams kyang 'ching bar byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
28a7(rgyud): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyur gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgya ban zla ba'i dkyil
28b1(rgyud): 'khor la gnas nas/ yang dka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
28b2(rgyud): par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'ching ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //
28b3(rgyud): lha rnams kyi dgongs pa brtag par bya ba dang / 'grub pa grub pa thams cad dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
28b4(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu chen po de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje 'ching ba de byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa
28b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi khur chur zhes bya ba de'i lag du de bzhin du byino// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khu tshur zhes pa'i rdo rje ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sem
28b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya bas rdo rje bcing ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas zar
28b7(rgyud): cad kyi/ phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan/ sangs rgyas kun du byar 'byung phyir/ dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar bka'/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i/ cho ga/
29a1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i las dang / brtson 'grus chen po'i cho ga brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba'i
29a2(rgyud): ye shes 'di bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// bam po gnyis pa'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba/
29a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag
29a4(rgyud): rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
29a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs/ nas phyung ngo // sA ta badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gsheg/
29a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'din/ rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur te byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid/ 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
29a7(rgyud): bas cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ma deng mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zas cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag/
29b1(rgyud): rgyas bta nas yang gcig du 'dres ste/ 'jig rten gyi bas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi/ rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan
29b2(rgyud): sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// se ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan pa'i bdag/ gang phyir brtan pas lus
29b3(rgyud): med kyang / rdo rje'i lus su gyur pa yin/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs
29b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes la/ phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i
29b5(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyungango // rad na badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
29b6(rgyud): thas cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag du/ rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid/ rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang / 'jig
29b7(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad du rdu'i shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgyas
30a1(rgyud): ci dus #/ btab nas/ yang cig tu 'dres ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje ni ni po che'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
30a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje rin chen bdag nyid
30a3(rgyud): grags/ gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ dbang gi tshul ni brtan po yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyal pos/ de bzhin
30a4(rgyud): gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas btab pa'i phyir/ chos kyi
30a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
30a6(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi byugs kha nas byung ngo // d+harma badz+re/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu/ pad mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung
30a7(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das de rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// pang mo'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang btam pa'i/ de bzhin gshig
30b1(rgyud): pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas btab nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
30b2(rgyud): cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi/ rdo rje'i pad mo chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas//
30b3(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma'i bdag/ gang phyir rang bzhin rnams dag pas/ 'dod chags yin
30b4(rgyud): yang dri ma med/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ de bzhin
30b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab par bya ba'i phyir/ las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i
30b6(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i/ rang gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo / karma badz+ri/
30b7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ba zag tu/ las thams cad kyi 'od zer tu gyur nas bying ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin de nyid do// las
31a1(rgyud): nyid su / thams cad kyi 'od zer de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang banyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyar/
31a2(rgyud): gyur te/ de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs ste/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad
31a3(rgyud): tsam gyis thams cad du rtse mo bltas pa'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibasu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
31a4(rgyud): nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sre pa'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ las kyi rdo rje mang po dag/ gang phyir gcig khams sems can khams/ ma lus par ni las
31a5(rgyud): bzang byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rngan/
31a6(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnas so// de nas yang bco ldan 'das rnam par snang badzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig la
31a7(rgyud): dang ga rje khyen gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs das/ de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo 'di rang gi grags kha nas phyung ngo //
31b1(rgyud): badz+ra la se// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha las byung ma thag tu/ rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rdo rje'i
31b2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rtse mo de las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skar gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/
31b3(rgyud): lha mo chen me rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad/ rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang gzugs dang mtshan pa dang / spyod lam sna tshogs pa brgyan thams cad kyis blangs pa/
31b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad bsdus par gyur pa/ rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su
31b5(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o rang 'byung rnams kyi ni/ mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de/ gang phyir 'dod pa dga'
31b6(rgyud): mchod pas/ mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gi dam tshig las byung bI/
31b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mochen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pa le/
32a1(rgyud): de sdus@#/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu/ rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
32a2(rgyud): pa de nyid do// rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang / mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi skur gyur te/ lha mo
32a3(rgyud): chen mo rdo rje'i phreng ba mar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rmyi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di
32a4(rgyud): ched du brjod do// e ma'o rin chen mchod pa zhes/ bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa me/ gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchod kyang / rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ de nas
32a5(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu'i mchog gi dam tshig las byung ba'i/ rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhag
32a6(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra g+hi te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung
32a7(rgyud): ma ngag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
32b1(rgyud): chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/
32b2(rgyud): lha mo chen mo rdo rje'i glu gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang po rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogasu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di
32b3(rgyud): brjod do// e ma'o// bdag ni kun gzigs pa'i/ glu mchog tshul gyi mchod pa yin/ grang phyir skyu rnyan 'dra ba yi/ mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed/ de nas yang
32b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar kyi mchod pa'i tshig las byung ba'i/ rdo rje byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
32b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lha mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra na ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu/
32b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi rang
32b7(rgyud): gi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de dag thams cad las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur
33a1(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par gyur nas byung ngo // /
33a2(rgyud): rtog thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las/ 'jigs rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams phyung nas/ yang
33a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu rin po che las byas pa'i gran bra ba'i dkyil
33a4(rgyud): 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e me'o me tog mchod pa'i bdag/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de/ gang phyir mchod nas de bzhin gshegs/
33a5(rgyud): rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i
33a6(rgyud): lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
33a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra a lo ke/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu/ thams
33b1(rgyud): cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i dkod pas/ chos kyi dbyibs de dag thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ thams cad du snang
33b2(rgyud): nga'i mchod pa'i bkod pa de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres
33b3(rgyud): te/ lha me rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ga yin phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo dang nor bu rin po che las byis pa'i gron zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
33b4(rgyud): la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me 'di/ rgya chen dge ba dag yin te/ gang phyir snang bcas myur du ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan
33b5(rgyud): yang thob// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar
33b6(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dri'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas//
33b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bu bo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra g+han d+he/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma zag tu//
34a1(rgyud): de'i ltas #/ gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje lha mo chend me rdo rje gar gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i grub pa'i
34a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o// mched pa kun don mdzad pa'i/ mchod pa rgya chen
34a3(rgyud): bdag yin te/ gang phyir rdo rje gar mchog gis/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang /
34a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i
34a5(rgyud): mchod pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/
34a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu de sems dpa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog mo'i gtso
