34a7(rgyud): mo 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo / badz+ra pe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// bdug
34b1(rgyud): pa'i mchod pa'i sprin gyi bkod pa/ rnam pa du mas rdo rje dbyibs thams cad du khyab par gyur nas byung ngo // bdug pa'i mchod pa'i rgya mtsho de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi/
34b2(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi/ rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste/ yang gcig du 'dres nas/ rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i skur gyur
34b3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu rtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grwar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod
34b4(rgyud): pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa chen po pa/ rab tu sems ldan dge ba yin/ gang phyir sems can 'breb ldan pas/ myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur//
34b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i rgyan gyi
34b6(rgyud): mchod pa'i dam tshig las 'byung ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol kha
34b7(rgyud): ma 'di/ rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pus pa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi thugs las byung ba thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das
35a1(rgyud): de nyid/ #dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyad par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de/
35a2(rgyud): nyid do// dri thams cad kyi mchod pa'i bkod pa de las/ 'jig rten gyi khaMs thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa yi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang
35a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo rdo rje'i dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yen phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i
35a4(rgyud): grA na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o lha rdzas mchod pa yi/ yid 'ong dri ni bdag yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
35a5(rgyud): kya dri/ lus rnams kun la 'byin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yan lag bsngags pa dang / de bzhin
35a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun du snang ba dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin pa dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa'i dri
35a7(rgyud): rnams bla na med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dka' bzhin du byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
35b1(rgyud): dam tshig lcags kyu las byung ba'i sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dang /
35b2(rgyud): thams cad bdag po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+rA A g+hA sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byang ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham/
35b3(rgyud): cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gas pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyur zhes bya ba'i sku
35b4(rgyud): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu rtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa rdo rje sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshog
35b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ yang dag spyan 'dren brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir
35b6(rgyud): bdag gis spyan 'dren pas/ dkyil 'khor kun la brtan par 'gyur/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'jug pa/
35b7(rgyud): sems dpa'i chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i je rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par shugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dren pa gsol
36a1(rgyud): @kham 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra pa sha/ de nas de nazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs
36a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las 'dren pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
36a3(rgyud): 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra me dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu
36a4(rgyud): 'dres ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje zhabs pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las
36a5(rgyud): byas pa'i sgo gang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'jug cing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'i
36a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul bran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang / bdag gis slar yang drang bar bya/ de nas yang bcon ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
36a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i// seMs dpa' rdo rje ni bye ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
36b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo / badz+ra s+pho ta/ de nas de bzhin gshegs thams
36b2(rgyud): cad kyi thugs las 'di byang ma thag du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyi de/
36b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs
36b4(rgyud): pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags grog zhes bya ba'i skar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs brtse ma rdo rje
36b5(rgyud): dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgo khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching zhing / ched du brjod pa 'di
36b6(rgyud): ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje lcags sgrogs dam po bdag/ bcings pa kun las grol ba rnams/ sems can don rnams bcings par 'dod// /
36b7(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba'i/ sems dpa' chen po dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
37a1(rgyud): nal snyoms zhigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dran 'di rang gi thugs/ kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra a be sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
37a2(rgyud): kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gsheg/
37a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po de dag las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ gcig tu 'dres
37a4(rgyud): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi sgo
37a5(rgyud): khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
37a6(rgyud): rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa'i bdag/ kun gyi bdag tu gyur nas kyang / bran du yang ni gyur pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang
37a7(rgyud): dbang bya ba rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba gyis rlangs pa'i
37b1(rgyud): byir/ rdo rje se gol gyis mtshan mdzad das/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin brlabs 'di gsungs so// badz+ra sa ma yAdz+dza/ de nas skad gcig yung tsam thang gcig
37b2(rgyud): gis/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi se gol gyis mtshan pas bskal ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams
37b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas ste/ khang bu brtsegs brtse mo rdo rje dang / nor
37b4(rgyud): bu dang rin po che las byas pa gangan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na ba der gshegs ste/ ched du byon nas/ oM sarba tadza ga ta pa ta
37b5(rgyud): b+han d+ha/ na kha ro mi zhes brjod do/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ni ci dga' bar bzlos shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal la/
37b6(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' ni/ kun tu bzang po spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yis/ dbus na de bzhin gsheg
37b7(rgyud): pa mdzes/ de nas de skad ces gsungs pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems
38a1(rgyud): da#/ dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
38a2(rgyud): mdzad kyi thugasu zhug so// de nas bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas ste byung nas/
38a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor dang rin po che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du gyur nas/ snyoms par zhugs ste/ zhugs nas
38a4(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rgya chen gdod nas skyes pa med// rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu
38a5(rgyud): 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang cig tu bsngos nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus med pa rnams yongs su
38a6(rgyud): bskyabs pa dang / thams cad la bde ba dang phan pa btang nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang yang dag par
38a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub dngos grub dam pa'i bar gyi phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad
38b1(rgyud): kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad po 'dis gsol ba btab po// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ rdo rje de bzhin
38b2(rgyud): gshegs pa kun/ rdo rje dang po kun du bzang / phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs/ don yod rgyal po rdo rje
38b3(rgyud): mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje mgug khyed la'o// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po/ rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa/ bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje gzhu khyod la/ rdo rje legs
38b4(rgyud): pa sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje dga' ba dgu pa che/ rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la'o// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje'i don/ rdo rje nam mkha'i rna bu
38b5(rgyud): che/ na mkha'i snying po rdo rje phyag/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje snyid khyod la'o// rdo rje gzi brjid che 'bar ba/ rdo rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i 'od// rdo rje 'od zer gzi brjid che/ phyag 'tshal
38b6(rgyud): rdo rje 'od khyod la'o// sems can don mdzad rdo rje'i dpal/ rdo rje nga rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la'o// rdo rje bzhad
38b7(rgyud): mo ngand pa che/ rdo rje 'dzub pa ngo mtshar che/ dga' shing rab dga' rdo rje ston/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dag 'byod la'o// rdo rje chos rab de nyid dor/ rdo rje pad mo rab dga' byed/
39a1(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje'i spyan/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje spun khyod la'o// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che/ rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab/
39a2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal rdo rje bro khyod la'o// rdo rje rgyu dang snying po che/ rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po// rab bskor rdo rje las byung ba/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'khor lo la'o// rdo rje gsung ba rang rigs
39a3(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje bzlos pa rab bsgrub sbyin/ mi gsung rdo rje mchog grub pa/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la'o// rdo rje las rab rdo rje'i dga'/ las kyi rdo rje kun rab grol/
39a4(rgyud): rdo rje nges pa rgya che ba/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la'o// rdo rje bsrung ba brten pa che/ rdo rje go cha sra ba che/ brtson 'grus phyogs ni thub par dka'/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus
39a5(rgyud): la'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che/ bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la'o// rdo rje 'tsham sbyor rab tu bdud/
39a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'ching bar rabagrel byed/ rdo rje khu chung dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khur tshur la'o// su zhig mi rnams 'chang ba na/ zhi ba'i rgya rtsa brgyad po 'di/ rdo rje ming dbang bskur
39a7(rgyud): logros/ mchog rnams kun gyis de dbang bskur/ gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis/ rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la/ rtags tu glu'i bstod pa ni/ de yang rdo rje 'chang chen las/
39b1(rgyud): rtags tu glu yang bstod pa ni/ de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur/ ming rgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis de ni bstod pa yin/ theg bachen po rtogs pa yis/ tshul chen yang ni rgyas
39b2(rgyud): par mdzod/ mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni/ sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi/ cho ga 'di ni bshad par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'ad
39b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ gsol ba'i tshig 'di thos nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin
39b4(rgyud): gyi brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i tang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas yang dag bshad
39b5(rgyud): bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po bshad bya ba/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar grags/ sems dpa' che zhi phyag rgya che/
39b6(rgyud): sgo bzhi byin gyis brlabs bgyid cing / dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du/ ci rigasu ni mchis nas kyang / phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs/ kun tu rnam par ltas nas ni/
39b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod de/ bsgying ba'i tshul du yongs su bskor/ sar pa legs par dkal nas kyang / chad dang thun pa mdzes pa yi/ thig gi mkhas pas ni nus kyi/
40a1(rgyud): de nyid lpa@#/ dkyil 'khor gyis ni thig gtab cing / grub bzhi bgyi zhing bsgo bzhi dang / rta babs bzhi ni mdzes bgyis las/ thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa/
40a2(rgyud): dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ gra'i phyogs ni thams cad dang / sgo khyud kyi ni nang rnams/ rdo rje rin chen spras nas ni/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gtab po// de'i rim pa
40a3(rgyud): nang zhags las/ 'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje'i/ thig gis yongasu bskor bar bya/ ka ba brgyas kyis mdzes bgyis la/ rdo rje ka ba'i nang los gsu/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
40a4(rgyud): lngas brgyan pas/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbusu ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ni gzugs bzhag cing / sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi/ dkyil 'khor rnams kyis dbus
40a5(rgyud): rnams/ rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par bzhag par gyi/ dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag du/ rdo rje gom pas song nas ni/ mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yi//
40a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad bzhag/ mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje 'dzin sogs mnyam par bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje sring sogs
40a7(rgyud): rdzogs par bzhag/ tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo spyan sogs dag par bzhag/ gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje rgya rab bzhag par bya/ 'khor lo grwa
40b1(rgyud): yi gnas rnams/ rdo rje lnga po rnams kyang bzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams/ sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams kyang bzhag/ sgo rnams kun byi dang du ni/ sgo bsrungs bzhi
40b2(rgyud): yang bzhag par bya/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogasu ni/ sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ tshi ga bzhin
40b3(rgyud): bcings bzhugs nas kyang / sprod ta'i phyag rgya dbab par bya/ de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di la sogs/ a bdag la byin brlabs sogs/ ji ltar ba
40b4(rgyud): ni bka' nod do// de ltar bgyis la bdag ming brjod/ de nas rdo rje bsgrub bgyis pa/ rdo rje snod pon sems pa yi/ rdo rje lcags kyus bcings nas ni/ se gol mang
40b5(rgyud): po dbab dgyes la/ sangs rgyas thams cad brda bar bya/ de che sangs rgyas thams cad ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams/
40b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnamasu 'du bar 'gyur/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ phyag rgya chen po bsgom byed cing / ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ bcung zad par du brjod par bya/
40b7(rgyud): dri nas 'dus pa dbyes nas ni/ de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa' rang bsgrub pa/ grig pa nyid du nye bar gnas/ de nas sgo rnams pas ca/
41a1(rgyud): de ning / lcags kyu la sogs las gyis nas/ las ni mchog gri phyag rgya yis/ dam tshig rnams ni bzhag par bgyi/ dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ sems dpa'i/
41a2(rgyud): rdo rje la sogs pa/ de ltar sems dpa' chen po grub/ dza hUM baM ho zhes brjod cing / de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pas/ sems dpa' chen po kun bsdus par/ spyan drangs nas
41a3(rgyud): ni rab tu bzhugs/ bcings nas de'i dbang du 'gyur/ de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams/ gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes dgyes la/ thams cad don kun 'grub par 'gyur//
41a4(rgyud): thams cad mdzod ces gsol ba yis/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ de bzhin du las bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir ni//
41a5(rgyud): rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par mchiso// de la dang po ni bzhugs pa lags te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
41a6(rgyud): pa rnams yongs bsgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde thams cad dang / dngos grub mchog rte nga 'bras bu cid kyi drud // dkyil 'a'o /
41a7(rgyud): po 'dir zhugs pa la snad du gyur pa dang / mgyur pa ni brtag mi 'tshal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can bcig ni sdig pa chen po bgyis
41b1(rgyud): pa yang mchis ste/ de gug rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs te mthong nas// ngan song thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nor dang bza' ba dang /
41b2(rgyud): btung ba dang 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang / dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang / sngar sprad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis ste/ de dag kyang ji
41b3(rgyud): ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyis bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can kha cig ni gar dang glu dang gad mo dang
41b4(rgyud): rtsed mo dang / kha zas dang spyod pa la dga' ba rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du chud pas/ lha gzhan gyi rigs dang dkyil
41b5(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yang dag par bsdus par gyur pa med pa'i dga' ba dang / mgu ba
41b6(rgyud): dang rengs pa rnams byung bar byed pa/ der ni srab pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing bskrag nas/ mi 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de nas ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par
41b7(rgyud): khang ltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang / dga' ba dang mgu ba dang dam pa thams cad 'grub cing / bde ba dang yid bde bamyong bar bgyi ba dang / ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug
42a1(rgyud): denyidapa kha bltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug du rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi
42a2(rgyud): sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dngos grub thabs kyis/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba ni/ bsam
42a3(rgyud): gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / sa rnams kyis 'bad cing / nyon mongs par gyur pa dag kyang bachis ste/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhags ma thag
42a4(rgyud): tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub par rnyed par dka' ba yang ma lags na/ dngos gzhan lha mos kyang ci 'tshal// de la dang po kho nar/ de bzhin gshegs pa
42a5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag bzhi bya'o// de ni 'di lta bus thams cad kyis rdo rje'i thal mo brgyad ste/ phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dze pa tha na ya ad mnam/
42a6(rgyud): nir+ya tan ya myi/ sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra swa ta/ a ti tiSh+Tha sA ma ma/ zhes brjod do// de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo la sogs pa snying khar bzhag te/ dpral bar phyag 'tshal
42a7(rgyud): zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa a b+hi she ka ya/ ad ma nam ni r+yA ta na ya mi/ sarba ta dza ga ta badz+ra rad na a b+hik+Shit+ta tsa maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/
42b1(rgyud): rdo rje thal mo spyi bor bzhag ste/ khas phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du brjod do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa pra ba ra te na ya/ a da man ma nir+yA ta na ya mi/ sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar/
42b2(rgyud): tan ya mi/ zhes brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bo nas bab ste/ snying khar bzhag ste spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du
42b3(rgyud): brjod do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa ka ra ma ne/ ad b+h+ra ma na ma ni ya ta na ya mai/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru maM/ zhes brjod do// de nas stod g.yogs dmar po gon la/ gdong /
42b4(rgyud): ras dmar po bkris nas/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings nas snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya s+t+waM// de nas gung mo gnyis kyi me rtog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la//
42b5(rgyud): drang zhing sring po 'di brjod do// sa ma ye hU~M/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad sgrogs shing / deng khyod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod
42b6(rgyud): la ye shes gang gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos ste/ de lta bu'i rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya ba yis// /
42b7(rgyud): khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig dang tshi gnyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo slob dben cid kyis rdo rjemams dpa' jo rje'i phyag rgya ba nangs
43a1(rgyud): de'i stug/ bstan pa dang phyir bstan pa bcings la/ rdo rje slo ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste// 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// 'di khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin/ gal te
43a2(rgyud): 'ga' zhig la sdus na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang man 'a chu'i snying pos sngags la slob ma de mthung du bzhug go// de la mda'i snying po
43a3(rgyud): 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod nyid kyi/ snying la yang dag zhags par mdzad/ gal te 'ga' zhig la smra na/ de nas de ma thag du khyod kyi snying dral te gshegs so//
43a4(rgyud): oM badz+red ta ka shrA/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad du sgos shig/ dong phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis/ ngas khyod 'di byo shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so//
43a5(rgyud): khyod nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas/ khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ zhes spos la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
43a6(rgyud): cad kyi byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' dga' la babs par gyur cig/ ces smros shig par dgo'o// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa' rdo rje'i
43a7(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings pa 'di skad du sma ru bzhugo/ 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags/ rdo rje ye shes bla med 'di/ de ring nyid du dbab par shog/
43b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra a pe sha a a/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings la/ sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya drangs la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di ji dga' bar/
43b2(rgyud): brjod du bzhug go// de nas phab ste babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skyed par gyur te/ ye shes de pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyuraro// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar
43b3(rgyud): byung ba rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la 'di sems bstan par 'gyur ro// 'di yi zug bsngal thams
43b4(rgyud): cad zad par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob
43b5(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams thams cad ni 'di yi mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rangs pa med pa'i bde ba thams
43b6(rgyud): cad 'di las skyes par 'gyur ro// bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig gis ni gzungs dang / kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad
43b7(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa nas/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad grub pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// phyag rgyas de bcings la rang gi snying khar 'gro la'i snying po 'di/
44a1(rgyud): naslar bzhu go// tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+hi doma~M b+ha ba/ sha sho te me b+ha ba d+hA d+hA ya ye me ma ti Ti tra sarba si tI ma me pre yan \u0f7f hUM ha ha ha ha ho/ de nas me tog gi phreng ba ded kyi
44a2(rgyud): 'khor chen por kator zhing // snying po 'di yang sgrar bzhu go/ pra ti dza badz+ra ho// de nas gang la babs par de 'dis 'grub po// de nas phreng ba de blangs ste 'go bor bcings
44a3(rgyud): la snying po 'di slar bzhago// oM pra ti g+hi Na tA ma man sAd tA ma hA pa la/ de bcings nas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur/
44a4(rgyud): de nas de ltar babs bzhin du gdong g.yog bkrol te/ snying po 'di yang spar bzhago/ oM badz+ra srad to swa yan ter+ya tsag kyu ud ta yan sarba go/ badz+ra cog kyur bung ta mar me te/
44a5(rgyud): badz+ra pa sha/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po rim bzhin du bstan no// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong ma thag du yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par
44a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang 'di yis snying la na gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs pa phyir/ 'od zer sna tshogs pa la sogs pa'i dkyil
44a7(rgyud): 'khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur// gal te na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin de nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
44b1(rgyud): sku nyid ston par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad don thams cad dang / yid kyis dgongs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid dam/ de bzhin
44b2(rgyud): gshegs pa grub pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i nang gi dri chu dang / snying po 'dir dbang bskur bar bya'o//
44b3(rgyud): badz+ra a di ni dza/ de nas phyag rgya dang phreng ba gang yang rung ba cig bcings la/ rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i
44b4(rgyud): dbang / de ring khyod la bskur bar bya/ sangs rgyas kun durab grub phyir/ rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long / oM badz+ra sa ti s+t+waM a b+hi k+Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M// de nas sring po
44b5(rgyud): 'dis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bsku ro// oM badz+ra sAd ta taM a d+hi sh+tsin mi badz+ra na ma a d+hi she ka tra/ kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming brjod pa de/ kye zhes brjod par bya'o//
44b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas ci khyod don 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang / rdzu 'bral gyi dngos grub chen po dang / rigs 'dzin gyi
44b7(rgyud): dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog grub pa'i ye shes kyi der du gang 'dod ces smras la/ de na gang gi gang 'dod pa
45a1(rgyud): de de la brjod par bya'o// de nas don thams rgyud kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// rdo rje dbyings ni bder gnas pa/ sring /
45a2(rgyud): khar yongasu bsgom par bya/ bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yis/ mthong bar 'gyur/ rdo rje'i dbyibs kyi bris nas kyang / na mkha'i ngos lnga bsgom par bya/ gang du ltung ba mthong
45a3(rgyud): ba der/ gter yod par ni rnam par bshad/ blo ldan mi yis rdo rje dbyibs/ lce'i steng du bsgoms nas ni/ 'dan yod ces bdag nyid kyis/ bden pa nyid de smra bar 'gyur/
45a4(rgyud): bdag gi lus ni thams cad la/ rdo rje'i dbyibasu bsgom nas ni/ babs par gyur nas gar gnas par/ gter ni den yod par bshad/ de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra
45a5(rgyud): ni ngi oM badz+ra rad naHbadz+ri ni deHoM badz+ra d+harmaHbadz+rin d+hiH/ oM badz+ra karmaHbadz+ri ni d+hiHde nas rdo rje rdzu 'phral gyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//
45a6(rgyud): rdo rje dbab par byas nas ni/ tshul rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar/ bsgoms nas rgya'i steng na par/ 'gro ba'i dngos grub myung du bob/ de ltar babs par byas kyang / gang gi gzug
45a7(rgyud): su bdag gis lus/ sgom par gyur na bdag nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyis ni bskur yang 'gyur/ de ltar bdag la pa banas kyang / bdag gis bdag nyid nam khar ni/ snyoms par gyur
45b1(rgyud): na ji srid du/ 'dod pa de sred mi snang 'gyur/ rdo rje dbab par bdag 'gyur nas/ rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na/ gnas nas ji srid 'di 'dod pa/ de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/
45b2(rgyud): de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra dza lA/ badz+ra ru pa/ badz+ra ka sha/ badz+ra ma haM/ de nas rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par byas ste/
45b3(rgyud): zla ba'i dbyibs cig bris nas ni/ steng gi mkha' la 'phags byas ste/ lag par rdo rje bsgom nas ni/ rdo rje'i rigs pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ zla ba'i dbyibs de 'dug nas ni//
45b4(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms nas/ bdag nyid dag pa ji srid 'dod/ de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur/ zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug nas ni/ rdo rje pad mo la gnas par/ bsgoms
45b5(rgyud): nas rdo rje'i spyan gyis ni/ rigs 'dzin go 'bar sbyin par byed/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas/ las kyi rdo rje bsgoms nas ni/ rdo rje rigs 'dzin kun du bsgrub/ de dag
45b6(rgyud): gis snyi po 'di dag yino// badz+ra d+ha raHd+ha rad na d+ha ra/ d+harma d+ha raHkarma d+hA raHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
45b7(rgyud): bar bya ste/ rdo rje kun gyi ting nge 'dzin nam pa'i dbyib su bsgoms nas ni/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid par du lding bar 'dod// kun las dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/
46a1(rgyud): bsgoms na bra med de bzhin du/ ye shes 'grub pas myur du ni/ mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bas ni/ na mkha'
46a2(rgyud): thams cad dran byas nas/ bdag nyin dran pa brtan ldan zhing / rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur/ na mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du/ sangs rgyas gzugasu dmyigs na ni/
46a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi ting nge 'dzin las/ sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra badz+ra/ shu d+ha shu d+ha/ swa tra swa tra/ b+hud+d+ha b+ha d+ha/
46a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnamaso// de nas gsang thub pa yin pas de la re shig dang por mna'i snying po sbyin par bya'o// oM badz+ra srad ta swa min te
46a5(rgyud): hri dad ye sa ma ya bas ti ta ni b+hid r+yad tad k+Sha na na/ ya yang ya ti d+had yad i d+ha na na ya/ de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i snying po 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig/
46a6(rgyud): khyed kyis gnod pa ma spangs par dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re/ lus 'di nyid kyis dpral bar ltung bar gyur ta re/ zhes dgo' bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i
46a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje dbang par byas nas nas ni/ mnyam par bzhag pa'i rdo rje yisaM/ thal mo ros ni dal brdabs nas/ ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur
46b1(rgyud): rdo rje 'jal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbang pa'i cho ga yis/ rdo rje gasdams pa'i ngos kyis ni/ dal gyis brdabs pa'i sbyor ba yi/ ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs/ de bzhin pa'i
46b2(rgyud): cho ga yis/ rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas ni/ sor me rtse mo rnams brdabs nas/ rigs brgya yud gyis brlag par 'gyur/ dal gyis brdabs pa'i cho ga byas/ mnyam par
46b3(rgyud): bzhag pas sor mo kun/ rdo rje brdams pa dkrol ba ni/ gnod pa kun las gsal ba'i mchog/ de nas de dag gis gsang ba bsgrub pa ni 'di yin ste/ bud med dam ni skyes/
46b4(rgyud): pa lnga'i/ bu ga'i nang du 'jug par bya'o// yid kyis de ltar zhags nas kyang / de'i lus kun khyab par bsams/ de la thal mo'o slong po ni 'di yin no// badz+ra b+ha shra badz+ra/
46b5(rgyud): a bi sha/ badz+ra an/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas rang gi rigs kyi lha'i snying po byin la phyag rgya bzhi pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar byas ste/ khyod kyis
46b6(rgyud): phyag rgya mi shes pas gzhan su rung ba la/ phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig/ ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems
46b7(rgyud): can de dag gis phyag rgya 'ching bar byas na/ de'i tshe de dag de lta 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de dag be com du gyur te/ gnod pa ma spangs pas myur du dus byas nas dpyal
47a1(rgyud): bachen por mnar med pa zhes bya bar 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / sems dpa'i bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po shes par/
47a2(rgyud): bya ba yin te/ sems rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni/ rdo rje dbyings zhes brjod byed cing / sangs rgyas skur ni bdag 'gyur bas/ rdo rje nyi ma bsgoms par bya/ grab ma thag du de yis
47a3(rgyud): ni/ ye shes che thobs na tshad dang / kun du 'gro ba nyid rnams thob/ sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba med/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa/
47a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje 'gyings pa sem bskyed bcing / sgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na/ rdo rje
47a5(rgyud): sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur/ 'dis ni kun du 'gro ba dang / 'dod pa kun bdag po de chen dang / rdzu 'phrul che stobs gzugs mchog rnams/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar
47a6(rgyud): 'gyur/ sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis/ ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing / mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams ldan par/ sems dpa' chen po bsgrub par bya/ de nas 'dir ni rtogs
47a7(rgyud): kun gyi/ bsgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang / grub pa rnams kyi las can rnams/ go rings bzhin du bshad par bya/ dang por nyin dus bzhin du/ rang la byin gyis brlabs la sog/
47b1(rgyud): byas na thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ de'i 'og tu ci dga' bya/ de la phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje dbab par byas nas ni/ phyag rgya chen po'i cho ga bzhin/
47b2(rgyud): bcings nas de'i mdun phyogasu/ sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo// ye shes sems dpa' de bathong nas// rang gi lus la bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcing /
47b3(rgyud): bar bya/ dbang du byas ste bsgrub par bya// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra satwa a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o// badz+ra sad ta tri sha ho// sems dpa' rjes su
47b4(rgyud): dran par bya ba'i snying po'o// dzi hUM baM ho// sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya ste// zhes brjod
47b5(rgyud): pas/ rgyab du zla ba grub nas ni/ der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom/ sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM zhes brjod pas/ gzhan la bsgreng ba sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang / der ni bdag
47b6(rgyud): du bsgoms nas ni/ rdo rje bzlas pas grub par bya/ phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'o// gzhan yang bsgrub pa chen po ni/ dza huM baM haM zhes brjod pas/ legs pa'i cho ga yid kyis ni/
47b7(rgyud): lus la sangs rgyas kun bzhug go// de nas bla med rdo rje las/ de dag gi ni las bshad de/ sangs rgyas rjes dran pa sgrub na/ sang+yas nyid du myur du 'gyur/ sems dpa' rdo rje/
48a1(rgyud): / bgrub na// phyag n+ya kun gyis bdag por 'gyur/ rin ched rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur/ chos kyi rdo rje grub na ni/ sangs rgyas chos ni
48a2(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur/ las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya las/ rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing ba yis/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dren pa'i
48a3(rgyud): cho ga yis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya yis/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed/ rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis/ sangs rgyas thams cad
48a4(rgyud): dgyes par byed/ rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis/ sangs rgyas dbang bskur thob par 'gyur/ rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub/ rdo rje dpal dan rten pas ni/ re ba rnams ni yongs su
48a5(rgyud): bskor / rdo rje gzhad pa'i cho ga yas/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du gzhad/ rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yas/ rdo rje chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis/ sangs rgyas kun
48a6(rgyud): gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin rten pas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ rdo rje bsrung ba'i cho ga yis/ blo dang tshig na grub pa thob/ rdo rje'i las mchog bsgrub
48a7(rgyud): pa ni/ rdo rje las grub pa 'grub/ rdo rje go cha gon pas na/ rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur/ rdo rjeganod sbyin bsgrubs pas na/ rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur/ rdo rje 'a chung ba nyis
48b1(rgyud): pas na/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'grub// rdo rje 'dzin pas bsgrubs pas na/ rdo rje rol pa chen po thob/ rdo rje 'phreng ba bcings pas na/ sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang grub 'gyur//
48b2(rgyud): rdo rje glu'i cho ga yis/ rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur/ rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ sangs rgyas la de mchod do// rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad/ rdo rje pa
48b3(rgyud): tog sbyor ba yis/ des ni 'gro dbang byed par 'gyur/ rdo rje snad ba phyag rgya ches/ rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed/ rdo rje dri'i tsho gas ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed/
48b4(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyu drangs nas ni/ 'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur/ rdo rje zhags pa'i cho ga yis/ thams cad rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ rdo rje lcags grog sbyor ba yis/ thams
48b5(rgyud): cad cing nganus par 'gyur/ rdo rje dbab po'i cho ga yis/ thams cad dbab pa grub par 'gyur/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad pa
48b6(rgyud): yin te/ thal mo sdams pa las/ sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni/ rdo rje thal mor bka' bstsal te/ rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams/ dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni//
48b7(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na/ de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yis/ bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya/ rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ gung ma myu gu ltar mnyam bsgreng / gung ma/
49a1(rgyud): dan / nang du gshibs pa ni/ sangs rgyas gnyis pa yin par bshad/ gung po rin chen 'dra ba dang / gung mo pad+ma 'dra ba bkug/ sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni/
49a2(rgyud): de bzhin badzub mo bkug pa'o// de banas de bzhin gshegs pa yis/ rigs ni dam tshig 'dzin pa yis/ phyag rgya bsdams dang dngos grub dang / las rnams yang dag bshad
49a3(rgyud): par bya/ zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyis/ gung mo gtang bar gyur pa yi/ the bong 'the chung so sor bsgreng / sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje/ 'dzub mo lcags kyu 'dzub mo sbyar/
49a4(rgyud): legaso// sbyin pa 'dra ba ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhi pa yi/ phyag rgya mang po'i dngos grub 'dri'o// 'the 'ong ba shibs la 'dzub gnyis bcag/ rtse sprad rin chen rdo rje yin//
49a5(rgyud): de gnyis gung mo srin legs dang / 'bebacung rnams ni bsnol brkyang ngo // de las srin lag 'the chung gnyis/ mnyam par bshibs pa rgyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni bskor nas
49a6(rgyud): kyang / kha'i phyogasu bzhag pa'o// the bong gnyis ka mnyam par gshibs/ 'dzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang / gur mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mo bkug/ de nyid rdo rje ral gri'i/ de la
49a7(rgyud): srin lag ze chung bshibs/ 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/ bsdams las ngo bong gnyis dkrol la/ bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o// 'be 'ong ba chung rtse sprad bkyed//
49b1(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad/ de las 'dzub mo gnyis gshibs la/ snying khar brkyang te bzhag pa'o// rab tu brgyad te bzhag pa'o// 'dzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la/ 'the
49b2(rgyud): chung gshibs pa'i mche ba'o// 'the chung gnyis par the bong gnyis/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyis brtsir ba'o// snying bar 'the bong gshings la bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba ma/ bal
49b3(rgyud): sbyar rtse mo kha nas 'byung / gar las thal sbyar spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje bcing pa bur du blugs/ thal mo sbyar ba gyen du 'thor/ 'the bong mnyam ste rab tu brkyang / rab tu brkyang nas
49b4(rgyud): byug pa'o// 'dzub mo gcig pur bkug pa dang / 'the bong gnyis ni mdud pa dor/ 'bre bor 'jug mo lta bur bo cing / rdo rje bcing ba 'dzub mor bsdams/ de nas 'di rnams
49b5(rgyud): bsgrub par bshad de/ rdo rje bsgrub pa bsdams pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ rang gi phyag rgya snying khar bzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las bshad de/ rdo rje las ni
49b6(rgyud): bla na med/ rdo rje dbyings lnga'i phyag rgyas ni/ de bzhin gshegs dang 'dus pa yis/ dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob mar bcas/ de ma thag du byin gyis brlobs/ sems
49b7(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje bcings pa yis/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje lcags kyus bcings pa yis/ sangs rgyas kun yang 'gags par byed/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba yis/
50a1(rgyud): #rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gnyis par byed/ rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/ legaso bar ni bstod par byed/ rdo rje rin chen bcings bsan/ sangs rgyas kun gyi/
50a2(rgyud): der dbang bskur/ rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas na/ sangs rgyas kyi ni 'od 'dra 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'chang 'gyur bas/ re ba kun kyang rdzogs par byed/ rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul
50a3(rgyud): gyis ni/ sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig band/ chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na/ rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje ral gri thogs pas na/ nyon mongs thams cad des bcod/
50a4(rgyud): do// rdo rje 'khor lo brtan byas pas/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur/ rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor bas ni/ rdo rje dag mchog 'grub par 'gyur/ las kyi rdo rje bcings pas ni/ rje/
50a5(rgyud): las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje go cha bzang byas pas/ lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya mchog/ ma rungs bdud ni des 'jom so// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcing
50a6(rgyud): pas/ phyag rgya kun yang dbang du 'gyur/ 'joms pas lha'i dga' ba rnams/ phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams/ rlung gis rtag tu skad gsal ba/ gar gyi mchod pa mnyes par
50a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ bdug pas 'jig rten dga' bar byed/ me tog gi ni mdzes pa'i gzugs/ mar ma yis ni snang bas dag/ dri las lha rdzas dri can du'o// rdo rje lcags kyus 'gus
50b1(rgyud): par byed/ rdo rje zhags pas 'jug par byed/ rdo rje lcags grog bcings pa ste/ rdo rje dril bu 'bebs pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya bshad/ badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams//
50b2(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings ni brtan par byed/ de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa/ chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin/ sa ma ya ste zhes brjod nas/ phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur/ a na ya
50b3(rgyud): sba zhes brjod na/ phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur/ gdon mi za ba sangs rgyas 'grub/ a ho su ka zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par byed/ sa du sa du zhes
50b4(rgyud): brjod na/ legs pa'i tshig gis der dgar byed/ su ma ha daM zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskar thob/ ru pa to ta zhes brjod na/ chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur/
50b5(rgyud): a tha pra ba ti zhes brjod/ re ba kun ni rdzogs par byed/ ha ha hA he zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur/ sarba ga ri zhes brjod na/ mi bya ba yis las rnams spong /
50b6(rgyud): du kha tshe ta zhes brjod na/ de ni sdug bsngal thams cad bcod/ b+h+yo ta b+ho di zhes brjod na/ dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ pra ti sha ba ta zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas
50b7(rgyud): rnams dang lhan cig sgra/ su pra shid dang zhes brjod ni/ kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/ nor ba la stezhes brjod na/ de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur/ shadra b+ha ba zhes
51a1(rgyud): brjod na/
51a2(rgyud): #// dgra'angs cad pa par 'gyur/ sardza me sdigs brjodan/ sangs cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur/ mang da A'i dpa'ag/ rlung shings gzugs babang ga
51a3(rgyud): shu ra so'u khye bde ba sbyin/ sarba pu tsa mchod pa byed/ pra ha da ni yid bde bar 'gyur/ pha la zhes pas 'bras bu mdzod/ su de dza kra gzi brjid ce/ su gan dang kri d+hi mchog chen/
51a4(rgyud): a ya hi dza 'gugs par byed pa/ a hi hUM hUM 'jug par byed pa/ he bod ta baM bcing ba chen po// gan d+ha a a rab bskyed pa/ de nas de dag gi chos kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa dges
51a5(rgyud): bshad do// lce lam rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang / las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa bshad de/ rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings ste/ mnyam
51a6(rgyud): par bzhag pas gnyis su bya/ rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings ste/ de nas bcing ba rab tu bshad/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mon/ g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya/ byang chub
51a7(rgyud): mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o// mi g.yo ba'i sa reg dang / rin chen gyi ni mchog sbyin pa'o// tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za
51a8(rgyud): ba'i 'jigs sbyin pa/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams/ rdo rje las rnams byed ste/ bsgyings
51b1(rgyud): bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis/ lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang / mda' 'phang ba'i tshul dang ni/ leg so zhes pa snying khar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis/ snying
51b2(rgyud): khar nyi ma brtan par bya/ g.yon pa la ni grub mo gzugs/ de bzhin kha phyogs bskor ba dang / g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa byed/ sring khar g.yon pa ral gri 'dung / 'gal
51b3(rgyud): me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang / rdo rje gnyis kha nas 'byung / rdo rje gar bskor 'grol ba yi/ thal mo 'gram pa spyi bo 'gram/ go cha 'the chung mche ba dang // bu tshur gnyis ni gnod
51b4(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis ni/ bsam pa g.yos pas dang par bya/ phreng ba bcing dang kha nas dbyung / rdo rje gar gi bskor ba yis/ rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni/ bdug
51b5(rgyud): pa la sogs de bzhin sbyar/ sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yis/ phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa po// 'dzub mo kun gyis rdo rje ni/ 'the chung las te lcags kyu che/ khrig ma 'dud
51b6(rgyud): pa 'dzub gnyis 'dud/ rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam te mnan/ de nas 'di rnams bsgrub par bshad/ rdo rje las ni byed pa dang / rdo rje kun gyis rdo rje ni/ rang gi snying la
51b7(rgyud): bsgoms par bya/ de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams/ rdo rje las ni rnam par mang / ye shes khu chur bcings pas na/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur/ mi g.yo ba yi
52a1(rgyud): den snus#/ bcings pa ni/ yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ gzhan la phan pa byed par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag
52a2(rgyud): rgya ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ mi 'jigs mchog gi myur bar ni/ sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ rdo rje 'gying pa brtan byas pas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bde
52a3(rgyud): brnyed/ rdo rje lcags kyu ska cig du/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun yang 'gags/ bdag gis rdo rje mda' yis ni/ rdo rje lha mo mnyes pa byed/ rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun/ legs
52a4(rgyud): zhes bya tshig kyang sbyin/ rdo rje chen po'i nor bu bcings/ ston pa rnams kyi de dbang bskur/ rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni/ rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgreng pas ni/
52a5(rgyud): des ni rin chen char yang 'bebs/ rdo rje 'dzum pas bcings pa ni/ sangs rgyas 'dra ba myur du bzhad/ rdo rje me tog bcings pas ni de yis rdo rje chos rnams mthong / rje/
52a6(rgyud): rje ral gri brtan bcings pas/ des ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod/ rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas na/ chos kyi 'khor lo bcings pas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
52a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni/ rdo rje bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis/ sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/ rdo rje go chas lus bcing /
52b1(rgyud): pas/ rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur/ rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed/ bdug pa yis ni yid dga' ba/ me tog gis ni rgyan rnams ste/ mer me dri ni gzi chen po/ rdo rje dri ni rab tu ldan/
52b2(rgyud): rdo rje lcags kyus 'gugs par byed/ rdo rje zhags pa 'jug pa'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'ching bar byed/ rdo rje dril bu bskyed pa po/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcing
52b3(rgyud): ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad// de la thog ma nyid du/ rdo rje bcing ba snying khar brdab par byas te/ snying po 'di brjod do// badz+ra ban d+ha tra tha/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa kun/ rang
52b4(rgyud): gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i dbang bskur du 'gyur/ de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// a/ de nas phyag rgya'i dam tshig
52b5(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rjesu dran par bya'o// snying po 'di brjod do// ma hA sa ma ya ta haM/ 'dis na phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
52b6(rgyud): de nas spyi'i bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad de/ de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa' bdag snying por 'di bsgom mo// sa ma ya
52b7(rgyud): satwa ho/ de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpa' bsgom nas/ sngags 'di byin gyis brlobs// sa ma ye sa twa ya ti tiSh+Tha sra ma ma/ de nas bsgrub par bya'o// bsgrub pa'i
53a1(rgyud): @chog rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pang bshad de/ de la thog mar reb shig nor bu grub pa 'dod na/ snying po 'di yin no// sarba d+harma si ti/
53a2(rgyud): 'dis phyag rgya grub na nor chen po bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas rdo rje grub par 'dod na/ snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra si d+hi/ 'dis ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje grub par 'gyur// de nas
53a3(rgyud): rigs 'dzin grub par 'dod na/ snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra bi d+ha ra si di/ 'dis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin grub po// de bzhin du dam pa grub par 'dod na/ rang gi
53a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i snying po bsgrub pa po// dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas po// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// nam phyag
53a5(rgyud): rgyas byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam/ bdag stong par 'dod na/ de nas snying 'di brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ta sa ma ya man pa la ya/ badz+ra satwa te no pa ti ta tre to
53a6(rgyud): me b+ha ba/ su to sho me b+ha ba/ su po sho me b+ha ba/ a nu rag to me d+ha ba/ su po sho me b+ha ba/ sarba sid ti me pra yang tsa sarba karma su tsa me/ tsi ta shri yam ku ru huM/ ha ha ha ha ho//
53a7(rgyud): bag ba na/ sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra ma me mun dza badz+ri b+ha ba/ mahAs ma ya sa twam/ 'dis ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs rnams cad bslus pa dang / dam pa'i
53b1(rgyud): chos la smod pa dang / nyes pa thams cad byas pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa pos/ rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par 'gyur bas/ tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar
53b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam dngos grub dam pa'am/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du myur du thob po// zhes bano
53b3(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje/ sems dpa' de skad du gsung so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyis grol ba'i spyi'i tshi ga rgyas pa bshad do//
53b4(rgyud): de la thog mar phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de dngas snying po 'dis dgol lo// badz+ra mu/ de nas snying khe nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur
53b5(rgyud): ba'i gnas su dbang bskur te/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyis phreng b.re bskor zhing bcings nas/ de bzhin du go cha yang snying po 'dis bcings // oM badz+ra rad na a bi k+ShaM
53b6(rgyud): ts+tsha/ sarba mu tra me ti d+ha ku ru ba ra ka pa ce na bam/ de nas yang go cha ba'i mthar phreng ba bcings pa btang la thal mo mnyam par brda ba ste/ snying po 'dis mnyes par
53b7(rgyud): bya'o// badz+ra dwe sha ho// tshig 'dis phyag rgya rnams bkrol ba dang / bcings pa dang mnyes par byas na rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo rje sems
54a1(rgyud): dpas kyang bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la lan bzlas/ ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar/ bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ phyag na rdo rjes
54a2(rgyud): gsungs pa bzhin/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungaso// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i rnams/ bsgrub pa dang ni las kun la/ 'dir rin ci
54a3(rgyud): dga' bzlas na ni/ dum bu kun las dngos grub thob/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ dum bu las bshad rang byas 'am//
54a4(rgyud): bsgrub pa 'dir ni thams cad do// // de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing / rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs te/ gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM rdo rje sems
54a5(rgyud): dpa' bsdus pa na/ rdo rje rin chen bla na med/ rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pas/ rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur/ de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bstod pa'i gla 'di nyid
54a6(rgyud): kyis/ rdo rje gar lag pa gshibs shing gsang bar bya'o// bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas ste/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje gdug pa ma la sogs pas
54a7(rgyud): mchod pa byed du bcug la/ mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su bzhag go// de nas thams cad ci nus par mchod cig ces bsgos la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
54b1(rgyud): gsol te/ ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du/ bdug pa la sogs pa mchod pa byed du bcug la/ ji ltar zhugs rnams ro dang kha zas la sogs pa thams cad dang //
54b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por bul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis sems mgu bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i brdul gshugs sbyin no// 'di
54b3(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas thams cad de/ rdo rje sems dpa' lag na 'dug/ khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang / phyag na rdo rje'i bsngal shugs brtan/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid ta/ badz+ra
54b4(rgyud): sam ta she ya tAM da ra ya myi badz+ra sad tA hi hi hi hi huM/ de nas thams cad ma bzlog shig zhes bsgo zhing mna'i snying po yang brtan no// de nas ji ltar zhags pa rnams slar
54b5(rgyud): bkyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab pa la/ sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ kha gyen du bstan ste/ snying po 'di bzlas shing
54b6(rgyud): bkrol nas/ oM khyed kyis sems can don kun byas/ rjesu thun par dngos grub bstsol/ sangs rgyas yul du bzhad par mdzad/ de nas bslar yang gshegs
54b7(rgyud): par gsal/ badz+ra sa twa mu/ de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la bya'o// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyis 'grol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thas
55a1(rgyud): cad kyi mngon par rtogs pa'i rtag pa'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogas+ho// /
55a2(rgyud): bam po gsum pa'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs dam tshig 'byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
55a3(rgyud): la snyoms par zhags ma thag tu/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de rdo rje 'dzin pa kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po
55a4(rgyud): can/ rdo rje gzungs dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
55a5(rgyud): kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi ye shes bsgrubs ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gzungs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil
55a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o// gang phyir byang chub sems/ sems can kun
55a7(rgyud): la phan bzhed de/ gdul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang / bud med gzugs su mdzad par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
55b1(rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra nU
55b2(rgyud): ti tra sha ri hUM badz+ra ni/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rdo rje sems dpa' dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil
55b3(rgyud): 'khor byon gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+ri ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
55b4(rgyud): cad rin chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skom
55b5(rgyud): par zhugs ste/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM ra da na badz+ri ni hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
55b6(rgyud): chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma
55b7(rgyud): badz+rin hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
56a1(rgyud): de nyid rdzas@#byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags ste/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM ka ma badz+ri ni hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
56a2(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra sa ta g+hA ye sa ma ye haM/ oM gu ha badz+ra ku shi hUM/ oM badz+ra
56a3(rgyud): g+ha ha ra ga ra ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha he sAd ti sho ra hUM/ kun du bzang mo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang / dga' ba dang chags ma dang / legs ldan ma ste/ rdo rje
56a4(rgyud): gzungs chen po rnam so// oM badz+ra g+hu h+ye rad da sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha ha pra be sha hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha badz+ra a grang g+ha ye hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha h+ye ha sa badz+ri hUM/ rin po che'i rtse mo dang / rin po nAM/
56a5(rgyud): sgron ma dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpyangs rgyan ma dang / dgod pa dang ldan rnams te/ rdo rje rin po che'i gzungs rnam so// oM badz+ra d+harma g+hA he sa ma ya haM/ oM badz+ra ko sha gu he hUM/
56a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra g+ha h+ya sa ma ye man d+ha le hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha he sa ma ye hUM/ rdo rje pad mo dang / kun du 'dzin ma dang / kun tu 'khor lo ma dang / stong du bzlogs ma ste/ chos kyi gzungs rnam/
56a7(rgyud): sa ba hU~M rtseganas ma ye yo gyu b+ha rmo hU~M/ so ba gru dang shu dar / mi ba byu rba shIsh+tsa/ dngos grub kyi gtsem dang / thams cad bsrung ba dang / mdangs
56b1(rgyud): slar 'phrogs ma dang / gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma ste/ las kyi gzungs rnams/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i/
56b2(rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra g+ha he swa tra badz+ri hUM/ oM badz+ra g+hA he rad na badz+ra hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha he d+harma badz+ri haM/ oM b+hU he karma badz+ri haM/ de nas rdo rje pha rol phyin pa de dag
56b3(rgyud): nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi gzungs bsdus pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi bshad do// dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams ste// /
56b4(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar ba dang bcas par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par bzhag go// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa zas
56b5(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje gsang mchod pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do// oM badz+ra g+hu he ra ti pu tse bar r+d+ha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra g+hu he bi g+he ka pu tsa sa ma ye sarba pu rba prarta ya hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha he
56b6(rgyud): gi ste ba tsa sa ma ye sarba pu tsa pra ba ra ta ya hUM/ oM badz+ra g+ha he rni te bu tsa pra bar rta ye hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin la sogs pa de nyid de/ 'bar dang bcas pa rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams
56b7(rgyud): rang gi 'ber po'i dkyil 'khor gyi gro rnams su dgod de// de nas yang phyag rkyen rdo dzes/ de rjegasung bzhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen pa 'di shadang// nas ra
57a1(rgyud): de da @#tu bshad bya ba/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil
57a2(rgyud): 'khor chen po bri bar bya/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni/ sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya/ mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mer bshad/ khri'i
57a3(rgyud): steng du rdo rje rtsegs/ rdo rje sems pa zhes bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri'i steng / ring gi dbang ni bskur bar bshad/ rdo rje pad mi khri yi steng / mtshan ma zhes ni bya bar bshad/
57a4(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje khri'i steng / rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad/ pad ma'i steng da bri bar bshad/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsten pa'o// khri yi steng du rdo rje bri/ lcags kyu 'greng ba gnyis
57a5(rgyud): de bzhin/ rdo rje rdo rje las bsgres par/ legs par sbyin pa gnyis te bzhin/ rin chen 'od zer 'bar bar bya/ nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// rgyal mtshan rje mo 'dra
57a6(rgyud): 'bar bar byas/ rdo rje gnyis pa so'i phreng / rdo rje'i dbus su pad ma bri/ ral gra 'bar bcas de bzhin no// rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje'i brtsibs/ 'bar ba'i 'od
57a7(rgyud): ber can gyi lce/ rdo rje kun du rtse mo dang / go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan/ rdo rje mche ba yang dag bri/ lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgya sbyar/ sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs dri/
57b1(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri ba ni/ rdo rje 'dzin sogs dkyil 'khor du/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri ba ni/ phyi rol tu yang ci rigs par/
57b2(rgyud): mtshan ma'i mtshan ma rnams kyang bri/ byams pa la sogs gang gi mtshan/ ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa'i tshe
57b3(rgyud): brgyas pa yin te/ de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi bcings te 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas lan gcig bskor
57b4(rgyud): te/ phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul te/ rang gi snying khar rdul bzhin du bskol nas/ sgo ba ni ro rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas ji ltar bzhin du la
57b5(rgyud): rnams byas nas phyir dbyung ngo // phyir phyung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul du gzung ngo // de nas bcud nas
57b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mtshan mas g.yogs la byin te// rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab po/ de la dang po rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
57b7(rgyud): pa'o// de la dang por rdo rjegasang ba'i lus kyi phya brgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ rkang lag thal mo sbyar nas khas/ blangs zhing rdo rje/
58a1(rgyud): / bsgom byas nas/ rdo rje la yang chags par byed/ dpung ba bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang / mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya/ lag pa yi ni 'bod byed
58a2(rgyud): bcing / lcags kyum yang 'gugs par byed/ mda' 'phen pa'i tshul gyis ni/ brang ningo snying khar 'phangs na ni/ nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ba yang / bdud gyis tshul gyis
58a3(rgyud): mnyis dga' byed/ bdag gi lus gyis snying khar ni/ rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni/ dpung pa bsnol bar bcings na ni/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsrung bar byed/ de la bdag
58a4(rgyud): nyid snying po 'di dag yin te/ badz+ra ra ga ya ho// badz+ra ku shwa dza/ badz+ra ma ra ya phaT/ badz+ra b+han d+ha rak+Sha haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i lta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje
58a5(rgyud): lta ba chags pas ni/ dga' bas mig ni rab tu dgra/ de yis bud med bltas pas ni/ rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ rab tu myur bar mig bsgyur zhing / mig gi rje mas
58a6(rgyud): 'gugs byed pa/ lta bar gzi can yin par bshad/ 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o// khro nyer gnyer ma rab bdud pa'o// khro ba'i mig gri btsum pas ste/
58a7(rgyud): khro ba lta ba byas nas ni// khams gsum yang ni 'jigs par byed/ ri rab ri'i brag 'dra bar/ brtan pas 'dzums par byed pa'i mig/ byams pa'i lta ba yin par bshad/
58b1(rgyud): gdon dang dug sel ba'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di dag yin no// badz+ra d+hi shi ma ta hri pa ti ba to shu ku shi dze kro ti tri shI ti ta/ trid+d+hi dI shrI tritA ta/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ngag gi phyag
58b2(rgyud): rgyu'i ye shes bsrab po// ho ho ho ho zhes smras nas/ dgra dang bral bas de ma thag/ sems can kun ni dgu' bar byed/ de ni rdo rje'i tshig gsal ba'o// dz+nyA dzA dzA dz+nyA zhes brjod na/
58b3(rgyud): khro bo'i tshig ni gsal ba ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yi/ skye kun du 'gugs par byed/ hu hUM hUM zhes brjod na/ tshig du brjod pa gsal ba yis/ ri rab dang ni 'dre ba yi/ sems
58b4(rgyud): can kun gyi bdud byed pa'o// haM haM haM haM/ zhes smras na/ phra ba'i tshig gsal bas ste/ 'jigs rten 'di kun bsrung byed do// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba bsrung / de la snying
58b5(rgyud): po 'di rnam so// badz+ra ho// badz+ra dza/ badz+ra dza hu// badz+ra dza haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems dpa' phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rnams pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ phyag
58b6(rgyud): na rdo rje'i bdag nyid du/ bdag nyid kyis ni goms byas nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ chos kyi spyan gyi bdag nyid du/ bdag nyid kyis
58b7(rgyud): ni goms byas na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ rnam pa thams cad bdag nyid du/ bdag nyid kyi ni gos ma byas na/ rdo rje thams cad de sru po// de la snying po 'din ma yin no//
59a1(rgyud): @#/ badz+ra pa ni pa ra sha na ma yA sarba b+ha d+ha ho// badz+ra ga ra ba badz+ra ba ni shIg+h+raM a ga ri sha ya hA hU dza/ badz+ra ne tra sarba d+harma nir ma ra ya hUM phaT/ badz+ra bi shir sha ba saH
59a2(rgyud): badz+ri ni hUM swa ha/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// bdag gi lus kyi snying khar yang / rdo rje sems dpa' bcing byas la/ rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni/ 'gro ba
59a3(rgyud): thams cad dbab par byed/ bdag gi lngas kyi snying khar ni/ rin chen rdo rje bcing byas pa/ 'bar ba'i blta bas bltas na ni/ thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur/ bdag gi
59a4(rgyud): lus kyis snying khar ni/ chos kyi rdo rje bcing byas la/ khro bo lta bas bltas na ni/ 'gro ba thams cad des 'dud byed/ bdag gi lus kyi snying khar ni/ las kyi rdo rje bcing byas la/
59a5(rgyud): byams pa'i mig gis bltas byas na/ 'gro ba thams cad bsrung bar byed/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag go/ badz+ra gu ha sa ma ya a//
59a6(rgyud): badz+ra gu ha sa ma ya ho// badz+ra bu h+ya sa ma ya huM/ badz+ra gu ha sa ma ya haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bal mo las byang ba/ gsang ba chen po yin
59a7(rgyud): parang bshad/ phyag rgya chen po ma der brdzul pa// de dag gan pacing bang bshad/ pa 'angaganyis ni bsgos byas pa/ 'du ba po'i drim kug nas ni/ gung momam pa'i tshogs
59b1(rgyud): sbyar/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang por bshad/ de yi gung mo rdo rjer bya/ gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya/ pad mo srin lag the chung dgug/ lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang / 'dzub mo rdo rje
59b2(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis rtse/ de nyid the bong gnyis kyis bcings/ legs par sprin dang 'dzub rin chen/ 'dzub mo rin chen de 'bar bya/ srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen/ de nyid
59b3(rgyud): kyang ni bskor ba yis/ kun gyi rtse mo rab tu bkyed/ mthe bong mthe chung bar tu zhugs/ sor mo bar tu 'khor lor brkyang / de nyid kyang ni kha nas dbyung / mthe 'ong brkyang ste
59b4(rgyud): rdo rje dgab/ 'dzub mo snyams nas nang du bzhag/ 'theb gnyis dbye ba de nyid las/ de nas nang du rdo rje bya/ rdo rje gsang ba de rnams ni/ rdo rje bcings pas 'byung ba yin//
59b5(rgyud): chos kyi gsang ba mtshan rnams kyi/ thal mo nang du bkug paso// las kyi gsang ba'i mtshan ma las su brtan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pas/ chos kyi phyag
59b6(rgyud): rgya mdor bsdus pa/ a dza ho sa mam oM ai taM ha hA dI d+ha maM raM ka ma ka ma ha ma hA baM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya gnyis byas nas/ las kyi phyag rgya rnams su bya/ dam tshig mchog ni ji
59b7(rgyud): sbed pa/ gnyi su phral nas de bzhin no// de nas 'di rnams bsgrub pa bshad/ sa ma ya ste// zhes smra zhing / bdag gis bcing bas 'grub pa yin/ 'dod pas chags
60a1(rgyud): de #/ pa bde ba'i bdag/ 'di nas ldan cig pa kyang ni/ dus kun du yang bcing mi bya/ gsang ba'ang ni don chen la/ mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar gA 'di
60a2(rgyud): rnams kun gyi bdag nyid gnas/ rang 'byung rnams kyi lha mo brtan/ bsgrub pa rnams la rab chags pas/ brtag pa'i bdag po btangang re/ de nas phyag rgya 'di rnam
60a3(rgyud): thams cad bcing ba la sogs pa'i las rnams yin/ bdag gam 'on te gzhan la'ang rung / rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni/ snying por bya ba 'di yis ni/ bcing ba 'am
60a4(rgyud): bcing du bcug kyang rung / badz+ra huM ban d+ha/ de nas dgrol ba yin no// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ snying po bya ba 'di nyid kyis/ gang dang gang nas 'byung ba yi/ de dang
60a5(rgyud): de nas dgrol bar bya/ oM badz+ra muHde nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te/ snying kha nas ni spyi bor dgrol/ 'dzub mo yis ni go cha bcing / snying por bya/
60a6(rgyud): ba 'di yin no// oM badz+ra dI d+ha badz+ra ka bAn+da 'dri ta/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams dgrol/ cho ga yis ni brtan par byas/ thal mo brdab
60a7(rgyud): pas kun sbyar la/ snying por bya ba 'di nyid de// ma gugs ma ya hel bya/ rdo rje sems dpa' dgar bzlas/ dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la/ dus 'di cid du
60b1(rgyud): sbyar bar bya/ thams cad grub par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil
60b2(rgyud): 'khor// / rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams nAd kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi
60b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA nas
60b4(rgyud): ma ya huM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis
60b5(rgyud): brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra sa twak+Sh+ma dz+nyA na badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin
60b6(rgyud): chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
60b7(rgyud): te/ rang ga rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ so badz+rad dan su k+sha ShA nas ma ya hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa che tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa mas cad tu rje chos kyi ye shes pa/
61a1(rgyud): me'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+ha
61a2(rgyud): rma suk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa'i rgyal pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil
61a3(rgyud): 'khor byin gyis brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags so// rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra karma su k+ShA na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gsheg
61a4(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'ad/
61a5(rgyud): snyoms par zhags ma thag tu/ de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas/ rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer rnams byung nas/ 'jigs rten gyi khams
61a6(rgyud): thams cad snang bar byas te/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pas/ thams cad rdo rje phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin du mnyam par zhugs pa brtan par byas ste/ yang
61a7(rgyud): gcig tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs ste/ gcig tu 'dus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i ye shes su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam/
61b1(rgyud): bar snang mdzad kyis thugs su zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes thugs su nags nas/ de bzhin gshegs
61b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ suk+Sh+ma badz+ra de nas de smras ma dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas/ bcom ldan
61b3(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra me'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su byin gyis brlab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs
61b4(rgyud): kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ rdo rje phra mo bdag ste che/ gang phyir phra che ba yi phyir/ khams
61b5(rgyud): gsum yang ni rgyas par mdzad/ de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
61b6(rgyud): cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas rab tu phra ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas ste/
61b7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis/ namakha'i dbyings thams cad rdo rje phra mo ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so// namakha'i dbyings
62a1(rgyud): @thams cad khyab par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rdo rje'i dbyibs su byin gyis brlabs ste 'dug go// de nas de nyid kyi
62a2(rgyud): chen de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes kyis rdo rje'i dbus su/ rdo rje chos nyid du dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo byin gyis brlab
62a3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ste/ de nas de zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di
62a4(rgyud): byung ngo // badz+ran b+hi ta thag ta hA/ de nas byung te de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
62a5(rgyud): cad kyi skar zhags nas/ thugs khar rdo rje'i dbyi bsu gyur te gnas so// de nas bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje las/ ye shes chen po'i snying po
62a6(rgyud): 'di bzhi byung ngo // badz+ra sa ta tha ma ka hri d+ha badz+ra a ku sha/ triSh+Ti ra ga badz+ra pra bi sha hri da ye/ a ho badz+ra d+hASh+TaM/ rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs
62a7(rgyud): pathams cad kyi bsdus pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag
62b1(rgyud): rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyi
62b2(rgyud): rang bzhin du thugs su zhugs ste/ snying po rdo rje'i dbyibasu bdag nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs ste bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje dbyings de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // badz+ra
62b3(rgyud): radwa na marma ke hi d+hi ya badz+re su N+ya/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+ha dza/ gra b+ha~M d+hi da pa badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'od chen po'i
62b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi rgan pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
62b5(rgyud): cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs dbyung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra
62b6(rgyud): mos 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ rang gi snying khar rdo rje'i snying por zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i dbyibs su byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de la
62b7(rgyud): snying po 'di ba'i byeng ngo // badz+ra ba dam rmag ka/ hri dab dz+ra kro sha/ ti Sh+Tha ba rdzarbakrahrid ya pra bi sha/ badz+rangs dkri hri da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye she
63a1(rgyud): #/ kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen po 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs
63a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag r+b+ha des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang
63a3(rgyud): gi snying po rdo rje'i thugs kha nas rdo rje las byung nas/ ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ rdo rje'i thugs der zhugs nas/ shin du phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin
63a4(rgyud): gyis brlabs ste bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi phyung ngo // sarba badz+ra a tAM ka hI na ya/ badz+ra ka pA latsa toSh+Tha/ badz+ra yak+Sha hr-i d+ha ye/
63a5(rgyud): badz+ra mu sha hri d+hA ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / bdud
63a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham
63a7(rgyud): cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rjes phra mo'i mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
63b1(rgyud): kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa' phyug na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas/ de nas yang rdo rje'i sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skur gyur te/
63b2(rgyud): rang gi mtshan ma nyid kyi thugs khar bzhag nas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por dgod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ rang gi snying po'i ting nge
63b3(rgyud): 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i
63b4(rgyud): phyir/ rdo rje phra mo ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ rdo rje phra mo zhes
63b5(rgyud): bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal du ni/ sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhugs/ rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bris/ sems dpa' chen po rnams bri zhing /
63b6(rgyud): de bzhin thugs khang nyid phyag rgya/ ting nge 'dzin du zhugs pa yang / phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing pas bcings/ de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la
63b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i cho ga rgya pa yin te/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ye shes kyi mtshan ma lag tu byin la/ rang gi seMs/
64a1(rgyud): da/ las su rung ba'i phyag rgya chen po bsrab po// sme ni bkan pa sbyar byas te/ sna'i rtse mor bsam phyag / rdo rje bra mang ba de reg pas/ sems ni bam par banas
64a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pa'i/ mtshan ma gal te byung ba na/ mtshan ma de ni khyadab bya ba/ sems dkun du khyab par bya/ ci tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas// khams gsum du
64a3(rgyud): yang khyab par 'gyur/ de nas de yang bsdu ba ni/ rtsa yis rtse mo'i bar du gnas/ de nas shin du mnyam par bzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom par bya/ de dag thams cad brtan par
64a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ ting 'dzin shes pa brtags pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// susak+Sh+ma badz+ra/ s+pha ra badz+ra/ sang ha ra badz+ra/ badz+ra d+hi d+hiSh+Tha badz+ra/ sems dpa' gang gi byams
64a5(rgyud): ba ni/ ma'am 'gyur brtan pa chen po yis/ sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ sems can kun las des khyab bya/ byams pas khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje can gyi gang yin
64a6(rgyud): pa/ sems can kun don byas pa yis/ bsgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya/ kun kyang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ bdod nas dag pas na mkha' bzhin/ chos sam yang na chos ma yin/
64a7(rgyud): bsam pas khyab ci dag 'gyur/ gdul bka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra bar/ sangs rgyas byang chu bsdod ma yin/ de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ btang stoms chen po gangs
64b1(rgyud): bar bya/ de la snying po ni 'di yin no// ma ha mer+ya tra ya ra na/ ma ha ka run/ sbyar na/ sarba shun d+ha pra mo rta la s+phar na sarbas ta sa bo d+ha ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes
64b2(rgyud): su dran pa'i ye shes bslab po/ namakha'i 'am yang na phyogs gzhan du/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjer bsgom/ ji lta ba'i rigs bzhin du/ rdo rje phra mo'i
64b3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ phyag na rdo rje'i dbyibs chen po/ gnas rnams kun du bsgom par bya/ rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ sangs rgyas sku ni du kun du// ji lta ba'i go rims bzhin/
64b4(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom par bya/ de la snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra b+hi mu khi b+hA ba/ ma hA bo d+hi sAd tA b+hi sha/ badz+ra pa ni d+ha rA ye ru bi/ bu d+harmi t+ya b+ha sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i
64b5(rgyud): tshul gris ni/ goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis/ zla ba'i dbyib su'ang bdag nyid ni/ byang chub sems kyis bsgom pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni//
64b6(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje'i dbyibs gyur pas/ bdag nyid kyi ni bsgom bya ba/ sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ bdag nyid snyid khar rdo rje sems/ bdag nyid
64b7(rgyud): kyi ni bsgom bya ba/ rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom pa'o// rnam pa kun du mchog ldan pa'i/ sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni/ bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ sangs rgyas
65a1(rgyud): byang chung bsgom pa'o// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// namasanA ta b+ha tu Sh+Ti sha/ badz+ra sa dA twa badz+ra d+hi sha/ badz+ra sad tA sa ma b+hi dz+nyAn b+hi sha Ta ga ton/
65a2(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos nyid gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam/ rdo rje'i tshig tu len gcig brjod//
65a3(rgyud): dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/ sems can thams cad chags par byed/ bdag ni rdo rje chen por mnyam/ rdo rje'i tshig du lan gcig brjod/ dang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar/
65a4(rgyud): gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gug/ bdag ni rdo rje chos dang mnyam/ rdo rje'i tshigasu lan gcig brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ de'i 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag
