65a5(rgyud): ni sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam/ rdo rje'i tshig du lan gcig brjod/ dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas/ las rnams thams cad de bsgrub po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
65a6(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom bya ba/ bdag nyid
65a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku nyid du/ des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub/ de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje bra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ snyid khar rdo rje/
65b1(rgyud): la sogs 'khor/ bsgom na rdo rje la sogs pas/ rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dmatshig gi phyag rgya'i
65b2(rgyud): ye shes bslab po// rdo rje bcings pa las byung bar/ bcu drug rnams bshad pa de/ ting nge 'dzin ni dam tshig mchog/ de rnams kyis ni bcings pa bshad/ dkyil mo
65b3(rgyud): dkar 'dug gan rkyal du/ g.yas bcug de bzhin slar bcug pas/ snying khar gnas pa bzhi pa te/ rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor ro// dpral bar bzhag dang lhag
65b4(rgyud): pa dang / brag pa dang ni dgod pa sbyar/ khar bzhag snying khar ral gri dang / snying khar rgyas dang kha nas 'byung / spre bo ba thong ka khar bzhag la/ 'dzub mo gnyis bkug
65b5(rgyud): mdun de bzhin/ de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// Tak+Shi/ gra gra/ mat+ta/ a gra/ taM traM/ i yaM/ tsau tsa/ tIn+ta/ d+hi Ta/ bi Tu/ kra sha/ ha ha/ ba ga ba baM/
65b6(rgyud): phaT gras/ de nas chos las ye shes phra mo rnams kyi las kyi ches ga bshad do// ye shes khu chur dam tshig las/ gnyis byas nas sbyar bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs
65b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa las/ rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po rdo rje ye shes kyi chos kyis dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa/
66a1(rgyud): #// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod
66a2(rgyud): pa bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas/ rang gi rigs
66a3(rgyud): pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha tu a nud ta ra pu tsa ka ra ma par na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
66a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bra na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i/ las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang
66a5(rgyud): gis rigs pa mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra swA hA/ a nud ta ra pu tsa karma swa ran ya huM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung 'byung bas/ de bzhin
66a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin chen mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pa khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa
66a7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ rang gi rigs pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra ra da na a nud tar pra tsa s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas/ de
66b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bra na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i/ las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje ti nge 'dzin gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
66b2(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra d+harma a nud ta ra pU dza kar rma par na sa ma ye haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
66b3(rgyud): gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa zhes
66b4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma a nud ta ra pu dza karma la s+phar na sa ma sa ye haM/
66b5(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab
66b6(rgyud): pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las/ bcom ldan
66b7(rgyud): 'ang phyag na rdo rje de nyid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i tshig rgyas pa// chos kyi dbyir zas cad du khyab pa'i rnam pa'i dbyings kun tu rgyas pa rnam par chog pa'i mched pa nas
67a1(rgyud): cad kyi rgyun gyi chog rgyas pa'i sprin gyis rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnamasu gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jams kyi phrin rgya mtsho rnams/
67a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gsheg
67a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs pa 'am mnyes par bya ba dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba
67a4(rgyud): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed pa
67a5(rgyud): dang / khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi
67a6(rgyud): dor bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'brel thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so// mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho lha mo de dag kyang / rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing / de bzhin
67a7(rgyud): shegs pa med cig na da// rje du khyed kyi 'i dzin pa'i tshul du 'i kyil 'khor la gnas nas/ cod du rjod pa 'di du rjod// mim gsas
67b1(rgyud): rgyas mchod pa'i bdag/ mchod pa kun ni byed pa yin/ gang phyir sangs rgyas byin chen du/ sangs rgyas kun gyis grub par mdzad/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
67b2(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa la sogs pa'i las kyi tshi ga rgyas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba ma nir+yA ta na pu s+pha ra na karma badz+ri hUM/ aHoM sarba ta thA ga ta
67b3(rgyud): sarba ad mi ni mya tan punA s+pha ra na karma gr-idz+dza/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba ad ma ni d+ya tan a nud ta gan pu dza pa ra na karma b+he ne badz+ri hU ho// oM sarba ta thAg ta sarba a da ma nam nir+yA ta na sa na ru kaka
67b4(rgyud): ra pu dza pa ra na karma daSh+NI e/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes
67b5(rgyud): par byed ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed ma chen mo rnams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen rnamaso// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya
67b6(rgyud): a b+hai she kar rje dz+nye badz+ra ya ni saM/ oMn ma sarba ta bA ga ta sur+ya re d+he badz+ra te dzi na dze la hi/ oM s+sarba ta thA ga ta ma sha pa ri nu ra bi tsin dam ni da dza gra d+d+ho badz+ra da ta dza pre te/ oM sarba ta thAg ta
67b7(rgyud): ma ha pri ti pra mo d+hi ke re b+h+yo dz+ra ha se he/ dbang mo chen mo dang / rin po che'i char 'bebs ma dang / rab tu dga' zhing mgum rnamaso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
68a1(rgyud): de skus@#/ bskur ba'i mchod pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra tra maMs pad+mo bi stu mo myaM ma~M ha d+ha gre hri/ oM sarba ta dzA ga ta pra da dzA ba ra byi ta na tsa ta ni ha d+ha re stu na myi mgo sha nu ge ha ra/ oMs
68a2(rgyud): ta thA ga ta tsakra sha ra pa ri brta d+hi sarba sa ta na ta na ye sta no ma sarba ma ma da le hAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa twa ba shu pu ta sa ma gi tirbi gi maM sta no mya badz+ra pa tsi maM/ ye shes chen po'i glu dang / dbyangs
68a3(rgyud): chen po rjes su 'brang ma dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi 'jug ma dang / sngags kyi spyod pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa ma'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta du pa
68a4(rgyud): myeg sman bu dzag rje kai ri ki ra/ oM sarba tra dag ta pu Sh+pa pra sa ra swa ran bu dgur mye ka ra ka ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka badz+ra rdol sbar na pud+d+ha kar me bar bar/ oM sarba ta ba ga tagan d+ha
68a5(rgyud): srung mar na pa ga da r+ya/ sems tshan mo dang / byang chub chen mo'i phan lagaldan pa dang / m-ig ldan ma dang dri ldan pa dang / de zhi na gshegs pa bams cad kyi sa dpan
68a6(rgyud): gis rjod pa'o// de nas 'di de bzhin gshegs pa gling lus pa pad thams cad 'asred pa byed pa'i las kyi kyi pa 'khor rdo rje'i byang ba/ do// de nas rab tu bshad drug
68a7(rgyud): mas kyi kyis lab la te/ de byings dang 'dri das/ da bya nas kyang grags/ dkyi la dzin pa'i la dun/ sangasardzas su dngas panag pa cur
68b1(rgyud): sems dpa'i la sogs tshul du/ sna mo phyag rgya bcas pa bri/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bshad do// de la dang po'i rdo rje
68b2(rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje bya ba 'dir gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang por rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis gzhag par byas ste/ bcug nas
68b3(rgyud): kyang 'di skad de/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dam tshig yin gyis/ mchod pa drag po 'di dag khyod kyis nyin re bzhin ci nus su gyis cig ces bsgo bar bya'o//
68b4(rgyud): de nas gdong g.yogs pa bkrol ba ni/ las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'i dam cig gyis/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod na/ gzhan gyis
68b5(rgyud): lta smos kyang ci bsgos/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i/ sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems ni brtan
68b6(rgyud): bskyed pas/ bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsam zhing / dga' ba bdag pa ni mchod byed cing / sangs rgyas kyis ni bde ba thob/ byang chub se myas ni brtan bskyed pas/ bdag
68b7(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas min ram papa shing / phreng ba la sogs mchod pa yis/ mchod na deni dbang mang bsrung / byang chung sems ni btan bskyed pas/ bdag ni sangs rgyas yin ngasams
69a1(rgyud): gang sa dang grangs pa dag/ bad do byu 'bru byung chu mas ni baspyad bskyed pas/ 'dan na sangs rgyas yan ma
69a2(rgyud): shing / gang gi mchod pa bdag mchod na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mchod par 'gyur/ de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// d+h+wad d+ha d+ha ma he/ b+hud tu yA bi shin na ma/ b+hud t+tastu ting ga do/
69a3(rgyud): d+hAd tu dra dza ka ro mi/ de nas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes srab par bya/ de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje yi/ mchog gi tshul
69a4(rgyud): gyis phyag 'tshal zhing / de bzhin sangs rgyas kun mchod na/ rtag tu phyag byar 'os par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsod nams che/ sku gsung thugs ni rdo rjes bskyed//
69a5(rgyud): rjes su yid rang bas mchod na/ myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yis/ lha rdzas bdag 'bul la sogs pa'i/ mchod pa kun gyi sangs rgyas rnam/
69a6(rgyud): mchod na de yang mchod par 'gyur/ lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje'i/ dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad ni/ yongs su bsngos pa'i mchod pa yis/ sangs rgyas kun dang
69a7(rgyud): mnyam par 'gyur/ de la snying po ni 'di yin no// a nu mo de/ bud d+ha pu tsa/ pa ri na ma/ chos kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// chos rnams rang bzhin gyis
69b1(rgyud): kyang gsal/ ngo bo nyid kyis gdong nas dag/ chos 'di dag gis mchod na ni/ dga' ba'i bde ba thob par 'gyur/ de nas chos rnams kun ni 'dus pa yi/ a zhes bya ba sgo zhes
69b2(rgyud): brjod/ chos kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bcod/ 'di ni chos rnams thams kyi/ rgyu ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ dam chos 'khor lo mchod pa yis/ mchod pas
69b3(rgyud): chos ni 'chang bar 'byung / chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ dgra snyan dag dang 'dra ba shade/ chos kyi mchod pa de dag gis/ mchod nasangs rgyas gsung yang thob/ de la 'di rnams
69b4(rgyud): kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// sarba shud d+ha/ sa man/ tra/ b+hu tra/ dar ma tsakra/ ni swa pan tsa/ de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab par bya'o// lus dang ngag sems
69b5(rgyud): rdo rje yi/ rang gi brdal ni phra mo rnams/ rdo rje'i dbyings su bsgos na ni/ de'i bdag nyid myur du thob/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ sangs rgyas kun tu
69b6(rgyud): bsgoms na ni/ chos kyi sku ni myur du 'grub/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ rang gi rdul ni phra mo rnams/ rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur/ lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ rang gi
69b7(rgyud): rdul ni skur bsgoms na/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no// badz+rag ya/ dang ma ka ya/ srad ta ka ya/ bud d+ha ka ya/ de nas gsang
70a1(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rang 'byung la ni lus kun gyis/ 'khyud pa'i bde ba'i mchod pa ni/ bulan rdo rje sems pa dang / 'dra bar de
70a2(rgyud): ni myur bar 'gyur/ shin du chags pa'i sbyor ba yis/ dam du bzung ba bde ba yin/ sangs rgyas rnams la phul gyur na/ rdo rje rin chen 'dra bar 'gyur/ shin du dga' zhing bde chags pas/
70a3(rgyud): sprad pas gyur pa'i mchog bde ba/ sangs rgyas rnams la bul na ni/ rdo rje chos dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ dbang po gnyis ni sbyar ba yis/ kun du sbyor ba'i bde ba ni/ mchod pa'i phyir ni bral bas
70a4(rgyud): na/ rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ de dag gi snying po 'di dag yin/ ra ti badz+ra/ prA tI badz+ra/ karma badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i 'phrin las kyi phyag rgya chen po
70a5(rgyud): ye shes kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// snying kha rtsibs la sogs rgyab sbyor bas/ dpral ba la sogs de bzhin da/ kha dang rna ba mgo ltag pa/ spyi bo rkang pa 'phrags par bzhag/ de nas de
70a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya ye shes bslab par bya'o// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ rdo rje bcing ba blacas dang btsas la/ srid kha la sogs gnas
70a7(rgyud): tshul du/ bzhag nas rgyal ba rnams mchod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// oM gyi ya/ sa ti rang / kar na/
70b1(rgyud): hang shad/ hUM hI/ sha no// shi sid/ las kyis phyab rgya pador bsdus na/ las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// theg pa chen po mngon par rtog pa las//
70b2(rgyud): rtog pa chen po'i rgyal ba rdo rje las zhes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs s+ho// // / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
70b3(rgyud): snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa zam
70b4(rgyud): cad kyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta musti bam/ de nas
70b5(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig pa bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs
70b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis rigs kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di/ dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di sbas
70b7(rgyud): pa/ oM badz+ra sa da ta mu sti ma/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
71a1(rgyud): dasdusacad kyi rig pa 'di bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
71a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra rad mya sti baM/ de bzhin ga gshegs pa che tshad med pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs
71a3(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub bsdu ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i
71a4(rgyud): snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra dar ma mu sti bam/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin
71a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di smras pa//
71a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra karma pusti haM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rang gi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ de bzhin gshegs
71a7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i tshig rgyas pa 'di'i dngos grub thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir/ rdo rje dngos grung zhes
71b1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ brag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na/ rdo rje dngos grub zhes kyang grags/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i
71b2(rgyud): tshul du ni/ mkhas pas rab tu bri bar bya/ thog par sangs rgyas gzugs bzhag ste/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi yang bri/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya la sogs bri/ de nas
71b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub kyi/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ de bzhin du bcud de 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o// khyod kyi gsang ba'i le'u 'di su
71b4(rgyud): la yang ma smra shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ log pa lta ba dang / sdig byed pa'i sems can rnams yod do// dngos gru chub pa dang sbyor ba byed pa dang / ri mo mi shes pa dag yod do// de dag
71b5(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su/ brtson 'grus chung bas mi 'jug ste/ de dag gis don du rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag
71b6(rgyud): rgya'i dkyil 'khor/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig du gyur pa 'di/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnamasu bskyab
71b7(rgyud): ba dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du byin gyis brlab so// khyed kyis
72a1(rgyud): sa @#/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gsang ba 'di rnams la yid mi ches pa dang / ma dad par ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal ba'am/
72a2(rgyud): byol song dang / yis dgas kyi khams su ltung bar gyur pa 'am/ mi bde ma spangs pas dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgol/ gdong g.yogs dkrol te dkyil 'khor bstan/
72a3(rgyud): der nis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig ma sna cig/ bdag nyid chen po gang dag gi/ phyag rgya gang dang gang bcing ba/ bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni/ der ni bdag
72a4(rgyud): nyid bsgom par bya/ ye shes 'di yis tshul gyis ni/ phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin/ bdag nyid chen po phyag rgya kun/ de dag kun gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas phyag rgya thams cad
72a5(rgyud): kyi gsang bar brjod par bya'o// rang gi dbang po bshig nas na/ rdo rje bcing bas bzung bar bya/ de yis phyag rgya gang reg pa/ de ma thag tu de dbang bskur/ de nas phyag thams cad kyi chos
72a6(rgyud): nyid brjod par bya'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ ye shes phyag rgya'i bcing bar bya/ cho ga 'di yis tshul gyis ni/ ye shes phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ de nas phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ de nas
72a7(rgyud): phyag rgya kun gyi las brjod par bya'o// glu dang gar dang zas dang ro// spyod pa la sogs bde ba rnams/ sangs rgyas rnams la phul na ni/ las kyi phyag rgya dbang du 'gyur/ de nas dkyil
72b1(rgyud): 'khor thams cad dang / bsgrung pa dang / gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ngabasrab par bya'o// mtshan ma brtan pa rang gyur nas/ dkar por gyur pa'i ras la gnas/ mtshan ma mchod rten
72b2(rgyud): byin brlabs te/ bdag nyid rdo rje dbyings su bsgom/ rdo rje bcing ba dam bcas ste/ gung mo myu gu bzhin du bzhi pa/ the'u chung dang 'dzub rtse dgreng / dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig go// rdo rje phra mo'i
72b3(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ rab tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom/ rdo rje phra mo'i dkyil 'khor te/ ting 'dzin dbang du gyur pa'i tshul/ rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcing la/ de gnyis rdo rje dam du bzung / 'jub
72b4(rgyud): mo mthe chung bsnol ba ni/ rdo rje dgos mchog dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bcing ba bzhin bslabs nas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i
72b5(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa ji ltar ba bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje dngos grub kyi phyag rgya bzhin pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du/ mi g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa/ dkyil 'khor gyis tshul du/ rang rang
72b6(rgyud): gi phyag rgya rnams bris nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub po// de ltar ras dang / rtsigs pa dang / namakha' dang / gnas thams cad du bris na// dngos grub thams cad 'grub bo//
72b7(rgyud): kyi nga gags pa nas rgyams sa/ lalan gyil 'theng dazugs pa don gyi/ ga 'dod pa bzhin 'grug/ sa lani sa rtsams nas yin na gagacigacis/
73a1(rgyud): @#/ la la ni nyi ma bzhis/ la la ni zhag drag gis/ pha la ni mtshams med med pa lnga byas pa yang ji ltar 'dod pa bde blag du/ don thams cad byed bcing / thams cad
73a2(rgyud): dga' ba dang / brod pa dang / zas dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi bde ba rnams byang bar byed kyang / lo gcig gis mchog 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungaso// de nas yang bcom
73a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grab dam pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes te bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs
73a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // badz+ra satwa// de nas bcom ldan 'das
73a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongasu bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba
73a6(rgyud): thams cad myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub par bya ba'i bar du/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtog pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do//
73a7(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad bya / sems dpa' dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas nas/ rdo rje sems pa' zhes kyang bshad/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil
73b1(rgyud): / 'khor phyi rims thig gdab po/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' bzhag par bya/ de nas dgug pa bzhug pa la sogs pa de bzhin du ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
73b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes bskyed par bar bya'o// de la thog mar 'di skad du/ khyod kyi dam tshig ma mthong ba dang / khong du ma chud ba sul yang gsang ba 'di ma smra shig/ khyod ngan song
73b3(rgyud): thams cad du ltung bas/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus ma yin pa shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i dri grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslabs par bya'o//
73b4(rgyud): zla rgyas dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas/ phyag rgya chen po gzugs pas na/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar ni/ bsgom na myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gsang
73b5(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig de ye shes bslab po// 'dod chags bral ba lta bus sdig/ khams gsum na ni gzhan med ste/ de bas 'dod la chags bral bar/ khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig/ ma hA/
73b6(rgyud): sa ma ya ha na hUM phaT/ de nas gna'i snying po sbyin no// de ltar de ni bzhin gshes pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa rnamasu dam tshig gi sdom pa sbyin par byed do// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i
73b7(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa bzhi bcing la bslab par bya'o// dngos grub kyang de bzhino// ri mo la sogs pa dang ldugs ma'i gzugs thams cad la yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i tshe
74a1(rgyud): / de da@#ga bzhin du byas nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin du 'grub 'gyuraro// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu de bzhin
74a2(rgyud): du yang bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad cig du 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso'o// byang chub sems chen po rdo rje sems rkyen
74a3(rgyud): po rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje chen po la/ rdo rje dgyes pa'i snying po 'dis legaso bya ba gsol to// oM rdo rje sems dpa' 'khyod legs so// leg so rkyen rdo rje khyed/ rdo rje chos ni khyod
74a4(rgyud): leg so// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa/ rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang / theg pa chen po mngon par bsdus/ rdo rje sems pa'i mtshan gyis kyang /
74a5(rgyud): dngos grub kun gyis mchog du 'gyur/ dag par byas nas bsgrub nas ni/ sangs rgyas nyid kyang bde ba thob/ rdo rje chos kyi sbyor bas ni/ 'dod pa kun gyi bde bas bde/ tshe 'di kyis
74a6(rgyud): grub pas na/ bde ba mi zad med mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ de kho na nyid bsdus pa las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
74a7(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba chen po// rdzogs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur // bcom
74b1(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba la/ mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol gtab po// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che/ rdo rje mgon po rab bsgrub
74b2(rgyud): mdzad/ rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od/ rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po/ rdo rje ral gri mchog chen po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyal po mchog/ spros med khyod la
74b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las dang bsrungs pa che/ gnod sbyin gtum pa gdon chen po// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ phyag rgya kun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dang byang chub che/ sangs
74b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ rdo rje'i ye shes ye shes che/ theg chen khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// don kun kun gyi de nyid don/ sems can don chen kun rigs pa/ kun khyen kun
74b5(rgyud): mdzad thams cad de/ kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang / dam tshig chen po de nyid don/ sems can khyod la phyag 'tshal
74b6(rgyud): lo// rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che/ rab tu dga' ba 'od po che/ rdo rje 'od dang 'od snang ba/ sangs rgyas 'di la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje mchog/ rigs mchog mchog
74b7(rgyud): dang ma'i mchog/ rdo rje dam pa mchog chen mchog/ rigs mchog byed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje dbyings dang gsang ba che/ rdo rje gsang bar bgasang 'chang / rdo rje phra bgasam gtan na/
75a1(rgyud): de nyid@#/ rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas mchog sangs rdo rje mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chu mkhas pa che/ sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che/ sangs rgyas
75a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che/ sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchod pa/ thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che/ rdo rje dngos grub khyod phyag 'tshal/ de bzhin gsheg
75a3(rgyud): pa'i sku chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs chen po/ rdo rje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan/ sangs
75a4(rgyud): rgyas be shes gnyen rgyal mchog skyes/ rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab/ ston zhi khro la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid che/ yang dag 'da' dang che ba'i tshul/ pha rol
75a5(rgyud): phyin pa kun mkhyen pa/ don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu bzang dang spyod pa mchog/ bdud dang bdud ni rab 'dul ba/ kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen/ kun tu 'gro
75a6(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas hUM zhes hUM zhes pa/ rdo rje hUM zhes 'dul ba po// rdo rje kun yin rdo rje grags/ phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ phyag bya mchod bcing rjed dang / rim
75a7(rgyud): 'grer de bzhin gshegs pas byas/ gang byer rdo rje sems pral zhes khyod bya/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod dag lus/ kun gzigs yab ni khyed yin te/ 'byung ba dang ni
75b1(rgyud): 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ rab tu mos pas bstod byed cing / glu blangs gang zhig bstod byed pa/ de ni rdo rje 'dzin
75b2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kun la mnga' mdzad pa'i/ mgon po khyod la gsol ni/ sems can kun don mdzad pa'i phyir/ rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzad// de nas de bzhin
75b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir/ rdo rje
75b4(rgyud): 'dzin pas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das dbang phyugs chen po la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyed thams cad kyis kyang zhi bas
75b5(rgyud): 'dul bar mi spyod de dag la/ bdag gis ji ltar bsgrubs par dgyes/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis//
75b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sgoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
75b7(rgyud): babams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam par spros pa nyid kyis ri rab ri'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par yang gcig tu 'dus te/
76a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par par snang mdzad kyi thugs kha'i dpal be'u zhugs so//
76a2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugasu bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
76a3(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyis ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu bskyab pa dang / phan pa dang bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa dang / ma rungs
76a4(rgyud): pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen po'i thabs kyi ti nge 'dzin gyi ye shes la dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying rje chen
76a5(rgyud): po'i thabs khro bo dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags so// snyoms par zhags ma thag tu/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thas cad kyi thugs kha nas// /
76a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di phyung ngo // hUM/ de nas byung ma thag du/ phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha'i rdo rje la/
76a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de rje 'dzin pa nyid de/ kun du 'bar ba'i snying 'jig ce can/ smin pa bcus zhing bri'i ba brjeng ba mcho lhag gong byung zhing mi brtsigs pa/ dodzo dpa/
76b1(rgyud): lcags kyu dang / ral gri dang / zhags pa la sogs pa rdo rje'i me lce 'bar ba'i mtshon lag na thogs pa/ rnams pa du ma'i kha dog dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyi cha lugs sna tshogs
76b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i ska las byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du shin du ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
76b3(rgyud): phyogs kun du rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o thams cad 'dul ba yi/ thabs
76b4(rgyud): chen ldan pa bdag yin d+ha gang phyir sems can 'dul thabs phyir/ dri ma med pa'i khro bar gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
76b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad spros pa med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i
76b6(rgyud): tingange 'dzin la snyoms par zhags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i rig mchog 'di smras pa/ oM
76b7(rgyud): sum b+ha ni sum d+ha hu/ gr-ig gro d+ha/ gr-ih+NA pa ya grahA ba sa hA/ a na ya ho b+ha ga pa ni/ badz+ra hU phaT/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung sa bag tu/
77a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyagar rdo rjer gyur te byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor
77a2(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te/ spyan drangs nas rdo rje'i dam tshig gis dkyil 'khor chen por bcug te/ dam tshig gis bcings nas yang gcig tu 'dres
77a3(rgyud): te/ rdo rje khro bo chen po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar 'dug ste/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o byang chub sems 'di ni//
77a4(rgyud): kun du bzang zhing sdig med de/ gang phyir sems can 'dul don du/ khro bo yang ni yid 'ong 'gyur/ de nas rdo rje khro bo chen po'i sku de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas babs
77a5(rgyud): nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan mngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ yang bka' nod cing bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
77a6(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gis 'gugs pa/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs
77a7(rgyud): tha thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs kha nas phyung ngo // du Ta gidz+dza/ de nas de byeng ma thag du 'jig rten gyi dmas rab 'byams rgya mtsho thams cad na/ 'jig rten gsum gyis
77b1(rgyud): dbang po dbang phyug cher po la sogs pa ji snyed pa deg thams cad 'jig rten thams cad na gnas pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba ma lus zhing lus pa med pa'i rnams de bzhin gshegs
77b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i lcags kyus bkug nas/ ri rab ri'i rtse mo gang na ba dang rtse mi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa gang na ba der lhags
77b3(rgyud): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khang bu brtsegs brtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa thams cad du bskor nas khyab par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs kha
77b4(rgyud): nas rdo rje blangs te/ gsor zhing thams cad dang ldan pa'i khams gsum pa'i ji snyed thams cad kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la ltas te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
77b5(rgyud): grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la zhugs la/ de'i bka' la nyon cig/ de nas deg gis 'di skad gsol to// bdag cag gi ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/
77b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsung ba/ sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ bskyabasu 'gro ba bsgrub par bgyis/ kun 'khyen ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ grogs pa rnams kyi
77b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bgyis/ de nas 'jig rted gyis 'angs 'din 'jig rten gsum po ma pa'i dag gi bdag pi sgre chen po 'jig rten bsum po thams cad kyi bdag par gyur pa dregs te/
78a1(rgyud): cher khros par ston cing 'di skad ces smra so// kye gnod sbyin nga ni 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug byed pa po// 'jig pa po 'byung po thams
78a2(rgyud): cad kyi dbang po lha'i lha/ lha chen po yin na/ gnod sbyin khyod kyi ngag nga ci'i phyir nyan/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsor zhing bka' bsgral pa/ kye sems can ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor
78a3(rgyud): du myur du zhugs la nga'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ de banas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i sems can dbang
78a4(rgyud): phyag la 'di skad bka' bstsal pa 'di su zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa la bos nas/
78a5(rgyud): 'di skad du gsungs// grogs po rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyebasu 'gro ba dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa la bsgrub par bgyis shig/ phyag na rdo rje 'di gnod sbyin khro bo ma rungs pa gtum
78a6(rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po ste/ rdo rje 'bar bas khyed khams gsum pa 'di dag thams cad brlag par byas ste re/ de nas dbang phyug chen po 'jig rten gsum po mtha'
78a7(rgyud): dag gi dbang por gyur pa dang / rang gi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor bang po dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la 'jigs pa bstan pa'i phyir/ khro zhing gtub pa chen
78b1(rgyud): po nyid/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'bar ba chen po gtong zhing ma rungs pa chen pos rtag tu skrod pa nyid bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// kyang ni 'jig rten gsum po
78b2(rgyud): mtha' dag gi bdag po pas khyod kyis ci'i phyir nga la bka' bstsal/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas pas gsor zhing rnam par bzhad de/ 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to//
78b3(rgyud): kye lus srul po ma'i sha za ba/ zas su ro bsregs pa'i thal ba za zhing kha zas dang / mal dang gos kyang de las byed pa/ nga'i bka' bzhin du byos shing / de nas lha chen po dbang phyug
78b4(rgyud): chen pos 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag dang / nam mkha'i khams rnams khro bo chen pos non par byin gyis brlabs te/ 'di rjes smras so// khyod kyang de'i bka' nyon la dam
78b5(rgyud): tshig yang longs shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha chen po zhes bgyi ba'i lha 'di'i ni rang
78b6(rgyud): gi 'tshal ba dang / stobs kyi dregs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa la 'dud par mi btub na/ 'di la ji ltar bgyi ba'i rigs/
78b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i das tshig 'dra bar byas so// a ni sum b+ha badz+ra badz+ra hu phaT/ de nas byang chub
79a1(rgyud): #/ sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje snying po 'di brjod do// hUM/ de nas de brjod ma thag du khams gsum pa thams cad nas 'dus pa'i lha chen po la sogs pa
79a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po'i dbang po thams cad kha sbub du 'gyel te/ nyam thag pa'i tshig 'byin cing / bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la skyabs su 'dong ngo // lha chen po'i lha zhes bya ba'i lha de
79a3(rgyud): nis la 'gyel te/ dran pa med par gyur nas shi'i/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// phyag na rdo rje
79a4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo 'di thams cad la skyabs sbyin pas byos te ma bsad cig de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa thos
79a5(rgyud): nas/ lha thams cad bos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te khyod rang gi srog 'dod na/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dang la de'i bka' la nyon cig/ de nas
79a6(rgyud): de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang bcas pa la skyabs su mchi'o// khyod kyi bstan pa'i bka' ni bdag cag gis ma
79a7(rgyud): 'tshal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas de dag bos nas 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kye lnga 'di rnams 'di ni deng de bzhin gshegs
79b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bdag po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras kyi thu'o//
79b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ste/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i don bya ba'i phyir/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ro// de ci'i phyir zhes na/
79b3(rgyud): khyod kyi srung lha chen po la sogs ma rungs pa'i sems can yod de/ de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang zhi bar mdzad pa'i sdig pa las bzlog par mi spyod pa'i sdig
79b4(rgyud): pa'i sems can de rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir byin gyis brlabs so// de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig par bka' bstsal to// kye grogs po rnams 'di
79b5(rgyud): nyid skyabs su deng dang / 'di nyid kun tu skyob kyi/ gzhan gyis ni ma yin no// de nas khams gsum kun nas 'dus pa srid pa gsum gyis dbang po de rnams bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
79b6(rgyud): 'dzin pa de gang na pa de logs su bltas nas nyams thag pa chen po'i sgra mgrid gcig du phyung nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun skyab
79b7(rgyud): du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa kun skyabs du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes la sogs pa de rnams nges te/ 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// kyis
80a1(rgyud): @#/ rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba 'di gcig du 'bar bar byas nas/ khyed thams cad kyang thal bar byas sta re/ de dag gis 'di
80a2(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs bskyed pa/ zhi ba dul ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa/ sem
80a3(rgyud): can thams cad mi 'jigs pa gsol ba lags na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsreg par 'gyur/ de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos de dag la 'di skad
80a4(rgyud): ces bka' bstsal to// kye grogs po dag gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa de'i phyir/ nga ni kun du bzang po ste/ khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa'i
80a5(rgyud): ngang tshul can sdig pa'i sems can rnams sbyangs pa'i phyir/ gal te nga'i tshe dam tshig la mi gnas na chud gsan par 'gyur ro// gsol ba de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i
80a6(rgyud): rgyal pos/ dbang phyug chen po ma rtogs pa'i lha de dag gzhan du bugs dbyung zhing blangs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad snying po rdo rje bslang ba zhes bya ba 'di smras pa// /
80a7(rgyud): e badz+re ti Sh+Tha/ de nis des smras ma thag/ dbang phyug chen po ma togs par 'bas gsum pa 'das pa srid pa gsum gyis bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cang kun du tug
80b1(rgyud): ba las sems byung ste/ lha'i bde ba myong zhing 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang / ba pu langs pa med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la lta zhing langs so// de nas bcom
80b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' bskul pa/ sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po 'dri ma langs na/ 'di'i ka srog de chud gsan par byas te ci rungs/
80b3(rgyud): gsos na ci yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas/ shi ba gso ba'i snying po 'di smras so// badz+ra a yu/ de nas 'di smras ma thag tu/ lha chen
80b4(rgyud): po lha'i bdag po shi ba las gsos te ldang 'dod na ldang nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag ji ltar gdul 'am/ bcom ldan
80b5(rgyud): 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' la nyan par mi 'jug na/ khyod la 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyis/ nga ma yin no// dbang phyug chen pos gsol
80b6(rgyud): pa// ci bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can 'di las skyabs mdzad mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa/ nga'i 'di la skabs mi nus so// /
80b7(rgyud): gsol pa/ ci'i slad du bka' bstsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
81a1(rgyud): de nyid#bstsal pa'i don bdag gis ma mtshal to// ci lta bu zhes ra/ khams gsum gyi bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis
81a2(rgyud): par ma mtshal na/ 'di su lags/ de bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te/ kye ma rungs pa'i sems can nga'i bka' mi
81a3(rgyud): nyan tam/ de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas/ 'khrugs shing khros par gyur te/ de ltar skyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzigs bstan te/ 'di skad
81a4(rgyud): ces smras so// ba shi bar bzod kyi/ khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po// phyag na rdo rje rab tu 'khros par ston cing / nyid kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas rdo rje'i
81a5(rgyud): rjes su spyod pa 'di byung ngo // oM b+ha Da kar shA badz+ra hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs kyi mthil nas/ kun du 'bar ba'i rdo rje'i snying po khro gnyer byas pa 'che ba lhag ger byung
81a6(rgyud): ba/ gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan mnga' nas bka' nyan cing 'dug par gyur ro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen po sgrung
81a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM ba da ya kar las kar Sha ya/ sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma nud car kad d+ha kad d+ha badz+ra dA dza/ de skad gsungs pa dang / lha chen po dang / lha mo dbuM
81b1(rgyud): mar bcas te/ rkang pa byin kar stan nas/ cer bur byung nas/ skye bo thams cad kyis gad mos btab cing / rkang pas dgug pa'i rdo rje rjes su sprod pas bkug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
81b2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drang du bzhag go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems
81b3(rgyud): can ma rungs pa mchis brang dang bcas pa 'di ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ oM badz+ra kra ma'o// de nas de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / byang chub sem
81b4(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ lha chen po zhags g.yas pas mnan/ zhabs g.yon pas u ma'i steng du mnan nas/ rang gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra a bi shi tsa ha na pa hA ma
81b5(rgyud): tra Ta/ de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas/ rang gi lag stong gi sa rang gi gdong stong la 'chog go/ de nas rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin
81b6(rgyud): po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i phyi rol na/ srid pa gsum po thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang 'di bdag nyid chen po des btul lo// zhes sgra chen po phyung ngo // de nas
81b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byams pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM b+hu d+ha mi tri badz+re dak+Shaho/ de nas de skad
82a1(rgyud): ces gsungs ma thag tu lha chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi bar gyur ta raM/ de yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs bgyis mthil gyis reg pas bde ba
82a2(rgyud): bla na med pa'i sgrub pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzugs dang / ye shes dang / mngon par shes par thob pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs
82a3(rgyud): pa nyid du 'grub pa'i bar du gyur to// de nas lha chen po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i nabs kyi mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung
82a4(rgyud): dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong te/ lha chen po'i lus phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phul nas/ 'og gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi 'jig rten khams kyi
82a5(rgyud): rdul phra rab kyi 'jig rten khams 'das pa na/ thal bas khyebs zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i bar dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par
82a6(rgyud): skyes so// de nas lhun po'i lus de las ched du brjod pa 'di byung ngo // e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med/ yi ge'i tshig gi mnan nas su/
82a7(rgyud): mya ngan las ni 'das par bzhag/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de las gzhan pa'i mthu chen po la sogs pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po
82b1(rgyud): thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs shing / zhugs nas kyang
82b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams thad kyi dam tshig bsrungs shig/ de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bka' ci skad bstsal de bzhin du bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag
82b3(rgyud): na rdo rjes srid pa gsum 'dus pa de rnams bos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// grogs po rnams yang gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa dang / dam tshig dang / sdom pa bzung la
82b4(rgyud): de'i dam tshig la yang gnas par gyis shig/ de dag gi gsol pa/ de bzhin du 'tshal na bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dam tshig glor ma chud do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi dam
82b5(rgyud): tshig 'di sbyin no// byang chub sems ni rims bzhin du/ bskyed nas de'i 'og du ni/ byang chub chen por ci nus par/ shin tu mnyam bzhag 'bad par bya/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
82b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes lha la sogs pa de rnams 'jug pa'i dam tshig chen po phyag rgya bcings pa byas nas/ dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'i snying po 'dis 'ching du bzhug go// oM badz+ra sa ma yaM gri ha na ban
82b7(rgyud): d+has ma ye badz+ra sa datas ma ya sa nu swar sarba ta thA gtas ma ya s+t+wa~M/ Di d+ho me thab/ ste ma b+ha ba/ a ha d+ho ma b+ha ba/ a pra ti ha d+ho mi b+ha ba/ sarba kan su tsa me tsid ta shI yang ku ru/
83a1(rgyud): des rnas#/ haha ha ha tu// de nas 'di smras ma thag du/ khams gsum gyi srid pa gsum gyi skye bo 'dus pa thams cad rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya ti ri ti ri lag du babs te/ dam
83a2(rgyud): du bcing bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes tshul bzhin du btsud nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims bzhin du bstan te/ rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas/
83a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i mtshan ma yang lag tu byin te/ rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bas bskur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyis don la bkod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum
83a4(rgyud): gyi bdag po thams cad kyi las rnams yin no// 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug chen po ni khro bo'i rdo rje'o// mthu bo che ni rgyu ma'i rdo rje'o// sgra bzhin nu ni rdo rje'i dril bu'o// tshangs pa ni thub pa'i
83a5(rgyud): rdo rje'o// dbang po ni rdo rje'i mtshon cha ste/ rig pa'i rgyal po rnams su dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la rjes su byin pa 'di lta ste/ bdud
83a6(rgyud): rtsi 'khyil pa ni rdo rje 'khyil pa'o// zla ba ni rdo rje'i 'od do// dbyig pa chen po'i gtso bo ni rdo rje'i dbyig pa'o// ser smug ni rdo rje'i ser smug ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje khro bo zhes
83a7(rgyud): bya bar dbang bskung / de nas namakha' la skyed pa'i lha'i dbang po mas cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ snang rtsis myos pa ni rdo rje grangs po tsho'i sde'o// sbrang rtsi'i byed pa na rdo rje'i bre ba'i/
83b1(rgyud): rgyal ba ni rdo rje'i dbang po'o// rgyal bar byed pa ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ste/ de la sogs tshogs kyi gtso bo zhes byar dbang bskur ro// de nas sa bla'i lha'i dbang po thams cad la byin
83b2(rgyud): ba 'di lta ste/ mdzod kyong ni rdo rje'i tho ba'o// me ni rdo rje'i me'o// brlung ni rdo rje'i rlung ngo // ku be ra ni rdo rje'i 'jigs pa'o// de la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i bo nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas
83b3(rgyud): sa'i 'og gi dbang po lha thams cad la byin ste 'di lta ste/ phag ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu'o// gshin rje ni rdo rje'i dus so// gcugs phud sngan rdo rje'i bgegs kyi gtso bo// be ru ni klu'i rdo rje te/
83b4(rgyud): de la sogs pa ni bran zhes par dbang bskur ro// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po'i lham thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/ rang gi mtshan ma la rdo rjer byin gyi
83b5(rgyud): brlabs sa nas/ rdo rje'i ming gI bskur bas dbang bskur ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi don la rab tu dkod do// 'di lta ste/ u ma ni khro bo rdo rje ma'o// dug ma ni rdo rje'i
83b6(rgyud): gser ro// Sha shI ni rdo rje'i rdo rje bzhin nu ma'o// 'tshangs ma ni rdo rje zhi ba'o// dbang po ni rdo rje 'u tshur ste/ de la sogs pa ni rdo rje rgyal por dbang bskur ro// de nas par sdang la spyod pa'i bud med
83b7(rgyud): thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ mi 'chi ba ni rdo rje'i mi 'chi ba'o// ro hi ni rdo rje dngas ma'o// dbyug 'dzin ma ni rdo rje'i dbyug mchog ma'o// skye ba 'phrog ma ni rdo rje'i skyed bcings te/ de la sog
84a1(rgyud): pa ni khro ba mo zhes bya bar dbang bskur ro// de nas nam mkha' la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ gsod ma ni rdo rje'i 'dzum pa ste/ za
84a2(rgyud): ba me ni rdo rje za ba te/ mgo ma ni rdo rje'i bgo ma'o// dga' bo mon rdo rje dbang ngo // de la sogs pa ni tshogs kyi gtso mor dbang bskur ro// de nas sa la spyod pa'i bud med thams cad la
84a3(rgyud): byin pa ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ba mon rdo rje'i pho nya ma'o// rlung ni rdo rje'i phyogs ma rdo rje ma'o// mi ni rdo rje 'bar ba ma'o// ku be ra ma ni rdo rje 'byor ma te/ rdo la sogs pa ni rdo rje po 'a mor dbang
84a4(rgyud): bskur ro// de nas sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad la byin pa 'di lta ste/ phag mi rdo rje ni'i kha'o// tsa mun da ni rdo rje'i dus so// sna tshad ma ni rdo rje'i ba'o// ba ru ma ni rdo rje chu srin
84a5(rgyud): ma ste/ rdo rje'i bran mor dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes zhugs pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rnams bskyed nas/ phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad
84a6(rgyud): bsrabs te/ rdo rje'i dam tshig mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni/ rigs rnams myur du ba thal
84a7(rgyud): bar byed/ oM he nas ma ya hu phaT/ de nas srid po gzung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di byin no// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te/ 'dzub mo lcags kyu bcings na ni/ bcu zhing phyir yang gar+b+ha
84b1(rgyud): bar bya/ dgos pa'i don sems gang yin pa/ de'i mdun du khyed rnams ni/ dgos pa 'grub 'dug par byos/ khyed kyi srog ni ma rungs par/ dam tshig 'dis ni gyur ta re/ rdo rje bcings
84b2(rgyud): ba dam bcas te/ 'dzub mo bkug la rab tu mnan/ mthe bo gnyis ka mtshan mas sbyar nas/ gung mo gnyis ka rab tu man na/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yi/ dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa las//
84b3(rgyud): gal te dga' yis 'das gyur na/ dam tshig 'di yi khyed gsod do// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ga yi/ mthe chung sor mo bcings nas ni/ 'dzung mo sor mo rgyab nas mdud/ bzlogs te mgo
84b4(rgyud): 'or bzhag par bya/ bdag nyid che ba'i dam tshig 'di rdo rje rigs 'dzin bcings nas ni/ khros te gang la ltas pa'i/ de'i mdun du de bzhin 'dug/ rdo rje bsrungs pa dam cings la//
84b5(rgyud): rdo rje gdams pa des man no// 'di ni sems dpa'i dam tshig ste/ sems can thams cad bsrung ba'o// gang zhig la la skyabs pa'i phyir/ khro dor ldan pas bcings nas ni/ sems
84b6(rgyud): can gang la bsrung ba'i phyir/ de yi brgyab du 'dug par byos/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings ste/ g.yon rdo rje 'dzub mo la/ mthe chung gnyis ni gdams byas ste/ bcu zhing slar gnas
84b7(rgyud): drag dkrol nas/ khro bar palam bzhag gang yin pa'i/ dam tshig 'di yang sbyar byas te/ khyed kyi de'i mdun du ni/ dngos gru ba kun gyi mchog phyir 'khod/ rdo rje bcings pa sbrel pa ni/
85a1(rgyud): / 'jud mo gnyis ni dam por bya/ mthe bo gung po rtse mo gnyis/ rdo rje phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / bzlog te sprul par bzhag par bya/ gal te gsod par
85a2(rgyud): 'dod na ni/ dgug par bya ba gang yin pa/ de'i mdun du rtag par 'dug/ de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi snying po 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'dzin pa'i snying
85a3(rgyud): po 'di yin te/ oM ba li tod pa li ta badz+ra a kar sha ye hu dza/ rdo rje gan+d+ha ba'i phyag rgyas lha dgug pa'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra a gra pa'i d+ha sa ma ya huM/ bar snang la spyod pa rnams kyi'o//
85a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra ma lA a gra baM/ 'phreng ba can rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra b+ha d+ha ho// sa la spyod pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra pa ta la d+ha na dza hu phaT/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra he ru ka
85a5(rgyud): badz+ra sa ma ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya/ mud tra pra dz+nyA na dza ka hUM phaT/ bud med thams cad kyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag ni rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//
85a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba por dbang bskur nas/ ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor du rtogs pa de dag thams cad ji ltar sgrub par
85a7(rgyud): dgyi ba legs par bka' bstsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsan nas/ 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M phaT/ de nas byang chub
85b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ sems cad thams cad la skyabs pa'i phyir/ dkyil 'khor thams cad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya a kar sha/ sarba man ta lam
85b2(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ras t+ye ma ti kram hUM phaT/ rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings ste// snying khar yongs su bskor bar bya/ 'dzub gnyis lcags kyu phyi rol gyi/ dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin no// de nas
85b3(rgyud): 'di bshad ma thag tu dkyil 'khor thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol kun tu bskor te khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad bos te/
85b4(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye grogs po dag bsrog bcod pa dgang zhig dam tshig bzung ba la bsgrub par dgyis shig/ de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig gi sems can
85b5(rgyud): de rnams kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba'i sems can lags pas mdangs 'phrogs pa la srogs ltos nas/
85b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ci ltar 'tshe bar bgyi ba de bka' bsnol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes ma rungs pa'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so// oM du ta badz+ra
85b7(rgyud): kro d+ha ga na de ga paH b+hi d+han las/ bi ki ras rba duSh+Tas ma ya mu tra man ta lam/ b+ha na~M D+hanadza/ mar da madra/ khang khang/ par man tA badz+ra sa ma ya hu phaT/ rdo rje khro 'dzum legs
86a1(rgyud): da// par ni/ sen mo sgrub te dkris nas kyang / rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba/ phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms/ de nas 'di smras ma thag du ma rungs pa'i dkyil
86a2(rgyud): 'khor thams cad gcig du 'dus pa rnam pa du mas gtse zhing dbral ba dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa yang dral te/ ma rungs pa'i sems cad de rnams/ yang bsreg shing shin
86a3(rgyud): tu btsos pas 'o dod cher 'dod cing 'phongs pa'i sgra phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ga na ba der thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
86a4(rgyud): bdag cag srog dang mi 'bral bar skyabs mdzad du gsol/ de nas phyag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ma rungs pa'i dkyil
86a5(rgyud): 'khor de rnams ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' bstsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ oM ni sum d+ha na ha da ha/ pa tsa gr-ih+NA ban d+ha hUM phaT/ de nas
86a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje khro bo mi zad pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma ha badz+ra kA ra kro ta pa ta ya/ sarba duSha man Da lam/ bi na sha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya/ di ki ra 'di
86a7(rgyud): d+han sa ya/ s+pho ta ya/ ban dza ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya/ mu tra b+han d+ha na/ grih+na ha da/ baH/ sarba duSh+Te sa ma yas daton badz+ra sa ma ya hu phaT/ de nas de gsungs ma thag tu ma rungs pa
86b1(rgyud): dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad yang gcig du gyur nas/ rgya mtsho chen por lhung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la
86b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la ma rungs pa thams cad thul cig ces bka' bstsal na/ phra mnam dang / gdon la sogs pa gnod de dag tham cad la bdag gis
86b3(rgyud): ji ltar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hA phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra man la sogs pa
86b4(rgyud): gdon ma rungs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a kar sha ya shi gram/ sarba duSh+Ta gra ham/ badz+ra d+ha ra sad t+yen hUM dza/ de nas de smras ma thag du pra men ma la sog
86b5(rgyud): pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad ri rab kyi rtse mo'i phyi rol bskor te mkhod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes phra men ma la sogs pa ga do ni ma rungs pa thams cad
86b6(rgyud): la bos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams/ srog gcod pa spongs pa'i bslabs pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa bzung bar bgyis shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba dang //
86b7(rgyud): rab tu 'bar ba dang / gcig tu 'bar bar gyur pas/ khyed kyi rigs rnams ma lus par gasregs pa re/ de nas phra men ma la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad bcom ldan
87a1(rgyud): na #'das la der thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag sha 'tshal ba na/ ji ltar bgyi ba bka' bstsal
87a2(rgyud): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag ni rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// phyag na rdo rje sems can 'di rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed la/ thabs sbyin par bsgrub par
87a3(rgyud): byos shig/ de nas phyag na rdo rje thugs rje chen pos sems can 'chi ba'i mtshan ma shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pra ti grin hA hri da yam a kar shA ya/
87a4(rgyud): a h+ya ya na sad to// swa mA da/ a dI na/ mri ya te/ ha da s+ya hI da yan niSh+ka ma du ma sa ma ya hu dz+nyA/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do// snying khar rdo rje lag ngar gnyis/ shin tu
87a5(rgyud): dam por bcings nas ni/ rdo rje 'dzub me rtse mo yis/ rang gi mtshan krung phrad par bya/ khyed rnams kyis phyag rgya 'dis sems can thams cad kyi snying rus la zlos shig/ de nas pra min
87a6(rgyud): ma la sogs pa ma rungs pa'i don thams cad dga' ba'i sgra bston nas/ mchongs rgal te rang gi gnas su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di
87a7(rgyud): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ma rungs pa 'dul ba lags par bka' bstsal na/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs la sogs pa nang
87b1(rgyud): de rnams la ji ltar bgyi ba bdag la bka' bstsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bskul pa/ oM hUM phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs
87b2(rgyud): pa'i nad dgug pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya sarba duShA dze ra di na na sha ya huM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag du rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams thams cad ri
87b3(rgyud): rab ri'i rtse mo'i phyi rol tu bskor te 'khod do// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rims la sogs pa'i nad rnams la bos te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye bzod ldan rnams/ sems can
87b4(rgyud): gsod pa las ldog pa'i slab pa gzud pa'i sdom pa long shig/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni sems can gyi mdangs 'phrog ste/ mche bar bgyid na da
87b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ci ltar bgyi legs par bka' bstsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las rnams dag par gyur pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i snying
87b6(rgyud): po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra karma/ bi shod ya sarba a ba ra Ni ne/ bud d+ha sad ton sa ma ya dz+nyA huM/ de nas de'i phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te/ 'dzub mo gnyis
87b7(rgyud): ka dkug nas kyang / mthe bo mnyam te sbyar nas ni/ mnan pa 'di ni sdig 'phrog pa/ phyag rgya 'di rims la sogs pa'i nang thams cad kyis gang la btab pa las byas pa bstan na/
88a1(rgyud): da@#rgol cig par bdag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje bstsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bsngal na/
88a2(rgyud): mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bstsol ba/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang cig du 'dus nas/ 'di skad ces bka' bsam
88a3(rgyud): to// oM badz+ra pa ni ma ha man d+ha lam/ pra pe sha ya sarba duSh+Ta ro dun ni ba ra ya/ pa paM b+hU pra mok+ka ya dur driSh+Na ba r+yA pa na num/ bi sho d+ha ya/ na ne sha ya/ bi na sha ya/ ha ha ha hahu/ de nas
88a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa'i tshig de bos nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lus pa med paskyab pa dang / phan pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang / dngos
88a5(rgyud): grub dam pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi ba'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i
88a6(rgyud): dam tshig las byung ba/ 'jig rten gsum las rnams rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste//
88a7(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba'i pha/ dngos grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya/ rdo rje ngas tshig las byung ba/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'byin byed pa/
88b1(rgyud): ma rungs thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de la sngags 'dis srad bu bri bar bya'o// oM badz+ra sa ma ya su tra ma ti ka ma/ grub bzhir bya zhing sgo bzhir dgod/ rta babs bzhis kyang rab tu brgyan/
88b2(rgyud): srad bu bzhi dang / ldan pas ste/ dar dang phreng bas rab tu brgyan/ dkyil 'khor kun gyi gro rnams dang / sgo rgyu byin 'tshams rnams su/ rdo rje rin chen brgyan par ni/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol srad
88b3(rgyud): bu bri/ shes rab can gyis de nang du/ rdo rje rkyen gyis brgyan te/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ ka ba brgyad dang rta babs bcas/ rdo rje ka ba'i gnas mchog du/ dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan
88b4(rgyud): ba ste/ de ltar dkyil 'khor srad du bri/ srad bu bris pas tshon gyis bgang / de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags pa 'di'o// oM badz+ra tsi tA sa ma ya hA/ de nas dbus su 'gyu nas ni/ rdo rje
88b5(rgyud): slob dpon mnyam bzhag pas/ rdo rje sgo ni rnams bzhi'o// yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya/ de la sgo rnams dbye ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM badz+red g+ha d+ha ya/ sa ma ya/ pra pe sha ya hUM// gser
88b6(rgyud): ram rdal las byas pa 'am/ sa yang rung ste legs bris pa'i/ pha gu grwa bzhir bya ba la/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzhag par bya/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sprin drang
88b7(rgyud): ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra dz+wa la ma ga ni pra tI ba ta a kar sha ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta tA na/ ma ha badz+ra sa ma la hudz+dza/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni/ 'bar bas bskor bar
89a1(rgyud): bdag par bya/ de bzhin rin chen 'od bskor ba/ bad pa kun de bzhin/ de nas rdo dpa tshig gi phyag rgyarnams bskrod pa'i sring po 'di yin no// dus twA rjen
89a2(rgyud): lA ma la hUM phaT/ oM rang na badz+ri dz+wa la ma ya hA traM/ oM d+harma badz+ri dz+wa lA mA pA hUM hri/ oM karma badz+ri dz+wa la mA la hUM a/ rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni/ sangs rgyas spyan sngar de bzhin de/ shes pa
89a3(rgyud): cho ga bzhin dri ba/ rdo rje hUM zhes dkyil 'khor ro// de la rdo rje shugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra bag a kra ma hUM/ de bzhin du rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dkyil
89a4(rgyud): 'khor thams cad la yang srad bu rgal te/ thams cad du 'gro bar bya'o// de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad do// yid kyi ri mo brteg nas ni/ rdo rje srad bu 'am gzhan yang rung / phyir byang nad du
89a5(rgyud): zhugs kyang ni/ dam tshig 'gal bar de mi 'gyur/ de'i dbus su sems dpa' che/ phyag na rdo rje bri ba ni/ ud dpal che sngo 'cher ba'i mdog/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dus/ mche ba gcung zad byung ba'i
89a6(rgyud): zhal/ khro dang bcas par 'dzums pa'i zhal/ g.yon brkyang tshul du gnas pa ste/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od/ g.yon pa'i zhabs kyi mthil gyis ni/ dbang phyug chen po mnan
89a7(rgyud): par bya/ g.yas pa'i zhabs kyis su ma yi/ nu ma'i steng du non par bri/ de'i snying po ni 'di yin no// / de yi phyogs ni thams cad du/ rdo rje khro bo bzhag pa ni// khros pas mche byung bas/
89b1(rgyud): ste/ 'bar ba'i phreng bas dkrigs pa'i 'od// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra sad tra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha a kar sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha ra ga ya hUM
89b2(rgyud): phaT/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha sa d+ha sad+ha huM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par ni/ rdo rje shugs kyi rgal nas kyang / der ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba/ rdo rje khribs bskor ba bri/ de nas de rnams kyi snying
89b3(rgyud): po ni bshad do// tAM/ oM bidz+ra br-i ku ti kro ta ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sur ru ma ha dza la mA la kro d+ha dz+wa la ya sarba ma hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi kye tu de hi hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra a Ta Ta ha sa kro d+ha ha ha ha da he
89b4(rgyud): phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / rdo rje de ni bri bar bya/ khro bo bdag nyid chen pos bskor/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po 'di bshad do// hri/
89b5(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+harma kro tA bi na sha ya bi sho da ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tigaSh+Ta kro d+hanIn d+ha ts+tshin d+ha hu phaT/ oM badz+ra he ta kri t+yA pra bi sha/ pra bi sha ya/ man da le sarba na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha b+ha sha/ ba da ba da
89b6(rgyud): huM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni/ rdo rje shugs kyi rgal nas kyang / rdo rje dbab pa bri ba ni/ rdo rje khro ba'i tshogs kyis bskor/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po bshad do// oM hUM badz+ra
89b7(rgyud): kim d+hu phaT/ oM badz+ra ka bkro d+ha rak+Sha rak+ShahU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra la k+Sha kro d+ha/ 'di dang hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krim mu sti sa twA la sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni gro rnams su/ rdo rje dbyings
90a1(rgyud): de ni#kyi tshul bzhin du/ ji ltar go ribs bzhin du ni/ gsang ba'i mchod pa kun bri'o// de nas de dag gi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di yin no// oM badz+ra la s+ya ra ga sa hUM pakra mo/
90a2(rgyud): badz+ra ma la a bi shan tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra gri tig ta ga ta hUM/ oM badz+ra dr-id t+yai ba shi ku ru hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor dam pa'i phyi rol du/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang / de'i grwa rnams nyid du ni
90a3(rgyud): mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi rnams bzhag/ de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra d+hU pa putsa s+pha ra nas ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pu tsa paSha pu dza pA ra na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ e badz+ra a log
90a4(rgyud): putsA s+pha ra nas ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gun d+ha pu dza s+pha ra na sa ma ye huM phaT/ sgo rnams bzhi yi dbus su ni/ lcags kyu la sogs bzhag par bya/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams/ phyi'i
90a5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs rnams so// de nas de dag gi snying po bshad do// oM badz+ra a gu sha ma ha kro da tA a kar sha ya sarba sa ma ya na hUM hUM dz+nyA/ oM badz+ra pa sha ma ha kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba sa ma ya na haM/
90a6(rgyud): hUM/ mo badz+ra sngota ma kro t+ta b+hAn d+ha b+han d+ha sarbas ma ya hUM baM/ oM badz+ra ma pe sha ma ha kro tA a be sha ya sarba sa ma yan hU~M sa/ de nas yang 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyam/
90a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang po nyid du rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid khro bo ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgyad cing te gzugs shig/ zhugs nas de bzhin gsheg
90b1(rgyud): pa thams cad la gsol ba btab te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i dbang du bcings te/ tshar gcad pa'i rigs pa rnams ni tshar/
90b2(rgyud): gcad do// rjes su bzung ba'i rigs pa rnams ni rjes su bzung na/ de ltar bsgrub par bgyi ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' bskul dugs sol zhes byas ste/
90b3(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo de'i te ri te ri'i phyag rgya rang gi snying khar ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag ste/ rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas nas/ yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad mchings shig dang /
90b4(rgyud): des nas thams cad byon par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi byas nas/ gdug pa la sogs pa yang ni de bzhin no// de nas cho ga 'dis rdo rje slob ma chug shig/
90b5(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon rang gis rdo rje khro de'i ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgyas bcings te/ slob ma la yang snying po 'di yang bcings du phug shig/ oM g+han hA r+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM baM/ de nas gos sngon po
90b6(rgyud): bgos la mgo la gtsug gtor sngon pos bcings te/ der sngon pos phyag dong dkris la sngags 'dis chug shig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma pra bi sha mi/ de nas gtsug ste rdo rje dbab
90b7(rgyud): pa'i tshig gi phyag rgya dang / snying po 'dis de la dbab par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra a be sha ya sa// de nas babs nas/ de ltar babs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
91a1(rgyud): cad kyis byin gyis brlabs so// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba thams cad kyang skad cig gis shes so// gnod pa yang med par 'gyur ro//
91a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// e hau zhes bya bas kyang sems can thams cad la tshar bcad pa dang / phan pa dag byed nus par 'gyur ro// phyag na rdo rje yang
91a3(rgyud): rtag tu de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgrub po// de nas mna'i snying po byin cig/ de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te/ dkyil 'khor chen po ci lta ba bzhin du ston cig/ dkyil
91a4(rgyud): 'khor zer ba tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag las rnam par rgyal bar nus par 'gyur ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i lha chen po la sogs
91a5(rgyud): balnga thams cad dgug pa dang / bzhag pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang dbya ba dang / mnan pa rus par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/
91a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing rang gi dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do// de nas de la rdo rje'i dbang bskur pas dbang bskur te/ rang gi
91a7(rgyud): mtshan ma de rnyed pa ci ste ba bzhin du sngags 'dis lags pa gnyis su skyed do// meng dra ba ni badra thaka bya ba/ de nas sngags 'dis dang ming gi dbang bskyer / mngon
91b1(rgyud): kro d+ha tAM a b+hi Shi na tsa mi/ badz+ra na mA A b+hik+She ta/ he badz+ra na ma/ de nas gang la ming gang btags pa de la/ kye zhes bya ba'i sgra sbyin par bya'o// de nas ye shes rnams skyed do// rdo rje
91b2(rgyud): khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ 'bar ba mang po'i 'od can gyis/ rdo rje dbyibs ni snying khar bsam/ kye bo kan las 'bebs par byed/ rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ dpral bar
91b3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen yang de bzhin du ni bsam byas na/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ rdo rje khro bar mnyam bzhag nas/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po'i 'do/ rdo rje pad mo mgul du
91b4(rgyud): bsam/ sems can thams cad brlag par byed/ rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'od/ rdo rje thams cad spyi 'or bzhag/ skye bo 'di dag thams
91b5(rgyud): cad bsrung / de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya 'di rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM huM sad tA badz+ra kro d+ha a b+hi sha ya/ ho ra da na badz+ra kro d+ha ba sho ma na ya tra/ hU~M dArma badz+ra kro d+ha na sha ya
91b6(rgyud): phaT/ haM badz+ra karma kro d+ha dak+Sha/ de nas lha rnams dgug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas brlab bo// lag par hUM zhes bya ba yis// rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas ni/ khros nas
91b7(rgyud): 'dzub mo bskul ba ni/ lha rnams dgug pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ rang gi rkang ma bil dbus su ni/ rdo rje lcags kyu bris nas su/ de nyid kyis ni rtags mnan nas/ lha rnams
92a1(rgyud): deyid sdus@#/ de ba nyid du gdug/ rdo rje lcags kyu nyid phyag rgya/ legs par phye ste bzhag nas su/ bskul na sum la sogs pa/ bud med thams cad 'gugs
92a2(rgyud): par 'gyur/ rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ 'jug to nyid du de bzhin te/ des mnan lha ni gang yin pa te// de yi dgug pa dam pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin
92a3(rgyud): no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a gra a kar sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra karma a g+hu sha kro d+ha a g+hu sha kro d+ha a kar sha ya hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha da na Da a gra a kar sha ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+hA
92a4(rgyud): sa na gad tsa a kar sha ya mi te/ badz+ra sa ma yaM ma nu sma ra huM phaT/ de nas phyag rgyas rnams bzhi'i ye shes bslab po// g.yon brkyang par ni gnas nas su/ rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyis
92a5(rgyud): ni/ hu tsam gyis ni skra cig gis/ skye bo thams cad 'bebs par byed/ rdo rje dag gis legs par smras// hUM zhes bya ba bzhi ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kun kyi snying po yis/
92a6(rgyud): thams cad kyang ni nges par 'gug/ rdo rje khro bo mnyam bzhag nas/ rdo rje khro bo'i lha mchog gi/ skye bo kun gyi gsod byed de/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor to// yid kyis lus la go bsgo
92a7(rgyud): ba/ bdag gas pha rol rnams la ste/ go cha chen po sbyor bas ni/ skye bo 'di dag thams cad bsrung // de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha kar ya sa be sha sa
92b1(rgyud): hUM a/ oM badz+ra bid t+yod ta ma ma ha kro d+ha a na ya ho ba ga b+han badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha daSh+Ti ha na ha da pa tsa bi nai sha ya hUM ka re Na pa ta ya badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ oM na mo dri d+ha badz+ra ka pa
92b2(rgyud): tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ de nas sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag nas/ badz+ra hUM zhes bzlas pa yi/ gang dang gang la
92b3(rgyud): kun zhags pa/ phyag rgyas btab pa te 'gyur ro// sgra chen du ni brjod bya ba/ ta ki hU~M phaT khros nas su/ lan gcig gang la smras pa ni/ rdo rje 'bar bas de mngon dgug/ rdo rje
92b4(rgyud): khro ba'i ting 'dzin cing / rdo rje blta bas bltas pa yis/ sems can gang dang gang yin pa/ de dang de ni 'chi bar 'gyur/ gsod skom yid la bsams nas su/ snying khar
92b5(rgyud): rdo rje bsgom par byed/ hUM zhes bya ba nyid kyi kun// rgyas btab par ni rang gis dgongs/ sems can gang dang gang dag gis/ yid kyi rgyas ni 'bebs pa 'di/ phyag rgya 'di
92b6(rgyud): ni shin tu yang / las rnams thams cad bsgrubs par 'gyur/ de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no/ tra gi a/ Tag gi dz+nyA/ Tag gi hUM/ Tag gi haM/ phyag rgya re res kyang la
92b7(rgyud): bzhi rnam la/ phyag rgya'i snying po bzhis sbyar ro// de nas gsang ba'i khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// yan lag kun gyi 'khyud nas ni/ hUM zhes gang la sbyar byas pa/ dbang po gnyis ni sprad na/ de'i srog
93a1(rgyud): de cir rdzus@#/ nim rungs 'gyur/ hUM zhes bya bar ldan par yis/ mchu phrad sos ni ma chu bzung nas/ dbang po gnyis ni rab sprad pa/ gang yin de ni mngon gsum 'gyur/
93a2(rgyud): hUM zhes sbyor ba gang yin pa/ de ni bden pa med par 'gyur/ dbang po gnyis ni sprad gyur nas/ gang yin de ni sdug bsngal thob/ hUM zhes bya bar gang sbyor zhing / dbang po gnyis ni
93a3(rgyud): sprad nas kyang / yan lag kun gyis bcing gyur/ de nas de dag snying po 'di dag yin no// hUM a/ hUM dz+nyA/ hUM ho// huM ham/ de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil
93a4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// gang gis sems can pa'i phyir/ rdo rje dbyings gyis tshul gyis ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/ de ni
93a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ dbang phyug dang ni u ma yang / sa la bris te de ltar mnan/ ji ltar bris pa'i go rims bzhin/ sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bya bar/ 'di ni bcing
93a6(rgyud): pa tsam gyis kyang / de ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba/ rdo rje hu dang 'dra ba yi/ dngos grung rdzu 'phrul myur tu 'grub// ji ltar mi ro bris pa bzhin// 'bar bas bskor ba'i dbus zhub
93a7(rgyud): pa/ sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de nas de rnams la bshad de// rdo rje las ni bran med// sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgrubs/ myur du sangs/
93b1(rgyud): rgyas nyid thob po// 'jig rten gsum la rgyal bcings na/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal 'gyur/ rdo rje che dang kun du 'gro// rdo rje hUM zhes bya bar 'dra// rdo rje dbang gis rgyal por 'gyur/
93b2(rgyud): chos bzang ldan pas 'jig rten dbang / las gyi rdo rje khro bo che// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa' khro bo rab tu brtan// khro bo'i lcags kyu rab tu 'gug/ khro bo zhags pa
93b3(rgyud): chags par byed// khro bo legs pas dga' ba bster// khro gnyer gyis kun ma rungs byed// khro bo'i nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ dpal gyi khro bos don rnams bsdus// ha rnga dgod
93b4(rgyud): pas 'du byed do// chos kyi khro bo chos rnams bsdus// rdo rje ral gris bcod par byed// rgyu'i khro bo sdug bsngal 'phrog/ khro bo smra bas tshig 'breg go// las kyi khro bo las
93b5(rgyud): rab ste/ bsrung ba yis ni bsrung bar byed// khro bo gnod sbyin dgra yang za/ khro bo khu tshur dngos grub ster// de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bshad do// rdo rje gnyis las byung
93b6(rgyud): ba ni/ dam tshig mchog du grags pa yin// de dag bcing ba bshad bya ba// khro bo bcing pa bla na med// lag ngar rdo rje byas nas su/ mthe'u chung lcags kyu bcing bar bya// gung mo/
93b7(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis kyi sdigs pa ni/ 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de bzhin 'dzub mongs sbyar te/ nor bu 'dra bar rab tu dgag/ gung mo gnyis gling pad mor bya// gung mo
94a1(rgyud): de nyid sdus/ 'dzung mo gnyis kas sdigs// 'dzub mo gnyis rdo rjer bya// g.yas pa lcags kyu dgug par bya// de nyid du zhes bya bar 'dud// legs par sbyin pa de bzhin
94a2(rgyud): te// 'dzub gnyis dpral ba'i gnyer mar bzhag/ snying khar 'dzub mos nyi ma bskor/ lag pa brkyang ste spyi bor bzhag/ 'dzub mo kha nas dgod ltar bya/ 'dzub me'i sen mo sbyar
94a3(rgyud): bar bya/ g.yas pa ral gribacing ba'o// gung 'dzub mnyam 'khor lo yi// kha yi nang nas dbyung ba dang // 'dzub mo gung mo rdo rjer bya// 'dzub mo yi ni 'gul par bskor// 'dzub
94a4(rgyud): mo gnyis ni mche ba che/ 'dzub mor bkug pa rdo rje bcing // rdo rje la s+ye la sogs pa// sems ma'i phyag rgya de nyid he// zhes bya chos kyi phyag rgya ste// haM zhes bya bar lhan cig go//
94a5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje dam tshig gi chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje can// ta ni rdo rje snying po'o// hI ni rdo rje sde yi sa'o// a ni rdo rje thams cad kyi'o// hUM/ he ta/ taM/
94a6(rgyud): hi hi// de ha d+hi nI hUM// gram kri nga dI a// rdo rje khro bo mang po yi/ chos kyi phyag rgya grub pa'o// rdo rje dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi/ las
94a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na/ rdo rje 'gying ba brtsegs tshul gyis// jo bo'i khu chur gnyis su bshad// gang dang gang gi phyag rgya rnams// las kyi phyogs na gang rung ba/ de dang
94b1(rgyud): der ni bsgyur nas kyang // phyag rgya de ni sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya thams cad kyi cho ga'o// de nas 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba
94b2(rgyud): bshad do// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya ni// rdo rje 'dzub mo dam tshig mchog/ rdo rje hUM zhes sngags kyis ste/ dngos grub thams cad yud kyis thob// mthe'o chung gnyis ka lcag
94b3(rgyud): gyur bcing // rdo rje gnyis ka'i bla 'og du// dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya 'di// ska cig gis ni thams cad 'gug/ rigs pa dam thams cad kyi/ 'jig rten gsum la brgyal zhes bshad/
94b4(rgyud): thams cad kyang ni mnod pa ste/ de bzhin las rnams thams cad byed// rdo rje 'dzub mo'i gnyis legs par// rab mnyam bzhag bskams na ni// shi ba thams cad spong zhes
94b5(rgyud): ba ste/ rdo rje sdod pa zhes bya'o// rdo rje 'dzub gnyis legs pa yang // rdo rje bcing ba bcings nas su/ bsgyur te gtsug du bzhag pa ni// tshe dang nad med 'phel ba'o// rdo rje bcings
94b6(rgyud): pa dam byas te// mthe bo skams nas nad du bzhag/ 'dzub mo dam por dgug nas su/ gcus pa zhags su bkug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bcings nas su/ gang gi
