94b7(rgyud): gzugs la nang g.yon pas// legs minan pa yi sems can de// zla ba byed kyis 'grub par 'gyur// de rje'i phyag rgyaganyis bcings te/ gcig la gcig ni brdabs pa ni/
95a1(rgyud): sems can gang gi lus la ni/ babs nas de yang brdob par byed/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// bdag gam pha rol go char bya/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi banings
95a2(rgyud): byas na/ rtags pa nyid du bsrung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'thil du bcings nas su// yid kyi khros nas dgab bya ba/ mthe'i rdo rje'i dam po te/ rdo rje rigs can 'grub par 'gyur/
95a3(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje dam byas te// mthe bo gnyis kyi bar mnan cing / mthe chung rdo rje rje mor ni// rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// 'dzub mo
95a4(rgyud): gnyis bkug bcings nas su// gcu zhing phyir gcus byas pa ni// lha dgug pa yi dam pa yin// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug rab tu mnan/ mthe bo//
95a5(rgyud): gnyis ka sbyar ba yis// dbus su btsir pa bar gi'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis ga la// mthe chung gnyis ka bcings nas kyang // rgyab sbur 'dzub mo gnyis bsgril te/ bsgyur ba
95a6(rgyud): nam mkha' spyod pa'o// rdo rje bsrung ba btsir bar bya// 'di ni sa pa'i dam tshig ste// thams cad byed pas 'od ka'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis gcings te// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub
95a7(rgyud): mo la/ mtho chung mdud cing drag du rtog/ 'di ni sa 'og dgug pa'o// rdo rje bcing basbrel pa ni// 'dzub mo gnyis gdam pa ste// gung mo mthe bo rdo rje ni// gtug pa'i phyag rgya 'dzem
95b1(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// mnyam bzhag de ni snying khar bzhag/ khrog bu tshur gyis bcings pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa'o// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo la/
95b2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo bkug pas bzung // rab tu khros nas drag gtogs na// ri rab kyang ni ltung bar byed// g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo la// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo lcags kyus bzung
95b3(rgyud): rab tu khros shing bkug pa yis// gdon rnams kun la dgang du byed// rdo rje bcings byas nas su// lag dar snying khar shin tu sngams// rdo rje 'dzub me nyid mtshan kung // bris pa
95b4(rgyud): yi ni snying 'byin no// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yis// mthe bo gnyi ga'i drung du ni// yid kyis khros nas btsir bar bya// rims la sogs pa dgug dam po// rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar
95b5(rgyud): ste// 'dzub mo gnyis kas bkug nas su// mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas/ mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis nang // 'dzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas kyang //
95b6(rgyud): legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni/ ltung bslong ba'i dam pa'o// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// gung mo gnyis ka ngos sbyar nas// tha ma bzhi yi ngo sprad pa// ska cig du ni sdig
95b7(rgyud): bral lo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// dkyil 'khor dang por srang bu/
96a1(rgyud): de sdus#// bri// srad bu bris la byi nas ni// srang bu ji bzhin bri bar bya// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te// 'dzub mo rtse mor ba sbyar la// byas nas mtshon rnams thams
96a2(rgyud): cad la// 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya// rdo rje 'dzub mo yang dag par/ sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su// rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni/ sgo dbye ba'i mchog yin no// de nas rdo rje
96a3(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa bshad do// g.yon brkyang pa'i tshul byas te// khro bo yi ni skad 'byin cing // khro zhing khro ba'i lta bas ni// las rnams tham cad bsgrub
96a4(rgyud): par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po lnga// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa/
96a5(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// // / bam po lnga pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa
96a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhigs te// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba badz+ra ni// badz+ra ma te/ a na ya sarba badz+ra sad t+yen sUdz+dza/ de nas 'di gsung ba tsam gyi/
96a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thugs kha nas// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid phyag na rdo rje rang gi lus thams cad 'dra ba kun nas 'bar bas bskor nas/
96b1(rgyud): rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams su gyur nas/ byung te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don bsgrubs nas// bcom ldan 'das
96b2(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo gsang ba sdu ba'i phyir skra dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jig rten gsum
96b3(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug nas// ched du brjod pa 'di chen du brjod do// e ma'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ gsang
96b4(rgyud): ba'i ye shes bla med gang // de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i phyir// btsun mo gnyis su gyur pa yin/ hri/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdo
96b5(rgyud): rje dam tshig gsang ba zhes bya ba'i 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra byas na// khro ba'i gsang ba zhes bshad
96b6(rgyud): do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bred// dkyil 'khor lnga'i gnas rnams su// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor
96b7(rgyud): dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas the bo'i dam tshig kyang // ji bzhin par ni mkhas pas bri// rdo rje shugs kyi rgal nas ni// phyag na /
97a1(rgyud): de nyid sa#rje'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dbus su mdung rtse chur bris la// rdo rje rab tu bzhag par bya// 'od 'bar dbus su bri ba ni// de yi go rims ji bzhin te//
97a2(rgyud): / rdo rje rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang // mnga' dang gu ba de bzhin te// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis par yang // 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas pa yi/
97a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bri bar bya// khro gnyer dbus su rdo rje bri// de bzhin rdo rje ni rgyal mtshan// de bzhin so yi phreng de yi// ngos su rdo rje bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil
97a4(rgyud): 'khor dam pa gsum par yang // pad mo dbus su gnas pa yi// rdo rje pad mo lha rdzas bri// 'angar ba'i dbus su pad mo bri// ral gri 'khong po de bzhin no// rdo rje rje yang tshul bzhin
97a5(rgyud): da// rtag tu de yi phyogs su bzhag/ rdo rje shugs kyis ngargal nas ri// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par yang // rdo rje bskal la rdo rje bri// rdo rje'i 'od ni chen pos bskor// de yi phyogs ni
97a6(rgyud): thams cad du// 'bar ba kun gyis bkris pa'i 'od// rdo rje thams cad go cha'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba khu tshur mchog/ gro rnams phyi yi gnas rnams su// tshul bzhin du ni bri bar bya// don
97a7(rgyud): rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i reg pa mdor bsdus na// d+hI oM badz+ra kro ta sa ma ye dz+hi// oM badz+ra ro sha oM ang yu sa na ya sarba na dz+hi// mo badz+ra ro she kA ma badz+ri ni// bshams ma a na yan d+hI/
97b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+hi to Sha ya sarba nad+hI// rdo rje dzi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dzi oM badz+ra b+hika Ti kro te ha ra sarba ang+gan dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la ma la pra b+he ma ha kro d+hA ag ni dz+wa la ya// sarba nar
97b2(rgyud): b+hi ro She dzi/ oM badz+ra dwA dza a gra kye yur ma ha kro d+he// de hi me sarba rban dzi// oM badz+ra a TA ha sa ha sa ad Ta da Ta// he sa na mA ra ya dzi// rdo rje dzi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// d+hi/
97b3(rgyud): badz+ra shad d+ha kro d+he ha na ma ra ya duSh+TAn dai// oM badz+ra tig Na kro d+hi tshin d+ha// oM badz+ra ko she na sarba na d+hi/ oM badz+ra he du ma hA kro d+hi pre b+hi sha tsag gram pre ba sha a sarban d+hi// oM badz+ra dz+ri he ma hA
97b4(rgyud): kro d+ha// b+ha she pa tsan pra mun tsa d+hi// rdo rje dwi zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// hrI/ oM badz+ra sarba mu khe ka ra ma badz+ri Ni ma ha kro d+he ku ru sarba hI// oM badz+ra ka pa tsa/ kro d+hi rak+Sha ma ma hI// oM badz+ra
97b5(rgyud): tsan d+ha kro d+he ma hA ya k+Sha ni badz+ra dang Sh+Ti ka ra la b+hi sha Ne b+ha sha pa ya hI// oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+NI ti dan d+ha hI// rdo rje hrI zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su'o//
97b6(rgyud): rdo rje ga ra la sogs pa gsang ba'i mchod pa'i rig pa rnams gsungs pa// badz+ra hA khem// badz+ra hUM guM// badz+ra hwA te/ badz+ra hAM s+t+waM// phyi rol gyi grwa rnams su sil snyan gyi mchod pa'i snying
97b7(rgyud): po brjod par bya'o// 'adz+ra nyi te/ badz+ra ta// 'ju d+ha/ 'dzudroH/ de nas sgo ba'i mchod pa'i sgong rnams gsungs pa/ bajang nge// bamatsun// badz+rab bo/ 'jal la de nas
98a1(rgyud): masa'adi rdzorigs kyigs pa'i dkyil 'khong du 'jug pa'i rtsa brgyas pa bshad do// de nas de la thogs nyid du// de zhig 'jig rten gsum las rnam
98a2(rgyud): pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa'i cho ga bzhin du gtsug ste/ rdo rje thegs te de rje'i rigs kyi dmacig gi phyag rgya dang // par gyi phyag rgyu ye shes kyis phyagarnarnams kyis rdo rje
98a3(rgyud): chadabs chod dang pyir gang kyis mched par bya'o// de la gir dang lan gyig dang // rtse ba'i gang dang // de shes gyig rnams kyi che pa'i phyag rgya'i 'i shes kyi gar ni 'di 'in
98a4(rgyud): // des dpung po nyid du rdo dbying su bsdus pa'i snying po jo rje'i glu dang gar len cing // de bzhin gshegs pa mas ca pa bskrad pas mched par byas nas/ do me bung po
98a5(rgyud): mimam dpa'i bya rgya gang gtig par byug/ de sa'i myi dgrags 'ardzus/ nams kyis yang dag par 'babs/ rjejig kyi kyil khyim ni// nga du mdzin
98a6(rgyud): 'jub ze gnyis/ rdo rje hUM jo phyag r+b+ha ni/ sl-id bar shin tu bcing bar bya// de nas gar gyi chog yi// rdo rje khro ba lcags kyu yis// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang ngo // rdo rje
98a7(rgyud): mad tshani 'ab san/ 'i dag 'a ngas bsgrub pa bya// byas rgya tshig bzhin kyil ste// khamam brda cing bcings pa bya/ myod pa'i tshig 'di yis ni/ khyog rdo /
98b1(rgyud): par byed// mnyes nas dgos pa thams cad ni// 'dod bzhin skad cig thams cad 'grub// de la gar gyi phyag rgya'i snying po 'di rnams yin no// sad d+h+ya badz+ra// an ya badz+ra
98b2(rgyud): rag ya badz+ra/ sA hu badz+ra// de'i 'og tu lan gyi gar gyi mchod pa bya ste// de bzhin gar gyi g.yon pa ni// khu tshur g.yas pas bzung nas su// bsgyur zhing 'dzub mo'i ngos gi ni// dpral
98b3(rgyud): ba nyid la bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar byed ma yang / bskor nas yang dag dgug par bya// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bslang nas ni// rdo rje ha ha zhes rgod cing / mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni/
98b4(rgyud): rgyal po la sogs mi kun kyang / 'bang dang rab kyi gzi brjid dang / sbyin dang dgod pas mnyes par byed// de la 'di rnams ni lan gyi phyag rgya'i snying po yin no// a hi badz+ra// de hi badz+ra/
98b5(rgyud): dz+wa la ya badz+ra// ha sa badz+ra// de bzhin gar yang dkrol nas ni// pad mo'i kha dbus bsgyur ba yis// 'dzub mo rtse mo snying khar bzhag/ bsams pas g.yos pas btud par bya// de bzhin
98b6(rgyud): gar byed rdo rje yi// ral gris bgegs ni gcod ltar bya// 'gal me 'khor lo bskor ba yi// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor tshul du bskor// rdo rje'i tshig du glu len ltar// phyag na rdo rje
98b7(rgyud): mchod par bya// mchod pa'i cho ga 'di yis ni// thams cad rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di rnams ni nye ba'i snying po rnams yin no// ka ma ya badz+ra// tshin d+ha badz+ra/ b+h+ra ma ya badz+ra/
99a1(rgyud): na / khwa'i badra// rje rje khro ba'i 'dzum yang dag/ bgan nas rgya ma spyad nas kyang // bsgyur de de nas gtsug gtor du// 'dzub mo'i rtse mo banag par bya// rdo rje
99a2(rgyud): las kyi tshul gyis ni// lus kun mchog gi dkyil 'khor du// gar gyi cho ga bstan par bya// snying khar rab tu bzhag par bya// de bzhin gar gyi cho ga yis// rdo rje bsrung ba bcing
99a3(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje 'ching ba bcings nas ni// cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya dkrol// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// rId t+ya badz+ra// rak+Sha badz+ra/ khad badz+ra// ban d+ha badz+ra// de nas
99a4(rgyud): khro ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje gzung ba'i lag gnyis kyis// khros pa'i yid kyis drag btog bya// skye bo gang gi ming smos pa// de yi snying ni 'gas par
99a5(rgyud): 'gyur// ma mchu se yis bzung nas su// gang gi ming smos gzir ba ni// de yi mogo yang myur 'gas te// gang gi bka' las 'da' ba'o// khro bo khri chen blta ba yi// mig kyang
99a6(rgyud): 'jum par byed pa ni// gang gi ming ni smos blta ba// de yi mig ni rdol bar 'gyur// rdo rje khro bor mnyam bzhag la// bdag rang gi ni sring khar yang // rdo rje bcing ba bcing na ni//
99a7(rgyud): de yi sems ni 'jigs par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra s+pho taH// huM mu kha bang rnga/ hUM badz+ra ne traH// hu badz+ra ma ne// de nas rdo rje chen
99b1(rgyud): po'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// de la dang po re shig phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad de// ze'u chung lcags kyur bcings nas ni// rdo rje khro bor bzhag par
99b2(rgyud): bya// g.yon pa rtse gsum rgyab du ni// 'jig rten gsum las rgyal zhes bshad// g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo thad kar rkyang / de bzhin bkan pa pad mo yi// de bzhin du ni bsgyur
99b3(rgyud): nas ni// g.yon pa'i rdo rje bzhag par bya// rdo rje'i mthil du bcing bya ste// khros pa'i yid kyis bgab pa ni// mthe bo rdo rje dam pas so// khre bo ti ri ti ri bshad// 'dzub mo
99b4(rgyud): lcags kyung bkug pa ni// 'dzub mo ngos ni sbyar ba'o// de bzhin 'dzub mo legs sbyin pa// 'dzub mo sprad de dpral bar bzhag/ snying khar nyi ma rab tu brtan// 'dzub mo
99b5(rgyud): bskams nas spyi bor bzhag/ bsgyur nas dgod par bzhag par bya// 'dzub bskams pad mo kha 'dus bzhin// gnyis ka ral gri 'chang bar 'dzin// 'dzub gnyis 'khor
99b6(rgyud): lor bcings pa'o// 'dzub mo bskams te kha nas byung / 'dzub mo shin tu brkyang ba dang // 'dzub mos mgul du bcings par bya// de nyid kha bra gram mchi bar bzhag/
99b7(rgyud): khu chu ba dam du bcings par ni// phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa bshad do// gsang ba'i khu tshur la byung ba/
100a1(rgyud): de yid sbrus@#/ dam tshig mchog du rab tu grags/ de rnams bcing ba bshad bya ba// 'dzub pa'i gnas su bzlog pa dang // rdo rje bcing ba bla na med// snying khar bzhag
100a2(rgyud): te rtsibs logs bcu// mda' drang ba ni g.yon pa nas// snying kha nas ni byang bar bya// khro gnyer du ni bsgyur nas te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ba ston pa dang / spyi bor lag pa
100a3(rgyud): brkyang ba dang // bskor nas dgod par bzhag par bya// kha yi dbus su rab bzhag pa// 'dzub mo rims kyi dribs pa 'dra// 'khor lo bskor ba bston pa dang / kha nas rab
100a4(rgyud): tu 'dzin pa ste// spyi bor las mchog dkyil 'khor ro// dpung pa spring ka rtsibs legs rnams// rdo rje bsrung ba de bzhin bya// mchi ba'i gnas su bzhag pa dang / khu tshur
100a5(rgyud): dam du brdams pa'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor phyag rgya ni// mtshan ma'i go rims bzhin du bcing // dam tshig rdo rje bcings pa las/ de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur bzhin// de nas rdo rje
100a6(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// phaT sha Ta maT saT raT ta Ta d+hi ta hA Ta pad Ta tad Ta kad Ta d+had Ta ku ti ri da kha Ta phaT// de nas rigs kyi gsang ba'i las kyi
100a7(rgyud): phyag rgyab cing ba bshad do// mde na las kyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje ba tshur gnyis bya ste// gnas gang yin par bzhag bya ba// khro ba'i lta ba khro dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa/
100b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las khro bo gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs s+ho//
100b2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
100b3(rgyud): zhags nas rigs pa dam pa'i 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sug shwA badz+ra kro d+ha hA phaT// de nas rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas
100b4(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta badz+ra kro tA kra ma hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
100b5(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje bra mo'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM srag Sh+Ta badz+ra rad na kro d+hi kra ma huM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
100b6(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje phra me'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa// oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta pad ma kro d+ha kra ma hA phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis 'jig rten gsum las rnam
100b7(rgyud): par rgyal ba 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sug badz+ra karba kre d+hakra ma hU~M phaT// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs bskyed pa'i phyir// rdo rje dbyings kyi
101a1(rgyud): degi tu@#/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bkod de// de nas de nas kyis rang gi snying po gsungaso// oM badz+ra sad ta sug ShA dz+nyA na kro tA kra ma hu phaT/ oM su ga r+dz+dza badz+ra sangag+ha
101a2(rgyud): sha a kar sha ya ma hA kro tA hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta ra ga ya// ti bram hU~M phaT/ oM sug Sh+ma badz+ra tuSh+Ti kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sug Sh+pa badz+ra b+hi ku ti kro d+hi ha ra ha ra hUM phaT/ oM sreg Sh+ma badz+ra
101a3(rgyud): la man da la kro tA su r+ya dz+wA la ya hUM phaT// oM sugarl-i badz+ra d+ha dza gra kro tA sarbe a ran+da me// pra yang tsa shi gra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta hA sa kro d+ha ma had ta ha ya// hA ha ha ha hUM phaT// e
101a4(rgyud): sugaSh+ma badz+ra d+ha ra ma kro tA sho d+ha ya hu~M phaT// oM sugaSh+Ta badz+ra badz+ra tshe d+ha kro tA tshin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT// oM su gaSh+TaM badz+ra kro tA ma hA tsag kra tshin d+ha pa ta ya shi ram// pra bi sh+ya hri da ya ma b+hin
101a5(rgyud): d+ha hUM phaT// oM sug Sh+pA badz+ra kar kro tA ha na pa ta ya bA ga ma tre Na hUM phaT// oM badz+ra sr-ig Sh+Ta badz+ra karma kro t+ya sarba karma ka ro b+ha ba sarba kar+ya na sa d+ha ya hUM phaT// oM badz+ra sug Sh+ma ka ba/
101a6(rgyud): tsakr-i d+ha rak+Sha hU phaT/ oM badz+ra sugaSh+Ta badz+ra yagak+Sha kro d+b+ha ha na pa ya sarba dus lhan tsin d+he ta ma tren// badz+ra dang / hUM phaT/ oM sugaSh+Ta badz+ra mu shI kri t+ti b+han d+ha b+han hU~M phaT// de nas
101a7(rgyud): yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsungs pa// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings
101b1(rgyud): dang 'dra bar na/ khro bo'i ye shes zhes kyang bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri// ye shes rdo rje'i dbus
101b2(rgyud): mchud pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu'o// phyag rgya de nyid kun ris shig/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams su yang // 'jig rten gsum
101b3(rgyud): las rnam rgyal sogs/ rims par bzhin du bgod par bya// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun du// rdo rje khro bo cho ga bzhin// de nas 'dir rdo rje rigs kyi ye shes phra mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi
101b4(rgyud): cho ga'i rim pa rgyas par bshad do// de la dang po nyid du re shig bcug nas bsgo ba ni// de rang khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo nyid du bcom ldan 'das phyag na
101b5(rgyud): rdo rjes dbang bskur gyis de la legs par nan tan gyis shig/ sems can khams ma lus shing lus med pa yongs su bskyabs pa'i phyir bya ba nas// de bzhin gshegs pa tham
101b6(rgyud): cad kyi phan pa dang // bde ba'i dgrub pa thob pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir gyi bar du rdo rje khro bo sems can thams cad yang dag por sbyang ba'i phyir byed na// me rungs pa thams cad lta
101b7(rgyud): zhig smos dang ci dgos// de skad sge nas gdong g.yogs bkrol te// de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bstan nas// rdo rje ji lta bzhin du lags pa gnyis su sbyin no// de nas
102a1(rgyud): de yid rdzus#/ rdo rje khro bo ye shes phra mo rnams bslabs shig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra mo bstan byas la// hu zhes bya bas gar sbyar ba// de'i srog ni 'jig
102a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo brtam bya te// cho ga bzhin du mched pa de// de srid kyi ni dgra 'di 'jig/ rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje phra me'i tshul sbyar la// khro bor ldan pa ji srid mched/
102a3(rgyud): de srid sems can ma rungs byed// de bzhin du ni bsdu ba yin// rnal 'byor can gyis 'dod nas ni// ma lus pa ni thams cad la// slar yang mtsho ba'i byin par bya// de la de dag gi snying
102a4(rgyud): po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM/ hUM/ na sha ya badz+ra hi b+hi de sha ya sarba ma hA badz+ra// oM sug Sh+Ta badz+ra prad t+yan pa shi g+h+nAn hUM// sems can gang gi dgra la ni/ lan gcig gyur pa che bstan
102a5(rgyud): pa byams pa mched pa'i tshul gyis ni// dgra bo spro bas bzhig par bya// dgra bo 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// gang su 'ang rung ba'i snying rje can// snying rje rnal 'byor de yis ni//
102a6(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad de 'jig go// chos sam yang na chos min pa// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// de ltar bsgoms nas sems can la// hUM zhes bya bas 'jig par
102a7(rgyud): byed// gdul bar dka' ba'i sems can gang // sangs rgyas byang chub snod byin pa// de rnams yang dag sbyang ba'i phyir// hUM zhes bya bas bzhig par bya// de la de rnam
102b1(rgyud): kyi snying po rnams ni 'di yin no// bai ra badz+ra kro tA hA phaT// ka ru badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT// hU bi shud d+ha kro ta badz+ra hU phaT// ha bi sho d+han badz+ra kro hU phaT// rdo rje dbyings ni bris nas kyang /
102b2(rgyud): yid kyis gang ni gang su yis// khyim gyi dbus su lhung bsams nas// de yid rigs de 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin phra ba'i cho ga yis// snying po rdo rje bsgoms nas kyang /
102b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// lhung ni rigs ni 'jig par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje gzugs chen po// bsgoms nas gang du lhung de yi// snang srid nyes pa sna de
102b4(rgyud): tshogs kyis// btsun mor bcas pa 'jig par 'gyur// rnams pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bsgoms nas ni// snang ba gang la lhung ba ni// de
102b5(rgyud): yi snang srid nges par 'jig/ de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra pra ba ta// hUM bo d+hi sa twa pra bA ta// hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra bA ta// huM bud d+ha pra bA ra ta//
102b6(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo rab sbyor bas// zla ba'i gzugs la bdag rang nyid// bsgom nas su ni bdag nyid yang // gang du lhung pa der lhung 'gyur// zla ba rdo rje bdag rang nying // bsgoms
102b7(rgyud): nas su ni bdag nyid yang // rab tu khros na gar ltung ba// de'i rigs ni mong ltung // bdag rang phyag na rdo rje ni// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang // gang du ltung ba
102'a1(rgyud): dang sdus @#/ de yi yul// ring por mi thogs 'jig par 'gyur// bdag rang sangs rgyas gzugs nyid du// bsgoms nas su ni bdag nyid yang // gang du
102'a2(rgyud): ltung ba de yi ni// sdang srid ring por mi thogs myur du 'jig/ de la de la de dag gi snying po rnams ni 'di dag yin no// bo d+ha grA pra ra ba ta ya huM// sad tA badz+ra pra ba ta ya haM// badz+ra
102'a3(rgyud): saM twa pra bA ta ya hUM// bud d+ha pra bA ta ya hUM// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi gsang ba phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje khro bor snyoms zhugs la// rang gi lus kyis yongs bskor
102'a4(rgyud): ba// rdo rje hUM byas mkhyud na ni// gang gis ming smos de 'chi'o// rdo rje phra mor snyoms zhugs la// sna nas phrang thang cig min// dbugs btang hUM zhes bya tshul gyis// 'jig
102'a5(rgyud): b+h+rUM rten gsum yang ldang bar 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la/ khros nas rdo rje blta ba yis// bltas pas su ni mongs par 'gyur// yang na 'chi ba ru ni 'gyur// bu gu nas
102'a6(rgyud): ni zhugs nas ni// yid kyis gang yang rung ba yi// snying drangs pas ni de yi ni// rang ngam 'di yis ni dbang tu 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po rnams gsungs pa//
102'a7(rgyud): badz+ra pa li ta kro d+ha ma ra ya hu phaT// oM bsug d+hA 'ja shAs pa shaM ba ta ya hU~M// yo badz+ra driSh+Ti bi ni sha ya hU~M phaT// hU~M dri da ya a kar shan kro d+ha pra bi shaskaM// hri da ya tsinad+ha
102'b1(rgyud): b+hin d+ha// kad d+ha kad d+ha hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// de la re shig phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bshad de// rdo rje ye shes sbyong ba yis/
102'b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje khro bor bdag nyid ni/ bsgoms na de ma thag tu 'grub// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// ting nge
102'b3(rgyud): 'dzin dam tshig ye shes las// hUM zhes bya ba gnyis dang ldan// ci rigs gnasu bzhag na ni// bsgrubs pa thams cad ster ba'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam
102'b4(rgyud): tshig gis ye shes bslab po// phaT/ sha Ta/ maT/ saT/ raT/ taT/ d+hiT/ ha Ta/ phaT/ traT/ d+ha Ta/ b+hA Ta/ kriT/ riT/ kha Ta/ baT/ zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya
102'b5(rgyud): mdor bshad pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// chos kyi khu tshur gnyis bya te// ji ltar rigs pa'i gnas su sbyar// las
102'b6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// cho ga ji bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje'i rig
102'b7(rgyud): kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas par bshad pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje las
103a1(rgyud): yid smras @#// kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs te// rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thAg ta ka
103a2(rgyud): s+ye shA ri hUM// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha d+ha s+pha ra na ma hA pu dza// kar ma bi d+hi ri stA
103a3(rgyud): ras ma ye t+yai lo kya bi dza ya ang ka ri sarba duSh+TAn// da ma ya badz+ri ni hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rang gi rigs po dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta/
103a4(rgyud): tha ga ta a ka sha/ d+ha d+ha pas ra na ma hA puts+tsha karma bi d+hi bista ra// sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje can gyis rang gyis rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// a
103a5(rgyud): sarba ta thAg ta d+harma d+had+hi s+thir na ma hA pu dza ka mi bi ti bista ra sa ma ye d+h+waM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta
103a6(rgyud): thag ta sarba loka d+hA du bi bi d+ha mad pu dza karma b+hi d+hi b+hI sA ra yas ma yi hu// de nas yang byang byachub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa 'di'i cho ga rgyas ba'i
103a7(rgyud): lha mo rnams rang gi snying kha nas bskyed de// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan drangs pa dang // dbang du bya ba dang // mnyes par bya ba dang /
103b1(rgyud): las thams cad grub pa'i dgos pa byed pa nyid du yang dag par spong ba la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phral dang // rnam par 'bral pa bya ste//
103b2(rgyud): slar yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te mkhod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan
103b3(rgyud): rdo rjes rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi tshe ga rgyas pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dang 'dra bas na// las kyi
103b4(rgyud): rdo rje zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thad sreng bu bre// dkyil 'khor dbus kyi gnas su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya//
103b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya'o// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor chen po rnams su yang // rdo rje rtse sogs bzhi po rnam/
103b6(rgyud): ji ltar rims bzhin bzhag par bya ba// de rnams kyi ni phyogs kun tu// mchod pa chen po rnams bzhag go// de nas las kyi 'khor lo 'dir// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bshad do//
103b7(rgyud): ban tu na rnams b+hin/ mi 'jas pa pa rnanapa lang+ge papa mo badrad te / ras rna mas 'dzuhA/ ma badza du la rnams pa / /
104a1(rgyud): denyid#// ba shi ku ru huM/ oM badz+ra sur+ya ba shi ku ru haM// oM badz+ra d+ha dza gra ke yu re ba shi ku ru haM/ oM badz+ra sad Ta ha se ba shi ku ru hUM// oM badz+ra pad ma rage ra ga ya hUM/ oM badz+ra
104a2(rgyud): mdad la re ge da ya huM// oM su badz+ra karma sa ma ya~M hu~M pun+d+ha ya hU~M// oM badz+ra ka ba tsa ban dr-i rak+Sha hUM// yai badz+ra yag k+Sha ni ma ra ya badz+ra dpar+N+Na ma b+hin d+ha hri da yam mu ka s+ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
104a3(rgyud): karma muSh+Ti sid d+ha hUM phaT// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// cho ga rgyas pa ji ltar ba bzhin du byas ste// rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi ye shes rnams bskyed do// de drang po nyid nas zhi
104a4(rgyud): ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// yams shing dmar po rnams kyi me// rab spor rdo rje khro bo yi// mnyam par bzhag pa sgoms 'jug la// til bsregs pas ni
104a5(rgyud): sdig bsregs shig/ yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// me ni rab tu s+phar nas kyang // rtag tu 'bras ni bsregs byas na// gdon mi za ba khyim rgyas 'gyur// yams shing dmar
104a6(rgyud): po rnams kyi kyang // mkhas pas rab tu ma sbar te// dUr ba'i yal ga mar bcas pas// bsreg par byas na tshe 'phel lo// yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// me ni rab tu sbar
104a7(rgyud): byas la/ ku sha'i yal ga 'bramar gyis// bsreg par byas pa nges par bsrung // de la de dag snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// e badz+ra sa rbab pad gdan badz+ra le hUM// oM badz+ra pu
104b1(rgyud): shI ye hUM swA hA// oM badz+ra a yu she swA hA// oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swa ha// yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan par me sbar na/ me tog mar me 'bras bu 'ang rung // sbyin
104b2(rgyud): bsreg byas na skye bo rang // rnal 'byor can gyis khros nas kyang // yams shing des ni me sbar la// lcags kyi phye ma bsregs na ni// rdo rje bcing ba nyid du 'gyur// yams shing de dog
104b3(rgyud): nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag te me bus la// 'bras bu kha ba khro bzhin bsreg/ skad cig du ni mchi bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra a kar
104b4(rgyud): sha ya swA hA// hUM badz+ra ra ga ya sAd/ huM badz+ra ban d+ha ya sA hA// hUM badz+ra ma ra ya swA hA// mkhas pas yams shing sgur po yis// khros nas byin bsreg sbar nas ni// 'bras bu
104b5(rgyud): lo ma sbyar bsregs ni// nabang du byas pa dam pa'o// yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag te me sbar la// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu me bsregs na// 'dod pa
104b6(rgyud): bzhin gyis gzugs brnyed do// de 'dra ba'i yams shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar nas kyang // mi snang me tog sdong bu yis// sbyin bsreg 'dod na mi snang 'gyur// yams shing
104b7(rgyud): de dag nyid kyis ni// mnyam par bzhag te me sbar la// nam pa'i lcug ma me tog gis// sbyin bsreg byas na mkha' la 'gro// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam sa//
105a1(rgyud): #/ 'adz+ra sha kar la swata/ oM badz+ra ze ri ni snad// khro bor ma'am bzhag yams shing ni// shin tu khrobs me sbar la// brdzi me tog bsregs byas na/
105a2(rgyud): / rdo rje dka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// khro dang ldan zhing me sbar te// dka' bo gang gi phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' ni nyan par 'gyur/
105a3(rgyud): bo nyid du mnyam bzhag la/ yams shing des ni me sbar te// phyag na rdo rje'i phreng ba bsregs// de yang bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// yams shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab
105a4(rgyud): tu khros te me sbar la// chos gos bsregs pas sangs rgyas kyang // skad cig du ni bka' bzhin mdzad// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// hUM badz+ra pa shang ka ra ya
105a5(rgyud): swA hA// huM badz+ra so ri pa shang ka ra badz+ra ya swA hA// hUM badz+ra pa ni pa shang ka ra ya swa ha/ hUM b+had d+ha pa shang ka ra ya swA hA// de nas gsang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/
105a6(rgyud): yid 'ong bud med lhan cig du// gnas shing bu gar an dza na// bcug nas bskul ba byas nas kyang // de yis dmig bskus dbang du 'gyur// ldong ros bu gar bcug
105a7(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje bsdams pas de g.yogs ste// mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi yis ni// dngos grub rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro// gor can du gar bcug/ gsang ba'i khu tshur gyis bcing na/
105b1(rgyud): bzhag na de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra bar 'gyur// gur gum bu gar bcug nas ni// bu gar sems dpa'i rdo rje yis// bkab nas 'bar bar gyur na ni//
105b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra pa shaM ka ra sid d+hu hUM/ oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid d+h+ya hUM// oM badz+ra da ra ya gu h+ya sid d+ha haM/
105b3(rgyud): de nas rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus nas// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// rdo rje
105b4(rgyud): kho bor mnyam par bzhag/ hUM zhes 'dzum mo'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni 'dir de bzhin// chos kyi phyag rgya 'dir de bzhin// oM zhes dang po yi ge as// las
105b5(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdus na// / las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// thams cad grub byed dag pa ste// rdo rje las kyi tshul gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje
105b6(rgyud): dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las// rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
105b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
106a1(rgyud): de nyid sngas / oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye haM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so//
106a2(rgyud): hUM badz+ri maT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rang gi rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// huM b+hi ku Ti badz+ra ra Ta// de nas byang chub
106a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje can gyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// huM pad ma badz+ri ti Ta/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis
106a4(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs// hU~M badz+ra karma a gri grid// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gsum las rnam par
106a5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa te// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje khro bo
106a6(rgyud): zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsred bu bre// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun tu// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs bri/
106a7(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'dir dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya ste// bcug nas phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye
106b1(rgyud): shes bslab po// rang gi phyag bu gar bcug nas bsgrubs nas ni// las kun myur du bsgrub par 'gyur// de nas bsgrub pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// hUM badz+ra sa ma ya
106b2(rgyud): krid// de nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// dkyil 'khor legs par zhugs nas ni// phyag rgya chen po'i mchog gnas pa// gnas
106b3(rgyud): na rdo rje hUM zhes bya// las rnams kun ni byed par 'gyur// de la 'di bsgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa// hU~M badz+ra sa ma ya hUM// de nas phyag rgya bzhi bzhi bcing ba ji lta ba
106b4(rgyud): bzhin du bslabs ste// de bzhin du dngos grub du 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba de bzhin du// ras la sogs pa bris pa dang // lugs ma la sogs pa'i
106b5(rgyud): gzugs thams cad yang dngos grub ni thun mong ngo // phyag rgya bcing ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos te// 'di skad
106b6(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'di la byin gyis brlabs du gsol// ci nas kyang sems can thams cad ji ltar
106b7(rgyud): dga' ba bzhin du bgyis kyang // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i srang du'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
107a1(rgyud): gcig du 'dus te// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po la byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
107a2(rgyud): rdo rje sems pa khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos kyi ni khyod legaso// rdo rje legs khyod rab tu legs// mong ste 'di ni legs bshad pa/
107a3(rgyud): rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ste// theg pa chen po 'dus pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po la/
107a4(rgyud): rje chen po'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs spro// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig du 'dus te// mkhyen
107a5(rgyud): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
107a6(rgyud): kanyon lo// dbang phyug chen po'i lus 'di khyod kyi rkang pa'i 'og nas btang bar byos// des bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
107a7(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rungs pa thams cad gdul ba'i khro bong dbang bskur nas// de bdag gi bkum lags na/ ji ltar/
107b1(rgyud): bdag gis de btang bar bgyi// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen po'i lus gyis srog gso ba'i phyir/
107b2(rgyud): shi ba'i rnam par shes pa 'gags pa'i snying po 'di nyid thugs kha nas byang ngo // oM badz+ra satwa hUM dza dza// de nas 'di yi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdam
107b3(rgyud): byas te// mtha' ma mnyam du brkyang nas ni// shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni// srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur// de nas de byung ma thag du// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
107b4(rgyud): pa thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs de// thal bas khyebs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas slar byon te dbang phyug gi lus der zhags nas// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
107b5(rgyud): e ma'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang phyir shi ba'i lus 'di lus// mtsho ba'i khams su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
107b6(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes rkang pa brdebs pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// sau badz+ra mu// de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje khro bo 'dzub legs par// zur dpyad
107b7(rgyud): bsdams te bzhag na ni// rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing // 'og nas yang dag 'byin par byed// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i zhabs kyis/
108a1(rgyud): @#/ 'oganas lha chen po thar par rang gis shes par 'gyur to// de nas dbang phyug chen po'i lus de/ de bzhin gshegs pa demams par byin gyis brda
108a2(rgyud): te// 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyi don dang / ma rung ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ba'i phyir nyid kyi rgyal tshab du bcug go// de nas phyag na rdo rjes zhabs kyi 'thil
108a3(rgyud): nas// zla ba'i zhabs zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya byung ngo // oM can tra drod ta re sa man ta b+ha tra kri ra ni// ma hA badz+ra ni haM// de nas
108a4(rgyud): de'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te// the 'ong the chung mnyam par ni// bskams nas legs par brkyang ba ni// rdo rje ri mo zhes kyang grags/ de nas de
108a5(rgyud): byung ma thag du zhabs kyi mthil de las zla ba'i ma bla ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'di byang nas// dbang phyug de'i mgo la// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyis mnan pa'i rjes su zla ba
108a6(rgyud): phye ba gnas par gyur te// g.yon logs su 'gug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag na rdo rje'i grogasu lag du mdung rtse byin nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam
108a7(rgyud): brdo rje'i rig pa zhes bya ba rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// de nas rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i mdung des/ 'ag
108b1(rgyud): me'i 'khor lo dbang bskur zhing // gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa byas nas// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byang chub sems ni bla na
108b2(rgyud): med// zhabs mchog gis ni gang reg pa'ang // sangs rgyas nyid du grub pa thob// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin las langs te/
108b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis bdag gi sug par rdo rje bskul te// phyag na rdo rje nyid
108b4(rgyud): du dbang bskur bas// lha la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs de rnams 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di la gnas pa'i rim pa bgyi
108b5(rgyud): nas// gang gi bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems can de rnams phyir mi ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
108b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug gtor 'di gsungs pa// oM badz+ra sad ta u shrI Sha hUM
108b7(rgyud): phaT// de nas 'di bshad ma thag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug gtor nas// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de kha dog du ma'i 'od zer du gyur te// 'dzi/
109a1(rgyud): nyid@#rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bar byas nas// yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i gtsug gi 'tshams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
109a2(rgyud): gtor gyi tshul phungs nas khod do// de nas gzi rjid kyi phung po de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug gtor 'di byung ngo // oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta suSh+NI Shi te dzer shi ya
109a3(rgyud): nA ba lo ki ta mur d+ha hUM// dz+wa la d+ha ka/ bi d+ha ka/ dar byid ra huM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes ring gi rig pa dam 'di gsungs so//
109a4(rgyud): ni sum b+ha badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje nyid kyi thugs las snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM Ta ki dza dza// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos reng gi rig pa
109a5(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ra da na ud ta ma dza la ya hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sman gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// /
109a6(rgyud): oM swa b+ha ba shu da badz+ra mA sho da ya sarba rngan bid d+hod ta ma hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra karma
109a7(rgyud): ud ta ma badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya ma nu spar// sum b+ha ni sum b+ha sa kar sha ya pra pe sha ya a be sha ya b+han d+ha ya sa ma yan gra ha ya sarba karma ni me kur ma ha sad tra hU~M phaT// de nas byang
109b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rig pa dam pas rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag bya ba'i phyir phul pa// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha badz+ra/
109b2(rgyud): bid d+yod tam hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag btsal nas// rang gi snying po 'di gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra shu la// de nas sku
109b3(rgyud): ma'i rig ma'i rgyal pos rang gi snying po gsungs pa// oM badz+ra ma ya bi dar sha ya sarba ma hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje dril bu yis rgyal pos// rang gi rig pa 'di phul lo//
109b4(rgyud): oM badz+ra g+han d+ha ra na hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje thub pas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba// oM badz+re mon ma hA pra ta hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje chen chas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba/
109b5(rgyud): badz+ra a su d+ha da ma ka hUM phaT// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so// de nas rdo rje khyel pa khro bos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la rang gi snying po 'di zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas
109b6(rgyud): phul lo// oM badz+ra kun Ta li ma ha kro ta gri// ha na da ha pa tsa bi don sa ya badz+re na mu da ni spa la ya b+hin da hI da yaM// badz+ra kro ta hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje 'ong rdo rje khro bos rang gi snying
109b7(rgyud): po 'di bul lo// mo badz+ra pram b+ha mar la ya sa mya kro ta hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rje dbyug pa rdo rje khrongs rang gi snying po 'di bul ba// oM badz+ra dan da ta ra ya sarba duSh+TAn ma kro taH/
110a1(rgyud): @#phaT/ de nas rdo rje khro ba rdo rje ser pos rang gi snying po 'di bral lo// oM badz+ra ping ga la d+hi sha ya sarba duSh+Tan gyi ma kro ta hUM phaT// rdo rje khro bo rnam so//
110a2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje glang sna tshogs kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra Shon d+ha ma hA ga nA pa ti rak+ta sarba duSh+Te b+h+yo// badz+ra d+ha ra ad n+yAn pa
110a3(rgyud): la ya hUM phaT// de nas yang rdo rje phreng bas rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra ma la ga na ma la pa te ma la ya a kar sha ya// pra pe sha ya ban d+ha ya// ba sha~M ku ru
110a4(rgyud): mamA rA ye hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje dbang gi snying po 'di phul lo// a badz+ra pa shi ma hA ga na pa ta ye ba shi ku ru hUM phaT// de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag pos rang
110a5(rgyud): gi snying po 'di phul ba// oM badz+ra bi dza ya ku ru ma ha ga Na pa ti hUM phaT// tshegs kyi bdag po rnamaso// de nas rdo rje'i tho ba rdo rje'i pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phyag na rdo rje phul lo//
110a6(rgyud): oM badz+ra sum la ku Ta sarba du Tan badz+ra d+hA ta hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje rlung gi pho nyas rang gi snying po 'di phul ba// oM badz+ra ni la ma hA be ga a na ya sarba du shAn hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje
110a7(rgyud): me'i pa nyes rang gi snying po 'di gsungs bri// oM badz+ra sa na la ma hA du ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+ha sI ku ru sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje 'jigs pa'i bo 'a chen pos rang gi snying po
110b1(rgyud): 'di bral ba// oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba badz+ra duta b+hak+Sha ya sarba duSh+TAn ma hA yak+Sha hUM phaT// pho nya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje bran gyis rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag
110b2(rgyud): na rdo rje la phul lo// oM badz+ra u gu sha ma kar sha ya sa rba ne ma hA tsi ta hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rje dus kyi rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM ka la ma hA mId tud mud bad ya hUM phaT/ de nas
110b3(rgyud): rdo rje ngan khri kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM badz+ra pa ni yaka s+yai bag nan// ku ru hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje klu'i rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i
110b4(rgyud): zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas phul lo// oM badz+ra ba na ga badz+ra na ya sarba d+ha na d+ha nar+ya hi ra Ni NAM su pa ra rna ma ni mug ta ya lang ka ra dri na sa rbo ba kar na Na badz+ra d+ha ra sa ma ya nu sAr a kad
110b5(rgyud): d+hi grih+Na banar d+ha ha ra bran pa ma ha tsata hUM phaT// dran rnam so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bkug pa'i dam tshig 'di gsung so//
110b6(rgyud): oM badz+ra ang gu shas kar sha ya hI// de nas zhugs pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra pa sha kad d+ha hUM// de nas dam tshig bcing ba gsungs pa// hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM//
110b7(rgyud): de nas las kyi snying po gsungs pa// oM badz+ra karma sad tra ya gring // de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di shad/
111a1(rgyud): / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dpa pa ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad sred du bre// de la 'di ni sred pa
111a2(rgyud): bre ba'i snying po yin no// oM badz+ra su tra a kar sha ya sarba mnad la huM// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su yang // seng steng phur pa btab nas ni// de nas srad du nyis ma du//
111a3(rgyud): byas nas de'i srad bu bre// de la de dag gi pur bu'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ya sarba big nan b+han d+ha hUM phaT// srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa dang // dkyil 'khor zlum po
111a4(rgyud): srad bu bre// de yi phyi rol byung nas ni// nyis 'gyur de ni de bzhin no// de yang rim pa gsum du'o// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// phyogs 'tshams 'khor lo rtsibs
111a5(rgyud): tshul du// gra yi ri mo srad du bre// sred bu bre ba'i cho ga'o// de nas srad bu bres pa der// dag pa'i tshon gyi dgang par bya// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches// cho ga bzhin
111a6(rgyud): du bzungs par bya// dang por bres nas phyis ci bde// de la 'di ni mtshon gyi snying po'o// oM badz+ra rang ga sa ma ya hUM// de nas rdo rje bslob dpon ni// mnyam par bzhag
111a7(rgyud): la dbus 'dug nas// rdo rje yi ni sgo bzhi rnams// yid kyis kun ni dbye bar bya// de la sgo dbye ba'i snying po ni 'di yin no// saM badz+rod b+ha ga Ta ya sa ma ya pra bi sha shi gran
111b1(rgyud): sngar badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT// gser mar yang na dngul yang rung // sa yis legs par bris pa 'am// bgu gru bzhi steng du ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// de la
111b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po ni 'dir yin no// oM sarba bid// sangs rgyas kyis ni phyogs kun tu// sems dpa' chen po bzhi bzhag go// mdun du phyag na rdo rje ni// 'jig
111b3(rgyud): rten gsum las rgyal zhes bya// de la sems dpa' chen po'i snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM// oM b+hin g+h+r-i haM// oM grih+NA pa ya hUM// oM a n+ya ho b+ha ga
111b4(rgyud): wa na badz+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+hi ku ti kro ta a na ya sarba rad nan hri phaT// oM badz+ra driSh+Ta kro ta driSh+Ta ma ra ya hUM phaT// oM badz+ra bi shr-i ko ta ku ru sar rba ma bi shwa ru pa ta~M ya sad
111b5(rgyud): tA ya haM phaT// 'jug gam phyir ni byung ba na/ srad bu'i 'og 'dzul phyir bsams pa/ rdo rje shugasu brjod pa ste// de yi ri me brgal bar bya// de la rdo rje shugs kyi/
111b6(rgyud): snying po ni 'di'o// badz+ra bi gra haM// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de bzhin du/ lte 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje sgyu ma la sogs bri/
111b7(rgyud): de la dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin no// mo badz+ra nak+Shu hU~M// oM badz+ra g+han d+ha hUM// oM d+han Da kaSh+TahUM// oM badz+ra ma yud ta hu~M// rdo rje shugs kyis banal nas ni// dkyi
112a1(rgyud): de@#'khor gnyis pa de bzhin te// rdo rje khyil ba la sogs pa// rdo rje khro bo bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ri dz+wa la ti
112a2(rgyud): d+hi ba ta badz+ra hUM// oM badz+ra so d+ya hu~M// oM badz+ra dan da hA// oM badz+ra pri kri ta huM// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sgo ni bzhi po rnamasu yang // rdo rje glang snga la sogs pa/ khad
112a3(rgyud): rim pa bzhin du bri// de la de dag gi dam tshig gi snying po 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra ma ta/ oM badz+ra ma la hUM// oM badz+ra arba hUM// oM badz+ra ha si huM// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal na
112a4(rgyud): ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri ba ni// lce 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// rdo rje tho ba la sogs pa'o// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra mAs la hUM// oM badz+ra pa tad+haM/
112a5(rgyud): oM badz+ra dza la huM// mo badz+ra graha huM// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi par bri ba ni// rdo rje lcags kyur la sogs bran// lte 'og rim pa bzhin du'o// de dag gi
112a6(rgyud): snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra hUM// oM badz+ra ma ran hU~M// oM big g+ha hUM// oM badz+ra ha ran hUM// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal na ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bzhag pa ni/
112a7(rgyud): lte 'og rim pa ji bzhin du// mo rnams thams cad bri bar bya// rdo rje sgron thams cad du// sgo ba rnams kyang de nyid do// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin pa'o// de nas
112b1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las kun bya ste// rdo rje slob dpon nyid rdo rje khro ba ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgya bcings te/ 'di skad smras
112b2(rgyud): shig/ ngas khyod la rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes bskyed par byas// de khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ mi bde ma spangs pas khyod dus byas te// dmyal bar ltung nga re shig ces bsgol//
112b3(rgyud): mna'i snying po 'di byin no// rdo rje khro bo ti ri ti ri'i phyag rgya yang bston shig/ rdo rje 'di ni khro bo che// dam tshig khyod kyi rigs bsregs pas// gal te 'das na glad pa nas/ brnam
112b4(rgyud): te lus rnams 'jig par byed// dam tshig bcing ba bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi phyag rgya snying po 'dis bcing ngo // oM sarba ta tha ga ta badz+ra d+ha ra g+hin b+han d+ha sa ma ya hUM/
112b5(rgyud): de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bcing ba bshad do// mthe chung mche pos 'brel pa dang // lag gnyis zla ba'i 'og du btang // las kyi phyag rgya dam tshig 'di// rdo rje 'chang ba zhes kyang
112b6(rgyud): bshad// de nas rdo rje chus dbang bskur te// snying po 'di yin no// oM badz+ra a bi she ka ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa badz+ra d+ha ra te sa ma ye gra gram// de nas gdong g.yogs te snying po 'dis
112b7(rgyud): bzhugs so// oM badz+ra pra be sha badz+ra pra bi sha ya badz+ra ma bi Shin badz+ra ma d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra hUM// de nas snying po 'dis me tog dor ro// so pra ting tsa sa tiSh+Tha badz+ra ho// de nas de dag gar
113a1(rgyud): ltung ba de 'di 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol nas dkyil 'khor rims bzhin du bstan te// lha gang yid pa de ni de la/
113a2(rgyud): ming bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na// sems can log par lta ba dag yod de// gang dag ci 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes gdon mi za ba ji ltar
113a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rig su phyag na rdo rjes dbang bskur ba// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam zhes dad par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dam tshig go// gzhan du na lha gang dag
113a4(rgyud): la dad pa de dag la mna'i snying po byin nas bstan par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rin po ches mtshan ma'i phreng bas dbang bskur nas// las kyis rdo rje lag pa gnyis su byin la/
113a5(rgyud): rdo rje ming rtag te// ji ltar rdo rje dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po bzhin bya'o// de nas phyag rgya chen po cing ba bslab po rdo rje bcing ba dam bya ste// mthe bo nang du sbyar nas
113a6(rgyud): ni// 'dzub mo bkug ste gnyis bkas dgab// sems dpa'i gtsug gtor zhes bya'o// rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni// mthe bo gung mo mthe chung bsgreng // gzi brjid
113a7(rgyud): phung po zhes bya te// gzi brjid chen po btsun mo'o// rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcing te// mthe bom po chung basbrel ba ni// ngam du lcags kyu bcing ba te// rig pa chen po da
113b1(rgyud): ba'i'o// rig pa chen po dam pa yi// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas rab bcir ba// snying khar mthe bo des kyis so// sems dpa' yi ni snying por bshad// de nyi dpung
113b2(rgyud): mo srin lag la sor mo rab tu bsdams nas ni// rdo rje rin chen tshul du ni// bsgyur nas gdong du bzhag par bya// de nyid bskyed de bzhag nas ni// snying khar yang ni bsgyur
113b3(rgyud): bar bya// me tog bzhi pa zhes bya ste// pad mo rig pa dam pa'i'o// de nyid spyi'i nas brtsams te// lus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// snga tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya
113b4(rgyud): 'di// rdo rje las rab bsgrub pa'o// sems ma rdo rje dam byas te// mthe chung rdo rje bsgreng ba ni// thams cad rig pa'i snying po 'di// phyag rgya 'di ni thams cad bsgrub
113b5(rgyud): mthe bo mthe chung bcings nas ni// g.yon pa ser me dbus ma gsum// rtse gsum pa yi dbu ma rtse// rdo rje phyag rgyar bzung ba de// rdo rje'i rig pa dam pa 'di// rdo rje'i
113b6(rgyud): mdung zhes bya ba'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// rdo rje bsgyu ma la sogs rtags// rdo rje bcings pa dam byas te// g.yon pa rdo rje bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur zhes
113b7(rgyud): bshad de// rdo rje rigs ni kun gyis 'di'o// rdo rje de ni gnyis byas te// mtshan ma kun ni nges bzhag go// rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyis// phyag rgya rnams kyang 'byung
114a1(rgyud): sa@/ bte// mdun brgyang steng du bkas pa dang // 'dzub mes theb bstan sbyang ba dang // oM zhes bya ba sting bags te// rdordo steng du bgagrupas/
114a2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs rnamaso// rab tu kyang nas lag gnas pa// lag pa'i rgyang du de bzhin ste// khu chur sbyang bzhag lag ngar bkum// kha phyogs
114a3(rgyud): su ni bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// g.yon pa'i mthe bo'i steng du bzhag/ phreng ba bcings pa'i thabs su sbyar// nor sbyin pa ni g.yas pa te/ ral
114a4(rgyud): gri phyag tu 'a chur mchog/ 'dus pa'i dbang po'i phyag rgya chen po 'dus pa'o// g.yas pas bdun du gtun shing 'dzin// log pa brkyang ba'ang de bzhin te// g.yas pa
114a5(rgyud): 'od ni 'bar bar bstad// rdo rje'u tshur bskyed pa'o// pho ba'i phyag rgya chen po tshogs so// bsgyings bcas 'dzub mo khar mche ba// dbyug pa band cing gnad pa dang /
114a6(rgyud): dpung pa bskum zhing sbyang ba dang // g.yas pagayod gyis 'dren pa'o// bran b+hi phyag rgya'i tshogs so// dkyil 'khor kun tu rtags pa ni// g.yon pas rdo rje gzung nas so//
114a7(rgyud): de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// bsgrub pa dang ni las nyid do// sems dpa' gang ging phyag rgya gang // der ni bdag rang nyid 'gyur te// bdag nyid de ni bsgoms gyur pa/ phyag
114b1(rgyud): rgya bsgrub pa'i dam par 'gyur// gtsug gtor chen po bsrungs pa che// gzi brjid chen po rab bsgrub ster// rdo rje zhes bya kun byed pa'i// snying khar bzhag pas thams cad
114b2(rgyud): 'gugs// sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya rnams so// thams cad rig pa thams cad bsgrub// rdo rje rig dam dam pa'o// rdo rje mdung gi phyag rgya che// grub pa chen po byin par byed/
114b3(rgyud): bsgyu ma'i rdo rje rab tu ster// dril bu yis ni yang dag 'bebs// dbug pa'i shing gis mya ngan 'das// rdo rje'i rdo rje gsor bar byed// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams so// bru
114b4(rgyud): ba'i mchog ni ma rung 'dul// zhi ba'i mchog ni thams cad gsod// dbug pa'i mchog ni 'tshegs pa ste// 'jigs pa'i mig ni dkrug par byed// rdo rje khro bo'i phyag rgya
114b5(rgyud): rnamaso// myos pas rab tu myos par byed// phreng ba kun na byed par bshad// 'dod byed dga' bar byed pa te// gsod pa thams cad gsod pa ste// tshegs kyi phyag rgya rnamaso//
114b6(rgyud): thob gdug pa 'joms pa ste// ras kyi ras rgyu de bzhin ste/ 'bar ba'i mchog ni gdug pa bsreg/ gnod sbyin ma ni gdon yod do// pho nyi phyag rgya rnam so// rdo rje'i mche ba
114b7(rgyud): za ba ste// gcod pa thams cad gsod pa'o// bgyegs bzang po ni brtsegs kyang byed// 'phrog ma yang ni thams cad 'phrog/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de bzhin
115a1(rgyud): @#/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo dkyil 'khor ched po'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/
115a2(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig las byung ba// byin gyi brlab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
115a3(rgyud): sgoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra sa bi t+ye swAhA// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa'i phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
115a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+ha ri d+he/ badz+ra bi kra hUM// phaT/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// se badz+ra dang na ge tres
115a5(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pad ma Ni te hU~M phaT/ de nas yang byang chub sems dpe'
115a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig bya dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ka r+b+ha ge hU~M phaT// de nas byang chubs bris dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rig pa
115a7(rgyud): dam pas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// mob shu la gre ste// de nas rdo je bsgyuma'i rig pa'i rgyal pos// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// e 'jam/
115b1(rgyud): kr-i hUM/ rdo rje dril dus smras pa// oM badz+ra g+hAn ti ke naM// thub pa'i rdo rjes smras pa// oM badz+ra dan Ta kaSh+TehUM// rdo rje don chas smras pa// me badzin// rig pa'i rgyal po'i dam tshig
115b2(rgyud): gi phyug rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khyil ba rdo rje khro bas rang gi snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di smras so// e badz+ra dz+wa le hUM// de nas rdo rje 'od kyis spras pa// oM badz+ra som+ba hUM/
115b3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyug pas smras pa// oM badz+ra na rnye // rdo rje ser smug gi smras pa// oM badz+ra bi shan du// rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje grang snas rang gi dam
115b4(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa// oM badz+ra ma d+he hUM// rdo rje phreng bas smras pa// oM badz+ra ma le huM// rdo rje dbang gis smras pa// oM badz+ra a bi she hUM// rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje smras pa// oM badz+ra
115b5(rgyud): bar dzI te huM// rdo rje tshogs kyi bdag po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje tho bas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya smras pa// oM badz+ra mu sa la gra te haM// rdo rje rlung gis spras
115b6(rgyud): pa// oM badz+ra pa te hUM// rdo rje mes smras pa// oM badz+ra dz+wa le huM// rdo rje 'jigs pas spras pa// oM badz+ra gra he haM// rdo rje po ha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas rdo rje lcug
115b7(rgyud): kyus smras pa// oM badz+ra dang ShA hUM// rdo rje dus kyis smras pa// oM badz+ra ma ra ni huM/ rdo rje dan khrid kyis smras pa// oM badz+ra b+hig+ha hU~M// rdo rje klus smras pa// oM badz+rad rin hU~M// rdo rje/
116a1(rgyud): @#/ bran gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdorje
116a2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// gro bzhi pa la byang phyogs bsgo// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bu bre// de yi nang du der yang ni// de bzhin bsgo ni shar phyogs gdod// de yi
116a3(rgyud): dbus su ci rigs par// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba'i la sogs pa// bzhi po de yi phyogs kun bzhag/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin
116a4(rgyud): mchog rnamasu// rdo rje phyag rgya bri bar bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rigs kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// rdo rje glang sna la sogs pa// bzhi po rnams ni sgo bsrungs so//
116a5(rgyud): 'jigs pa dpal dang sgra dbang dang // dur ga g.yon pa'i gro rnams nas// phyi'i gro rnams phyag rgya ni// de rnams nyid ni bri bar bya// de nas cho ga rgyas pa rnams// ji bzhin
116a6(rgyud): par ni bshad par bya// de nas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'dir ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byas ste// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa dam tshig gi las byas nas/ rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag
116a7(rgyud): rgya'i cho ga bzhin du bcing la// khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba// su'i mdun du yang dam tshig gi phyag rgyam smra shig/ gsang ba 'phel bar yang ma byed cig ces bsgo shig/
116b1(rgyud): de nas las kyi rdo rje rdo rje 'chang ba'i phyag rgya'i steng du bzhag ste/ cho ga bzhin du bcug cing // zhugs nas rdo rje de de bzhin du 'od cig/ gang la bab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
116b2(rgyud): de de'i dbang du 'gyur te// de las thams cad byed do// de nas gdong g.yogs pa dkrol nas// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin du bstan no// dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di gsang
116b3(rgyud): bsgos shig/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'di khyod kyis// rtag tu las kun byed pa ste// ma dang sring mo rnams dang // chung ma bu mo rnams 'dzes 'brang // de la de'i snying po
116b4(rgyud): 'di dag yin no// oM sarba badz+ra gra ma ni sarba b+ha ga k+She swa da yaM gu h+ya badz+ra ni hUM phaT// 'di lan gcig bzlas pas bud med thams cad dbang du byas te// spyad na tshwas ma yin
116b5(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// ci dga' ba thams cad spyad nas bsgrub par bya te// de nas thams cad dag par sems kyis rigs nas yid kyis kyang phyag rgya thams cad kyis las
116b6(rgyud): dam pa thams cad byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs so// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// dam tshig khro bo'i 'dzub gtsug dang /
116b7(rgyud): snying khar yang ni bsdams par bya/ ngos kyi mdzod sbru kha nas drang // spyi bor bzhag nas gnyis su bya/ g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub bcings pas// rtse gsum mtshan ldanan
117a1(rgyud): #par bya// 'di bcings pas ni yang dag par rig pa dab par rang grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad kyis// g.yon pa'i rdo rje gtso bor 'dus// dag
117a2(rgyud): tshig cho ga ji bzhin par// phyag rgya bcings pa bshad par bya// thams cad 'khor lo sor rtse gtsum// dril bu phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// de bzhin oM kyi phyag rgya dang / sing ge'i
117a3(rgyud): sna bar yongs su bzungs// rig pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya rnams so// 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa dang // 'od ni yang dag 'dus pa nyid// dbyig pa'i khu tshur 'dzin pa dang /
117a4(rgyud): kha gram phyag rgya bskor ba'o// khro bo'i dam tshig rnams so// gtung ba'i phyag rgya dang phreng ba// rdo rjes mnan nas btud pa ste// spyi bo bzhag pa tshogs kyis te// dkyil
117a5(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni bsrungs pa yi// tshogs rnams kyi ni dam tshig go// lag pa bskam pa khar bzhag te// rgyab du yang ni bskor bar bya// 'bar dang me rtag gdong ba ste/ phye nas khar
117a6(rgyud): yang gnas par bya// pho nya mo'i dam tshig rnams so// mtha' ma gnyis na khar bcug dang // bcir bcings rab tu mnan pa'o// dpung pa bsnol ba dang / myur du 'phrog pa 'ang
117a7(rgyud): de bzhin no// bran mo rnams kyi dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dmatshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzungs kyi
117b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig las byung ba rda
117b2(rgyud): rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bid// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje rang gi tshe
117b3(rgyud): kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha na ha nA hUM phaT// de nas yang rdo rje snying pos rang gi chos kyis dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ha ra ha ra hUM phaT// de nas yang rdo rje can gyis
117b4(rgyud): rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungaso// oM me ra ma ra huM phaT// de nas rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi chos kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM ku ru ku ru hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje'i
117b5(rgyud): rig pa dam pas rang gi chos kyi sa dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM huM hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje sgyu mas smras pa// oM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT// oM a bai sha a bi sha huM phaT// mo
117b6(rgyud): b+ha ra bu ba swa hUM phaT// oM b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha hUM phaT// rigs pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o// oM da ma da ma huM phaT// oM ma ra ya ma ra ya hU~M phaT// oM g+hA ta ya g+ha ta ya hUM phaT// oM b+ha
117b7(rgyud): bi b+ha la dzu ma Ta// blo rnams kyir// mes dam dadu paT/ oM D+yan d+ha rgyan duchu pa Ta// ma b+ha shi zla brgya phaT// oM dza ma dzi la hu phaT// tshigs rnams kyi'o// mad+hi Sh+T+r-iH
118a1(rgyud): #phaT// oM g+ha g+hAhUM phaT/ oM dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya hUM phaT// sau kha khang hUM phaT// pon rnams kyi'o// oM kha na khan hUM phaT// oM mar ma ra hUM phaT/ oM glai
118a2(rgyud): hA g+ha~M h+na hUM phaT// e bi ba pi ba sA hUM phaT// bran rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so//
118a3(rgyud): de na se rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor te// 'jig rten gsum gyis 'khor lo bzhin// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sog/
118a4(rgyud): thams cad snyoms par zhugs pa'o// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul lta bu// snying khar mtshan ma yang dag bzhag/ de nas dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga bzhin du las byas na// rdo rje 'chang
118a5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya rdo rje dril bur bcas pa bcings te// 'di skad bsgo shig/ khyod kyis dam tshig ma mthong ba dang // lha'i rigs ma mthong ba su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo la// dril bu
118a6(rgyud): dkrol du chug shig/ 'di skad bsgo nas kyang mna'i snying po byin la// ji ltar dril bu 'di dkrol ba// de'i sgra ji ltar mi rtag pa// de bzhin las kyi rdo rje khyod mi rtag par ni mi rung byed/ rdo rje srog
118a7(rgyud): dbyen sti stang med// rdo rje spun la mi 'ja' dang // gdug la byams dang chags bral ba gal te khyod kyis byas na'o// de nas gdong ga yogs dkrol la// dkyil 'khor bstan te/
118b1(rgyud): chos kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'di la sogs// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin no// thams cad mnyam pa nyid bsams pa// rdo rje rigs pa dam
118b2(rgyud): pa ste// 'gro ba 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin// de bzhin sdug bsngal dril bu 'dra// sdug bsngal thams cad mya ngan 'dra'o// rdo rje 'joms pa bla na med// rig pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin
118b3(rgyud): rnams so// sems can gdul phyir khro bo mchog/ zhi ba yis ni nges par gsod// dbyig pa yis ni 'chog pa med// log par lta bu 'jigs pa med// rdo rje khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin
118b4(rgyud): rnams kyi'o// ra ro 'dra bar dpa' ba med// phreng ba 'dra ba 'ching ba med// bud med 'dod pas 'gro dbang med// bstan pa tsam gyi bzhan pham mo// tshogs kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams//
118b5(rgyud): tshegs kyi 'chad pa mchog yin no// reg pa rnams ni rlung gi'o// gzi brjid can ni byin za'i mchog/ za rnams kyi nang khrag dam pa// po nya'i ting nge 'dzin rnams so// mche ba dag pa
118b6(rgyud): zhugs pa ste// 'chi bdag thams cad gnas na 'dug/ 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs bzhan med// chu las lhag pa'i ro gzhan med// bran gyi ting nge 'dzin rnams so// de bzhin
118b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtag pa'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi tsheg ches kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho/
119a1(rgyud): de da@#/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa
119a2(rgyud): dam pa 'dis gsungs so// oM badz+ra karma pra bar ta ni sa ma ye haM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra
119a3(rgyud): bi la se pu dza dza ya hUM// de nas rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dpe pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a b+he she ke bi shin na daM// de nas rdo rje spun gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso//
119a4(rgyud): oM badz+ra gi tig hi hiM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi las kyi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra nI tri nI t+ya hUM// de nas rig pa dam pas
119a5(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yod ta ma nr-i t+ya nI t+ya bi kur ba haM/ de na rdo rje khro bo rdo rje me'i lha mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// e gro ta badz+ra a ga ni dza
119a6(rgyud): la ya dri shu lam b+hin d+ha hri da yaM badz+ri na hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje gser lha mos chen mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra he me tshin d+ha tsakre na badz+ri ni hUM phaT// de nas
119a7(rgyud): rdo rje gzhon nu mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra shan ting dza ba dza pa a sham la ya sarba na ma ra ya shan ti dri sh+ya hu~M phaT// de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rjekhu tshur gyis
119b1(rgyud): rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra mu shrI ha na ha na badz+ren b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha bI Da ya bi da ya sarba duSh+TAn hri da ya ni oM sum b+ha ni b+ha hUM phaT// rig pa'i rgyal po rnams kyi'o//
119b2(rgyud): de nas rdo rje mi mchi ba rdo rje khro bos rang gi las kyis dam tshig 'di smras so// e badz+ra a mri tre sarba duSh+TAn gri h+NA ban d+ha ha na pa tsa bi dan sa ya b+hi na sha ya tshig d+ha b+hin d+hasmi ku ru mur dan ta
119b3(rgyud): da ya badz+re na ye ke tsid ma ma ya mu ka s+ye big h+Na b+hi na ya ka ta ma dam ya d+hid ta kro ta badz+ra ni hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje mdangs can gyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra kan
119b4(rgyud): te ma ra ya ra so mya rU pe pu pra tI ba ta ra ge na shi gram po ta ya hri da yaM badz+ra da ra sad t+ye na maho dzod s+dza ka ra la shi ta ra shrI badz+ri ni hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje dbyig ma'i mchog mas rang gi la
119b5(rgyud): kyi snying po 'di smos pa// oM badz+ra dan Da gre ta ya hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje khro mo cong cing chen mos rang gi dam tshig gi snying po 'di smras pa/ oM badz+re mye kha khe kha na kha na sha ba den pa
119b6(rgyud): shi ku ru driSh+Ta ma ra ya b+hi sha ne hUM phaT// khro bo'i rig pa rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'dzub mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras so// oM badz+ra be la ye tshin d+ha a sin b+hin d+ha
119b7(rgyud): brjen mar ya u ma da ya pi ba pi ba hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rje zas kyis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa// oM badz+ra sa sha ne b+ha gak+Sha ya sarba duSh+TAn badz+rad sha ne shag ti d+ha ra ya ni ma
120a1(rgyud): de nyi da k+Sha sh+ya// na sha man sa ya a ha re/ na ra ru ti ri a sa ba pri ye ma dza dza ba sa nu le pa na bi lib ta ga te/ a na ya sarba dan d+ha nu h+ya ran+ya su b+ha rda a di ni sang kra ma ya
120a2(rgyud): ba ra te bra ga k+Shi ni hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje bsgo bas rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa// oM badz+ra pa se ne an na pan ru pa kar na ni shri gur ba na i dam mye pra yang tsha a ba shi sad ka rba pa
120a3(rgyud): badz+ra kar da ra ni hU~M phaT// de nas rdo rje dbang gis rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa// oM badz+ra pas she a na ya ba shi ku ru sarba sti ya sarba pu ru sha na ma shi ku ru grub dan pra sad ya bya ba ha re b+h+yo batra
120a4(rgyud): ra pha bi dza ya ka ri badz+ra pA ta ka ta ri ni hUM phaT/ rdo rje tshogs kyi'o// de nas pha rdo rje po nya mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa// sa~M badz+ra dusti a na ya sarbe man+ta lam pra be sha ya b+han d+ha
120a5(rgyud): ya sarba kam ni me ku ru shi ga ma ta sa ya ma ra ya ra pe na badz+ra kha drang g+ha d+ha ri ni hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje shugs kyi rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa// oM badz+ra be ga badz+ri ni g+hag+ha g+hA g+ha sha ba
120a6(rgyud): de na ma ra ya bi ki ra bi d+ha na sa ya badz+ra pra Ta d+ha ri shi haM phaT// de nas rdo rje 'bar bsams rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa// oM badz+ra dze la le ya da ha da ha b+ha s+thi ku ru hU~M pheMT// de nas
120a7(rgyud): tums rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa// oM badz+ra bi ki te pra bi ka ta dang Sh+Tha ka ra la bi sha na bag te// shi g+h+ra g+ne has be sha la bak+Sha pa ru ti ran pi bam hA lek+Sha ni badz+ra pa sha d+ha ri ni
120b1(rgyud): hUM phaT// rdo rje pho nya mo rnams kyi'o// de nas rdo rje'i bran mos rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa// oM badz+ra mu khi a na ya badz+ra dang Sh+Te b+ha ya ni ka ba ta la ba si ni kha na kha na/ kha hi
120b2(rgyud): khaM hi sarba ma mu khe pra be sha ya s+pho ta ya ra ma ni sarba dustan nan badz+ri ni shi ta a sa ta ri ni hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje'i dus mes rang gi las kyi dam tshig smras pa/ oM badz+ra ka li ma ha pre ta
120b3(rgyud): ru pi Ni ma Na sha ma nas ru hi ra bri ye// e h+ye hi gri h+Na b+ha ga k+Sha ya badz+ra d+ha kyi ni badz+ra shang kye le sarba de bag na ma ni b+hu te ha ra ha ra pra nan a mu ka s+ya ka pa la ma la lang kri ha sarba ka ye kyin
120b4(rgyud): tsi ra ya si badz+ra kha tang kha da ra ni pre ta ma nu sha sha ri re shi gram a bi sha ya ban d+ha ya ma ra ya// badz+ra rak+Shi si hUM hu hu hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje bskul mas rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di
120b5(rgyud): smras pa// oM badz+ra pu ta ne ma nu ma ra sha man sarba su ru d+hi ra mu ta mu ri sha shraSh+ma shing g+ha na ka te re ga r+b+ha ha ri Na yi he shaM g+haM i daM a mu ka s+ya ku ru badz+ra sho d+ha ni ka ta ri ni sarba karma Ni me ku ru
120b6(rgyud): hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje ma ka ras rang gi las kyi dam tshig 'di smras pa// oM badz+ra ma ka re gras gras shi g+haM shri pra pi sha ya pa ta lam b+he k+Sha ya badz+ra ma ka ra d+ha ni hUM phaT// de nas
120b7(rgyud): rdo rje bran mos rnams kyi'o// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes yang rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor cing gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad byeb// las kyi
121a1(rgyud): / dkyil 'khor dam pa te// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyal gyi ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srid du bri/ dkyil 'khor mcho sa ni thams cad du sangs
121a2(rgyud): rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya// de dag phyogs ni rim par yang // sems dpa' chen po rnams bzhag go// de'i ngasus su chung mar bcas// rdo rje rig pa dam pa nyid/ rdo
121a3(rgyud): rje bsgegs po la sogs gsang // gar gi mchod la sogs pas mchod// de yi lha mo go rim bzhin// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du// rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra//
121a4(rgyud): gar byed pa ni bri bar bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje spyan mchog phyir// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so// grwa dang sgo'i phyogs rnams su// gdug pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// de nas las
121a5(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug la sogs pa'i las byas nas// rdo rje 'chang ba'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings ste// 'di skad ces smros shig/
121a6(rgyud): khyod kyi lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa su la yang gsang ba'i las 'di ma smra shig/ khyod dam tshig gi nye bar gyur ta re// zhes smras la// rdo rje slob dpon rang
121a7(rgyud): gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings ste// khro bo'i blta bas blta zhing 'di skad ces brjod do// oM badz+ra d+ha d+yas be sha ya pra be sha la nri t+ya pa ya sarba karma sid d+hi
121b1(rgyud): ma me pra yang na hUM ma hUM sa la la la la brdzi// de nas yang babs nas bdag nyid kyi 'jug ste/ phyag rgya dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o// de phyin
121b2(rgyud): cad lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang yid dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis las thams cad 'dod pa bzhin du bya'o// de nas yang gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te// gar gyi mchod pa'i
121b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes spobs shig/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis// dam tshig mchog ni gnyis bya ste// rdo rje la se la sogs mchod// rdo rje rig pa dam pa ste// rig pa 'di
121b4(rgyud): rnams thams cad kyang // lte 'og go rim ji bzhin du// gar gi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o// la kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// rdo rje gar gi tshulanI// phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdu so// dang
121b5(rgyud): cig mchog na gnyis byas te/ 'dra ba'i phyag rgyas dkrol bar bya// gang gi mchod pa 'di yin ni// gtso bo thams cad mchod na ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa che rtsigs kyis// las grub pa
121b6(rgyud): yang nges par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi rtog pa chen po las rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
121b7(rgyud): denas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rde rjes rdo rje'i rigs de dag bams cad gyi don du bsgonas// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bzhag te// mkhyen bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la'i
122a1(rgyud): de nyid@#/ skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag gsang ba thams cad 'dzin par dbang bskur na// de bzhin gshegs
122a2(rgyud): pa gsang ba de gang lags bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// de
122a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can rnams kyis rang bzhin ni// ji lta ji ltar 'dul 'gyur ba// de lta de ltar sems can don// 'dod chags la sog
122a4(rgyud): rtsang bas bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rdo rje gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir// sems can thams cad gas
122a5(rgyud): kyang ni// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying pos rang gis nor bu'i gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad phan phyir
122a6(rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas don du sbyor ba yis// pha rol nor rnams phrogs kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis// rang gi gsang ba'i
122a7(rgyud): pad mo 'di gsungs so// 'dod chags 'dra ba'i bde ba med// rgyal ba la ni de phul la// gzhan gyi chung ma sems can phyir// bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur/ de
122b1(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs kyis rang gi gsang ba 'di gsungs so// sems can thams cad pan phyir dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i phyir// las rnams thabs
122b2(rgyud): cad byas pa yi// bsod nams shin tu mang po nyid// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'chang ba
122b3(rgyud): la legs so zhes ston pa// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa te// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa tha
122b4(rgyud): na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di yang legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid
122b5(rgyud): bsdus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po// rdzogs s+ho// // bam po drag pa'o// /
122b6(rgyud): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus ste// bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid chos thams cad kyi bdag po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la// mtshan
122b7(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab pa// pad ma sems dpa' pad ma che// 'jig rten dbang po dbang phyug che// spyan ras gzigs dbang bstan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje
123a1(rgyud): de cid@#chos la phyag 'tshal lo// chos kyi rgyal po dag pa che// sems dpa'i rgyal po blo gros che// pad ma'i bdag nyid pad ma che// pad ma mgon khyod phyag
123a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo// pad ma las byung pad ma 'od// pad ma dag pa rab dag byed// rdo rje pad ma pad mchog sku// pad ma'i pad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs chen po sdang ba che// bgo
123a3(rgyud): pa chen po che dang mtshungs// bstan pa chen po dpa' ba che// dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can bsams pa theg pa che// rnal 'byor chen po mos pa che// bde za bde
123a4(rgyud): byed dag pa'i don// sangs rgyas pad ma khyod phyag 'tshal// chos de nyid don dam pa'i chos// dag pa'i chos ni chos rab byed// chos chen po dang chos bzang mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo
123a5(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems bzang mchog/ chos kyi sems dpa' sems mchog 'dzin// sems dpa'i dam pa sems mchog shes// sems dpa'
123a6(rgyud): sems can khyod phyag 'tshal// spyan ras gzigs dbang mgon po mchog/ mgon po chen po rnams gzigs pa// snang ba 'jig rten 'jig rten don// 'jig rten mgon po
