123a7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten yig yi ge che// yi ge mchog ni yi ge 'dra// yi ge'i yi ge thams cad spyan// 'khor lo'i yi ge khyod phyag 'tshal// phyag na pad ma phyag chen po//
123b1(rgyud): dbugs byin pa ni sbyin pa po// sangs rgyas chos ni sangs rgyas che// sangs rgyas bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzugs ni gzugs chen po// rdo rje gzugs ni gzug
123b2(rgyud): bzang 'chung // chos kyi snang ba gzi brjid mchog/ 'jig rten snang khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma'i dpal mgon mgon ldan pa/ tshangs pa'i mgon po tshangs chen po// tshang
123b3(rgyud): sras khyod phyag 'tshal lo// snang ba'i snang mchog snang ba'i gtso// snang gsal shin tu snang ba'o// snang ba'i mgon po snang ba che// sangs rgyas sdang khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
123b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dbang bskur sangs rgyas mchog/ sangs rgyas sras po mkhas chen po// sangs rgyas dbang bskur gtsugs gis mchog/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal
123b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan ni spyan chen po// chos spyan gzigs pa chen po'o// ting nge ye shes thams cad pa// rdo rje spyan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bdag nyid kun gyi yon tan 'di// khyod kyi mtshan
123b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad rnams// bstod dam bsgom par byed pa gang // 'jig rten dpa' thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol btab pa// rang gi rigs rnams bskyed nas
123b7(rgyud): kyang // chos kyis 'khor lo ngas pa ni// thub pas bshad par mdzad du gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos de bzhin gshegs
124a1(rgyud): de nyid#/ pa thams cad kyi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas// bcom ldan 'das shag kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pagal ba der mdun du phyogs te 'dug nas// rdo rje ba
124a2(rgyud): ma de rang gi thugs khar bzhag te// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rab tu dag pa 'di// rdo rje pad ma 'di dag gi// pa yin bdag gi bu yang yin// rigs 'di byin gyi
124a3(rgyud): brlabs par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam cig las byung ba'i byir gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
124a4(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos gi dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kha nas byung ngo / hri/ de nas de byung
124a5(rgyud): ma thag du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas pad ma lta bu'i 'od zer kha dog dang // gzugs dang / rtags dang // gcod las rnam pa dam byung te// 'jig rten
124a6(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad du 'dod chags la sogs pa rnam par dag pa dang // chos nyid kyi ye shes yang dag par sbyangs nas// slar yang logs ste// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
124a7(rgyud): po'i thugs khar zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya bar rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsung so// oM badz+ra pad mad tam
124b1(rgyud): hri// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phye na rdo rje rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam
124b2(rgyud): pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad nod ta ma ta// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yod ta ma hri// de nas
124b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa gsungs so// oM badz+ra bi d+yod ta ma a// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
124b4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags ste// 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po
124b5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hu// hri ho// de nas de smras ma thag du// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang po'i thugs las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de//
124b6(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang po'i gzugs 'dzin pa pad ma la zhugs ste// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma pad ma 'dzin pa/ kha dog dang // gzugs dang // cha lugs dang /
124b7(rgyud): brgyan sna tshogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa sems thams cad kyi sku 'dzin pa// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lus su gyur nas byung ste// 'jig rten gyi khams
125a1(rgyud): de nyid sdusathams cad ji lngar 'dul bar so so'i gzugs su bstan nas// ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba byas ste// yang slar log
125a2(rgyud): nas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod nas/
125a3(rgyud): ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// thabs ni snying rje'i bdag nyid de// gang du thabs kyi 'dul mdzad na// lha rnams su yang 'gyur
125a4(rgyud): ba yin// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs pa bskyed nas// de bzhin
125a5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la sems can thams cad mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang // don dang // grub pa dam pa dang // rdo rje chos nyid dang // ye shes dang // mngon par shes pa
125a6(rgyud): 'bras bu rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir bul nas// 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa
125a7(rgyud): ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba ni// 'gro ba 'dul zhes bya ba ste// grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa dang // srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ dang dang phreng
125b1(rgyud): brgyan pa dang / dkyil 'khor grwa ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo rgyu 'tshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan par// phyi rol dkyil 'khor srang bu bre// de'i nang du srad bu ni/
125b2(rgyud): grub bzhi par ni bri bar bya// gnyis pa'i gror ni sgor 'dod cing // pad mo dra ba bya ba yin// ka pa brgyad kyi tshul du ni// pad ma'i 'dabs ma brgyad pa bri// de'i ge sar dbus su
125b3(rgyud): ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku gzugs bzhag/ de la sangs rgyas bzhag pa'i snying po ni 'di yin no// bud d+ha haM// sangs rgyas phyogs kun bri ba ni// pad mo'i dbus su gnas
125b4(rgyud): pa yi// rdo rje rin chen pad mo dang // sna tshogs pad ma de bzhin no// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// e huM d+hi kri// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje
125b5(rgyud): shags kyi brgal nas ni// der ni spyan ras gzigs dbang bri// gzugs rnams thams cad 'byin pa te// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje 'gying la sogs
125b6(rgyud): tshul du// sangs rgyas la sogs sems dpa' che// mtshan ma pad ma 'chang ba bri// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// tso ta thA ga ta d+ha ra ma hUM/ oM badz+ra pad ma a ku k+Sha shi
125b7(rgyud): ra badz+ra sad tra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra pa ra ya ma ra ya pad ma ku su mu a yu d+ha d+ha ra a mo ga shar tse// oM pad ma sam b+ha pad ma hasta sAd+ha huM// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni/ dkyil 'khor gnyis
126a1(rgyud): de nyid#/ pa'ang de bzhin te/ de yi dbus su dri ba ni// bor tshug dbus 'ang de bzhin gshegs// de yi phyog ni thaMd du// khro gcer la sogs tshul du ni// mtshan mar pad ma 'chang drib/
126a2(rgyud): ste 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// hUM oM pad ma b+hi kA ti ta Ti tA// oM pad ma ma ni ke du d+ha ra tsan dra pra ha da ya ar+ya pha lo ki ti shA ra/ he hri pye/
126a3(rgyud): sarba tran shi g+hams ma ya huM/ oM pad ma d+ha ta ha sa me ke d+ha sha mA kha ha ha ha ha hUM// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum po yang de bzhin te// sems dpa' chen po
126a4(rgyud): snyoms zhugs par// pad mo'i steng du bzhag par bri// de'i phyogs ni thams cad du// steng 'og go rims ji bzhir bya// pad ma la sogs tshul du ni// sems dpa' chen po rnam
126a5(rgyud): kyang bzhag// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so// haM ai ta ra pad ma a ba lo ki ya ma ma sa ma ya sad ta huM// oM pa da ma ku ma ra pad ma sha ga ti d+ha ra kha ge na// tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM
126a6(rgyud): phaT/ oM pad ma ni la kan tra// shang kha tsa ga kra ga d+ha pad ma bin// bya g+ha tsarmA ni sa na// kriSh+Ti sa ra bkri taM yang nyo pa b+hi ta e dzi na tsam bskan d+hod ta ri ya// na ra ya na pa d+ha ra tI ne tra/
126a7(rgyud): mu tsa aT ta ha sam pra pe sha ya sa ma yan te hi ni/ sid ti ma yam pa lo ki te shwa ra hu// oM b+ha hA pad ma sa ma ya b+ha ba dza badza pad ma b+ha sha hU~M// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni/
126b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bzhi pa'ang de bzhin te// der ni pad ma zhal bzhi pa// pad ma mdung rtse thog pa bri// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje gar la sogs tshul du// mtshan mar
126b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa bri bar bya// sems dpa' chen po tshi ga bzhin// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ tI/ e pad ma nad te shA ra Nad ta pu dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta karma sa ma ya sa kar sha ya
126b3(rgyud): pra be sha ya b+han d+ha ya/ a be sha ya sarba karma sid d+hi ma mye pre yad tsa// a ba lo gi te shA ra ya hI/ oM ya ba b+han ya ma da d+ha// a ba lo ki te shA ra rak+Sha b+han b+ha pad ma ka pa tsa//
126b4(rgyud): sa ma ya hAM// oM ma hA pra tsan da bi shA ra ru da ba ti ka ta pad ma dang Sh+Tha ka ra la// ba sha na bag tri// tre sa ya barbaM// pad ma yag k+Sha kha da khad d+hi ga d+hig d+hi ga d+hi ga/ pad ma muSh+Ti sa ya s+t+waM
126b5(rgyud): ban d+ha hUM phaT// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// grwa rnams kun tu bri ba ni// rdo rje la s+ya la sogs tshul// pad ma la s+ya la sogs lha// de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag rnams yin ne/
126b6(rgyud): oM pad ma la s+ya ra ga ya ma hA de bi ra ga ma hA pu dza sa ma ye hUM// oM pad ma ma le a b+hi She ka pu dza sa ma ya huM/ oM pa da ma gi te ga ta gdA gi pu dza sa ma ye hUM// oM pa da ma ni nId r+ya sarba
126b7(rgyud): bu dza ba ra b+han d+ha na sa ma ye huM// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor grwa rnamasu// pad ma mchod pa la sogs bzhi// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi bri'o// de la dog gi man
127a1(rgyud): nyid#/ pa'i phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma du ba pu dza sa ma ye braha d+ha ya pad ma ku lad yid te// mahA ga ni pad ma hi hUM// saM bu dza sa ma yem ha pad ma kul
127a2(rgyud): tse te ku ru sarba karma ni me pad ma sa ni d+hi huM// de nas tshegs la sogs pa kun// sgo rnams bsrungs pa bzhi po dag/ de dag sring po'i don gyis ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// o ha yang
127a3(rgyud): / gri ba ma hA pad ma a ku sha a kar sha yai shi g+ha ma sarba pad ma ku la sa ma yan// pad ma a gu sha d+ha ra hUM dz+nyA// oM a mo g+ha pad ma pa sha kro ta ya kar sha ya pra pe sha ya ma ha pa ti// ya ma ba ti
127a4(rgyud): pa ru na ku ma be ra bra h+ma be sha d+ha ra pad ma ku la sa ma ya ma hUM hUM// oM pad ma s+pho d+ha b+han d+ha sarba pad ma ku las ma yan shi g+ha hUM paM// oM shan mu khas nad ka ma ra be sha d+ha ra pad ma g+han Ta ya/ a sha
127a5(rgyud): ya sarba pad ma ku las ma yan sarba mu te// b+han d+ha ya sarbe sid d+hi yo me pra yang tsa pad ma be sha// a ya ya/ de nas 'dir 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i pad mo'i dkyil
127a6(rgyud): 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// de la dang po kho nar pad ma'i slob dpon gyis// rdo rje pad ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la// ji lta ba bzhin du zhugs te// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyi
127a7(rgyud): 'khor chen pa'i la du snying po 'dis las rnams bya'o// sems pa dam rmo ta d+hi ldas// de nas de zhin du bka'i mnas na// das cig gi phyag rgyam bdag nyid dbang bskur te/ bad
127b1(rgyud): ma'i dbyibs blangs nas rang gi pad ma'i ming nas brjod la// pad ma'i lcags kyu la sogs pas las rnams bya'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya de dag nyid kyis sems dpa' chen po rnams
127b2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// de nas dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas pad ma'i slob ma rnams bzhag par bya ste// de la dang por pad ma'i slob ma rnams la mna'i snying po byin la//
127b3(rgyud): 'di skad sgo bar bya'o// deng ni khyod kyi snying ka na// pad ma'i sems dpa' nyid bzhags te// ji ste tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag du bral te gshegs// de nas yang 'di skad
127b4(rgyud): du bsgo bar bya ste// gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di su la yang ma skra shig/ khyod kyi mi bde ba ma spangs par dus byas na sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re// de nas snying po
127b5(rgyud): 'dis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o// oM badz+ra pad mas ma ya ste// de nas gos dkar po bgos la// dar dkar pos gdong g.yogs nas gzhug par bya ste// snying po ni 'di
127b6(rgyud): yin no// oM pad ma sa ma ya hUM// de nas las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas pad ma'i dbyibs lag du byin no// oM pad ma ha sta badz+ra d+ha ra taM// pad la ya des kyang 'di skad du
127b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o// de la yang 'di skad du brjod par bya ste// ji ltar pad mo dmar po 'di// rigs kyi nges pas ma chags bzhin// thams cad dag
128a1(rgyud): de nying 'dra#/ par bsgoms na ni// de bzhin sdig pas gos mi 'gyur// de la chos nyid de yin no// de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ srid
128a2(rgyud): la pad ma'i bris nas kyang // pad ma bsgoms na snying kha ru// pad ma dpal yang dbang 'gyur na// bud med bral pa smos ci bsgos/ dpral bar sangs rgyas gzugs bris te/
128a3(rgyud): gtu' na gnas par 'gyur// rtag tu bsgoms par byas na ni// bsgoms pa de ni myur du yang // dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// kha yi nang gi lce steng du// sangs rgyas gzugs
128a4(rgyud): ni bla bsgoms na// sgra dbyang lha mo bdag nyid ni// rtag tu khan gnas par 'gyur// gtsug gtor dbus su pad ma ni// snyoms par bzhugs te bzhag nas kyang // gtsug gtor bad
128a5(rgyud): ma bsgoms nas ni/ mkha' 'gro thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma shri yam pa sha man ho// pad ma sa ra rba ti sho d+ha ya hUM// oM pad ma ur gram
128a6(rgyud): ba sha ku ru dza dza// rtsig pa 'am yang na 'kha' la'ang rung // pad ma pad ma bsgoms na ni// 'dis ni sems can thams cad kyang // dbang du byed padam pa'o// mkha' 'am yang ni/
128a7(rgyud): phyogs gzhan du// pad ma pad ma bsgoms nas kyang // gang che mthong ba de tshe grangs// ci dga' bar ni mi snang 'gyur// rtsigs pa'am yang na nam mkha' la// pad ma rgya
128b1(rgyud): grab bris das de// gang che mthong nas blangs pa yi// de che sna tshogs gzugs su 'gyur// mkha' 'am yang daphyogs gzhan du// rdo rje pad ma bsgobs nas kyang // de blangs ska cig cid
128b2(rgyud): kyis ni// pad ma rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams yin do// oM badz+ra sarba dza gad ba shi ta dz+nyA na pad ma A bi sha a// oM dz+nyA na pad ma ti shwa ya tI
128b3(rgyud): sham ku ru ba pa// oM sa ma ti bi sha pad pa tiSh+Tha/ bai shA ru byam me dar sha ya b+ha ga b+han baM// oM sa ma ti badz+ra// pad ma tiSh+Tha shi tiSh+Tha shi g+ha ma haM// dkyil 'khor la sogs tha ma
128b4(rgyud): cad de// spyan ras gzigs dbang bris nas ni// de yi mdun du rta mgrin gyis// phyag rgya'i mchog gis 'dren par bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras
128b5(rgyud): gzigs dbang bri bar bya// nges pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// 'gro ba thams cad 'dren par byed// dkyil 'khor la sogs thams cad du// spyan ras gzigs
128b6(rgyud): dbang bri bar bya// de'i mdun du pad me yis// lcags grog mchog gi phyag rgya bcings// dkyil 'khor lo sogs thams cad de// spyan ras gzigs dbang bri ba de'i//
128b7(rgyud): mdun du pad ma'i dril bu yis// thams cad 'bebs pa'i dam pa'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma a g+na sha sa kar sha ya sarba ma ha sad tan hudza
129a1(rgyud): @oM a mo ka ba sha kro ta hUM to// oM pad mo po ta baM// oM pad mo g+han d+ha a be sha ya sarba ma ya// bdag nyid nyid kyis bdag nyid nyid// pad mar zhal bzhir sems
129a2(rgyud): dpar yang // bsgoms nas de nas grub nas no// skad cig gi ni gzugs mang 'gyur// de ltar bdag nyid bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje chos kyis ting nge 'dzin gnas// pad ma'i
129a3(rgyud): pad ma bsgoms nas ni// zas mi shes pa'i sgo 'phang thob// spyan ras gzigs dbang thor tshug dbus// bdag gis sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// bdag nyid kyi ni bsgoms
129a4(rgyud): gyur na// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin gnas// bdag nyid nyid kyi bsgoms na ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur//
129a5(rgyud): de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// pad ma bi sha dar ma ka ya pad ma byud da a she ka lo ka sha ra// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslob
129a6(rgyud): bo// de la re shig dang por ni// phyag rgya chen por ye shes yin te// ji ltar ri me'i tshul ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // pad ma la gnas sems dpar
129a7(rgyud): / bdag nyid kyi ni bdag nyid bsgoms// de nas de dag gi las ni 'di dag yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya che ba bcings na// tshe dpag med dang mnyam par 'gyur/ rdo rje
129b1(rgyud): padam bcings nas ni// spyan ras gzigs dbang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gi bcings na ni/ bde bar gshegs pas de dbang bskur/ bsams pad ma'i
129b2(rgyud): ting 'dzin thob// sna tshogs kyis ni sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'dul ba po// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ster// pad+ma ma sems dpas ting nge 'dzin//
129b3(rgyud): pad ma'i khro bo'i dbang bskur dpal// rdo rje'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gis// pad ma 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog/ sangs rgyas dbang gis sangs rgyas nyid// rdo rje bar
129b4(rgyud): mo gra ba mchog sbyin// 'dod pa'i dbang pos rab 'dod ldan// dga' ba yis ni legs par sprin// khro gnyer gyis ni khro zhing 'gyur// pad ma'i nyi mas gzi brjid
129b5(rgyud): mchog/ pad mo'i zla bas mdangs chen po// bzhad pas rab tu bzhad pa thob// sgol mas dngos grub mchog thob po// pad me'i ral gris skal bzang thob// mgrin
129b6(rgyud): sngon gyis ni 'gugs pa che// gos dkar gyi ni dngos grub po// pad mo'i gar dbade phyug gis 'grub// mi 'jigs rtag tu 'jigs pa med// rab gtum gyis ni ma rungs
129b7(rgyud): 'dul// pad ma khu tshur rab bsgrub byed// la s+yas dga' zhing phreng ba nor// glu dbyangs gar bde bdug pas tshim// me tog mdzes shing mar me lta// dris ni mchog gi drir
130a1(rgyud): dmang 'gyur// rta mgrin gyis ni yang dag 'gugs// gdod mi zabs dbang du byed// pad ma'i lcags sgrog 'ching ba che// dril bus kun nas 'bebs
130a2(rgyud): byed do// de nas pad ma'i rigs kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// mthe bo mdze chung mnyam par bsgreng / phyag rgya 'di ni chos
130a3(rgyud): dam tshig/ sangs rgyas chos ni rab thob byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// 'dzub mo gung mo srin lag ma nyams// sangs rgyas rigs mchog phyag rgya de// sangs rgyas
130a4(rgyud): nyid du grub par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bcings nas ni// gung mo rdo rje rab skams byed// 'di ni rigs pa dam pa yis// phyag rgya yin te rdo rje 'grub de las gung mo rin chen 'dra/
130a5(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rab grub byed/ gung mo pad mo'i tshul du byas// pad mo'i dngos grub rang thong byed// rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas ni// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// chos kyi rdo
130a6(rgyud): rje bcings nas ni// ska cig gi ni dam tshig 'grub// rdo rje bsdams nas 'dzub bskams pas// sangs rgyas dngos gra ba rab thob byed// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba/ sems
130a7(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya khyad par du/ rdo rje thal mo bsdams nas kya/ gung mo mnyam bskams de bzhin du// mthe chung mthe chung po che ba ni/ sna tshogs pad mar bshad pa yin//
130b1(rgyud): de las mthe bo gnyis bsnol te// dbus kyi rdo rje spyi gtsug phud/ 'dzub gnyis rtse sbrang bkug pa'i gzugs/ gtsug pud sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ rdo rje bsdams
130b2(rgyud): ba dam byas la// mthe bo bskams te btad nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis ni rtse mo dgugs bkan nas ting nge 'dzin du bzhag/ thal mo pad mor mnyam sbyar la// 'dzub mo
130b3(rgyud): rdo rje bskams nas ni// mthe bo ngos la sbyar ba ni// nges pa'i dbang phyug phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas ni// legs par bkan ste bcings nas kyang // mthe
130b4(rgyud): bo gnyis ni pad mor bsgreng // sangs rgyas pad mo yin par bshad// mthe bo gnyis ni rdo rje snyam/ 'dzub mo lcags kyu ral grir bya// mthe chung gnyis ni so sor dbye// gung mo
130b5(rgyud): srin lag pad mor bya// thal mo mnyam par rab sbyar la// nus te mthe bo bkug nas ni// 'dzub mos 'dzub mo bzung nas su// 'dren par byed pa pad mo mnga'// tha la
130b6(rgyud): mo sbyar nas mnyam par bkan// legs pa'i phyag rgya bcings na ni// legs so zhes bya sbyin par byed// pad mo legs par yin par grags// thal mo mnyam par rab
130b7(rgyud): sbyar la// 'dzub po rtse mo skams te 'grub// bze chung phral te mdzod bur bzhag/ pang po khro gnyer zhes bya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// sor mo thams
131a1(rgyud): den#cad dkyil 'khor du// snying khar rab tu brkyang ba na// pad mog ma yin par bshad// thal mo rab tu dam sbyar la/ 'jub gnyis rin chen 'drab
131a2(rgyud): bya// dpung pa spyi bor rab brkyang ba// pad mo rin chen rgyal mtshan rtsi// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor bzhag/ kha dang bcas par rab brkyang nas// nyid kyi kha nas dgongs pa dang /
131a3(rgyud): kha ni bcu cig nyid du 'gyur// ting 'dzin pad mo bcings nas ni// mthe bo gnyis ni so sor 'gyed// pad mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab ster byed//
131a4(rgyud): pad mo sgrol ma'i phyag rgya ni// 'jub gnyis pad mo'i tshul bcings// ral gri tshul du byas pa 'di// pad ma ral gri'i phyag rgya yin// mthe chung pad mo chen por bya// mtheb
131a5(rgyud): gnyis de bzhin dbyig ltar bsgreng // 'dzub mo rtse mos dung chen bya// gung mo srin lag 'khor lor sbyar// rdo rje thal mo dam byas la/ g.yas pa'i oM gyi nang du bzhugs//
131a6(rgyud): g.yon pa'i 'dzub theb bzlas pa bya// sor kun chu skyes kha phye 'dra// rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar la// grwa yon dang g.yas nas de bzhin du// 'gying bcas gar byed bskor nas
131a7(rgyud): ni// spyi bor bzhag pa pad mo can// rdo rje bal mo dam de byas la// de bzhin rtse kun kha dbye ba// bskor te padam snying khar ni// bzhag na brtan par byed pa'o// rdo rje thal mod/
131b1(rgyud): byas la// gsang ba'i gnod sbyin tshul du ni// thal mo brkyang ste bskams nas ni// khar bzhag pad mo gnod sbyin ma// rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas kyang // gung mo gnyis ni
131b2(rgyud): phyir bkug ste// rang gi mthe bo rgyab mnan pa// pad mo'i khu tshur zhes kyang bshang/ rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul gyis ni// rdo rje thul mo las byung la// mchod pa'i lha me thams cad kyi/
131b3(rgyud): dam tshig mchog rnams bcings pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// 'dzub mo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// bkug nas rtse mo sbyar ba'o// rta mgrin gyi ni yin par bshad//
131b4(rgyud): pad ma thal mo mnyam sbyar la// 'dzub gnyis mdud par mdud pa ni// don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya yin// 'theb 'dzub lcags sgrog 'dra bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i tshul gyi
131b5(rgyud): ni/ pad mo'i thal me/ mnyam sbyar la// srin lag mthe chung gnyis par du// mthe bo gnyis bcug dam du btsir// de nas pad ma'i rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di
131b6(rgyud): yin te// hri gri bri hri// shrI shrI dri hri gi d+hi kri bi// bi ri shrI aHpad mo'i khu tshur gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
131b7(rgyud): dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
132a1(rgyud): de nyid@#/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos kyi gzungs kyi dam tshig byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
132a2(rgyud): rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsung
132a3(rgyud): so// oM badz+ra sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra pa Ni rang nas ma ye hUM// de nas byang
132a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad ma sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi reg pa dam pa
132a5(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM kar ma sa ma ye hUM// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil
132a6(rgyud): 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa te// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la/ pad mo'i gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor
132a7(rgyud): chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// de dbus pad ma bzang po la// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mo bri// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// dam tshig mchog
132b1(rgyud): rnams lhag ma bzhin// rang gi rig pa rnams ldan par// chos kyi rdo rje la sogs bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma sha re hUM// so d+harma
132b2(rgyud): sa ma ye badz+ra pad me ni huM// oM bud d+ha ma bi she ka rad na sa ma ye haM// oM ta ra sa ma ye hUM// oM bi shA mu khe hUM// sna tshogs gzugs mchog dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis
132b3(rgyud): brgal nas ni// de'i dbus su pad mo yis// bskor ba'i pad mi bri bar bya// de'i phyogos rnams thams cad du// pad mo'i phyag rgya nyid gnas/ pad mo'i mtshan mo bri bar bya
132b4(rgyud): bde bshegs nyid kyi nyid phyag rgya// de la de dag gi phyag rgya 'di dag go/ haM/ oM pad ma ta thA ga te oM sa mnan ta bad tra// pad ma badz+ra kAk+Sho sha d+ha ri ni hUM// oM pad ma ra ti// oM pad
132b5(rgyud): ma duSh+Ti// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// gtsug phud dbus su chu skyes bri// sangs rgyas dbade bskur bri bar bya// de'i
132b6(rgyud): byegs rnams thams cad du// lce 'og gi rims ji bzhin du// pad mo'i mtshan ma ldan pa yi// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam
132b7(rgyud): yin no// shi ri oM b+hi ku ti Ta Ti bi te Ti/ pad me huM// oM pad ma dz+wa le hUM// oM so mi ni pad me hUM// oM pad ma ha si ni e ka da sha bag tre di ri di ri sid te// bad te tsa laM/
133a1(rgyud): de nyid#pra tsa le ku su ma d+ha re/ i li pra sha sid d+ha ma me pra yad tshah+na// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // de'i dbus su
133a2(rgyud): pad ma mdzes// pad ma'i phyag rgya bzhag par bya// de bzhin phyogs rnams thams cad du// lte 'og gi rims ji bzhin par// bde ma'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// pad ma la ni
133a3(rgyud): gnas pa bri// de dag gi snying po 'di dag go// d+hi ai tA re tu tA re hUM/ oM b+hi hA// oM pad ma tsakra shaM kha ga d+ha d+hA ra ni ni la kan the sid d+ha sid h+ya hUM/ oM ban d+hu ra bA si ni pad ma sa ma
133a4(rgyud): ma b+ha be// ba da ba da haM/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhi par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // pad mo'i dbus su pad mo ni// 'bar po'i phreng ba bskor 'od bri// de'i
133a5(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad du// steng 'og gi rims ji bzhin par// pad mo'i dbus na gnas pa yi// pad mo'i mtshan mar gnas pa bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams
133a6(rgyud): so/ sti/ oM pad ma nar te shA ri pu dza ya sarba ta thA ga ta nan nad Ta hAM// oM a b+ha yang pad ma ka ba tsa ban d+he rak+Sha ma ma hUM hUM/ oM ma ha pra tsan de pad yak+Shi ni bi sha ru pa d+ha ra ni
133a7(rgyud): b+hi shrI pa ya sarba duSh+TAn khad kha da hU~M phaT// oM pad ma mu ti a mu ti a mu// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams bri ba// dpad me'i lcags kyu la sogs
133b1(rgyud): rgyu// mdor na pad mo'i mtshan ma can// de nas de dag gi phyag rgya 'di rnams so// oM pad ma b+hi she ka pU dze ra ta// oM bad ma gri ta/ bu dze gI// oM pad ma nid t+ya bu dza krid/ oMd+d+ha
133b2(rgyud): pa pad me ni hAM/ oM pad ma puSh+pe hUM// oM pad ma ku la sun d+ha ri// d+harma a lo ke pu dza ye hUM// oM pad ma gan d+h+ye hUM// mchod pa rnams so// oM pad ma ku sha a kar sha ya/
133b3(rgyud): ma hA pad ma ku lan ha ya gri ba sa ye hIdz+dza/ oM a me ke ba shwa kro tA sa ma ya pra be sha ya// sarbaM sa ma yan hU~M// oM pad ma shang ka li// bam oM pad ma gan d+ha d+ha ri shI gram/
133b4(rgyud): ya be sha ya sa ma yan shan mu'i ya// ni de nas phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// pad mo'i slob ma rnams ji lta ba bzhin du
133b5(rgyud): gtsud de/ 'di skad du khyod kyis gsangs pa 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ khyod sems can dmyal bar ltung ta re// tshe gcig du sdug bsngal gyur ta re// de nas phab na
133b6(rgyud): 'di skad du// khyod kyi mig lam du ji zhig snang zhes dris nas// des ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du dngos grub du 'gyur ro// des gal te na mkha' dkar bar mthong na
133b7(rgyud): ni// de'i tshe de ni dngos grub dam pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// yang na ser po mthong na ni/ de nor 'grub pa'i ye shes bslab bo// ji ste dmar po mthong na ni// rjes su
134a1(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// ji ste nag po mthong na ni// mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// ji ste sna tshogs mthong na ni/
134a2(rgyud): dngos grung thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par shes nas/ ji lta ba bzhin du gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te// snod ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bskyed de// phyag rgya'i ye shes bsla
134a3(rgyud): par bya'o// de ltar rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du yang snod ji lta ba bzhin du phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab pa ni 'di bzhin du brtag par bya'o// de nas
134a4(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa bsgrub pa'i ye shes 'di yin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang sems dpa' che// sna tshogs gzugs su bdag rang nyid// bsgoms na phyag rgya chen po yi/
134a5(rgyud): mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas dbang gi dam tshig 'di// mnyam par bzhag pas brtan byas te// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// mchog gi dngos
134a6(rgyud): bre ba thob par 'gyur// pad ma pad ma sems dpa' che// bdag rang nyid mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms// bdag nyid kyis ni dam pa yi// dngos grub thob pa nyid du 'gyur//
134a7(rgyud): rang 'byungs gdon mi za ba yi// dbang phyug rang bzhin las kyi rgya// cho ga bzhin bsgrubs myur du yang // mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po
134b1(rgyud): ni 'di rnams so// oM pad ma swa hA rka ma sid d+ha ho// oM bud d+ha bi she kro ham sid d+ya ma ma// oM d+harma sa ma d+hi ra ha ma sid d+hA ho// oM a mo g+he shA ra ha ma sid d+ha mam// de nas nor
134b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// kha'i nang du dbyig bcug te// sna tshogs dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// gcig du gyur nas stong du
134b3(rgyud): 'gyur/ gser srang brgyad cha brangs nas ni// dam tshig mchog ni rab brtan par// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// gcig du gyur nas stong du 'gyur/ mu tig 'bram
134b4(rgyud): bu khar bcug la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug tu// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// gcig tu byur las stong du 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya lag gnyis kyi rin
134b5(rgyud): chen thams cad blangs na ni// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na yang // gcig tu gyur las steng du 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM pad ma hi ran
134b6(rgyud): nu pra dad+hA dza/ oM pa da ma su rnad hu~M dza/ oM pad ma mug ta pra ta hUM dza// oM pad ma sarba rad na pra da hU~M dza// de nas rjes su dga' bar bya ba'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// sna tshogs
134b7(rgyud): dbang phyug phyag rgya che// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// pad mo blangs te mdun gnas pa// gang yin des ni de mgur byed// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yis/
135a1(rgyud): @#/ pad ma dmar po dam bzung ste// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms nas kyang /
135a2(rgyud): pad ma blangs te ji lta ba// rdo rje blta bas de ltar bltas// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya tshul gyis ni chog bzhin du pad ma bzung // lag pa gnyis
135a3(rgyud): kyis bskor nas ni// bud med thams cad des 'gur byed// de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM bi shi shwa ra ma ha pad mo ho// oM sa ma ya pad ma ho// mo log padam ho/
135a4(rgyud): oM karma pad ma ho// de nas mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab po// ma lus dbang po'i phyag rgya che// gomam par bya ba bdag rang nyid/ gang gi mdun du de'i pad ma// bcad ni 'chi 'gyur sgra
135a5(rgyud): cig gis// pad ma brtan bzung yang dag par// dam tshig mchog ni de nyid kyis// rab tu brtan pas de rtogs ni// gang gi ming smos de 'jig 'gyur// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings pa
135a6(rgyud): las// pad mo bzung ba ji bzhin du// gang gi ming smos pad ma de// bcad pa de ni 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// pad bzung cho ga ji lta bar// gang la khros
135a7(rgyud): pas rtogs bya ba// de'i srog ni 'gag par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po 'di rnams yin no// sems pa das chen mar mtho ba Ta// mosam la bdas smogan sha par Ta phaT// mo/
135b1(rgyud): d+harma par mchod byin sha ya d+hIT phaT// oM ka tha ba dam s+pho ta ya dzI bi ta ma sas kri Ta phaT/ de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// pad me la ni bud
135b2(rgyud): med bsam// de'i steng bdag nyid rdo rjes bsgyur// pad ma par chog rtse byed cing // mnyam par bzhag na dngos grub tho/ pad ma la ni bud med bsam// de stengs pad mar
135b3(rgyud): bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing padam pad ma mchog/ dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// pad ma la ni bud med bsam// de stengs sna tshogs bdag bsgyur te// rtse zhing
135b4(rgyud): sna tshogs pad ma mchog/ sna tshogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// oM badz+ra pad ma sa na yogs ta ya hri// oM bud da dam ku ta
135b5(rgyud): san yo ga sa twa ya shI// oM pad ma pa da ma sa na yo gas tA ya d+hi// oM bi shA pad ma san yo ga sa tA pa sti// de nas pad ma rigs kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes rdzi
135b6(rgyud): lta ba bzhin du bslab po// sor mo'i rtse sprad pa dmar bya// rdo rje khro bo 'dzub gnyis sprad // rtse gnyis nor bu pad mo ltar// rdo rje bsdams pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bcings
135b7(rgyud): pa bsdams nas kyang / gung mo gnyis ni myu gur bsgreng / 'dzub mo srin lag gnyis bkug pa'i// phyag rgya shAkya thub pa bstan// chos kyi rdo rje snying khar bzhag/ bsgyur te dpral
136a1(rgyud): dad @#bar banag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin tshul pangar du bzhag/ bsgyur nas spyi bor bzhag par bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang bcings la// mchod rten par
136a2(rgyud): ma'i tshul du ni// gung mo gnyis ni bcings gyur na/ sangs rgyas pad ma yin par bshad/ de la mthe bo rdo rje dang // 'dzub gnyis ral gri lcags kyur bya// pad ma'i rdo rje
136a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa de// gsang ba'i phyag rgya yin par bshad/ de las mje bo bsnol nas kyang // 'dzub mos 'dzub mo rab bzung la// rangs na rab dga' yin par bshad// legs
136a4(rgyud): so zhes pa'ang de bzhin te// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mtheb gnyis bsdams te bcug nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis rtse bkug rtse mo ni// dpral bzhag gung mo pad mar
136a5(rgyud): bya// de nyid las ni snying khar yang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ston pa dang // de nyid las ni rgyal mtshan bcings// lhag par rab tu brkyang bar bya// rdo rje bsdams dam byas
136a6(rgyud): la// 'dzub gnyis rtse mo pad mar dgug/ de bzhin pad ma'i ral gri ste// 'dzub mo pad mar byas pas sbyar// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe bo g.yon pa nang du
136a7(rgyud): bzhug/ dung ste mthe ngo bo bar bsgreng // sor mo kun brkyang pang mthe chung // de las thams cad dkug nas kyang // mthe chung pad ma lta bur bya// mthe bo g.yas dang /
136b1(rgyud): sbyor ba yi// 'dzub mos nor bu bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe chung pad ma lta bur bya// 'dzub mo skams pa pad ma'i spyan// rab ta gar byed bzlog
136b2(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la// mthe chung pad ma lta bur bya// dam du 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste// mthe bo gnyis ni go char bya// de las mtheb gnyis mchi bar bya/ mtheb
136b3(rgyud): gnyis nang du gzhug par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig mchog ni bla med de// rdo rje nang du bsdams nas kyang / 'dzub gnyis pad ma 'ang byas la// mthe
136b4(rgyud): bo phan tshun bsnol ba ni// gsangs pa sna tshogs dbang du bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe chung gung mo mnyam bsgreng la// 'theb ngos rdo rje sbyar ba ni/
136b5(rgyud): gtsug bud dbus na de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe bo pade ma 'dra byas la// kha nas byung ltar byas nas kyang // pang du ting nge 'dzin
136b6(rgyud): ltar bzhag/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos rnams ni// mnyam par ngam dung skams nas kyang / 'dzub gnyis rdo rje bskams pa'o// de bzhin
136b7(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa las// 'ju ba gnyis pad ma 'dra byas la// mthe bo gnyis kyang bsnol nas ni// gung mo gnyis ni rtse sprad dgug/ de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las/
137a1(rgyud): @#mtheb gnyis rdo rje rab sbyar la// 'dzub mo ral gri lcags kyur bya// mthe chung pad ma 'dra byas te// de bzhin du ni bsgyur nas kyang // 'dzub mo
137a2(rgyud): g.yon pa bsgreng ba la// 'dzub mo mthe bo rtsi sbyar bas// dam du bzungs ste dgugs ltar bya// de nyid mnyam byas 'dzub mo gnyis// bkug la mthe bos mnan pa ni/ bad pa
137a3(rgyud): dbyed pa bdag nyid ce'i// legs so zhes pa sbyin byed kyi// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// sor mo kun gyi ngos sbyar la// mthe bo gnyis kyis mnan nas ni// 'dzub mo mnyam pa
137a4(rgyud): sbyar ba'o// de nyid snying khar nyi ba bya// spyi bor pad ma rgyal mtshan bya// pab ste kha 'gram bzhag pa ni/ pad ma cher dgod dgod pa yi// rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la/ chos kyi rnga
137a5(rgyud): rje tshul byas te// mthe chung mthe bo rab bskams la// 'di ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig yin// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// 'dzub gur pad ma ral grir bya// de bzhin nang
137a6(rgyud): du 'khor lor bya// zlos pa sbyin pa de bzhin no// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// 'theb 'dzub gnyis te gnyis su bya// de nas snying khar sbyar ba ni// gsangs pa'i bsrungs
137a7(rgyud): ba yin par bshad// de bzhin rdo rje bsdams pa las// mthe chung pad ma 'dra byas la// 'jub gnyis shin tu bkug nas kyang // 'theb gnyis phyir bskyed mche ba can//
137b1(rgyud): de las khu tshur tshul gyis ni// mtheb gnyis ngos kyis btsir ba ni// pad ma gsang ba'i khu tshur che// dam tshig mchog du rab brtags so// pad ma la s+ya la sogs pa// de dag
137b2(rgyud): gzhan rnams kun gyi ni/ rdo rje nang du bsdams byas la// de 'dra bar ni bcings par bya// de nas pad ma gsang ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te// hA gra prA hA// sha sha dahA/
137b3(rgyud): ga d+ha kra daM// tsha raSh+Ta sa// las kyi phyag rgya mdor bsdu na// gsang ba'i khu tshur gnyis byas pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po
137b4(rgyud): chen po las// chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshes
137b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlab pa'i pad mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
137b6(rgyud): gsungs so// oM d+harma sa ma ti dz+nyA na ta thA ga ta huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gis rigs kyis chos 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsur
137b7(rgyud): so// oM badz+ra d+harma hU~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo rje rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// mo ra na d+ha bahU~M// de nas byang chub se
138a1(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma d+harma haM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
138a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM karma d+harma hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzig
138a3(rgyud): kyi dbang pos nyid kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// chos kyi ye
138a4(rgyud): shes zhes brjod do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// de dbus su bri ba ni// ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// de'i phyogs rnams
138a5(rgyud): thams cad du// sems dpa' che rnams tshe bzhin/ sna tshogs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bzhugs bri// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//
138a6(rgyud): dz+nyAn bud d+hA d+he// yoM dz+nyA na pa sha shA ra hUM// oM dz+ha ra bud b+h+ra ma kuta hu/ oM dz+nyA nad+hA rbe shor hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a mo b+he shwa ra huM/ oMdz+nyAn pad mabud d+ha huM// oM dz+nyA na pa mu rarA dzaH
138a7(rgyud): rats+tsha/ mau dz+nyAn padam mar na// oM d+hin pang me tu'i hU~M// mo rnye pangs d+hi kA ti hU~M// seM r+d+he pa ma su r+ya hU~M// ma~M dz+nyAn pang sa can cahU~M// ma~M g+han pa dam gas hU~M// oM dz+nyA na pad
138b1(rgyud): ma ta ra huM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma ku ma ra huM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma gra ra yan hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma b+ha sha huM// oM dz+nyA na pad ma nrid t+ya sha ra hUM// oM dz+nyA na pad ma rak+Sha hUM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma yak+ta hU~M/
138b2(rgyud): oM dz+nyA na pad ma mu dzI hUM// oM dz+nyA na pade ma la s+ye hUM// oM dz+nya ra bad ma maM le huM// oM dz+nyA na pa da ma gir te huM/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma ni ra t+ye hU~M/ oM dz+nyA na pad ma d+ha be hai/ AMdz+nyA na pu be hUM/
138b3(rgyud): oM pad madz+nyAn d+hi pi h+ye// oM pad+ma dz+nyA na gan d+hi hU~M// oM pad ma dz+nyA na a gu shaM hUM// oM pad madz+nyAn pa sha hU~M// oM pad badz+rA na s+photrahrI// oM pad ma dz+nyA na a bai sha hU~M// de nas chos kyi
138b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir// dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste// 'di skad du khyed kyi gzhan su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod sem
138b5(rgyud): can dmyal bar ltung nas sdug bsngal myong bar gyu ra ta re// de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug sgoms bzhugs la// snying khar pad mo bsgoms
138b6(rgyud): nas kyang // pade mo'i ting 'dzin thob na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar lding // 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// dpral bar pad mo bsgoms byas te// goms nas
138b7(rgyud): shin tu brtan par 'gyur// de ma thag du mkha' la 'gro// 'jig rten dbang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis// snrel pad mo bsgoms nas kyang // grub par gyur na myur du yang // nas
139a1(rgyud): de nyid @#na mkha' la ni de 'gro go/ 'jig rten dbang gting 'dzin gyis// gcig du pad mo bsgoms nas kyang / grub par gyur na myur du ni// ska nig
139a2(rgyud): gis ni steng du lding // de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pa da ma dz+nyA na hrid ya oM b+hi sha// oM pad ma dz+nyA na a b+hi she a b+hi sha/ oM pad ma dz+nyA naM bying pyod tam
139a3(rgyud): a bi sha// oM pad ma dz+nyA na uSh+Ti sha a bi sha/ nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du/ bde ma dbyings ni bsgoms nas kyang // cho ga 'di ni grub 'gyur na// ska cig
139a4(rgyud): rjegis ni mi snang 'gyur// na mkha' ma ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo dbyi bas ni bsgoms byas la// de'i steng du bdag 'dug par// bsgoms par gyur na mi snang
139a5(rgyud): 'gyur// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la// gang tshe mthong ba de tshe blangs// mi snang bar ni myur du 'gyur// na mkha'
139a6(rgyud): 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo'i dbyibs ni bsgoms byas la// mthong ba'i pad ma de zos na// de ma thag du mi snang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so//
139a7(rgyud): yo padam a ka sha/ oM pad pa raH/ oM pad ma dz+nyAn gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ oM pad ma ras yan// phyag rgya che bcings pad mo ni// kha dog dbyings rnams sna tshogs pa'i/
139b1(rgyud): dbyings de lag pas bzungs nas ni// gzugs rnams thams cad 'chang bar 'gyur// pad mo kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad po'i dbyibs bris la// de nyid
139b2(rgyud): bsgom pa byas na ni// gzugs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyibs su bsgoms na yang /
139b3(rgyud): sgra'i gzugs su de 'gyur ba// pad mo'i kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs pad po'i dbyibs bris la/ de nyid bsgom pa byas na ni// gzugs mang 'chang bar de 'gyur ro//
139b4(rgyud): nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// pad ma kha dog dbyibs rnams ni// sna tshogs dbyings su bsgoms na yang / sgra'i gzugs su de 'gyur ro// pad mo'i kha dog dbyibs
139b5(rgyud): rnams ni/ sna tshogs dbyibs su byas nas kyang // de la zhon nas mkha' 'gro zhing ci dga'i gzugs su nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pad ma
139b6(rgyud): d+ha ra di shA ru pa pra brtag a ka ya bi sha// oM bi shA pad ma pra brta ya ma ma// oM sa ma d+hi bi shA pa da ma a bi sha// oM bi shA pad ma mnod k+Shi ra pa a ka ra sha ngi shA ru pa ma a tI ti
139b7(rgyud): lAmam// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya che// ting nge 'dzin gyis legs bcings la// pad mo blangs la rab byin na// rtag pa ru ni dbang du 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dang/
140a1(rgyud): de nyid@#tshig gi// phyag rgya zhes bya legs bcings nas// des ni pad mo blangs nas kyang // byin par gyur na dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin skyes dge ba yi//
140a2(rgyud): phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// ye shes pad mo gang byin pa// de ni de'i myur dbang 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i dam tshig ldan// las kyi phyag rgya bcingaso nas ni// pad
140a3(rgyud): mo byin pa gang yin pa// de ma thag tu de dbang 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA dz+nyA na pad ma ho// oM sa ma ya pad ma ho// oM dz+nyA na pad ma ho// oM karma pad
140a4(rgyud): ma ho// de nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab po// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dam
140a5(rgyud): tshig mchog gi bsgrub byas la/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// pad mo'i pad ma bzhag par bya// chos kyi khu tshur brtan byas la// las kyi phyag rgya gnyis su bya// de bzhin gshegs
140a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig brtog pa'i rgyal po chen po'i las kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang
140a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las// chos kyi las kyis dam tshig 'byung bar byin gyis brlabs pa'i pad mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sgoms par zhug
140b1(rgyud): nas// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma gra haM// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs las 'byung ba rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM hUM di/
140b2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM rad na karma sa ma ye huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dab pa 'di
140b3(rgyud): gsungs so// oM pad ma karma hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sna rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi sha karme hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags
140b4(rgyud): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po// nyid kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa te// rdo rje dbyibs dang 'dra ba ni// /
140b5(rgyud): pad mo'i las ni bya ba ste// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bsre bu bre// sangs rgyas phyogs kun pad ma yi/ mtshan ma 'dzin par thams cad bri/
140b6(rgyud): de la de dag gi rig pa 'di rnams so// aM du ri ni hUM// oM bi sha karma sha ra hUM// oM ta tha ga te shAr+ya bi she ka karma bid de hAM/ oM karma sha ri dz+nyA na pu dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM a me
140b7(rgyud): karma shA ri huM// oM pa da ma karma bud d+he haM// oM pad ma karma badz+ri ni hi/ oM pad ma karmi ni ma ran pA dzu ke ra ma sa ma ye huM// oM pad ma karma tuSh+TaM hUM/ oM pad ma karmaM b+hi ku ti hUM tra/
141a1(rgyud): ded/ oM pad ma karma sur+yat+ta// oM pad ma ka rmad dze hUM// oM pad ma karma ha se ha// oM pad ma karma ta re huM// oM pad ma kar+Naku ma ri hUM// oM pad ma kaH
141a2(rgyud): nA ra ya ni hUM/ oM pad ma karma pre d+he huM// oM pad ma karma brid t+ye shu ri hUM/ oM pad ma rak+Sha karma sa ma pe haM/ oM ma hA pra tsan d+hag+h+ra Ta ni pad ma dang Sh+Ta karma ka ri hU~M// oM pad ma kaH
141a3(rgyud): mu Sh+Ti g+hA ta pa hUM// mo ra ti pu dzi haM dzaM dza// oM ra ti pu dze huM dza dza// oM a bi she// ka pu dze hAM ho// oM d+hi d+ha pu dze hUM de// oMnr-id t+ya pu dze hwA baM// oM du ba pu dzi hUM a/ oM puSh+Ta
141a4(rgyud): pu dze hUM ta// oM a lo ga pu dze hu~M d+haM// o g+han d+ha pu dze hUM baM/ o ha ya gri bi ha na ya hUM dza// oM a mo ka pa sha kr-i te bi da ya hUM phaT// oM pade ma shang ka la ban d+he hUM phaT/
141a5(rgyud): a pad ma g+han ta a be sha ya huM phaT// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste// 'di skad du
141a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu// khyod kyis tshul 'di su la yang ma smra shig/ sems can dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgos shig/ de nas ye shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas
141a7(rgyud): sdig pa bshags pa'i ye shes bslab par bya ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug phyag rgya cher// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms nas kyang // sdig rnams bshags
141b1(rgyud): nas myur bar ni// sdig pa kun las de dag 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang gi ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings te// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni/ mtshams
141b2(rgyud): med las ni byang bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam par bzhag bsgoms la// sdig pa thams cad bshags na ni// sdig pa kun kyang rab
141b3(rgyud): tu 'joms// mdor na gang yang rung ba yi// las kyi phyag rgya legs bcings la// las rnams thams cad bshags na ni// las rnams kun las rnam dag/ de la de
141b4(rgyud): rnams kyi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba pa pa sang sho da na ma hA pad ma// oM sarba a nan tar+ya sho d+ha na sa ma ya pad ma// oM sarba pA pa pra na shan d+harma pad ma// oM sarba karma a pa
141b5(rgyud): ra ni bi sho da ka karma pad ma// de nas sgrib pa thams cad yongs su zad par 'gyur ba'i ye shes bslab po// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya che// shin du mnyam bzhag bsgoms
141b6(rgyud): byas la// shud d+ha ya shud d+ha ya zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi dam tshig bcings nas ni//
141b7(rgyud): bud d+ha bud d+ha zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms na ni// d+hi d+hi d+hi d+hi zhes
142a1(rgyud): @#/ brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// lus kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
142a2(rgyud): hI hI hI hI zhes brjod na// las rnams kun las dag par 'gyur// de pa de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM pa pak+Sha ya pad ma// oM a ba ra nek+Sha ya pad ma/ oM ni nga ra nik+Sha
142a3(rgyud): ba ya pad ma// oMk+ShArmak+ShA pa ya pad ma// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i ye shes bsgrub po// 'jig rten dbang gi phyag rgya che// rab tu mnyam par bzhag
142a4(rgyud): bcings la// oM o o au zhes brjod na// mchod pa thams cad rab tu byed// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig mchod ni bcings nas kyang / d+ha b+ha byA
142a5(rgyud): byA zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur/ 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// chos kyi pad mo bsgoms nas kyang / he he he he zhes brjod
142a6(rgyud): no/ sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// pad mo'i las kyi phyag rgya ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag bcings la// d+he d+he d+he d+ha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas thams
142a7(rgyud): cad des mchod 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so// a ya~M kar pad ma// oM b+ha kar pad ma// ye he kar bdam// a d+hi ka ra pad ma/ de nas dngos gru/
142b1(rgyud): kyi ye shes bslab po// 'jig rten dbang po'i phyag rgya cher// mnyam par bzhag par bcings nas kyang // hri hri hri hI zhes brjod na// 'jig rten dbang po 'grub par 'gyur/
142b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig zhes bya bcings nas ni// shri shri shri shri zhes brjod na/ dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang po
142b3(rgyud): mnyam bzhag par// mnyam par bzhag par bsgoms nas kyang / d+hig d+hig d+hi ga d+hi ga zhes brjod na// pad ma khro bor 'grub par 'gyur// pad ma chen po dge ba yi//
142b4(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / si si si si zhes brjod na/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM hri sid d+ha/ oM shrI sid d+hu//
142b5(rgyud): e d+hig sid d+hu// oM si sid d+hu// de nas las kyi gsangs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di yin te// 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed
142b6(rgyud): cing / a ho su kha zhes brjod na/ sangs rgyas thams cad des mchod 'gyur// 'jig rten dbang pos snyoms zhags la// bud med kun dad byed cing / pri ya pri ya zhes brjod
142b7(rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dges so// 'jig rten dbang pos skom zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // a ho ra ti zhes brjod na/ de ni rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur//
143a1(rgyud): de nyid 'jig rten dbang por snyoms zhugs la// bud med kun dang rtse byed cing // su kha su kha zhes brjod na/ de'i bdeng mi nyams 'gyur// de la de
143a2(rgyud): dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM sarba bud d+ha pu dza pra bar ta na pad ma/ oM pri ti karma pad ma pad ma ho// oM ra ti pra bar rten pad ma// oM ma hA su kha pad ma driT+Ta ho// de nas la
143a3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bslab par bya'o// de nas pad mar thal sbyar te// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje'i dgos// las kyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// gnas rnams kun
143a4(rgyud): du bzhag par bya// de nas pad ma rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya ni// tra zhes bya bar brjod par bya// las kyi dam tshig gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya yang dag sbyar// de bzhin gshes
143a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas
143a6(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i chos kyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// phyag rgya'i snying po 'di gsung /
143a7(rgyud): so// oM badz+ra d+harma padam du// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra dz+dza/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po rang gi phyag rgya/
143b1(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na ku tre haM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje can gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma pad me d+he// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
143b2(rgyud): rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM sarba mu khe hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis dbang pos phyag rgya bzhi pa'i
143b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya bzhi mchog dkyil 'khor te// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba dang // dkyil 'khor chen por 'dra bar bya//
143b4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni bzhag par bya// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje pad mo la sogs bri// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir
143b5(rgyud): dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas// ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste// 'di skad du// 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod rtag tu sdug bsngal bar
143b6(rgyud): 'gyur pa dang // mi bde ba ma spangs pas dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung ta re zhes sgo shig/ de nas de'i ye shes bskyed par bya ste// lag pas pad ma bzung
143b7(rgyud): nas kyang // bsgrims te lags par bsnams par bya// dri des sangs rgyas rnams mchod na/ myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ mnyam par bzhog pas gtsug phud
144a1(rgyud): de nyid@#dbus/ sangs rgyas gzugs ni rab bzhag la/ 'gro zhing dbyings pas brtan na ni// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// pad ma'i pad ma gzug
144a2(rgyud): chen por/ ting nge 'dzin gyis byas na ni// ji bzhin tshul du 'dug nas su// yid kyis de ni bsad par bya// pad ma'i rgya bram nyid du ni// byas te lag pa g.yon pa yin/ bzung
144a3(rgyud): nas kyang ni dbab sogs la// bskor ba de ni rab tu byed/ de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM g+han d+ha pu tsag+ha sa d+ha ya hI// oM pad ma mgu ta ta thA ga ta ba shi ku ru sarba
144a4(rgyud): na lo ke shA ra bi she ka sa ma ya ho// oM pad ma pad ma ma ra ya sarba prad t+yar ri kan sa ma d+hi ga dz+nyA na d+hig/ oM bi shA pad ma sarba karma ka ro b+ha ba la li lu le li le hUM phaT// de nas
144a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// chags nas dgos pa thams cad ni// bsgrub par bya ste dam tshig 'di// bsgrub par dga' ba'i phyag rgya yang // rnal 'byor gyis ni myur du 'grub/
144a6(rgyud): de la 'di'i dam tshig gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM sarba ya pad ma ra ga sa ma ya a// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa thams cad bslab par
144a7(rgyud): bya'o// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// de nas par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
144b1(rgyud): chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM sarba dza gad bi na ya ma hA sU ta/ a gang
144b2(rgyud): cha shi g+ham/ bai shA ru pan dar sha ya// ma ma tsa sarba sid d+ha ya pra yang tsha hri// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos 'gro
144b3(rgyud): ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul
144b4(rgyud): du ni/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de'i nang du pad mo yang // de bzhin du ni bri bar bya/ der ni 'dab ma kun khyab pa'i// sna tshogs gzugs ni bri bar bya// de nas
144b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin du btsud nas// de bzhin du bsgo ste// 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes bslab po// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i/
144b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas kyang // phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni// sna tshogs 'chang dang 'dra bar 'gyur// de nas 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya
144b7(rgyud): ye shes bslab po// sna tshogs gzugs kyi ting 'dzin du// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang / dbang po gnyis ni sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor du ni de
145a1(rgyud): @'grub bo// de nas phyag rgya chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya bcings pa rnams bslab par bya'o// dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de bzhin
145a2(rgyud): du ra la sogs pa la yang bya'o// phyag rgya gzhan rnams kyang phyag rgya gcig pa'i tshul gyi de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
145a3(rgyud): gcig tu 'dus nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje
145a4(rgyud): rin chen khyod leg so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mdor
145a5(rgyud): bsdus pa'i// mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'dus pa las// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi de
145a6(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba// rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po/ rdzogs s+ho// / bam po bdun pa// / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa
145a7(rgyud): thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i rin po che rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
145b1(rgyud): mkha'i snying po la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab po// na mkha'i snying po sems can don// sems dpa' chen po gzi chen po// rin chen che ba rin chen
145b2(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// dbang bskur sbyin pa rkyen che// dag pa che zhing dge ba che// sangs rgyas rin chen rnams dag skra// rin chen rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal
145b3(rgyud): na mkha' na mkha' las byung ba// nam mkha' thams cad 'od che ba// nam na mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs kun gyi// re kun mchog ni khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen mdzod bu rin
145b4(rgyud): chen 'byung // sangs rgyas mdzod pu bde gshegs rab/ rin chen thams cad rab kun mchog/ rin chen dgos pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen rin mchog rin chen dag/
145b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun rin chen/ rin chen dam pa nam na mkha' che// mkha' mnyam khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rgyan yin pas na mdzes pa che// mdzes pa'i 'byung gnas
145b6(rgyud): rab mdzes mdzad// don kun dag cing dag pa'i don/ sbyin spyong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chos rin chen ni rnam dag mchog/ dge 'dun rin chen de bzhin gshegs/ dbang
145b7(rgyud): bskar chen po 'jig rten don// don sbyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin pa rab sbyin sbyin pa'i mchog/ gtong zhing gtong mchog sbyin mdzad pa/ sems can don kun de
146a1(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// ska cig tu ni sdig med thob// rin chen khyod la gsol ba ni// nor 'dus pa ni bshad par mdzod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur mchog
146a2(rgyud): rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' 'di thos nas// de bzhin gshegs
146a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rad na haM// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// de bzhin gsheg
146a4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi nor bu'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra ta thA ga ta a sha pa ri pu ra na ma ma hA rad na huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
146a5(rgyud): na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra hUM taM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM na
146a6(rgyud): Ni huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje can gyi rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM pad ma hri// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje
146a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa ra da na huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos// de bzhin gsheg
146b1(rgyud): nyid don/ don chen don khyod phyag 'tshal lo// bsam pa'i rgyal po gzi brjid che// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de bzhin gshegs pa sems
146b2(rgyud): dpa' che// sangs rgyas kun te khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen che/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od che ste// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal chen po// gzhad
146b3(rgyud): chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur mchog/ dbang chen khyab bdag chen po ste/ 'jig rten mgon rab 'jig rten mchog/ 'jig rten
146b4(rgyud): nyi ma khyod phyag 'tshal// rin chen phul te rab kyi mchog/ rin chen rgyan te rin chen mdzad// rin chen snang ba sdang ba che// rin chen grags pa khyod phyag 'tshal// rin
146b5(rgyud): chen phung po rin chen 'byung / nor bu rdo rje nor yon tan// rin chen 'byung ba skar rab 'thar// rin chen kun te khyod phyag 'tshal// che nyid shing ste rin chen dbang /
146b6(rgyud): re ba thams cad bskongs mdzad pa/ bsams pa thams cad legs par bsgos// rin chen po phung po khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od mchog khyab pa'i bdag nyid kun/ mchog
146b7(rgyud): rab sbyin zhing mchog che ba// phun sum thams cad 'byor pa po// rdo rje snying po bdag phyag 'tshal// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ni ba 'di// su yang rung bas 'chang byed na// sangs
147a1(rgyud): de'i 'dus#pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// de bzhin
147a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas// rdo rje nor bu rin po che lta bu'i 'od zer rnams byung nas// de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ste// sems
147a3(rgyud): can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur nas yang gcig tu gyur te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs su
147a4(rgyud): zhugs so// de nam mkha'i snying po'i thugs kha nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid kun nas 'od zer 'bar ba'i snying po// rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che sna
147a5(rgyud): tshogs kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sku// rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya'i phyag 'chan phyag na bsdams pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ska
147a6(rgyud): rnams su gyur te byung nas// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du// rin po che chen po'i char phab pa la sogs pa'i nor bskyed pa rnams kyis sems can rnams mgu bar
147a7(rgyud): byas nas/ slar yang byon te// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyogs thams cad du// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
147b1(rgyud): la gnas nas// ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e pa'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rin chen thams cad bsdus pa ni// rdo rje rin chen rigs nyid du// 'gro ba'i dod du
147b2(rgyud): 'di 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rig bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
147b3(rgyud): bar byed pa 'di brel te// don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings
147b4(rgyud): dang 'dra ba la// don kun grub pa zhes bshad pa// grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa ste/ srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa la// dar dang phreng ba lnga ldes
147b5(rgyud): brgyan dkyil 'khor chen po'i grwa rnams dang // sgo byed kyi ni nang rnams su// rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// phyi'i dkyil 'khor srad bu bre/ de'i nang du rdo rje yi// rin chen
147b6(rgyud): las byung gnas bya zhing // ka ba brgyad kyi tshul du ni/ rin chen sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i// dkyil 'khor lngas ni rgyan gyur par/ der ni srad bu bri bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya
147b7(rgyud): bskor ba ste// der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM bud d+ha ra da na huM// oM badz+ra pa Ni hUM/ oM badz+ra rad na a kur hUM/ oM ra na par
147b8(rgyud): oM rang na pad+ma hUM/
148a1(rgyud): ngan/ #ma bar sha huM// re ba kun grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyi brgal nas ni// rdo rje snying po der gnas shing // rin chen mchog ni sbyin par bri//
148a2(rgyud): de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin du// rin chen phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam
148a3(rgyud): so// oM sarba arba sid d+hi pra da haM// oM badz+ra ma Ni tsin d+ha e kar sha gadza b+ha ga ban/ sid d+hu sid d+hu hUM/ oM dran e ku sha a ka ra sha ya// sarba ar+Ya na a na ya shi gAM sarba ta ba
148a4(rgyud): ga ta sad t+ya mu nu s+phar hUM// oM maM ni ra ga ba shi ku ru sarba ad+ba na a na ya a kar sha garba hUM// oM ro den tuSh+NI hu// rin chen phreng ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas
148a5(rgyud): ni// rin chen phreng ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de'i dbus su legs par bri// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ nor bu'i mtshan ma
148a6(rgyud): thogs pa lI/ sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de dag gi sring po ni 'di rnams so// oM ra na driSh+Ti tra// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a bi she ka rang na ma le hUM// oM ma ni s+yA
148a7(rgyud): du// mo tsi d+ha ma ni d+ha dza sarba sha pa ri pu ra a kar shagad+ha hU~M/ oM rang na sa Ta Ta sags pas hU~M// rin chen bangasa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje shugs kyis zil nas ni// dza~M
148b1(rgyud): chen pad ma 'dzin khyab bdag/ de'i dbus gnas bri bar bya// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// lteg 'og go rims ji bzhin par// nor bu'i mtshan ma 'chang ba yi//
148b2(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rad na pad ma hu~M/ oM t+ya ga sa ma d+hi dz+nyA na gar+b+ha haM/ oM rad na ko sha gra hUM/ oM ma ni tsakra pra
148b3(rgyud): baR+Sha ya huM/ oM radan pa sha hUM// rin chen char 'bengs dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// rin chen tshar ni rab 'bebs pa'o// sems dpa' che rnam
148b4(rgyud): der ya bri// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// mdor ni lag na phyag rgya yang / rin chen mtshan mar ldan pa ya// sems dpa' che rnams cho ga bzhin// de la de dag gi snying
148b5(rgyud): po ni 'di rnams so// oM rad na priSh+Ti bar sha ya sarba ar+tha sam ba do b+ha ga b+han ma hA ma ni ha sta huM// e ma ni pU dza sa ma ya huM// e ma ni b+han d+ha ka ba na haM/ oM ma ni daM Sh+Ti ka ra la ma hA yak+Sha
148b6(rgyud): ha ra ha ra sarba na ar+tha b+hi sha pa ya hUM// oM ma ni rad na b+ha na d+ha sa ma ya haM/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni/ gra'i phyogs ni thams cad du// lcug 'og go rims ji bzhin
148b7(rgyud): par// rin chen la s+ye la sogs bri// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di dag go// ai rad na ra ti hUM/ oM ra da na me le haM/ oM rad na gi rti hA// a ra da na nI t+yai hAM/ phyi rol
149a1(rgyud): de nyid @#dkyil 'khor dam par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // phyi'i dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ bdug pa'i mchod pa la sogs bri/ de la
149a2(rgyud): de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM d+ha pa rad ni// oM puSh+pa ma ne// saM pu rad na a lo ke/ oM ma ni g+han d+he/ sgo rnams bzhi'i dbus su ni// sgo ba rnams ni bzhag par
149a3(rgyud): bya/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnamaso// oM ra da na a kar sha ya ar+ya ru na ma hA sad b+ha ga ban taM/ a ka sha ga tsam// tse da ya kar sha ya shi g+haM ho dza// oM sarba rad
149a4(rgyud): na pra be sha ya she sa ma ya pra be sha ya sa yan// ma ha ma ni ra dza ku lan ra da na pa sha haM/ oM ma ni b+han d+ha huM baM// oM ma ni rad na a be sha a/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen
149a5(rgyud): po 'dir nor bu rin po che'i slob dpon nyid ji bzhin du zhugs te// cho ga rgyas pa bdag nyid kyis byas la// de nas rin po ches byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus// nor
149a6(rgyud): bya'i slob ma dbang bskur te// rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la// snying po 'di brjod do// oM badz+ra ma ni rad na sa ma ya baM// de nas kha dog ji lta bu rnyed pa'i
149a7(rgyud): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te// de dang de 'dra bas mig g.yogs la// snying po 'di brjod du bcug ste/ bzhugs par bya'o// me hU~M ma nir dza ku lam/ de nas de lta/
149b1(rgyud): bur bcug nas/ 'di skad du 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod che rabs thams cad du dbul por gyur ta re// sdug bsngal las mi thar par gyur ta re/ sems
149b2(rgyud): can dmyal ba na yun ring du gnas par gyur ta re// zhes bsgo la// dam tshig gnyis su bya ste// theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa yang brjod par bya'o// de nas babs
149b3(rgyud): ba dang gter chen po gang na yod// ji ltar thob par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje'i tshig gis dri bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
149b4(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos thams cad smrar gsol cig ces spras ma thag du// gdong g.yogs pa dkrol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig kyang
149b5(rgyud): brtan te// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la thug gi bar du dkyil 'khor chen po bstan par bya'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas/ dgos pa thams
149b6(rgyud): cad bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bcings// gter bskos nas ni gang dag na/ gter
149b7(rgyud): yod pa de mthong bar 'gyur// dam dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings la// gang na gter rnams yod gyur pa// der ni phya ba rgyab cir na ni// de tshe bdag nyid 'byung bar 'gyur//
150a1(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// shin tu mnyam bzhag bsgoms na ni// gang na gter rnams yod gyur pa// yid kyis shes pa nyid du 'gyur/
150a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ gang du phyag rgya ba ngas gyur pa// de na gter yod shes pa bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnam so//
150a3(rgyud): oM ma hA ra da na a bi sha hUM// oM ma ni pi da ya dar sha ya/ oM ra da na sa ma d+hi dru hi// oM rad na a bi sha dar sha ya// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas ni/ gang du lus ni 'khor gyur pa/
150a4(rgyud): de ni rin chen gter gyur pa// dam tshig nyid kyis shes par bya// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gang du babs nas gnyis gyur pa/ de ni rin chen chen po yi/ gter
150a5(rgyud): yod par ni shes par bya// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gang la byas pa bdag nyid kyis/ rin chen mang po bdag nyid kyis/ gter ni gang na yod pa smra//
150a6(rgyud): las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // gang tshe lag gnyis phan tshun nas/ babs nas dam tshig bcings gyur pa/ de ni gter ni yod par bshad/ de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di/
150a7(rgyud): rnams so// oM ma ha ra da na ka ya dar sha ya ra da nam/ oM a ka sha garda ma ni rang na s+tha ta swa ta ta ya ta ni d+hi/ oM ma ni ra da na dz+nya na nam swa yam b+ha hi/ oM pu na sa ma ya ban d+ha dar/
150b1(rgyud): zhen/
150b2(rgyud): sha ya snga// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni/ de bzhin gang du dgos gyur pa/ de ni rin chen 'byung ba yi/ gter yod ye shes par bya// gang du dgos yod der
150b3(rgyud): yang ni/ dam tshig gi mchog bcings la// gang che nyid ni grol gyur pa/ de na gter ni yod par bshad// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcing nas ni// gang du nges par dogs gyur pa//
150b4(rgyud): de ni nges par gter yod par/ ye shes bskyed de shes par bya// gang na yang dang yang dgos pa// las kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// nger bcings de ni gnyis 'gyur na/ gter ni
150b5(rgyud): yod par shes par bya// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ni d+hi dz+nyA na a bi sha// oM rad na sa ma ya mun tsa ni d+hi ban dam/ au d+harma rad na b+hA hi ni d+ha nam// oM sarba
150b6(rgyud): karma ni s+pho ta ya d+ha ra sha ya ni d+hi ba na d+hod k+Shi pa// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms na ni// gter rnams kun ta btsal nas kyang / gang na gnas pa der babs pa/ de na yod par rma
150b7(rgyud): rnam par bshad// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // gter rnams kun tu btsal nas ni// gang na gnas par rtag gyur pa// de na gter ni yod pa ra pa shad/ ting
150b8(rgyud): 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// gter rnams kun kyang btsal nas kyang // gang na yod pa nges par shes// de na gter ni yod par bshad// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
151a1(rgyud): @gter rnams kun tu btsal nas kyang // gang na yod par las phyag rgya// bskor ba de 'i yod par bshad / de la de dag gi snying po ni rnams so// ma
151a2(rgyud): rang na pa rik+Sha a bi sha/ oM rang na sa ma ya dri ng+ga dar sha ya/ oM dran pa rik+Sha dz+nyA na a bi sha/ oM ma ni karma d+ha ma ya// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// dbang /
151a3(rgyud): po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // phyag rgya chen por bsgoms da ni// babs par gyur na gter rnyed do// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang / bud
151a4(rgyud): med kun dang rtse byed cing // gang du phyag rgya dam gyur pa// de na gter ni yod par bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// gter rnams kun tu tshol byed cing // ye shes phyag
151a5(rgyud): rgya bcings na ni// gter gyi ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// dbang po gnyis ni ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag bcings nas ni// gang du phyag rgya gnyis gyur pa// de na gter ni yod
151a6(rgyud): bar bshad/ de la de dag gi snying po ni rnams so// oM mad ma ni sman log sa bi sha/ oM sa ma yas na lo ga Di dz+nye ma b+hA ba/ oM ni d+hi d+hanA a be sha sa be shas na yo ga/ oM sarba
151a7(rgyud): ta san yog/ de nas nor bu'i rigs chen po'i phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes bslab po// de nas phyag rgya chen po ni 'di yin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ tsi sta/
151b1(rgyud): nga'i mo bzhin/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// don gyi mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po rnams kyi las ni 'di rnams yin no// sangs rgyas phyag rgya sangs rgyas
151b2(rgyud): nyid// rdo rje snying pos gnyis rab 'grab/ rin chen lcags kyus kun sman 'dren// nor bu dga' ngar rjes dgar byed// nor bu mgu bas dges par byed// nor bu lta bas nor
151b3(rgyud): 'phrog pa// nor bu phreng bas dbang po skar zhing // nor bu nyi mas gzi brjid mchog/ yid bzhin nor bu ci dgar byin// rin chen gzhad pas nor 'phrog 'gyur/ rin chen chos kyi dro
151b4(rgyud): kyang thob// gtong ba'i mchog gis dam pa rnyed// rin chen ral gris mdzod chen po// nor bu'i 'khor los bdag por 'gyur/ smra bas btsal ba'i dngos grub thob// rin
151b5(rgyud): chen char gyis nor chen po// nor bu'i mchod pas rab mchod nyid/ rin chen go chas brtan par byed// rin chen 'chi bas ro 'phrog go// khu tshur nor bus dngos grub thob// de nas
151b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i dam tshig gi// phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur thob// rdo rje nor bu che bcings na/
151b7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen 'grub par 'gyur/ rdo rje gnyis las nor bur byas// rdo rje 'dzin las nor thob po// de nyid mthe bo rdo rje yis// nor bu sbyin te snying khar bzhag/ 'dzub gnyis
152a1(rgyud): @#pad mo'i nor bu bcings/ 'jig rten dbang gis nor sbyin 'gyur/ rdo rje las nor sna tshogs kyi// nor bu chen po'i rgyal mtshan sbyin// rdo rje dbyings 'dzub
152a2(rgyud): nor mchog gi/ sangs rgyas rin chen nyid thob po// 'dzub mo snyams te rgyab bkul la/ mthe bo rdo rje bcings pa yis/ rdo rje snying po phyag rgya las// 'di ni rdo rje nor bur gsungs/
152a3(rgyud): 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / rdo rje nor bu chen po thob/ 'dzub gnyis rin chen 'drar bcings la// gung mo myu gu bsgreng ba ste/ 'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / rang gi dbang
152a4(rgyud): bskar thob par 'gyur/ de las gung mo srin lag dang // mthe chung rnams ni pad mor bya// 'di ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs// mtshan 'dzin pas ni nor sbyin 'gyur/ 'dzub mo/
152a5(rgyud): mthe bo mthe chung rnams// rdo rje rin chen tshul du bya// gung mo gnyis ni sen mor sbyar// srin lag myu gur 'dra bar bsgreng // rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ 'dzub gnyis nor bur
152a6(rgyud): byas nas kyang // mthe bo gnyis brkyang ngos snying kha// don kun brab pa sbyin par byed// rdo rje bsdams pa bsdams nas kyang / gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// nor bu mtshan gyi
152a7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di// nor bu rin chen rab sbyin no// de nyid las ni 'dzub po gnyis// lcags kyu'i rdul du byas pa ni// don kun 'gug pa'i phyag rgya ste// nor bu rin chen lcags kyur/
152b1(rgyud): bshad// de nyid las ni bsgyur nas kyang // 'dzub mos 'dzub mo bzungs nas ni// mda' 'phangs pa'i tshul byas la// rangs na 'gro ba dga' bar byed/ de nyid las
152b2(rgyud): ni 'dzub 'theb gnyis/ sbyar la legs so zhes bya'o// de las 'theb gnyis sbyar ba yis// 'dzub gnyis rtse mor dag pa de bzhin// mthe bo gnyis ni dbus sbyar la//
152b3(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis ngos dang sbyor ba ni// nor bu'i blta bar bshad pa ste// blta ba'i don rnams 'phrog byed pa'o// don kun grub pa'i phreng ba ni// rang gi dbang ni rab sbyin 'gyur
152b4(rgyud): de nyid snyid khar mthe bo gnyis// bsgreng ste ngos gyi sbyar ba ni// nor bu'i nyi ma snying khar bzhag/ gzi brjid chen po rab sbyin 'gyur// srin lag mnyams te bsgrengs nas
152b5(rgyud): ni/ phye ste spyi bor bzhag bya ba// rdo rje nor bu chen po'i gtso// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de nyid las ni 'gying byed cing / kha 'gram bkod par bskor ba ste//
152b6(rgyud): rin chen cher dgod zhes bya ba// gzhad pas don rnams thams cad thob// kun rtse nor bur pad mo ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi nor 'phrog pa// de las mtha' nas 'grol ba
152b7(rgyud): ni// sbyin pa chen po rab sbyin byed/ mthe bo gnyis ni nang du dgug/ 'dzub gnyis nor bur byas pa ni// nor bu ral gri yin te mthus// 'gro ba rnams kyi nor 'phrog pa'o//
153a1(rgyud): @rdo rje bsdams rtse 'khor lor bya// 'be gnyis nang du bcug nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis nor bu 'ang byas na// 'khor lo bsgyur ba thob par byed//
153a2(rgyud): de nyid thal mo'i tshul du byas/ kha nas 'dren par byas pa ni/ de bcings pa ni ngag yin te/ rang gi bka' ni nor 'phrog 'gyur/ rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// rin chen
153a3(rgyud): char ni rab 'bebs te// sor mo thams cad bsgrengs nas ni/ phyogs bzhi nas ni nor char 'bebs// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// gar byas gtsug phud dbus bzhag
153a4(rgyud): nas// kun la cho ga bzhin bcings na// rin chen kun gyis nges mchod 'gyur// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgyas ni// mgrin pa'i phyogs su mkhyud par bya// nor bu bcings
153a5(rgyud): pa zhes bya ste// bsrung ba yi ni cho gar grags// de nyid don kun bsgrub pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin tshul du khar bzhag pa// nor mche ba zhes bya ba ste/ 'jigs pas don kun 'phrog
153a6(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa dam byas la/ 'dzub bkug mthe bo gnyis kyis ni// legs par mnan te btsir ba ni// nor bu'i khu tshur dngos grub byin/ dam tshig rnams kyi
153a7(rgyud): mchod mchog rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshul du ni// ji bzhin nor bu ldan pa ste// 'dir ni dam tshig mchog tu brtag/ gung mo nor bu'i tshul bya bar// de dag nyid las
153b1(rgyud): rnam par brtag/ lcags kyu gcig sogs tshul du ni// las rnams thams cad bsgrub byed// de nas nor bu rin po che ri rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin no// tratra
153b2(rgyud): tri hI shI si ra ha d+hi di ki ba ri pa ya a/ rin chen phyag rgya gnyis byas la/ las kyi phyag rgya bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyis dam tshig rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
153b3(rgyud): bo las/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
153b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i bzungs kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi phyag
153b5(rgyud): rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ra den sta pe haM/ nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a
153b6(rgyud): b+hi Shin tsas ma ya hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra rang na a b+hi she ke hUM// de nas byang chub
153b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+harma a b+hi She ma// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna
154a1(rgyud): de ni@#tshogs kyi rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungaso// oM sarba a b+hi she ka pra dza se ma ye haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
154a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
