154a3(rgyud): dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen gsangs pa zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// de'i dbus su
154a4(rgyud): tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas phyag rgya bri bar bya// khri la gnas pa'i nor bu'i gtso// rdo rje dbyings kyi mdun du bri// nor bu'i sa phreng ba pad mo'i nor// nor bus bskor
154a5(rgyud): ba'i nor bu rnams// de la de dag gis snying po ni 'di rnamaso// e traM o ma ni sa ma ye hUM// oM ma Ni rad na ya b+hi sho ka ma le haM// oM ma Ni rad na pad me huM// e ma Ni ra da na b+hi/
154a6(rgyud): Sh+Ti sa ma ye hUM// thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas kyang // rdo rje rin chen dbus su ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po bri// de'i phyogs ni thams
154a7(rgyud): cad du// lteg 'og go rims ji bzhin par/ rang gi phyag rgya nor bur ldan/ rin chen slob dpon nyid kyis bri/ de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM sarba sarA sing/
154b1(rgyud): d+hi pra d+hi ba ha badz+ri rad na sa ma ye ma ni sarba uR+Shan me sad d+ha ya d+ha ra ni hu~M/ oM ma NI a kar sha ya hUM/ oM ma Ni rad na sa ma ya aM bu sha a kar sha ya ma ni ku la dz+nyA/ oM ma ni ra ga
154b2(rgyud): sa ma ye huM/ a ma ni sa d+he haM/ de nas dkyil 'khor gnyis par yang // rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// spyan gnyis dang ni ldan pa yi/ nor bu de'i dbus su bri// de'i phyog
154b3(rgyud): rnams thams dri/ ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin par// noru ba'i mtshan mar ldan pa yi// rang gi phyag rgya rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra
154b4(rgyud): ma ni rad na ne tra a na ya ba shi ku ru sarba ar+tha sa ma b+ha d+ha shi b+haM driSh+Ta aM ku she huM// oM badz+ra rad na ma le a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM// oM ma ni ra da na su r+ye dza la ya sarba ma ma ha te dzi ni haM/
154b5(rgyud): oM ma nI tsan Ta d+ha dza gri hUM// oM ma ni ha se ha sa huM// rdo rje shugs kyis brgol nas ni// nor bu'i pad mo bri bar bya// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// ltag 'og gau rims
154b6(rgyud): ji bzhin bya// de li de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma ni sa ma d+hi pa da ma ni haM// oM ma ni rang na t+ye ga sa ma ye hUM// oM ma ni sa ma ya ko shai hUM// oM ma ni sa ma ya
154b7(rgyud): tsan kre hUM/ oM ma b+ha sha gri hU~M// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa dam par ni// rdo rje shugs kyis brgal nas ni// rdo rje rin chen ldan pa yi// rin chen char 'bebs der gnas shing /
155a1(rgyud): @#las kyi phrug rgya ji bzhin pas// yongs su bskod bar bri bar bya/ nor bu'i mtshan pa ldan pa rnams// b+he 'ogag mas ji bzhin bya/ des
155a2(rgyud): de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnam so// oM rad na briSh+Ti sa da ya ma hA ma ni hUM// oM ma hA pu dza sa ma ye n+yo t+ya a// oM ma ni rang na sa ma yak+She/ oM badz+ra ma niSh+Ta ka ra le ha ra ha ra hUM/ oM
155a3(rgyud): ma ni sa ma ya muSh+Ti haM// de nas nor bu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// las rnams ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas// rang gi slob ma rnams bcud te// 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o//
155a4(rgyud): khyod kyis tshul 'di sul yang ma brjod cig/ khyod rab tu dbul ba dang // dus byas nas sems can dmyal bar ltung ta re zhes bsgo la// rang gi nor bu'i dam tshig gi ye shes
155a5(rgyud): bskyed par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bya// bdag nyid kyi ni dpral bar yang // bzhag na rgyal por nges par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bcings
155a6(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje chen mkha' la bri// bdug gi gnas su bzhag na ni// nges par rgyal po nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen mkha' la bri// ye shes
155a7(rgyud): rdo rje de banag na/ nyid kyis grub pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ mkha' la rdo rje rin chen bri// rang gi gnas su de bzhag na// nyid kyis byung ba'i
155b1(rgyud): rgyal por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// mahA badz+ra rad na a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma ma// sa ma ya rang na a b+hi Shiny+tsa ma// d+harma ra da na a b+hi Shiny+tsA ma// karma rad na a
155b2(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsA ma ma// phyag rgya chen po'i snying khar ni// rdo rje rin chen bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas mngon par dbang bskar ba// mchog tu rmad du byung ba thob// rab mnyam bzhag pa
155b3(rgyud): rdo rje yi// rin chen dpral bar bsgoms nas ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings gyur na// thams cad kyi ni rgyal por 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// lce la rdo rje rin chen
155b4(rgyud): bsgoms// chos kyis rgyal po nyid du ni// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rab mnyam bzhag pas rdo rje yi// rin chen gtsug gtor bsgoms nas kyang // las kyi
155b5(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas ni// las legs byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur// de la dgra gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rad na hI da ya ma b+hi Shiny+tsa ho/ oM badz+ra rad na a b+hi Shi ny+tsag/
155b6(rgyud): sra yong na mtho drwa bas/ yongo na su t+t+ya ga sa dz+hi nyam pab// byab rgyachen por bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms na rdo rjo na chen phreng // ram la chags sa thos ma 'i
155b7(rgyud): ma zan po 'byung ba 'ang ri sa na zeng // ngam lami gas pa sa nas kyang // sems dpa' rdo rje ba sgoms da de// dam cis rnams kyi dag por 'gyur
156a1(rgyud): de nyid @#rje rin chen bdag nyid kyis// ras la sogs pa bris nas kyang // bsam gtan phyag rgya bsgoms na ni/ nges par chos kyi bdag por 'gyur/
156a2(rgyud): ras la sogs la rdo rje yi// rin chen bris nas las rnams kyi// phyag rgya bsgoms par gyur na ni// bdag nyid las kyi bdag por 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di
156a3(rgyud): rnams so// badz+ra rad na bim b+ha a d+hi tiSh+ThA// badz+ra rad na b+hi ma b+ha// pra d+hi tiSh+ThA/ badz+ra ra da na bim d+ha a b+hi sha// badz+ra rad na bi ma ku ru// gser ram yang na dngul yang rung /
156a4(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen bcings gyur tam/ yang na rin chen gzhan yang rung // snying khar bsgoms nas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// gser ram rin chen gzhan las
156a5(rgyud): byas// rtag tu dpral bar bzhag na ni// nor che ba'i rgyal por 'gyur// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi// rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas kyang // rang gi khar yang btsug na
156a6(rgyud): ni// tshig la dbang bar de 'gyur ro// gser ram rin chen gzhan dag gi/ rdo rje rin chen bsgoms nas ni// gtsug gtor du ni yang bsgoms na// las rnams kun gyi bdag por
156a7(rgyud): 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM badz+ra rang na hrid ya a b+ha ran hUM// me badz+ra rang na a b+hi she ka ma hA ar+tha prad// oM badz+ra rang na btse pa te// oM badz+ra rang nam
156b1(rgyud): hA karma ba te// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i gsungs pa'i ye shes bslab po// phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni/ rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// nor bu bud med bu gar bcug/
156b2(rgyud): de ltar dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ dam tshig mchog gi nor bu ni// bud med dbu gar bcug nas kyang // dam tshig mchog bcings thams cad kyi// dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub
156b3(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje nor bu che bcings la// chos kyi phyag rgya bsgoms nor bu// de ni bud med bu gar bcug/ bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i nor bu bcings/
156b4(rgyud): bud med bu gar las phyag rgyu// bsgyings par gyur pa las kun gyi// dngos grub bla na med par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ma hA ma ni sid d+hi// oM ma
156b5(rgyud): hA sa ma ya a b+hi She ka si da d+hi// oM karma sid d+hi// oM karma sid d+hi// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// phyag rgya chen po bcings pa bshad de// rin chen rdo rje myu gur ba cing /
156b6(rgyud): gung mo srin lag mthe chung rnams// sor mo brkyang ba byas nas ni// spyi bor bzhag pa grub mchog sbyin// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // 'dzub gnyis mdud pa mtheb
156b7(rgyud): gnyis dang / srin lag rdo rje bsgyur nas ni/ mdzod sbur bzhag pa dbang bskur thob// rdo rje rin chen tshul byas la/ de nyid yongs su bsgyur nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis rtse
157a1(rgyud): gdong sprad pa// de ni dbang bskur thob byed pa'o// de nyid 'theb gnyid 'dzub gnyis ni// chos kyi rdo rje'i tshul du yang / bcings nas dpral
157a2(rgyud): bar bzhag pa ni// chos chen gyi ni dbang bskur na// las kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang / dbang bskar kun gyi phreng ba ste// bsgyur nas dpral ba nyid du yang // bzhag na dbang
157a3(rgyud): ni bskur bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje dbyings skyes dam tshig kyang / bcings nas rin chen gnas dam ni// dpral bar bzhag na dbang bskur
157a4(rgyud): 'gyur// mtheb gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo yang / nor bu 'dra bar bkug pa ni// rdo rje nor bu chen po thob// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas
157a5(rgyud): kyang / nor bu'i khu tshur bcings nas ni// gung mo gnyis kyang nor bur byas// nor ba phreng bas dbang bskur 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa byas na ni// gung mo nor bur 'drar byas la/ 'dzub
157a6(rgyud): mo srin lag gnyis pad mo// kha dbye 'dra bar byas pas 'grub/ gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bcing // sor mo thams cad bsgrengs pa rnams// nor bu nyid du bsgoms na ni// 'khor
157a7(rgyud): rnams mchog dang ldan par 'gyur// rdo rje rin ched rgyal bcings nas// phung mo ma pobo sbyar ba dang / srin lag ma the chung bskams pa rnams/ khar bzhag ste stong nor rab ste/
157b1(rgyud): de las 'dzub gnyis rdo rje bya// de gnyis de bzhin lcags kyur bya// 'dzub mos 'dzub mo drang ba dang // de gnyis dga' ba rab sbyin pa'o// gung mo gnyis ni nor bu rabacing //
157b2(rgyud): 'dzub gnyis ngos la bkug pa'o// srin lag ngos gnyis mdud pa la// mthe bo gnyis kyis bkab pa ste// de nyid rdo rje nyi mas bskor// dpung pa'i spyi bor brkyang bar bya/
157b3(rgyud): nor bu'i rgyal mtshar rtse mo brgyad// gzhad pa'i tshul tshul du byas pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa byas nas kyang // 'dzub mo srin lag gyen du bsgrengs// de dag pad mo 'dra
157b4(rgyud): bar bya// gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya// de las tha ma rab sbyin bya// rdo rje ral grir sbyar ba dang // rdo rje 'khor lo tshul du byas// de nyid khe nas dbyung bar bya// rdo rje
157b5(rgyud): rin chen myu gu bcing // sor mo thams cad brkyang ba dang / de dag spyi bor bzhag pa ni// rin chen char gyis rA 'bebs so// de nyid 'khor lo'i tshul du ni// snying khar/
157b6(rgyud): rin chen gnyis byas pa/ nor bu 'dzin rtse mche ba yin// dbus su mnyams pa khu tshur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// phyag rgya chen po de dag
157b7(rgyud): nyid// sim sbyar byas te bcings na ni// mdor na gsang ba'i gsang ba ste// dngos grub bzhir gyur byin par byed// de ltar rdo rje gsang ba bzhin/ dus rnams kun
158a1(rgyud): @tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// trai gr-i ha~M saM kye// kha d+haM haM br-i b+h+r-i kr-i bi ka ri stu paM// gsang ba gsang ba'i
158a2(rgyud): du rgyur mchog/ gnyis su byas nas las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyis dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// rin po che gsang ba'i phyag rgya
158a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
158a4(rgyud): kyi dbang bskar ba'i ye shes kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rang gi rigs pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// /
158a5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta / a bi dzi ka dz+nyA nad ta ma huM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungaso// oM badz+ra d+ha na a b+hi She kra/
158a6(rgyud): sa ma ye hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma ni rang na a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems
158a7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma a b+hi Shi ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sna tshogs kyis rab
158b1(rgyud): gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ya b+hi she ka dz+nyA na hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi ye shes kyi
158b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad do// dkyil
158b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bri// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// snying kha'i mtshan mar bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye
158b4(rgyud): shes kyi snying po 'di rnams so// oM sarba aR+Sha sid d+hi dz+nyA na hUM// oM ma ni dz+nyA na hUM// oM ma ni dz+nyA na aM ku sha// oM ma ni dz+nyA na ra ga// oM ma ni dz+nyA na taSh+Ti// oM dz+nyA na driSh+Ti ma ni hUM/
158b5(rgyud): oM ma ni dz+nyA na a b+hi Shi ka// oM pa ni dz+nyA na sur+ya// oM ma ni dz+nya na d+ha tsa// oM ma ni dz+nye na ad ta ha sa// e ma ni dz+nyA na pad ma haM// oM dz+nyA na ma ni t+ya ga/ oM dz+nyA na ma ni kro sha/ au dz+dza
158b6(rgyud): na ma ni tsakra// oM dz+nyA na ma ni b+ha sha// oM dz+nyA na ma ni rang ma bar sha// oM ma ni dz+nya na nId t+ya pu tsa sa ma ye hUM// oM ma ni dz+nya nai rak+Sha/ oM ma ni dz+nyA na yak+Sha// oM ma ni dz+nyA na muSh+Ti/
158b7(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga rgyas pa ji lta ba bzhin byas nas// slob ma la 'di skad du bsgo bar bya// khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod dngos
159a1(rgyud): decing \u0f7f/ grub mthob par myur du shi bar gyur ta re// zhes bskul// nor bu'i rigs kyis chos kyi ye shes bskyed par bya'o// ting 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/
159a2(rgyud): rje snying po bris nas ni/ bsgoms nas don ni blang bya zhing // byin cig byin cig ces yang brjod/ ting nge 'dzin gyis ras sogs la/ rdo rje snying po bris nas ni// bsgoms
159a3(rgyud): nas rin chen don byin ces// tshig tu smra zhing gsol ba gad ba/ rdo rje snying pos ras la sogs// bris te mnyam par bzhag nas kyang // rnam par bsgoms te ye shes
159a4(rgyud): la// dam chos sbyin zhes gsol ba gdab/ rdo rje snying po ras sogs la// mnyam par bzhag par bris nas kyang // bsgoms nas dam pa'i las byin zhes// las la
159a5(rgyud): gsol ba gdab par bya// de nas de dag gi bsgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di rnams so// e de hi sarba ar+tha na b+ha ga ban badz+ra gar+b+ha// e de hi sarba rad na b+ha ga ban badz+ra gar+b+ha// oM de
159a6(rgyud): hi sarba sad dang man b+ha ga ban badz+ra gar+b+ha sa twa// ya~M de hi sa karma thA ga ban badz+ra gar+b+ha// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po legs sems
159a7(rgyud): dpa'// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgrims nas ni// phun sum tshogs don gsol bar bya// nam namakha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po'i sems
159b1(rgyud): dpa'i mchog mgam par bzhags bsgoms nas kyang // nor bsams pa ni gsol bar bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du/ nam mkha'i snying po legs
159b2(rgyud): sems dpa'// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // phun sum tshogs ni gsob pa gdab// nam mkha'i phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po
159b3(rgyud): legs sems pa// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // la sogs pa ni gsol ba gdab// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM d+hA na gar+b+he de hi
159b4(rgyud): sarba ar+than// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+he de hi sarba rang ra// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+he de hi sarba dar man// oM dz+nyA na gar+b+he de hi sarba karma na// rdo rje snying po snying khar bris/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag
159b5(rgyud): bsgoms byas la// gang gi chen snying 'phar ba// de tshe grub pas nor ster ro// rdo rje snying po'i dpral ba ni// bris te rnam par bsgoms nas kyang // gang che mgo bo/
159b6(rgyud): 'dar gyur pa// des ni mngon par dbang bskur thob// rdo rje snying po khar bcug la// de nyid du ni bsgoms nas kyang // gang tshed ni bya gyur pa// de tshe des ni ngag
159b7(rgyud): 'grub bo// rdo rje snying po bdag spyi bor// rab tu bzhag te bsgoms nas kyang // gang che de cing 'bar gyur pa// de tshe 'phang du ltung bar 'gyur// de la
160a1(rgyud): / dbage slong pon 'dri rnams so// mdzod la sar+b+ba de ni d+ha man/ oM dran sa ni Shoka bar+b+ha sa d+hi Shi)/ yo ga pad+ma da d+hA//
160a2(rgyud): na gaN+Do Sh+Te sha A ka she ga da rno// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni/ bdag la grub gsol zhes gsol la// e li rad no zhes
160a3(rgyud): brjod 'grub// nam mkha'a'i snying po'i dam tshig ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / dbang bskur ba ni gsol gdab la// mi li rang na zhes brjod thob/
160a4(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // chos bdag gsol zhes gsol gdab la/ tsi li rang na zhes brjod thob// nam mkha'i snying
160a5(rgyud): po'i las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen thams cad gsol btab la/ ki li rad na zhes brjod thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni
160a6(rgyud): 'di rnams so// oM I li// e mi li// oM tsi li// oM ki li// de nas nor bu'i ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// nam mkha'i phyogs sam
160a7(rgyud): phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying po bsgom na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sprad na/ dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ bzhi pa rim bris bzhin// rdo rje snying po
160b1(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar na// dbang bskur ba ya thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la/
160b2(rgyud): sdug pa de dang gang rtses pa 'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed// nam mkha' kun gyis rdul dbyibs kyi// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam
160b3(rgyud): sbyar na// thams cad grub par nges par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM ka sha gu h+ya dz+nyA na sa d+ho ya hUM// tsing ta gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa haM// pri ya
160b4(rgyud): nu s+thi ti dz+nyA na gu h+yaM sarbaM lo kai ra ma ya hUM// sarba gu h+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi ma me pra yang tsa haM// de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin du btsongs par bya'o// dngos grub
160b5(rgyud): kyang de dang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje nor ba ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhag par bya'o//
160b6(rgyud): de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin te// sa ra ras/ ra te ke ha// d+ha ma ti hi b+hA// ka ra ya ma// mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ji bzhin par bzhag par bya'o//
160b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
161a1(rgyud): de nyid@#/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis
161a2(rgyud): brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhugs nas// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta karma a d+hi She ka hUM// de nas
161a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hu ka ra a b+hi She ke hUM// de nas byang chub sems
161a4(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba A ka sha sa ma ta a b+hi She ke hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161a5(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sad d+harma a b+hi She ke ra da ni// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rigs pa
161a6(rgyud): dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM bi sha a b+hi she ke/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos/ rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig 'di
161a7(rgyud): gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
161b1(rgyud): tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad sred bu bre// de'i dbus su tshul bzhin du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bzhag par bya// sems dpa' chen po'i tshul gyis ni/
161b2(rgyud): rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma ni rangan pu dza glu// oM sarba d+ha sid d+hi badz+ra rad na a b+hi She ke hUM// oM badz+ra ma ni da re sa ma ye
161b3(rgyud): hUM// oM ma Ni ra da na a kar sha karma sa ma ye hUM// o ma Ni rad na ra ga ra ti karma pu dze pra bar+d+ha/ oM ma Ni rangad nas d+ha ka ra pu sa ma ye/ oM ma nI ma ni red na dri ShA a
161b4(rgyud): rke she// oM ma ni rang na ma la pU dze// e maM ni rad na sur+ya a lo ka pu dze// oM ma Ni rang na d+ha dza pa ta ka// oM ma ni rad ni a Ta Ta ha sa pu dze// oM pad ma me ni sa ma d+hi sa
161b5(rgyud): ma ye haM// oM sarba t+yA a na smi ti sa ma d+hi karma ka ri haM// oM ma ni rad ni tig Sh+Ta sa ma ye tshin d+ha tshin d+ha haM// oM ma ni rad na tsakra sa ma ye hUM// o ma ni rad na ba she ba/
161b6(rgyud): dAb dahU~M// oM ma ni red ni wer sha ni hUM// oM maM nai rad na karma ni hUM// oM mi ni rad na ka bcu rak+Sha he// oM ma ni rad na dang Sh+Te khad kha de hUM// oM ma ni rad na karma ma?
161b7(rgyud): ShIhUM// oM ma ni rang na la s+ye pra dza ya ho// oM ma ni rad na ma le e bi she ka pU dza ya// oM ma ni ring ni t+ye pu dza ya// oM ma ni rad na puSh+paM p+'u dza ma// oM ma ni radwa
162a1(rgyud): de nyid#d+hU be bu dza ya/ yo ma ni rang nag na d+he pu dza ya// oM ma ni ra na aM ku sha sa kar sha yadz+dza// oM ma ni rad na pu she hUM/ oM ma ni rad na
162a2(rgyud): s+tha te baM/ oM ma ni rang na a pe she a// de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas nas bcug ste// 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyod
162a3(rgyud): kyis su la yang ba skra shig/ khyod las kyis sgring pas non nas shi bar gyur ta ri// zhes bsgol// nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje snying po
162a4(rgyud): phyag rgya che// bsgoms nas kyang ni rab mnyam bzhag/ mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyis dam tshig mchog/ phyag
162a5(rgyud): rgya gang yang rung bcings la// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// dbang bskur dam pa des thob po// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin du// rang mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na
162a6(rgyud): ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na// 'gro ba'i dam pa 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis/ las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sangs rgyas
162a7(rgyud): thams cad mchod gyur na// rga cig du ni don kun thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// oM rad na pu dza a b+hi Shiny+tsa// oM rang na pu dza a d+harman sha ya pa ti//
162b1(rgyud): oM rad na pu dza karma sarba ar+than byed de// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas/ sangs
162b2(rgyud): rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// 'jigs rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i
162b3(rgyud): ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni/ gnas rnams kun te bzhag par bya// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni// lhag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya//
162b4(rgyud): de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// da dz+nyA ga d+ha// sna dza tu sarma k+ShAM tu sharma k+Sha k+Sha d+hi// rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub po//
162b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// /
162b6(rgyud): / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhags nas// rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
162b7(rgyud): gsungs so// oM badz+ra ra dan traM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma le hUM// de nas
163a1(rgyud): de nyid @#/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM ma ni rang ni// de nas byang chub sems
163a2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma rad de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis
163a3(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM bi shwa driSh+Ti// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor
163a4(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bye ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor yongs su brtag par bya//
163a5(rgyud): de ji lta ba bzhin du bcug ste bslab par bya'o// khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig/ ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes bskyed par bya ste// rdo rje rin chen ting nge
163a6(rgyud): 'dzin gyis// rdo rje rin chen bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag na ni// dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas de'i snying po ni 'di yin
163a7(rgyud): no// oM badz+ra rang na sarba a d+hi She ka/ sarba sid d+ha yo me pra yang tshar la ra la hu tra// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya ngasrab par bye te// khyod 'am yang na sdug pa 'am/
163b1(rgyud): bud med dpa ni skyes pa'ang rung / dpral ba gnyis ni sbyar ba dang // sprad pas gnyis ka'ang 'grub par 'gyur// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di yin no// oM badz+ra rang nas
163b2(rgyud): khi bi d+he d+ha rad to// pra yang tsa shi b+ha// a b+hi Shin na haM// ha ha ha ha tra// de nas phyag rgya bzhi pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcings pa dang // rnam pa bzhi de bzhin du bslab par
163b3(rgyud): bya'o// dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i
163b4(rgyud): snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra ma ni d+ha ra sarba a ar+tha sid d+hi me pra yad cha ho b+ha ga ban badza rad na hUM// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//
163b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa te// dngos grub kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o//
163b6(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod rnams la// tshogs bral ma gyur bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la ni phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya
163b7(rgyud): bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la yang sems dpa' dang // phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa
164a1(rgyud): de nyid @#thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la legs so zhes bya ba 'di bstan to//
164a2(rgyud): legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ de bzhin gsheg
164a3(rgyud): bkun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'dus pa las// de bzhin
164a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// bam po brgyad pa'o//
164a5(rgyud): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa
164a6(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la re shig dang por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya che/ bcings nas mkhas dbyings
164a7(rgyud): thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlangs la// rang gi snying du bcug da ni// ji ste 'dod na tshe 'di la// zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas nyid
164b1(rgyud): thob des 'di bsgrub/ ji ste mi 'dod gong gra ba bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// de nyid chen po brjod bya ste// tshig rer thams cad bdag yin par// sems dpa'i
164b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor bdag gis bsgom// ji ste 'dod na bdag nyid de// de bya gzi can dge ba yi// gong 'phang tshe 'di nyid la thob// mi 'dod dngos grang gong pa bzhin// de nas dam
164b3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grang ba// de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can thob// mi 'dod dngos
164b4(rgyud): grub gong ma bzhin// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// dag ces brjod na nges par yang / sangs rgyas
164b5(rgyud): dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya yi// dngos grub kun gyi rgyud bshad de// thams cad kyi ni kun dag par// las rnams
164b6(rgyud): khams cad sbyangs nas ni/ sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grab rnams so// de nas
164b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// dngos grub kun sbyor sangs rgyas kyi// bka' ni sems can kun don du// phyag rgya chen po bsgrub/
165a1(rgyud): da#/ na ni// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyangam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// phyag rgya chen po'i rgyal du ni/
165a2(rgyud): ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub par// de bzhin bdag ces bsgoms nas ni/ sgra cig tu ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi bla gargya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung bshad pa'o// yig med
165a3(rgyud): pa'i chos rnams la// rab tu spros pa yod min te// chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub
165a4(rgyud): kyi rgyud bshad do// dge ba yang na mi dge ba/ gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// rgyal ba rnams la phul gyur na// ska cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur/ de nas byang chub
165a5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad ma'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad
165a6(rgyud): de// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ mu stegs can gyis smang gyur la// de la chags pa'i chos 'di ni// theg pa che la grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya
165a7(rgyud): dam pa'i dngos grub 'di yin te// ting 'dzin brtan pa'i tshul gyis ni// byams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang / cho ga bzhin ldan khyab byas na// cig gis ni ga
165b1(rgyud): can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// 'dod chags ngo bo pa nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur pa'i tshul du ni// 'dod chags pha rol phyin
165b2(rgyud): rnyed de// ska cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// bdag gis blta dang reg pa dang / nyan pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung //
165b3(rgyud): sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi 'thar byed 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ nor bu'i rig kyi dam pa'i
165b4(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la phyag chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po ji bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag 'gyur zhes//
165b5(rgyud): bsgoms par byas la rnams bsgoms na// ska cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar ni// sems
165b6(rgyud): can kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs pa byed gyur cing // ska cig gis ni gzi can thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// bdag nyid kyang ni
165b7(rgyud): spangs nas su ni// nor sbyin rab tu dga' byed cing // chos byang phyag rgya smra na ni// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di bsha do// /
166a1(rgyud): de nyid/ dbul po rnams la phan phyir// nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan na/ gzi can 'gyur ro tsi te yang // mi 'dod 'bras bu gong ma bzhin// rigs
166a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi dngos grub dam pa thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sem
166a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig
166a4(rgyud): gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// gang gi 'dod la sgoms zhags pa// de la 'dod pas sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas phyag rgya chen po yi// ye shes dam tshig yin par
166a5(rgyud): bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad do// 'dod pa rnams la phyogs bral min/ dam tshig shin tu tshul chen 'di
166a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'dri yin no// sems can don du khro min
166a7(rgyud): yang // khro bo chen po rab tu ston// rdo rje rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de la pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/
166b1(rgyud): rang bzhin dag par shes nas kyang // de dgos gang dang gang byed pa// 'di ni pad ma'i rigs chen gyis/ dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig
166b2(rgyud): gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// nyung ngam yang dmang yang rung // ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pas nyi ma ma stongs pa// bya ba 'di ni dang tshig yin// rigs thab
166b3(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos
166b4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas chos zhes grags so zhes/
166b5(rgyud): brjod nas chos nyid yi ge ni// sangs rgyas chos ni phyag rgya che// ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin
166b6(rgyud): no// 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i chos mchog 'di'o// de la rdo
166b7(rgyud): rje'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sangs rgyas bka' ni sbyang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya ba'i phyir// de ltar khros par 'gyur kyang // ma rungs bdud rtsa
167a1(rgyud): / dngos grub thob// de la pad mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// pad mo'i chu yis mi chags pa// de bzhin ka 'dod pas
167a2(rgyud): pi chags zhes// smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sbyin dang mnyam pa'i cho
167a3(rgyud): med de// bsgrub pa byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos/ mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
167a4(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i la
167a5(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su// ji bzhin par ni btul na ni// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog
167a6(rgyud): 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub ni 'di yin no// dus bzhi yin ni tshul dag du// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag du ldan pa
167a7(rgyud): rnam bzhir yang / byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa
167b1(rgyud): gang dang gang de byed// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyi 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// 'jigs pas
167b2(rgyud): gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub rab sbyin pa'o// de nas nor ba'i rigs kyi las
167b3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni yin no// sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// lus can rnams la byin pa dang // re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'idalas ni don kun grub byed
167b4(rgyud): bya'o// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
167b5(rgyud): cad kyi rigs kyi chos nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no// rdo rje seMs
167b6(rgyud): dpa'i ting 'dzin ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgongs// 'di ni sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan las sangs rgyas 'gyur ba med// de la 'di ni de bzhin
167b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te// phyag rgya chen por bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin
168a1(rgyud): de#gshegs pa rigs kyi// chos nyid dngos grub dam pa thob// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
168a2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // las rnams thams cad bsgrubs na ni// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad me'i
168a3(rgyud): rigs kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya brjod byed cing // rdo rje chos kyi chos rnams ni// chos nyid du ni 'dis
168a4(rgyud): bsgrub po// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// las kyi rdo rje snying khar bzhag/ chos nyid 'di dag
168a5(rgyud): bsgo mos na ni/ las kyi chos nyid thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid mkhyen pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
168a6(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
168a7(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul gyis ni// ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// de ltar 'jig rten nges shes te/ dag
168b1(rgyud): la dag dang dkar 'od gsal// dmar lo chags dang rab dmar khro// shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa/ de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur/ de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
168b2(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'bar ba'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// de ltar 'gro ba'i yid shiso// de la
168b3(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// na mkha' 'am ni phyogs bzhin du// khros par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong gyur pa// de lta
168b4(rgyud): bur ni ye shes so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am// yi ge'i phreng ba mthong gyur na// mdor na kha dog
168b5(rgyud): ci 'dra bar/ shes pa de 'drar des sems shes// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang // ji lta bur ni
168b6(rgyud): snang gyur cing // mthong bar gyur pa de 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de nyid la ni snyoms zhugs nas// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byed pa dang ni
168b7(rgyud): 'chag pa'ang rung // ji ltar mthong ba de ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs te bsams nas ni/ sems can gang dang gang yin pa// de dang de ni de bzhin du// sems
169a1(rgyud): can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad mkhyen pa'i cho ga rgyas rgyad do// de nas
169a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
169a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms ni// ye shes kyi ni tshul de yis// sangs rgyas
169a4(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub ye shes kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' 'ang ni phyogs gzhan du// ser skya'i 'od kyis dkyil 'kho/
169a5(rgyud): mthong // sems dpa' nyid kyi phyag rgya nyid// mngon sum nyid du mthong gyur na'o// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// de ltar bu'i dbyibs gyur pa'i// dbus
169a6(rgyud): su sngos bsangs snang na ni// rdo rje rigs mchog dngos grub ni// ji ste 'dod na myur du thob// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nyid la ni mkha'
169a7(rgyud): 'dra ba'i// pad ma sngon po lta bu mthong // pad mo chen po'i rigs kyi rig pa yi// dngos grub du ni legs par 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// /
169b1(rgyud): nam mkha' 'ab ni phyogs gzhan na// de nyid mkha' bzhin dri med las// 'od zer dkyil 'khor 'phro bar ni// mthong na dngos grub myur du thob// rdo rje sems sogs sems
169b2(rgyud): dpa' rnams// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas par// dngos grub dus su rang bzhin du// bdag nyid kyi kyang mdun mthong na'o// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub
169b3(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos
169b4(rgyud): grub kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs paM rnams kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems
169b5(rgyud): dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// lus kun de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgoms la// de bzhin lus las 'thung mthong na'o// de la
169b6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni//
169b7(rgyud): bsgrubs pas chog 'di yis ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni 'phrul gyi spyan gyi ye she bshad do// phyag rgya chen por ma'am bzhag te// mig gi rnam shes
170a1(rgyud): bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung bdes bsams na/ shin tu ring ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso//
170a2(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por mnyam bzhag ste// rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang // shin tu ring ba gnas pa thob// zhes bcom ldan 'ad
170a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// phyag rgya chen por mnyam bzhag ste// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // sems can gang la de rtags na// de'i sems ni des shes
170a4(rgyud): 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por mnyam bzhag ste// bdag gram yang na gzhan yang rung // yid kyis ltas na gar skyes pa// gzugs ni de yis shes 'gyur zhes// bcom
170a5(rgyud): ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phral gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // rdzardzu 'phral gang dang gang 'dod
170a6(rgyud): ba/ des ni gang na'ang rung bar ni// ting nge 'dzin gyis mthong bar 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
170a7(rgyud): kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub pa pos/ mngon
170b1(rgyud): par shes pa lnga thob po// khros nas dgos pa thams cad ni// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun gyi skad cig 'gyur/
170b2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya mchog
170b3(rgyud): ra ba mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga thob po// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin du// cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chag
170b4(rgyud): 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
170b5(rgyud): mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis na bsgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa
170b6(rgyud): lnga thob po// ltag 'og go rims de bzhin du// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas na// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// zhes
170b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyung ngo do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
171a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dben pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la
171a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dben pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi// tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing // bden pa chen po bsrangs na ni//
171a3(rgyud): myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob po// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gsheg
171a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i rigs 'byung ba'i dam tshig la ni mna' bor la// rdo rje'i bden pa gsungs na ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo
171a5(rgyud): rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shin tu 'di las 'da' bka' bar// rdo rje 'dzi
171a6(rgyud): gyis mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa 'di ni bsrungs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub
171a7(rgyud): kyi rgyud do// ji sde dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bang mochen po 'am rigs mchog gi// dam pa'i chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i dam tshig bsrungs par bya/ zhes
171b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di las shin tu 'da' bka' bar// sangs rgyas mchod la
171b2(rgyud): mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i mchog 'di bsrungs na ni// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i
171b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi
171b4(rgyud): rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// sa ma ya snyom zhes brjod na// de'i 'og du ma bsgrubs pa//
171b5(rgyud): phyag rgya kun dang rigs rnams la'ang // nyid kyis bcings nas brtan par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'odi ni de bzhin
171b6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sA ra ta stam zhes brjod na// de nyid bskal bas bdag nyid che'i// ma bsgrub par yang phyag rgya kun// nyid kyis
171b7(rgyud): bcings nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub
172a1(rgyud): de nyid#kyi rgyud do// du zhes bya ba gcig cam gyis// mdor daphyag rgya thams cad ni// bdagags yang na gzhan yang rung// nyid bcings 'ching du bcug
172a2(rgyud): kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dpe tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sarba shud d+ha zhes brjod na// bdag gam yang na gzhan gyis kyang // bud med chags
172a3(rgyud): la sogs ldan la// thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// oM zhes bya ba mdor bsdu na// phyag rgyabam
172a4(rgyud): cad 'grub 'gyur te// 'jig rten gyi ni mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad dam tshig gi de nyid kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i tshig rgyas pa'i
172a5(rgyud): rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin
172a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas phyag rgyabacings na ni// sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang // bsgrubs
172a7(rgyud): na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// bcings na de'i mdun du yang / rdo rjes
172b1(rgyud): dpa' bsgoms nas ni// shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni
172b2(rgyud): mchog bcings la// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgobs na ni// nyi rims du ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i
172b3(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten mgon po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
172b4(rgyud): do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni/ khi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub
172b5(rgyud): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub sgrub pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs//
172b6(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdun du yang // sad
172b7(rgyud): rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// de nas de ma thag du 'grub// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i
173a1(rgyud): don 'dus#dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa bdag ces bsgoms nas kyang / phyag rgya thams cad bslabs
173a2(rgyud): na ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog bsgrub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// bdag
173a3(rgyud): nyid kyi ni rdo rje'i dbyings// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgom byed cing // phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// de ma thag du 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
173a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad mo'i dbyibs su bsgoms
173a5(rgyud): na ni// thams cad shes pa'i ngo bo yi// pad mo'i rigs chen 'grub pa bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor
173a6(rgyud): bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms na ni// nor bu chen po'i rigs bshad pa'i// mchod
173a7(rgyud): pa kun gyi rang bzhin 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byed
173b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
173b2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dang phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag nas bcings nas kyang // snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag
173b3(rgyud): na sangs rgyas byin brlob po// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
173b4(rgyud): yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems ma'i rdo rje brtan byas la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin pa dang // spyi bor bzhag nas byin gyis brlob// ces bcom ldan
173b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas
173b6(rgyud): kyang // snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// nga zhag na nyid du byin gyis brlob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rtse mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi byin gyis
173b7(rgyud): brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje'i pad mo rab byas la// snying kha mdzod sgyu mgrin spyi bor// rab tu byin gyis brlabs
174a1(rgyud): ded 'du#/ phyir brtag/ ces bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos
174a2(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor bur che bcings la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlabs phyir bzhag par bya// zhes bcom ldan
174a3(rgyud): 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
174a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rin chen
174a5(rgyud): rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu bzhag byas na// rgyal po rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni de 'gyur ro// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//
174a6(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgyas mdudang nas ni// brtsam pa byas
174a7(rgyud): nas ngos bzhir yang // phreng banyid kyis dbang bskur 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje'i dbang gi phreng ba ni// bcings na
174b1(rgyud): dpral bar bzhag na yang // phreng ba'i dbang bskur de yis ni// rdo rje rnams kyis de dbang bskur// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
174b2(rgyud): chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyi ni 'jig rten gyis// dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das
174b3(rgyud): kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gzungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud de// rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste de dbang bskur/
174b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ni mchod pa'i phyir// dbang phyug du ni dbang bskur 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur
174b5(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so//
174b6(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rgyal ba kun gyi rnam par ni// phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag pas bcings// sngags kyi rig pa bzlas da ni/
174b7(rgyud): myur du dngos srung thob par 'gyur/ zhes yangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// dal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems
175a1(rgyud): ded 'das/ @#/ dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// bzlos pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
175a2(rgyud): 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags las ni khyod byung ste// bdag ni khro bo yin gyi bsgoms
175a3(rgyud): na// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams/ myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos
175a4(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i rigs bzlos pas// byams 'gengs pa yi tshul gyis ni// snying po la sogs bsgrub na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// zhes
175a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'dis kun to sgron ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha' kur gyi ting 'dzin ni// rab
175a6(rgyud): mnyam bzhag nas bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// bsgrubs nas kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha' snying pos gsungs// rigs
175a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i
175b1(rgyud): gnas rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rab mnyam bzhag par dang por ni// bdug pa la sogs
175b2(rgyud): mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
175b3(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gsang ba'i mchod pa rnam bzhi yis// gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod byed cing // bdag dbul ba la sogs pa yi// bachod pa byas
175b4(rgyud): ra 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro ba rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo'i
175b5(rgyud): gsang ba brjod byed cing // khro bo'i khu tshur rab byas na// myur du bdag gi rigs 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
175b6(rgyud): kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zab cing tshe rgya che ba'i// tshul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang ngag gis phul na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par
175b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'odi ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gdugs dang rgyal
176a1(rgyud): mtshan 'ban rnams kyis// rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa thams cad byin na ni// nor bu'i rigs ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes
176a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rang la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna chog
176a3(rgyud): 'grub byed cing // dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang //
176a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang // ting nge 'dzin dang // mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gsheg
176a5(rgyud): po thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
176a6(rgyud): yin no// lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni bzhi gshegs nyid mngon zhes// 'di ni rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// zhes sangs
176a7(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'phral gyi mig sogs mngon
176b1(rgyud): shes ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes lngar ni bdag gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
176b2(rgyud): dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms
176b3(rgyud): na yang / mngon shes lngar ni bdag gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
176b4(rgyud): kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lngar ni bdag
176b5(rgyud): gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spun gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi
176b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lngar yang bdag gyur nas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu
176b7(rgyud): 'gyur// zhi sa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos bu kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub se
177a1(rgyud): @dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
177a2(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing // sangs rgyas
177a3(rgyud): byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang
177a4(rgyud): chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen po bsgom byed cing // byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub
177a5(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bas
177a6(rgyud): rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas// lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
177a7(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin
177b1(rgyud): chos phyag rgya bzlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso//
177b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gnas// las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i
177b3(rgyud): ye shes 'di// bsgobs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dmakha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub
177b4(rgyud): kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so//
177b5(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// nyid kyis sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sems can don rnams rab byed cing // sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur na/
177b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
177b7(rgyud): ji ltar yul dang ldan 'gyur nas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgom byed cing // de nyid bskul na myur bar ni// mnyes par bya bar de 'grub po// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas
178a1(rgyud): de nyid@#gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrungs pa dang // sems can sbrang phyir khros
178a2(rgyud): pa yis// ma rungs mngon spyod byas na ni// 'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni
178a3(rgyud): pad mo'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pas kun tu blta ba dang // byams dang snying rje chos smra dang / mi 'jigs kun la sbyin byed rnams// sangs rgyas
178a4(rgyud): kun gyis mnyes par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni
178a5(rgyud): rab sbyin dang // nor bsags rab tu sbyin byed cing // de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed/ ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam
178a6(rgyud): mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mnyes par bya ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
178a7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang du bya ba/
178b1(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de ltar rnam dag bde sbyin pa'i// 'dod chags la ni brlas mi bya// sems can kun gyi don du sbyor// 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed// ces sangs
178b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod sten bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis// su
178b3(rgyud): ra ta s+t+waM zhes smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid bskal na dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i
178b4(rgyud): rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' yis sems can nams// dag byas lus can skyabs sbyin dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir//
178b5(rgyud): gsad na yang ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// pad
178b6(rgyud): me'i 'dab mkha'abyed cing // 'dod chags dag pa kan rtog pa// 'dul ba'i phyir ni chags ca byed cing // 'dod par byed na dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
178b7(rgyud): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang
179a1(rgyud): de nyid@#bskur phyir// rdo rje rin chen nyid re reng // spyi bor bzhag ste dbang bskur na/ zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs zam/
179a2(rgyud): cad kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi tsho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsad pa'i
179a3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems can kun don ma mthong zhing // sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs na/ yid
179a4(rgyud): dang lus dang ngag gis ni// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gsheg
179a5(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyis rgyud do// dngos grub thams cad ma tho ba la// rigs rnams kyang ni mi brtson zhing // rdo rjes kun tu brdeg na ni// bsad na dngos
179a6(rgyud): grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ma rungs mi 'dul khro med
179a7(rgyud): cing // de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal thob byed na// huM zhes bya bas bsad par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so//
179b1(rgyud): de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// snying po rje med cing byams med la// sems can b.rungs mi sbyong zhing // bdag nyid la ni bslus na ni/
179b2(rgyud): bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor ba'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i
179b3(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mi stong bdag la nor med cing // nor gtong ba dang gnod byed la// sems can rnams ni dbul gyur na// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur/
179b4(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad yongs su bskongs pas gsungs so// kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas kyi// rnal 'byor ma thob gsod bcug la// de dag
179b5(rgyud): drang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gis dngos gru ba sbyin par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun ta bzang pos gsungaso// rigs thams cad kyi bsad pa'i
179b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrungs pa'i
179b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyu do// sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tus dus mchod gam
180a1(rgyud): denyidartag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni bsrungs bzad kyi mchog/ ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
180a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsrungs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshan tsam zhig/ lan gcig tsam yang brjod gyur na// 'di ni bsrung ba rtag chen po// ska cig
180a3(rgyud): gis ni dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi bsad pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi
180a4(rgyud): shes// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje hrul mos byed pa// 'di ni bdag dang gzhan la bsrung // zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs
180a5(rgyud): so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi bsrungs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang gi mtshan
180a6(rgyud): bzlos pa// bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bsrungs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs
180a7(rgyud): rgyas sems can gtong byed par// ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi byed par// bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsrungs
180b1(rgyud): bas gsung so// rigs thams cad kyi bsrungs pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan
180b2(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyud 'di bzhes par gsol// gang gis sems can thams cad rtog
180b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu gyur nas rtog par bgyi ste// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom
180b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// legs so leg so// phyag na rdo rjes legs par bshad pas
180b5(rgyud): nged kyis blangs shing byin gyis brlabs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang gcig tu 'dus nas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
180b6(rgyud): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje
180b7(rgyud): theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de/
181a1(rgyud): ridakhon nyid bsdus pa las// rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho/
181a2(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni
181a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de// sangs rgyas byang chub ting nge 'dzin// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// byang chub bde
181a4(rgyud): bas thob 'gyur zhes// bsams nas kyang ni rtogs par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
181a5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de// sems dpa'i rdo rje snying khar bcing // nga'i chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces smras
181a6(rgyud): nas// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste// cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin tu dngos grub tho
181a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so// ji lta ba bzhin bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub thob par ma gyur na// hUM gis phyag rgyas bsad
181b1(rgyud): na ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin par byed// ces bcom ldan 'das huM ka ra zhes bya bas gsungs so// tan ta/ ya thA ta thA hi ku pi to// badz+ra hr-i ka ra ma mu tA ya// ma ra
181b2(rgyud): yan sarba bu d+han sta// ba yan sing di rad d+han ti hi t+ya ha b+ha ga ban sarba taM thA ga ta hUM ka ra// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa bsang ba'i rgyud de// ting
181b3(rgyud): 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje'i lta bas bltas nas kyang // bdag gi chung ma 'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
181b4(rgyud): 'das pad mo 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud de// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog ces
181b5(rgyud): smra byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i 'dod pas gsungs so// rigs dam pa thams
181b6(rgyud): cad kyi dngos grab gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
181b7(rgyud): tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub gi gsang ba'i rgyud de// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod
182a1(rgyud): cing // bud med kun la chags byas la// sems can dron gyis snyoms dang // brjod na sangs rgyas nges mnyes so// zhes bcom ldan 'das
182a2(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya/
182a3(rgyud): bud med kun dang rtse byed pa// rdo rje rnams dang gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrungs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungaso// /
182a4(rgyud): 'de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud do// bsod pa 'jig rten thams cad bsod// lus dang ngag las dam dges pa// 'jig
182a5(rgyud): rten rnam sbyangs na ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin no zhes// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so// tan ta yan badz+ra kun sem ya sid d+hi gu h+ya tan ta/
182a6(rgyud): ma na yan ma ra yen lo kan// ka ba bag kar ma sid pra ye// hUM ka re sta byi shad d+ha ra phan// sa ma yo h+yar tha sid d+hi da yi ti// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i
182a7(rgyud): rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ mu stegs rnal 'byor can ma dag/ dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes banom
182b1(rgyud): ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud ngo // rdo rje nor bu'i sngar bcings la// rdo rje
182b2(rgyud): snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// ma rungs rnams kyi nor 'phrogs na// dam tshig dngos grub byin par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs tham
182b3(rgyud): cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi
182b4(rgyud): dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam
182b5(rgyud): bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dngos zla ba thams cad byas nas ni// sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la
182b6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// sems can kun la chags byed cing // yul la skyo bar ma gyur la// bud med dga' ba'i
182b7(rgyud): dag pa ni// gsang ba chos dngos grub mchog sbyin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung bas gsungs so// sna'i rnate 'byor hU~M zhes pa// phra ba'i rdo rje ting 'dzin
183a1(rgyud): de da 'a#gnas// mi bslangs rnal 'byor 'dis bsad ces// rab tu 'bar ba'i rdo rjes bsgyel// dam pa'i dngos grub par byin no//
183a2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i dam pas gsungs so// ta tra yan badz+ra ku la d+harma sid d+hi gu h+ya tan tra// nas hU~M kA ra yo ge na// sarba duSh+TAn stu ma ra yi/ mug
183a3(rgyud): tra badz+ra sa ma d+hiSh+Tha// pad ma sid d+hin ya da ba na yang sa t+ya ha// b+ha ga ban dar ma hUM ka ra// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i
183a4(rgyud): rgyud do// rdo rje bra ma'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bud med kun dang rtsi byed na// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
183a5(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud do// bud med ni sdug pa dang // dbang
183a6(rgyud): bo gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// re ba thams cad yongs su bskangs nas// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungaso//
183a7(rgyud): rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// de nas bya nga sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
183a8(rgyud): las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
183b1(rgyud): gyis// sangs rgyas rjes su dran bsgoms na// bud med lus kyi bu gar zhugs// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis
183b2(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu gnas ni de bzhin zhugs/ bud
183b3(rgyud): med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med par yang mgu bar gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dges pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos
183b4(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje hUM gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // khros nas bu gar zhugs nas ni// yid kyi de nas dbang du bya// zhes bcom
183b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad
183b6(rgyud): me'i ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar zhags nas bud med rnams// thams cad kyang ni bsrungs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni
183b7(rgyud): nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// rdo rje rirang chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings// bu gar zhugs na bud med rnams// ska cig
184a1(rgyud): sa sa@#/ gis phab gar byed 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas
184a2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud
184a3(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// phyi'i dkyil
184a4(rgyud): 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor// der ni sangs rgyas bzhag par bya// gsang ba dar ni zhags nas kyang // sangs rgyas la ni nyid du sgra/
184a5(rgyud): 'di ni khyab pa'i btsun mo ste/ kun gtong ba ni bdag gsol cig/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya yi// tshul la yang ni de skad brjod// sangs rgyas mnyam med
184a6(rgyud): 'od mnga' ba'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
184a7(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
184b1(rgyud): rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni mchog tshul te// dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas myur du ni// su ra te sa ma pa snyam ho// badz+ra sa tad+ya sid d+hi maM// zhes
184b2(rgyud): brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskal ba'i tshul gyis/ mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rje
184b3(rgyud): rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra bar ni// rdo rje kun gyi
184b4(rgyud): rigs kyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad tshul du yang // mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur du bar yang // dngos grub gsol ba 'debs byed cing /
184b5(rgyud): 'dod chags las ni khyod byung zhes// smras ni kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi
184b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// pad me'i rigs ni thams cad kyi 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni/ mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ der
184b7(rgyud): zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba// 'dod chags chos te pad mche// khyab pas bdag ni myur dngos grub// de skad smras na dkyil 'khor ni/ kun gyi des ni dngos grub po//
185a1(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu de/
185a2(rgyud): nor bu chen po'i rigs rnams ni// don kun grub pa'i tshul du yang // dkyil 'khor legs par bris nas ni// zhags nas 'di skad smra bar bya// bsams pa kun gyi
185a3(rgyud): dngos grub las// 'dod chags bsams pa dngos grub mchog/ bsgrubs shig bsku shig sems dpa' che// bcom ldan 'das thams cad grub pa po// de skad smras
185a4(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad du ni zhugs gyur na// mchod pa gsang ba bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de phyin cad ni grub bdag nyid// bsgrubs
185a5(rgyud): na rtag tu 'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe myur du mi 'grub na// de nyid bskal na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams
185a6(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs thams cad
185a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngom grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyagasang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyung de// de bzhin gshes
