185b1(rgyud): pa'i lha mo che// sdug cing bde ba kun sbyin pa// bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas// bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso//
185b2(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya chen po'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ltag 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// 'di ni
185b3(rgyud): de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje'i tshul tshig 'di spros shig/ bdag ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// khyod nga'i chung ma'i snying la gnas/ lus kun la ni mkhyud nas kyang // rdo rje 'gying
185b4(rgyud): bas 'gying bar mdzod// rdo rje 'bying ba lha mo che// de nyid bskal te chags gyur pas/ lus kun la ni brtan gyur na// ji bzhin myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom
185b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sid d+hi sid d+hu d+ya sa ma ye// sa ma yo haM snyom bri
185b6(rgyud): ya ma ma// zhes bskal myur du chags gyur nas// rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
185b7(rgyud): kyis chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bud d+ha bud d+hA ma hA sa twa// b+ha d+ya te mi ti pri ye// zhes ni bskul na myur bar yang // rjes su chags na 'grub par 'gyur
186a1(rgyud): dan 'dus / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyis las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sarba
186a2(rgyud): karma ka ri b+ha sa s+ho// me sid d+hud+ya badz+ra ni// rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos
186a3(rgyud): gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin
186a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do//
186a5(rgyud): mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sba bar// shes na rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'ang/
186a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems
186a7(rgyud): can kun gyi yid la khyab// sems can kun la bde byin zhing // sems can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog/ zhes bcom ldan 'das
186b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i mchog de rmad che bar// dang ldan shes nas dang byas na// bsgrubs/
186b2(rgyud): dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di rdo rje'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// tshogs
186b3(rgyud): pa dag pas chags bral gyis// sems can don gyi yid byung nas// mu stegs lta bas byas pa te// lta ba ngan pa'i cong rong ltung // theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir//
186b4(rgyud): bsod pa tha tshig yin pa ste// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so// ta ta ma na badz+ra ku la sa ma ya// gu h+Na sid d+hi/
186b5(rgyud): tan tA ra ga shud+ho/ pi rag ta nan ti R+Shi dri sti gri ta/ da ma na na ma ra nan sa ma ya// stag ga mi// dam b+hid nya ya sid d+h+ya// did d+h+ya ha b+ha ga ban badz+ra d+ha ra// de la 'di ni pad
186b6(rgyud): mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi// mu stegs can rnams gzhom pa'i phyir// 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // ming tsam zhes ni ci phyir brjod//
186b7(rgyud): nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud //
187a1(rgyud): ts+ya/ bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag tu legs par gsags par bya// bud med bla med rin chen zhes// bsams na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/
187a2(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de na byang chub sems
187a3(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
187a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud med rnams kyis yongs bskor la/ kun la brtse ba'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang /
187a5(rgyud): mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
187a6(rgyud): rgyud de// rab dgas ngal te skyo ba na// rab dga' las 'byung bde ba de// phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i phyir// phul na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
187a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// hUM gi dam tshig bcings nas kyang // skyo bo bud med 'khyud nas kyang / 2
187b1(rgyud): 'khyud par 'gyur bde ba de// phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byas pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos
187b2(rgyud): grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gdong du bltas nas ni// ltas par gyur pa'i bde ba de// phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur//
187b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos gru ba gsang ba'i rgyud de// las kyi phyag rgya bcings gyur la// rgyan
187b4(rgyud): rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang // bud med 'khyud pa'i longs spyod na ni// mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen gyis gsung
187b5(rgyud): so// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin
187b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes//
187b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos
188a1(rgyud): #/ zlab kyi rgyad do// sangs rgyas su ni bdagu bsgoms pa/ tsinas smras kyang mi tsor bu pa// gzhan gyi thad med rje byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub pa
188a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje 'jom byas
188a3(rgyud): nas kyang // rdo rje phreng ba bcing byed cing // de las rdo rje glu blangs nas// rdo rje gar gyis mchod byas na// 'dod pa'i dga' ba dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang gyi gar gyi bde
188a4(rgyud): ba las// bde ba gzhan ni yod min te// de phyir gsang mchod 'di bla med// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten gsum las
188a5(rgyud): rnam rgyal bsgoms// cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang // gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsang
188a6(rgyud): bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin
188a7(rgyud): bar// las kyi phyag rgyar rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
188b1(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las
188b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga
188b3(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi rigs brjod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
188b4(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi gsang ba'i rgyud de// mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las// sems can rnams la chag
188b5(rgyud): tshul gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'byung na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
188b6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// sems can thog ma mtha' ma tha med// nam mkha' 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang
188b7(rgyud): bokun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun bdag po// sems can kun gyi sems gang na ni// bstan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par bzhag na ni/ des
189a1(rgyud): par rdo rje nyid 'gyur te// sems dpa'i byin brlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de/ rdorje
189a2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs// rang sems rab tu rtogs la sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// thams cad kyi ni rig
189a3(rgyud): su 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang mtha' med pas gsung so// de bzhin gshegs rigs de nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// de nyid pad mo'i
189a4(rgyud): rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs mchog go// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor los gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gas
189a5(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa
189a6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid
189a7(rgyud): ni// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par bzhag las ting 'dzin te// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub// ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsum
189b1(rgyud): de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// rab tu rtogs phyir rdo rjes te// bzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags
189b2(rgyud): kyu yin// pra ma rtogs par mda' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs shes bya// spras pa'i phyir ni rin chen gsungs so// gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma ste/ rgyal mtshan
189b3(rgyud): legs par bsgreng bar gsungs// 'dzub pa bzhad par grags pa yin// 'dod chags dag phyir pad mo yin// ral gri nyon mongs dgra gcod phyir// dkyil 'khor
189b4(rgyud): tshul gyis 'khor lo ste// tshig gis brjod pas smra zhes bya// sna tshogs phyir ni kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis mchi ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar
189b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rtag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan la sogs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
189b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mtshan mas mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// de nas byang chub sems dpa
189b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mtshan mas mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gas
190a1(rgyud): nyid@#ba'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'ching ba
190a2(rgyud): skye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyab cing ba'i skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de//
190a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// ces sangs rgya
190a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar
190a5(rgyud): rgyal po nyid phyag rgyas// rgyal po'i khrims la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po'i skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yin// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du
190a6(rgyud): yang // nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ni// bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos
190a7(rgyud): gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni// skye bo 'gas ni bcing
190b1(rgyud): gyur na// shin tu 'da' bar mi bya ba// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi// dam tshig phyag rgya bcing ba yi// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar
190b2(rgyud): du mi 'da' bar// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya
190b3(rgyud): bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// mdor na rgyal pos rdo rje'i dag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di ni bcing bar shes nas kyang // des ni
190b4(rgyud): chos kyi dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
190b5(rgyud): rgyud de// rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // bka' dang ldan pa'i las ni// shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
190b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// rigs thams thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub
190b7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su bzung zhing byin gyis brlab so// de nas/
191a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dus #yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya
191a2(rgyud): ba 'di sbyin no// leg so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs
191a3(rgyud): pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di dag ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'dus pa las// rigs
191a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rtog pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes//
191a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas
191a6(rgyud): rjes su dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
191a7(rgyud): gshesas pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chags pa rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' kun gyis
191b1(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting 'dzin
191b2(rgyud): gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// bsgoms na mdun du'ang de bzhin te// phyag na rdo rje'i
191b3(rgyud): mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyis chos dam pa'i dngos grub
191b4(rgyud): kyi rgyud de// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni// bsgoms na mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan par// 'dul bar der ni rab byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos
191b5(rgyud): kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyi mchog
191b6(rgyud): ldan pa'i// phun sum tshogs don des thob po// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
191b7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
192a1(rgyud): @#/ rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas rjes su dra gyur la// rdo rje phra po'i rgyal gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs
192a2(rgyud): rgyas dngos grub thob par 'byur // zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi
192a3(rgyud): rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin du// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byed cing // badz+ra sa to zhes brjod na// rdo rje sems dpa'i nyid thob bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
192a4(rgyud): dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gis dngos grub kyi rgyud de// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// dran byed bdun du de bzhin te// hUM hUM hUM hUM
192a5(rgyud): zhes brjod na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pang mo'i rigs kyis chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi
192a6(rgyud): rgyud do// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyi ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgom byed cing // shud d+ha shud d+ha zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
192a7(rgyud): chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang / sid+d+ha sid+d+ha
192b1(rgyud): zhes brjod na// don gyi dngos grub mchog du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu'i chos kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas
192b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni
192b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med// ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste// ya zhes pa des chos rnams ni//
192b4(rgyud): skye ba med par bshad pa yin// phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni// shes rab kyi bsgoms de nas ni// yi ge kun gyi ye shes dngos// bad gshegs skra cig gis 'grub 'gyur// zhes
192b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jal dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos ye shes kyi dngos
192b6(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud de// de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis// dad nas bcings sam bklags gyur na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom
192b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'din rje'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// tad tra yan badz+ra badz+ra kA la sad d+ha mad+han sid d+hi// tan/
193a1(rgyud): de nying / trapa pas twa hi tha ya/ bud d+ha d+han ke ra Ne la ma// du sha na na bin yang tha la// ma ran tha du sid d+hu sid d+hi// a ha thA ga ban badz+ra ku la// sdig pa'i sems can
193a2(rgyud): phar don du// sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba'i phyir// bsad pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis
193a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rang bzhin dag pas shes pa ni// dam pa'i don ni yin par bshad// thog ma
193a4(rgyud): tha mar 'di bsgoms na// chos kyi dngos grub byar du thob// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi
193a5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems can kun la don sbyin byed// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi// rigs kyi
193a6(rgyud): yang ni dngos grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rin chen gyis gsungs so// rigs nyid kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
193a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di
193b1(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub pa// 'di ni bsgom par
193b2(rgyud): byas na yang // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin
193b3(rgyud): gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// bla med las ni bang po rnams// sems dpa' kun 'gyur thams cad kyang // shes na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur//
193b4(rgyud): shes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sdig pa dag pa'i rgyu yi phyir// sdig kun rab tu 'dul
193b5(rgyud): byed pa'i// sems can thams cad bsad pa la// dad par gyur na gyu na 'grub par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i
193b6(rgyud): rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ kun las dag pas dgos pa kun// des byed las ni yin no bar// shes
193b7(rgyud): na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sred ldan
194a1(rgyud): de nyid#dbul ba thams cad kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskong la// don kun grub pas kun bdag ni// grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// zhes bcom
194a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
194a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
194a4(rgyud): phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rtag du rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'bad pa kun gyis sbyor ba ni// rnam pa'i mchog ni kun ldan pa// mngon shes lnga ni thob par
194a5(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// slob
194a6(rgyud): dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob min la min bu min pa'i// mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de// de dag phyag rgya gsang bas 'grub// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas
194a7(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi phra po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje phra ma'i tshul gyis ni// rnanas te byung ldan gyur la// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gnas/
194b1(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par byed// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// pad mo chen po'i
194b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gnas// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje blta bas bltas nas ni// 'dod chags dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo'i 'dod chags kyis
194b3(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi phra bo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu phra ba'i lha 'bar bas//
194b4(rgyud): don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de na byang chub sems
194b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi
194b6(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// gang tshe phyag rgya 'am ting nge 'dzin// bsgrub phyir brtsol bar gyur pa na// gang tshe mkha' khams skar pa 'dra// dkar por rgyug par nges mthong na//
194b7(rgyud): de tshe bo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob par shes// de phyin chad ni sangs rgyas kyi// rtog pa kun la bsgrub par bya// shes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung //
195a1(rgyud): de nyidade la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyis ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed dngos po yod gyur pa//
195a2(rgyud): de snyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba'ang rung // mkha' la brgyug par mthong na ni// rdo rje spun ni rnam dag par// shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni//
195a3(rgyud): bla na med pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bsam
195a4(rgyud): pa 'am ni g.yon phyogs su// mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid ni// sprin 'dra myur du 'khor ba ni// mig gis mthong bar gyur nas kyang // rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de// mthong na
195a5(rgyud): 'jigs par ma gyur la// phyag rgya de yang bzung na ni// phyag rgya'i mig ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi spyan
195a6(rgyud): gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gang che skya dmar dkar ba dang // ser po'i dkyil 'khor mthong gyur pa// de tshe dgos pa nyid 'gyur zhing // 'khor lo'i spyan gyis 'grub
195a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang / dbyig
195b1(rgyud): la sogs pa 'dra ba dang // gang gi tshen mkha' mthong gan// de ni mkha' mig 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi/
195b2(rgyud): spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las kyi dam pa'i da
195b3(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// 'dod chags bde ba rnam sbyin
195b4(rgyud): phyir// gtso bo thams cad mchod byas na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungaso// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
195b5(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'dod chags bdag ces bsgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na// rdo rje'i 'dod pas gzi can mnyam/
195b6(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// khro bo bdag ces
195b7(rgyud): bsgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na// khams gsum rnam par rgyal 'dra yi// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa
196a1(rgyud): nyid #phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi las dab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni// 'dod pa dag
196a2(rgyud): bar bsgom byed cing // byams ldan thig le sangs rgyas rnams// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos
196a3(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la// bsam pa g.yos pa btud nas ni// phyag rgya rtag tu
196a4(rgyud): brtson byas na// dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos
196a5(rgyud): grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
196a6(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas/
196a7(rgyud): ye ma'o// sems can don rnams la// skyo bar gyur pa gang bshad zad// 'di ni las kyi dam tshig ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas
196b1(rgyud): mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang
196b2(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// mchod na thob par 'gyur//
196b3(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems can kun la phan byed cing // kun bzang
196b4(rgyud): khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi
196b5(rgyud): dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin/ te/ bdag nyid 'dul 'gro 'dul skar gnas la// mchod na
196b6(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das padam chags pas gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de//
196b7(rgyud): sems can kun la don chen sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po bdag yin te// don kun grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das
197a1(rgyud): #don thams cad grub pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
197a2(rgyud): dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid
197a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rang gi ting 'dzin 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo mdud nas ni// go char bcings te spyi bor bzhag/ shin tu yang ni bsrungs par 'gyur/
197a4(rgyud): zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba// ri mo
197a5(rgyud): bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste// mnyes nas bud med gang bsams pa// de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni
197a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris la// de'i mig gi phyogs su ni// 'dzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang // bud med mchog
197a7(rgyud): ni 'dren par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pang po'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi rgyung de// lag pa gnyis su pang mo blangs
197b1(rgyud): 'dod chags dag par lta byed cing // rdo rje'i lta bas bud med de// lhas na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor
197b2(rgyud): bu'i rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas// lags pa gnyis kyis nor bu bzung // hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud med kun
197b3(rgyud): la 'dud byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
197b4(rgyud): na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos
197b5(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud de// mchod pa'i las kyi cho ga sbyar// gang dang ging gis bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol btab ste// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das
197b6(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i
197b7(rgyud): mthong ba'i cho ga sbyar / dgos pa gang ni ga smras pa de/ myur du dngos grub pa thob par 'gyur/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo dzingag/
198a1(rgyud): nyid@#kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo'i ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang // rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad
198a2(rgyud): gang bsams pa// de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi
198a3(rgyud): rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// yid kyi mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de'i dngos grub thams cad thob// ces
198a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'dug pa
198a5(rgyud): la sogs mchod byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de kun ska cig nyid kyis 'grub// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs tham
198a6(rgyud): cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa'i dngos
198a7(rgyud): grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungaso// de la 'di ni de gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas rnal tIng de b+his rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// sangs
198b1(rgyud): rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrub pa'i// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshes
198b2(rgyud): pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sems dpa' zhes grags kun bdag nyid// bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste// sem
198b3(rgyud): dpa' bdag ces byin brlabs pa// nga rgyal bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs
198b4(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de// sems dpa' ji bzhin rgya de bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin
198b5(rgyud): bdag de bzhin// bsgom pa 'di yi tshul gyi ni// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi
198b6(rgyud): chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de// chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas la// ngag gi phyag rgya de dag kun// sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge
198b7(rgyud): 'dzin// ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor
199a1(rgyud): de nyid @#kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang / mchod pa dam tshig dngos grub rnams// bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje'i las rnams
199a2(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin/
199a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje
199a4(rgyud): la legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs
199a5(rgyud): pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di yang ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las// rtog pa
199a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phye ma'i cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs s+ho// // bam po dgu pa'o//
199a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs bcang ba 'di gsungs so// ba na cing chags bral la// gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te// sems can kun la/
199b1(rgyud): pan don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang chog rgyas pa'i rgyud
199b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de la 'di ni snying po'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te// dkyil
199b3(rgyud): 'khor chen po mthong nas// bdug pa dang me tog dang mar me dang // dri'i phyag rgya rnams kyis mchod pa byas ste// de nas rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di
199b4(rgyud): ni bzlas pa'i cho ga bshad pa yin te// zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste// dus bzhir bdug pa la sogs pas cho ga ji bzhin du mchod nas// de bzhin gshegs
199b5(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod de// phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag
199b6(rgyud): byas la// sngags 'di bzhin bdag gi lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra tse pa sta na ya/ a da ma naM ni r+ya ta ya mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a d+hi tiSh+Thas
199b7(rgyud): ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa a b+hi she ka ya// yang ma na nir r+ya tA ya mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rang na/ a b+hi Shi ny+tsa maM// oM sarba ta thAg ta pu tsa pra bar rta ya// ad ma ni nir+yat+na
200a1(rgyud): de nyid @#ya mi// sarba ta thAg ta badz+ra d+harma pra brta ya maM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa ka rba ni yang man ni d+yA ta ya mi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karba ku ru maM// de nas 'dod pa'i
200a2(rgyud): yon ta thams cad la chags pa dang bral ba la/ kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyod cing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyu
200a3(rgyud): bsgoms la// ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje'i tshig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//
200a4(rgyud): ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni// de nas ras la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs// de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal
200a5(rgyud): du kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste// sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la// rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o// de nas ri mo'i
200a6(rgyud): sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya chen byas la// 'dzub bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi pa'i du bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la// mtshan thog thag bzlas
200a7(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas napa langs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rje/
200b1(rgyud): rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni// des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la// ri mo'i sku gzugs spyan
200b2(rgyud): sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du// ji lta ba bzhin bcings shing bkrol te// rdo rje'i tshig gis 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi so bar cung zad cig phyag
200b3(rgyud): rgya bkrol la// ji lta ba bzhin bcings te bzlas par bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la// 'phar zhing smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du na mkha' la rdzing
200b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang // mi spang ba dang // las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bcings ma thag du phyag rgya thams cad kyis las thams cad ji lta ba
200b5(rgyud): bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni// des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ tingange 'dzin
200b6(rgyud): gang dga' ba de snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la// de nas mthar mtshan thog thag dkyil mo dkrung mi bshig par snyoms par zhags te 'dug par bya'o//
200b7(rgyud): de nas nam langs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas ji lta bur 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro// zhes
201a1(rgyud): denyid / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas las grub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas shing // tha ba gcig gi bar du bsgrubs/
201a2(rgyud): la// de nas mthar mtshan gcig la thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad kyi dngos grub du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de
201a3(rgyud): nas las gcig bya bar 'dod na yang // lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang gzhan dang // grong dang grong khyer rnams go cha bcing ba la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyuraro//
201a4(rgyud): dbab pa yang bya ste// can ngan dri zhim pos// gdon gyis zin pa dang // gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams dang // rdo rje dang // lcags kyu dang // mda' dang / lag pa dang // rin po
201a5(rgyud): che dang // nyi ma dang // rgyal mtshan dang // so'i phreng ba dang // pad mo dang // ral gri dang // 'khor lo dang // lce dang // rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang // mche ba dang // khu tshur
201a6(rgyud): dang // phyag rgya la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad la lan gcig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do// sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de rma ba'i 'jug ma'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste// bcings/
201a7(rgyud): la// de nas bya'i 'jug ma de sems dpa' jo pa'i phyag rgyas mnan la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyababs kyi bar du bzlas pa/
201b1(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rma bya ba'i 'jug ma las gzugs sna tshogs pa snang bar 'gyur te// de phyir chad rma bya'i 'jug ma rang gi lus cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad ston te/
201b2(rgyud): 'jug ma de nyid la yon gcig bzlas te bskor bas kyang // bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// 'jug ma de nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams
201b3(rgyud): kyang ston// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa
201b4(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis bdud sde dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dul ba'i rdzu 'phral gyis rnams par rol par mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas//
201b5(rgyud): bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o// de nas dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gsheg
201b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la// phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis//
201b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du byed na// sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos// ji ste 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub
202a1(rgyud): ##/ par 'dod na yang // des dang po kho na rang bzhin du bzlos shing // tha ba gcig du brgya stong du bzlas na// de nas mthar rgya bcings te// de bzhin du/
202a2(rgyud): mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub thams cad rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub gang la
202a3(rgyud): rung ba gcig du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa/
202a4(rgyud): / rdzogs s+ho// / de nus rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang // cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang por sngar brnyen pa byas te// de ltar ji ltar 'dod pa
202a5(rgyud): bzhin du yi ge'i 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mtha' mar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas paM byas la// de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan btags pa
202a6(rgyud): dang // chad pas bcad nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te bsgrub par 'dod na yang // des ji lta ba bzhin du ri/
202a7(rgyud): me'i sku gzugs bris la des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas// zla ba gcig 'dod pa kun la longs spyad cing // ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du bzlas pa
202b1(rgyud): dus bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlos shing zla ba'i mthar byin pa dang // ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas// rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings la// phyag
202b2(rgyud): rgya bcings la de la hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas na maM langs pa dang // lha rnams kyi dbang po dang // phye dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa
202b3(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas na bka' nod par 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi tshe nges khyod
202b4(rgyud): tshur shog 'di byos shog ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nge'i bka' bzhin du byos shig/ de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po
202b5(rgyud): 'gyur te// yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dga' bar bka' ba stsol cig// bskor te sbyar 'ongs nas kyang // phan gdags pa dang chad pas
202b6(rgyud): bcad pa rnams byed cing // lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyi longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas// ji ltar dga' bzhin du byed cing lha rnams kyi dbang po'i bud med la
202b7(rgyud): sogs pa bud med thams cad mgu bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang // de la su gang gis kyang nus pa med de// hUM zhes bya bsre lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams
203a1(rgyud): de nyid lus#/ cad gnon cing // de nas skal chung ngu stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste phyag rgya bsgrub
203a2(rgyud): par 'dod na yang // ji lta ba bzhin du bzlas pa byas la// zla ba'i mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o//
203a3(rgyud): nas nam langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ci lta ba'i cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // gzug
203a4(rgyud): sna tshogs ston pa dang // mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang // sgyum rnams ston pa dang // thams cad dbab pa dang // dgug pa dang // dbang du bya ba thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed
203a5(rgyud): par bya ba dang // rin po che thams cad bsdu ba dang // 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang // rin po che'i char 'bebs par bstan pa dang // gad mo cher bgod pa dang /
203a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang // bcod pa dang // dbye ba dang // dus kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba dang // ci lta ba bzhin gyi de kho na nyid brjod pa dang // las thams cad
203a7(rgyud): la 'jug pa dang // bzung ba dang // rmongs pa dang // gnod pa dang // bsdigs pa dang // bsad pa dang // sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga'
203b1(rgyud): ba'i rol pa la 'jug pa dang // dbang bskur ba dang // dbang po thams cad glu len du bzhugs pa dang // dbang bskur ba dang // gar byed du bzhugs pa dang // bcing ba
203b2(rgyud): dang // dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na// yang des
203b3(rgyud): rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nas brtsams te bsgom zhing // de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par byas te// de nas mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid
203b4(rgyud): kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas// sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / char
203b5(rgyud): gcod nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas shing // zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs
203b6(rgyud): la de nis mthar mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de
203b7(rgyud): nas las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur na yang lan gcig brjod de// yid kyis bsams pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i rigs
204a1(rgyud): de nyid#kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// de nas bang mo'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la
204a2(rgyud): dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas bsgrub pa byas te ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la/
204a3(rgyud): de'i phyogs thams cad dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la/ grwa rnams su lha mo rnams bri'o// de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas
204a4(rgyud): la// zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba 'dul ba byon te// dus ji bzhin par mchog gi skabs 'byed par 'gyuraro//
204a5(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang // des de bzhin du pad mo'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad du
204a6(rgyud): brjod pas dus bzhir bzlas pa bya'o// de nas mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam la ngas na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings
204a7(rgyud): pas// ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// ji ste ting nge 'dzin
204b1(rgyud): gyi tshul bsgrub par 'dod na yang // de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu ji lta bur dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang /
204b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// ji ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang // de bzhin du bzlas la// zla ba'i mthar
204b3(rgyud): mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// pad mo'i rigs kyi yo byad
204b4(rgyud): dang cho ga rgyas pa// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi yod byed dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang po kho na
204b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi byas la 'bum bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil
204b6(rgyud): 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la// de nas bzhin du mchod pa byas te// de bzhin du bsgrubs la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu zlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa
204b7(rgyud): dang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po byon nas dbang bskur ba sbyin par mdzad do//
205a1(rgyud): de#dbang bskur ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der rigs 'dzin gyi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan
205a2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// ji ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje rin po che'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrubs na bsam pa thams cad
205a3(rgyud): kyi las byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// ji ste nor bu'i rigs kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang // des de bzhin du rin po che
205a4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'i rin po che bzhin bsgom par bya ste// dngos po med pa'i dam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung // rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sgra
205a5(rgyud): ltar 'byung // zhes bya ba'i ting ngange 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan
205a6(rgyud): gcig thog theg tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dga' ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// zhes
205a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de nas las bsgrub pa bshad de// de bzhin du bzlas na tha ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nas
205b1(rgyud): langs pa dang // bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos don thams cad bsgrub par 'gyur te// de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
205b2(rgyud): pas gsungs so// nor bu'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo byad dang
205b3(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di dag yin te// de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa bshad do// snying po bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
205b4(rgyud): grub par gyur cig ces brjod la// snying po ci dgar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i cho ga bya'o// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i yo byad dang cho ga ste// phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga'
205b5(rgyud): bar gyur cig ces smras la// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te// ji ltar dga' ba ci nus kyi bzlas pa bya'o// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni
205b6(rgyud): sngags thams cad kyi yo byad dang cho ga ste/ spros pa med pa tshig bsgrub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig/ ces smras la
205b7(rgyud): sngags ni dga' bar bzlas par bya ste// 'di ni dngos grub po// de la 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga ste// sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par gyur// de bzhin
206a1(rgyud): denyid@#gshegs pa thams cad ni rigs pa zugs su chud cing sdom par gyur to// zhes smras la// rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o// zhes bcom
206a2(rgyud): ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas snying po dang phyag rgya dang // sngags dang // rigs pa thams cad ji ltar bdag nyid du rdo rje'i bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni
206a3(rgyud): 'di yin te// sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang // phyag rgya dang // sngags dang // rigs pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du grub par bya ba de ni bdag gam/ sems par bsgoms na
206a4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa/
206a5(rgyud): rdzogs s+ho// de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub
206a6(rgyud): ni 'di lta ste// nor bsgrub pa'i dngos grub dang // rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub dang // rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang // dngos grub chen po rnams so// de la nor bsgrub pa ni 'di
206a7(rgyud): yin te// gang na gter yod par dogs pa der phyag rgya bcings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje'i lta bas bltas na// ji ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong
206b1(rgyud): na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o// de nas rdo rje skyugs sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings nas brkos te// ji ltar dga' ba nyid du blangs na rjod pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom
206b2(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub pa yin te// phyag rgya gang bsgrub par byed pa na// badz+ra sid d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi
206b3(rgyud): dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas phar 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs su ston pa dang / ji
206b4(rgyud): srid du dga' ba de srid mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang // nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang // dpag tshad stong gi steng na lding ba dang / 'og du 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang // phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad
206b5(rgyud): stong du ji dga' bar song las bskor te slar 'ongs pa dang // dpag tshad stong kho ra khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa shes pa dang // dngos po thams cad mig gis
206b6(rgyud): mthong zhing rna bas thos pa dang // phyogs thams cad dpag tshad stong gi khor ra yag na gnas pa'i bud med tha mam cad ci dga' bar pang du blangs te 'gugs pa dang // gser dang
206b7(rgyud): nor bu dang mu tig la sogs pa dbyig thams ca cad dang // no thams cad phrogs kyang cung zad kyang brgal mi nus te// bdag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par gyur na gzhan gyis lta smos
207a1(rgyud): / kyang ci dgos// skyes bya stong phrag bcu bsdoms pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang // rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang // rtag tu 'dod pa thams cad la longs
207a2(rgyud): spyod pa dang ldan pa dang // rtag du dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na med
207a3(rgyud): pas mchod pa byed cing // lo stong phrag bzhi'i bar du 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dngos grub kyis gsungs so// de la 'di
207a4(rgyud): ni rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te// phyag rgya bsgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin zhes brjod la// grub pa dang rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor los bskor bar 'gyur te/
207a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad dang longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig gcig gis bskor te// slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su
207a6(rgyud): spyod pa dang // lo bcwo brgyad pa'i na chod dang ldan pa dang // skra 'khyil pa dang ldan pa dang // rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rdo rje
207a7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad mthong zhing // bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'dzin gyis gsung so//
207b1(rgyud): de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te// bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po'i don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas ska cig gcig gis
207b2(rgyud): kyang // phyogs bcu'i de 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems par bcas pa thams cad mthong
207b3(rgyud): nas// rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas// sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas//
207b4(rgyud): slar 'ongs te// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang // bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing /
207b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen por gyur nas// tshe'i tshad ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro// zhes
207b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungaso// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub ste// de yang 'di ltar 'jig rten 'jig
207b7(rgyud): rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang // dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang // bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang /
208a1(rgyud): nyid#dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag
208a2(rgyud): rgyabacings la// dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang // hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o// haM zhes bya ba
208a3(rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bsgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du
208a4(rgyud): gyur par 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po'i rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te// nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po'i 'khor lo
208a5(rgyud): thams cad kun tu bskor te// slar 'ongs nas ma rungs pa la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad hUM zhes bya bas 'dul byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM
208a6(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' bsnol cing // rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas
208a7(rgyud): mnyes par byed cing // lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dngos grub
208b1(rgyud): ste// phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rin po che'i phyag rgya dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste// de nas grub pa dang // dbang rnam
208b2(rgyud): pa bzhir 'gyur te// rdo rje'i dbang dang // rin po che'i dbang dbab// chos kyi dbang dang // las kyi dbang rnams so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
208b3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dbang gis ni rin po che thams cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbang gis ni chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang gis ni
208b4(rgyud): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gis
208b5(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste// de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
208b6(rgyud): la mchod pa byas na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
208b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni dngos dam pa ste// de yang 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom
209a1(rgyud): don mtsham ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// de la 'di dag ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dngos gru ba rnams ste// de ni 'di ltar mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya
209a2(rgyud): dang // bsrung ba dang // pad mo'i dngos grub rnams so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te// ji ltar pad mo 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams
209a3(rgyud): rlung la mams pa sems dpa' bams kyang gis par byed nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas nas// sems can thams cad dang
209a4(rgyud): byed nas par 'gyur ro byabs pas 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro thams cad bsrung ba dang / rdza bded// bskyo banus par 'gyur ro// 'badag nyid pa dam rdo
209a5(rgyud): 'dzin du nags la bdam lag par blangs te bsnyungs na 'jig rten dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad ldan zhing la stong phrag bzhir 'tshe bar
209a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bad pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi dngos ma ba rnams te// de yang 'di ltar de bzhin/
209a7(rgyud): bshegs pa sa ca kyi rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub dang // ga'i brjid chen po dang / khams pa grus cang yongs kyi rdzogs pa dang / rin po'i dngos rgyar/
209b1(rgyud): ring po mi thog par ldan par 'grub bo//
209b2(rgyud): rnam so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub ni 'di lta ste// nyid kyi dbang bskur ba dbu' dang // mar me dbul ba dang // ci nus kyis sbyin pa'i
209b3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang // rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod na// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
209b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa// / rdzogs s+ho//
209b5(rgyud): de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungaso// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi
209b6(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta ba// de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de'i thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la 'di ni
209b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngos grub chags lus skyes// de'i thabs ni bsgom pa ste// dngos grub kun
209b8(rgyud): gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// spros pa med pa'i thabs
210a1(rgyud): de nyid @#/ kyi ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// ma rig mngon chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos
210a2(rgyud): grub yod yin te// de'i thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kyi ni mchog thob po// rtog pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams
210a3(rgyud): kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi
210a4(rgyud): rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// de la 'di ni
210a5(rgyud): phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// dam tshig gsang ba bsrungs na ni// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// dam tshig bsgyangs
210a6(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na// bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod/
210a7(rgyud): nams med kyang myur bar ni// chos sbyin pas ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bsod nams nang na sbyin pa mchog byin na/
210b1(rgyud): bsod nams thog 'gyur te// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// rtog pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas
210b2(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar
210b3(rgyud): snying po'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// yi ge a las 'jug byed cing // yi ge thams cad rnams bsgoms la// rang gi kha nas gzhan zhal du// bsgoms na dngos grub thob
210b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpa' gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// shes rab nges
210b5(rgyud): 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste// des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par// bsgoms na nyid 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab mchog gis gsung
210b6(rgyud): so// de la 'di na sngags kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// shes rab sgra'i rjes 'breng zhes// ting 'dzin tshig gis rab spros na// de bsgoms na ni myur bar yang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob
210b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bros gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rig dang sngags gnyis khyad par du// khyad par yod pa
211a1(rgyud): de da ##/ ma yin te// shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes
211a2(rgyud): rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so// rtog pa thams cad kyi shes ba kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
211a3(rgyud): bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/
211a4(rgyud): dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'brel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'khor lo mang por zhug
211a5(rgyud): pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rjes
211a6(rgyud): su yi rang la sogs tshul/ de bzhin dam pa'i chos glags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas na ni// nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi
211a7(rgyud): rgyud de/ ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las// tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi chog
211b1(rgyud): rgyas pa'i rgyud/ rdzogs s+ho// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rjes// rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i
211b2(rgyud): ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na// de nyid com ldan sems dpa' ste// thams cad sems de nyid bdag po// skra dang gsung thugs
211b3(rgyud): rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brton pa rang 'byung gi// sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te// 'di la rdo rje rab tu
211b4(rgyud): gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa'i gzugs gyur te// khams gsum kun gyi rdul snyed du//
211b5(rgyud): de nyid du ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje'i sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems par yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung / mtshan ma
211b6(rgyud): la sog sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snying khar yang // rtag du dga' bas bsgoms na ni//
211b7(rgyud): de ni myur du grub pa thob// ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyudo//
212a1(rgyud): sa nga sgru sa ga pa nga nga skye smras so// ya nga gan na
212a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med pa'i// ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa'i ye shes las// brtags na
212a3(rgyud): rtogs pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// mi rtog gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtags pas rtogs las byung ba ni// rdo rje
212a4(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// cho ga bzhin du ri mo bri// rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog pa// rtog
212a5(rgyud): dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// rtog pa las ni 'dod chags 'byung // pad mo la
212a6(rgyud): ni de gnas te// de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni// grub pa nyid ni de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni// mthu yis
212a7(rgyud): shin tu mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog las// zla rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi
212b1(rgyud): rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// yid kyis 'dod pa'i cho ga yis// yid kyis 'dod pa 'grub 'gyur te// ting 'dzin
212b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa snying la gnas// de phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' dka'
212b3(rgyud): mi byed bzhin// bdag nyid chen po'i gzugs brnyan gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi sngags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// 'da' bar bya ba ma
212b4(rgyud): yin zhing // dbye bar dka' la gsang ba nyid// gsang ba bsgrub phyir brjod pas na// de'i phyir ni sngags zhes brjod// de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// ma rig pa ni gzhom
212b5(rgyud): pa dang // ngag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rig pa zhes zhes brjod do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rtog pa
212b6(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de// de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te//
212b7(rgyud): snying po bzlas te bdag gam ni// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba dang // 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur zhes par bya// de la 'di ni phyag rgya ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud/
213a1(rgyud): de nyid 'dug bdag gis cho ga ji bzhin du// gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgyab cings// 'jig rten pa la bltas na ni/ gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes/
213a2(rgyud): 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te// lan gcig tsam yang sngags brjod na// 'das dang 'byung dang 'byung gang yin/ 9/ rang gi lce la smras 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
213a3(rgyud): 'das kun spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de// rig pa lan gcig brjod na ni// byang dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar
213a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// / rdzogs s+ho//
213a5(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs dang rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya
213a6(rgyud): bsgrub pa yin te// ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang // dkyil me dkrung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas na// sems dpa' chen po grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan
213a7(rgyud): 'dis rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul du ni// brkyang bcum tshul du rab gnas pa/ shin
213b1(rgyud): tu khros nas bsgrub byas na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya
213b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te// rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad mo 'byung ba bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom
213b3(rgyud): ldan 'das pad mo sems dpas gsungaso// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te// ji ltar 'dug gam hAl ba 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni//
213b4(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na// the tshom med par 'grub pa 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i
213b5(rgyud): gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// lce rtse shin tu mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni// rtog pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje tshig yin no// zhes bcom
213b6(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te// hUM zhes bya ba 'brag sgrar sgrags// khro bo'i ngag ni
213b7(rgyud): zab cing brtan// rdo rje chen po khro bo gsal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i
214a1(rgyud): #gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing / khra ba'i tshig ni shin tu gsal// ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis/
214a2(rgyud): zlos pa po rnams 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor ba'i
214a3(rgyud): rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// shin tu yongs su gsal tshig gis// rtag du 'dud la brtson byed cing / tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur
214a4(rgyud): du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegags pa'i rigs kyi gas
214a5(rgyud): ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// rtag du 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// sems can thams cad pa de sbyin pa// rdo rje ses dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par/
214a6(rgyud): 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'a 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// sems can kun la phan pa dang / ma ru das
214a7(rgyud): ba rnams 'dul ba dang // sangs rgyas brtan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/ khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba
214b1(rgyud): gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// ji ltar pad mo rab chags la// bsgoms pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa/ de ltar bdag/
214b2(rgyud): gis chags skyon yang // srid na chags bde 'grub 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub
214b3(rgyud): pa'i rgyud de// nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi// dgos pa'i don ni kun bsgrub phyir// rin chen char ni 'bebs 'gyur zhes/ grub na myur bar de 'grub po// zhes bcom ldan 'ad
214b4(rgyud): 'phags pa na mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// ji ltar langs sam 'dug pa 'am// 'chag
214b5(rgyud): kyang rung ste de ltar ni// lag pa g.yon pa phyag rgya mchog/ thams cad byed na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba phyag na rdo rjes gsung so//
214b6(rgyud): de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud do// de ltar de ltar gnas nas kyang // ji lta ci ltar byed kyang rung // rdo rje khro bo 'dzub mo bcings// gos kyis g.yon
214b7(rgyud): na 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud/
215a1(rgyud): da/ #lag pa g.yon pas pad mo yi// khu tshur bcings te skyes nas ni// ji dga' myur du pad mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das/
215a2(rgyud): kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// g.yon pas rin chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam
215a3(rgyud): pa'i lags g.yogs la// ci dga' bar ni rim 'gror byed// rin chen dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rigs
215a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de// rang gi sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// rdo rje'i ngag dang rdo rje'i lta// ring myi thogs
215a5(rgyud): mchog grub po// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang // gsung dang thugs
215a6(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyu/ rdzogs s+ho// / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad
215a7(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'di byin gyis brlabs par mdzad du gsol// de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig
215b1(rgyud): tu 'dus nas// yang legs so zhes bya ba 'di byin no// rdo rje theg pa blan med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad
215b2(rgyud): pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho
215b3(rgyud): na nyid 'dus pa las/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud// rdzogs s+ho// / de nas byang chub
215b4(rgyud): sems dpa' sman langs te// bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba bdag po// rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa' che// sems can don mchog bdag nyid
215b5(rgyud): can// shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje'i bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal// sems dpa' byung ba de nyid don// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems can don chen dgongs pa'i
215b6(rgyud): don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas chos ni chos chen po// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// smra ba chen po rab rib mchog/ sems dpa' chen po
215b7(rgyud): khyod phyag 'tshal// las chen bsrung brten po ste// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa// bdag nyid chen po 'gro skyong mchog/ sems dpa' rgyud khyod phyag 'tshal lo// kha rol/
216a1(rgyud): phyin pa kun brnyes pa/ kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po// sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po// shes rab chen po khyod phyag 'tshal/ thugs rje chen po
216a2(rgyud): mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal// shAk+Sha seng ge shakya che// shAkya shAkya thub pa che// 'dul
216a3(rgyud): ba chen po khyab pa po// dkri don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// rdo rje mgon po mgon po che// sems can
216a4(rgyud): tshigs ni khyod phyag 'tshal// 'od chen snang ba chen po ste// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dga' bo chen rab dpa' mchog/ sde dpon dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal/ tshangs pa
216a5(rgyud): rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i sku ste sku'i mchog/ sku gsum sku min
216a6(rgyud): bsgom pa'o// kun gyi sku ste sku che ba// rdo rje sku khyod phyag 'tshal lo// gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog/ gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin tu gsung
216a7(rgyud): ci ga// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sems min sems ste sems kyi mchog/ sems gsum sems min ston pa po// thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje sems khyod
216b1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum pa rdor mir sbyong // rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rdorje rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bde gshegs
216b2(rgyud): bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis skra ciganyen byed dam// klog gam yA
216b3(rgyud): na bsgrub pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang // chos
216b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' bstsal ba'i tshig gsan nas// de bzhin
216b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad par gsol// de nas yang de
