216b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshig su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba
216b7(rgyud): sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang // 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams
217a1(rgyud): de nyid@#cad kyi mdun du// rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun tu khyab par byas nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
217a2(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems
217a3(rgyud): can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag du// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul
217a4(rgyud): shin tu phra mo thams cad ji srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis// rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad
217a5(rgyud): rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par
217a6(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro ba'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag du// de bzhin du
217a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo ji srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin
217b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshigs su bcad pa
217b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// pad mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas 'di
217b3(rgyud): gsungs ma thag tu// de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo ji srid pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal
217b4(rgyud): pos pad mo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig
217b5(rgyud): rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi
217b6(rgyud): khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sbom pa yang rung // de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rI rab ri'i rgyal po'i rtse mo// rdo rje dang // nor bu
217b7(rgyud): dang // rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdan la bzhugs nas// rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rab/
218a1(rgyud): de nyid@#tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi/
218a2(rgyud): yi nang du babs nas kyang / dgos phyir sems can kun gyi don// rdo rje 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon pos rab tu bsgrub par mdzod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
218a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du bar mdzad du gsol// de nas yang de
218a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam
218a5(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas// phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang
218a6(rgyud): nga'i thugs dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rigs thams cad dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang de'i thugs su
218a7(rgyud): zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnang nas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungaso// mdor na sangs rgyas thams
218b1(rgyud): cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag du// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi/
218b2(rgyud): rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na// de bzhin gshegs pa ji skad bzhugs pa rnams las// de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi
218b3(rgyud): khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku 'phro bar mdzad pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
218b4(rgyud): chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad dang // gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang // sem
218b5(rgyud): kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang // rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang // yan lag dang // nying lag thams cad dang // gnas thams cad dang / mtshan ma thams cad dang // dpe byed
218b6(rgyud): bzang po thams cad dang // ba spu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // thugs rnams su zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
218b7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsung dang thugs rdo rjer de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
219a1(rgyud): du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas// ri ba rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying po byang chub pa gang na ba der gshegs nas// ched du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi/
219a2(rgyud): shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/ rtswa blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sems can bstan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog
219a3(rgyud): gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams// mu stegs lta ba la gnas par mdzad// mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// lta ba ngan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag bya ba'i
219a4(rgyud): phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyi de kho na nyid mi shis nas// 'di skad du dge sbyong ci byang chub kyi phyir 'di
219a5(rgyud): lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi bzad pa spro bar mdzad zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rtswa de bting ste steng du bzhugs nas/ lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal
219a6(rgyud): to// grog po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don ma rtogs nas// lha rnams
219a7(rgyud): kyi dbang po brgya byin gan bar dong nas// ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di brjod do// de sgra rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i
219b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi tshogs kyis bskor te// gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do// de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang //
219b2(rgyud): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang // lhan cig du 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha'
219b3(rgyud): dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pos lha thams cad kyi bdag po mthu bo che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
219b4(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing // yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis// 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// /
219b5(rgyud): snyam du shes par ma byed cig/ lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis// lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no// de legs kyis der mchod
219b6(rgyud): pa la mngon par bsgrub po// de nas lha thams cad bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gang na dang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bsnying por byang chub zhags
219b7(rgyud): pa gang na ba der deng nas// ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thug
220a1(rgyud): dad@#/ brtse bar dgos te// rang gi gdan 'di las bzhengs la// lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
220a2(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' bsngal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
220a3(rgyud): byang chub sbyin par par bsgrubs shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub gsol bar mi nus so// ci ste bdag gis nus par gyur
220a4(rgyud): na// bdag cag nyid yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing // yang tshigs sa su bcad pa 'di gsung
220a5(rgyud): so// de nis gzugs min gzugs min min// bden min brdzun min gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de
220a6(rgyud): dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa'i gdan las bzhengs te// lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// grogs po rnams
220a7(rgyud): stan 'di la 'dug la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya bar bsgrubs shig/ de dag gis gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das rngos thog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan
220b1(rgyud): de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du// tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang chub sems ni brtan par byos// sems dpa'i rdo rje brtan byas la// sang+yas
220b2(rgyud): su ni bdag bsgoms shig/ de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so zhes thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i tho rangs 'jig rten dang
220b3(rgyud): 'thun par bya ba'i phyir// bdud bam par byas nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs sangs rgyas su mngon par sangs rgyas nas// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa
220b4(rgyud): med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa// 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la bzhugs pa la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do// rdo rje sems dpa'
220b5(rgyud): sems dpa' che// theg pa chen po bdag nyid che// snang ba che zhing dag pa che// mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems
220b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dod pa bdag pa che// kun gyi bde ba bde ba che// bde mchog thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag
220b7(rgyud): 'tshal lo// rdo rje legs pa dges pa che// legs shes bya ba rab mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dges pa che// rab ges khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// dbang
221a1(rgyud): / bslang bzang po bdag po che/ rin chen thams cad mdzes pa me// ma brgyan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gzi brjid gzi brjid rtse// 'od kyi lam pa chen po/
221a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bang ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpa' che ba// rgyal mtshan che ba nor rab gtor// rnam kha'i rgyal mtshan yub che// gtong ba'i rgyal
221a3(rgyud): mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dges pa che zhing rab dges pa// dges pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dges// chos dges khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni
221a4(rgyud): chos pa// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyor ba// sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig
221a5(rgyud): spyod ral gri chen po che// sangs rgyas mtshan khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor lo che// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi
221a6(rgyud): 'khor lo khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje bsung ba gsung ba che// spros med yi ge chen po che// yi ge med pa bzlas pa che// sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las te/
221a7(rgyud): las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal la// rdo rje bsrung bgo cha che// go cha mchog ste brtse/
221b1(rgyud): pa che// bsrung ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khrob che// ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs
221b2(rgyud): chen te// bsrung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcing ba che// khu tshur chen po phyag rgya mchog/ rdo rje khu tshur khyed phyag 'tshal/
221b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas phyag bya zhing // brjod de mchod de bsti stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// byang chub sems ni khyod yin te// khyod la rten nas rgyal
221b4(rgyud): ba dang / dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun/ byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas/ sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyud/ rdo rje
221b5(rgyud): sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal/ rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal/ rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// / rdo rje las ni khyod phyag
221b6(rgyud): 'tshal// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshan mchog gis ni khyod bstod pa'i// / bsod nams kyang yin des
221b7(rgyud): kun kyang / sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni/ rab dad pas ni lan gcig tsam/ ga
222a1(rgyud): #gis legs par brjod pa ni/ kun kyang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan
222a2(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig
222a3(rgyud): tu 'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so zhes bya ba byin no// rdo rje theg pa bla na med/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsung /
222a4(rgyud): theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so//
222a5(rgyud): rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bstsal
222a6(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa
222a7(rgyud): thams cad dges shing mnyes nas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sas dpas gsung ba la mngon par dges gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba//
222b1(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// gcig zhus//
223a1(rgyud): rdo rje rjertse mo/
223a2(rgyud): mo bzhugs
223b1(rgyud): rgya gar skad du// badz+ra shi khar ma hA gurgya yo gtan tra// bod skad du// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo/ oM kun tu bzang ba
223b2(rgyud): la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas rnal po rdo rje 'chang / kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'khor lo de ni brtag byas nas/
223b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// ma lus thub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// thub pa'i dbang phyug gsol ba
223b4(rgyud): 'debs// rnal 'byor tshul chen bsgrub byed cing / cho ga sna tshogs yang 'byung // rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i/ 'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol// mgon po bdag
223b5(rgyud): ni skal chen te/ khyod ni bya don sems byed// gsang ba mkhyen cing dgong bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rigs las mchog gyur gsungs// de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan/ rnal 'byor
223b6(rgyud): bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa de// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// gsung shig gsung shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste// rdo rje rnal 'byor rna tshogs bdag/ gas
223b7(rgyud): ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che// chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa// rtogs pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// 'di ni rtog pa ji lta bu// bsgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar
224a1(rgyud): lags// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi// ci phyir rgyud dag 'ching ba na// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// rigs sngags ji ltar bzlas
224a2(rgyud): par bgyi// thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rigs sngags dag ni bzlos pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dri ba'i tshogs mdor snyan pa'o// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// yi ge
224a3(rgyud): hUM ni ci yin brjod// ci'i phyir na yi ge phaT// swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// mchod pa ci phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // ci'i phyir na dkyil 'khor yin//
224a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor dang po zhags pa yi// skyes pa 'am yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig bya ba pa ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// thub
224a5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yis srogs gi phyir yang ni// dor ba mi bya gang zhig lags// khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar
224a6(rgyud): phyogs bcing ba// bgegs rnams bcing dang bcas pa yi// log 'dren ji ltar bskyed par bgyi// dga' ba chen po ji lta bur// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag bgyi// spos
224a7(rgyud): dang me tog de bzhin du// mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor brtags pa ji lta bu// gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig ci zhig yin par shes// rdo rje po/
224b1(rgyud): ma'i chog gang // sngon du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi// bsgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// skom 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags// mdun du dgug pa'i
224b2(rgyud): don ni ji ltar lags// 'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang ji lta bu// bcing bar bya ba'i lan ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur/ ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol
224b3(rgyud): nga lags// dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi// las kyi cho ga'i bya ba yang ni ji ltar bgyi// dge brtug po gsang chen ji lta bu// phyag
224b4(rgyud): rgya phyag rgya'i lan ni ji ltar bgyi// mchod dang mchod pa'i lan ni ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo ji ltar 'byung // 'khor lo'i rnam pa bye brag du zhig mchis// dngos dang
224b5(rgyud): / dngos med ji ltar spangs pa lags// bla ma gsang 'byung 'od zer gsang ba ni// sbyin bsreg rnam pa du ma brjod// zab khung ji lta bu zhig lags// sbyin bsrog mdor bdus ji lta bu/
224b6(rgyud): las rnams ji ltar 'byung ba lags// las rnams pa du ru brjod// gsang ba rnams ni rnam pa du// mchog du gsang ba ji ltar brjod// de nyid ji lta bu zhig lags// phyag rgya nye
224b7(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ni// mchod pa'i phyag rgya ji ltar lags// rigs kyi lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// ji ltar bsgrub bya shin tu bsgrub// rdo rje phra mo ji ltar brjod// dgegs ni ji ltar
225a1(rgyud): gsal bar bgyi// mdor na rigs pa 'dzin pa dang / slob dpon ji lta bu zhig lags// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang ldan pa'i// 'khor lo rnams pa dU ru/
225a2(rgyud): brjod// dngos grub mtshan nyid bsgrub byed pa'i khasna tshogs rtog pa ji lta bu// thig rnams rtag pa nyid dang ni// dngos grub sna tshogs ji lta bu// gsang ba dang bye ma ji lta lags rgyud kyi don
225a3(rgyud): ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje 'chang ba dadrug 'di zhig/ drag po'i don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje zhi ba 'di ni zhi// ci yi phyir na zhi bar mdzod// phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po 'ang ci zhig
225a4(rgyud): lags/ ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod// ci yi phyir na khro bor brjod// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci'i phyir rdo rje brjod par bgyi// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ni// de yi rdo rje
225a5(rgyud): ci lta bu// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje'i rigs kun gang gis lags// chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// rigs kyi rnam pa du yin brjod// ci yi
225a6(rgyud): phyir na rigs su brjod// rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ chen po gnas gang zhig na gnas// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du/ ci phyir rdo
225a7(rgyud): nisems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di don cing // rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje bzi brjid ci yin brjod/ rje/
225b1(rgyud): rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs/ Ni yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyu ni 'khol che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las
225b2(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rdo rje bsrung ba khu tshur che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // de bzhin pa dang ma ni
225b3(rgyud): gang // dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi ci// dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // thog ma tha ma med 'di ci//
225b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu bdag nyid rab bzang nyid// rdo rje bdag nyid ji lta bu// ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dang po'i rig
225b5(rgyud): ni ji lta bu// chos kun skyes pa med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung ba 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs
225b6(rgyud): pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan 'das bcom ci yin brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// ci phyir shes/
225b7(rgyud): rab brjod par bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin// tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang // bsam gtan rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ci// srid gsum 'jig rten gsum don ci// ci yi
226a1(rgyud): #b+hi ga khams gsum ga/ 'khor ba'i dan cizhig yin/ lu 'das pa'ang ci yin dzod/ tag dang 'jig dang de bzhin dag/ reg pa chen po che yin
226a2(rgyud): brjod nam mkha' lani ci yi phyir/ gas nyid kyi ni ci yin brjod// 'byung ba chen po gang las 'byung // 'gogs pa ci zhig gang gis byed/ dri ba'i tshogs mdor snyan pa'o// ci yi phyir na/
226a3(rgyud): phyag rgyar brjod// ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya// ci'i phyir na rigs sngags brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyi
226a4(rgyud): brjod par bya// rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams/ rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcings pa thub chen po// gsang ba kun nas
226a5(rgyud): btus pa gsungs// bdag ni nyid la ni dbang bskur bar bya ba'i chog ji lta bu// yang na gzhan dag nyid la ni// dbang bskur ba ni ji ltar lags// ji ltar sems ni bskyed par bgyi/
226a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin ji lta bu zhig lags// de nyid rigs pa 'di lta bu// rdo rje ye shes ji lta bu// gzhan yang dgongs pa ji lta bu/ spyod pa ji lta bu zhig lags// gang yang rung ba'i rtags
226a7(rgyud): las byung // ming dang ming men shes par 'tshal// las 'bras med par byed pa dang // 'byin par byed pa gang las bshad/ lus ni nam mkha' bzhin 'byung ba'i// gang las
226b1(rgyud): byung ba brjod par byed// ci yi phyir na thar par brjod// rnal 'byor pa don ci yin brjod// rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed byed pa'i// rdo rje phra mo'i rnal 'byor gang // gzhan yang
226b2(rgyud): rang gis rigs dag las// rnal 'byor rtul shugs ji ltar brtsam// mdor na dbang du bya ba dang // de nyid gsang ba gang zhig lags// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'i//
226b3(rgyud): gsang ba rtogs chen las gsungs pa// dgongs pa rnams pa du ma yis// gsang ba gsungs shig blo gros che// rnal 'byor rnams pa du ru brjod// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung
226b4(rgyud): du// ji ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud du bshad// gsang ba'i rigs byung ji lta bu/ nga ni rang byung nyid yin te// khams gsum 'jig rten sa 'og na// sa stengs bla mya ngan 'das// ji skad bshad
226b5(rgyud): pa'i gsang ba'i gzhan// rdo rje can nyid khyab 'jug rang nyid yin// nyi ma zla ba gshin rje drag po nyid// rang nyid skyes dgu'i bdag ste pha ma yin// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar
226b6(rgyud): 'gyur// dri ba'i tshogs gnyis pa mdor bstan pa'o// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gsum lus dbang phyug che// gdong drag tshogs bcas lha'i ris kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// gzhan
226b7(rgyud): yang bza' dang tshogs ni gang yin pa/ nga bdag nyid ces ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// nga ni 'dod pa thar pa dang // de ni dmyal ba'i dmyal ba la// nga ni yi dgas dud 'gro'i bdag/
227a1(rgyud): tshig 'di 'i ltar rung bar 'gyur / nas gzhan yang 'dod la chags sems ldan// banas cig ldan 'dzin pa'i ska ba chags/ u sngags/
227a2(rgyud): thig na mngon dga' skye dgu'i rigs// ji ltar 'dod bzhin don rnams rtogs byed cing // ji skad bshad pa'i sna tshogs rigs dkyil 'khor// dag pa'i chos kyi 'byung gnas dgongs/
227a3(rgyud): mi shes// rang gi 'dod pas byung na rtogs byed pa// de la skye dgu bdag chen rtse bas gsungs// mchod 'os chen pos mchog ni dang po'i gnas// gsang ba'i dbang mchog mngon bsngos dbye
227a4(rgyud): bar gsol// skye dgu'i bdag po dkyil 'khor gsang bdun du// dam tshig mchod par ji ltar mchod par bya 'gyur// 'dod yon lnga bcas rol bar byed pa yis// dngos grub tshogs
227a5(rgyud): mchog chen po thob par 'gyur// dman pa'i 'dod las rigs kyi dngos grub 'byung // 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de bzhin b+ha ga ji ltar rtags ci 'dra// de yi 'jug
227a6(rgyud): ba yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdzas de dag ni ji ltar rab tu bsgrub// 'jig rten gsum na dman pa ji ltar 'gyur// de nas 'dod chags zhes pas dngos grub thob// 'dod chags dag phyir
227a7(rgyud): de ni ji ltar rung // chags bral sdig pa chags dang bral ba la/ gsang ba bstan pas sdig dngos ji ltar 'gyur// mator bas bsod nams mchog thob ji lta bu// skye dgu'i kun bsang ba bsod
227b1(rgyud): nams ji lta bu/ a byin blangs pas bsod nams 'gyur zhes pa'i// 'gal ba'i tshig dag ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// dga' ba chen po bud med bsten pa yis// tshe 'di la ni sangs rgyas
227b2(rgyud): mchog 'grub pa// mi gtsang 'dod pa bskyed pas sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bar ji ltar 'gyur// 'dir ni brdzun dang mtshangs pa'i bsod nams med// ji ltar brdzun
227b3(rgyud): ni bsod nams ldan par brjod// 'dir ni sems can gzhan gsad bza' bar bya// 'gal ba'i tshig ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// 'khor ba spangs kyang chos min 'gyur ba dang / mya
227b4(rgyud): ngan 'das la gzhol ba chos ma yin// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor gyi ni rjes 'jug pa// chos min 'gyur zhes ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// drag dang ser sna sdang ba'i sems ldan pa// chos min
227b5(rgyud): spyod cing brdzun pa'i tshig la chags// srid gsum mngon par gnas pas rnal 'byor bsgrub// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags bcas pas lhags par rgyal// rigs kyi rnal 'byor la byung
227b6(rgyud): ji ltar bsgrub// bla med go 'phang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// dag cing ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lhur blangs bya// sbyor ni 'thung dang gshang ba bza' ba yis// dag cing mchog gyur rnal
227b7(rgyud): 'byor dngos grub 'dod// mi gcing gshang gci zos shing thungs pa yis// yid 'dod dngos grub ji ltar rjes su 'thob// bud med bcas par lhan cig chos sbyong cing // gnyis
228a1(rgyud): mo@#ka lhan cig gyur pas dag mchod// ji ltar bud med lhan cig dkyil 'khor mchod// dngos grub dam pa mchog tu ji ltar 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje'i
228a2(rgyud): rigs 'byung kun ldan zhing // mchog tu mi bzad drag pos las can te// dag cing shin tu sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba'i de ni ji ltar de rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang brdegs cing
228a3(rgyud): gsad pa lhur len cing // bskrad dang drag po'i las can de dag ni// dag cing sdug la shin tu mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// gzhan yang bza' dang gtung ba
228a4(rgyud): lhur lon cing // snying 'byin pa yis dag 'dod pa nyid// de ni dag cing sdug la mtho bar 'gro// 'gal ba de ni ji ltar rung ba yin// gzhan yang nur bu rin chen phrogs pa yin// sdug cig
228a5(rgyud): brtan la mtho bar 'gro ba dang // gzhan yang nga rgyal ser sna lhur len pas// dag par 'gyur ba yin ni 'gal ba yin// gzhan yang las kyi rigs pa 'byung ba yis// mi dge ba
228a6(rgyud): yi las rnams thams cad bya// 'khrigs sogs tshogs rnams mang po yi// las byed pa ni ji ltar skyo mi 'gyur// gzhan yang brdzun tshig de bzhin 'khrigs pa yis// dag 'dod
228a7(rgyud): 'phags pa min pas gsang ba yi// rgyal ba'i dbang chen 'dod pas bdud ji skar sdug cing mtho 'gro'i ltar rung bar 'gyur/ khye mgon po khyod ni dag pa'i chos kyi tshogs ni khyod ni rtag
228b1(rgyud): tu rnal 'byor 'gyur/ kye mgon po khyod ni 'gyes chen bdud rtsi 'chang ba dam chos gsang ba'i 'byung gnas te// kye rgyal ba khyod ni dri med nyi ma'i bzhin du mi shes kun tu sbyong mdzad pa/
228b2(rgyud): khyab byed rgyal ba'i ngang tshul 'jig rten gsum gyi 'dren chen byang sems dga' ston kye// mdor bsdus pa'o// kun mchog thams cad rigs pa ste/ kun mkhyen dri ma gsum spangs pa/
228b3(rgyud): byang sems sangs rgyas rgyal po che// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid ni// ting nge 'dzin las bzheng nas kyang // phyogs rnams kun tu gzigs mdzad// thub pas mgon rnams rab btud
228b4(rgyud): nas// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs/ kye ma'o rnam dag ye shes rdo rje bdag/ kye ma'o sangs rgyas nyer thob pa/ kye ma 'o gar mkhan 'khor lo 'di// rang gi ye shes dri bar byed/
228b5(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// mchog tu gsang ba bshad par bya// shin tu rnyed dka' dam pa yi// rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye bya// bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyal mtshan dam pa
228b6(rgyud): bsgrengs par bya// rin chen sgrom gyi kha phye nas// shes rab kyis ni snang bar bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa// dam pa yang dag bshad par bya// bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs chen po/
228b7(rgyud): rtogs pa thams cad bsdus pa dang / gsang ba'i ba'i bye brag 'byed bye cing // rnal 'byor dgongs pa rnam par 'grol/ de nyid dam pa shes byed pa'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa
229a1(rgyud): / dpa/ dajon pa 'byong ga dang // 'khong na pa thong ga / 'a du yang gnas pa la rtog pa thams cad bcus bdung / dus gsus sgrub pa'i
229a2(rgyud): bya bar ldan// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor kun 'byung zhing // bya ba kun gyi thabs chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// rdo rje chos ni rab
229a3(rgyud): 'jug pa// sku gsung zhes bya gsang chen gyi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // rdo rje rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// ma rungs thams cad 'dul byed pa// khams gsum rnams rgyal
229a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // chos kyi rnal 'byor cho gar ldan// pad ma gar mkhan bskyed byed pa'i// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i// rtog pa thams cad bsdus
229a5(rgyud): pa dang // sbyin pa bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rin chen 'khor lo bskyed byed cing // byang chub sems dpa'i yid ches byed// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi
229a6(rgyud): thabs chen po// sna tshogs gar mkhan bskyed byed pa// las kyi rnal 'byor cho ga yi// rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa dang // de nyid shes shing dgongs pa shes// tshul chen mchog ni shes
229a7(rgyud): byed cing // mchog gi dang po sangs rgyas mchog/ rtog pa thams cad bsdus pa ste// go rims bzhin du 'jug byed pa'i// cig par sems can bya ba byed// bya ba chen no mchog gzhig
229b1(rgyud): chos dang longs spyod mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas gar mkhan 'khor lo ni// mchog tu ngom mtshar gyur pa 'di// bskal pa ji bzhin gsang ji bzhin// ji ltar sems can 'dul 'gyur
229b2(rgyud): bshad// sngon 'gyur 'das pa'i dus su ni// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ spro ba chen po ngo mtshar
229b3(rgyud): che// bka' dpag tu med pa spyod// go rims bzhin du de yis ni// dbang bskur bar du legs thob gyur// shes rab chen pos sa mthar phyin// gos kyi dbang ni thob gyur nas// 'og
229b4(rgyud): min stug po nyams dga' bar// blo gros chen po bzhags par gyur// bdag ni sangs rgyas mchog gyur zhes// rnal 'byor pa yi bsams nas ni/ bya ba mthar phyin bdag gis bshad//
229b5(rgyud): sems can don 'byung thob bya zhes// bya ba de la dgongs nas ni// sngon dang phyi mar bde chen med// chos kyi dga' ba rmad chen po'i// dga' ba spyad par bya snyam ste/ byang chub shing drangs
229b6(rgyud): bzhugs gyur nas// bya dka'i bya ba kun ldan ste// dbugs 'byang rngub pa'i 'gogs pa dang // sems dpa' med ba cing g.yo ba med// lus ni gang yang mi 'byung zhing // yan lnga
229b7(rgyud): spyod par mi byed de// de bas g.yo ba med chos la// yun ring du ni gnas par gyur// phyogs bcu ni thub dbang po// sangs rgyas kun gyis dgongs gyur pa// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i
230a1(rgyud): byang chub du// sdug bsngal bya ba'i rigs pa min// de bas bdag cag kun lhan cig/ bskul bar bya phyir 'gro snyam du// dgongs nas thams cad rab rgas
230a2(rgyud): ste// stug po ru ni byin par 'gyur// byon nas thub pa thams cad kyis// bskal ba mchog ni mdzad par gyur// oM badz+ra su shrIsh+ma zhes pa'o// rigs pa se gol brdabs nas ni/ byang chub sems
230a3(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bslar// phyogs rnams kun tu bltas pas na// sangs rgyas kyi ni rgya mtsho mthong // thub pas mgon rnams las btud de// bka' stsol zhes ni gsol ba btab// mgon chen sangs
230a4(rgyud): thams cad kyis// gsung cig zhes ni bka' bstsal pa// sems kyis spyod yul ci 'dra zhes// rang gi sems la so sor gtogs// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rang gi sems
230a5(rgyud): la rtog bzhin du// yun ring du ni gnas pa na// sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste// yan lag kun gyis rab btud nas// zhes pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/ sems kyi rnam pa ma mthong ste
230a6(rgyud): sems kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// sems kyi spyod yul shes par dka'// khyod la snying po rang bzhin gyis// phra mo bzlas pas rab tu spyod/ oM tsi ta pra/
230a7(rgyud): ti be ting ka ro mi// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rang gi sems la rtog bzhin du// thang cig de la gnas pa ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du mthong // de nas sems 'di ci zhig yin/
230a8(rgyud): nyon mongs sa bon can nam ci// de dag pa 'am ni mi dge'i sems/ kun bzhi'i sa bon can sems sam/ chos kyi rgyu mthun rtogs gyur nas// pha rol phyin pa drug bsten pa/
230b1(rgyud): 'di ni sems can dag pa ste/ kun nas nyon mongs gnas ma yin// yun ring du ni bsod nams dang // ye shes tshogs chen bsags pa ste// ji ltar zla ba gang ba yis// dag cing dang /
230b2(rgyud): la rnyog pa med// de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir// sems ni zla ba gang dang tshungs// dngos po yod dang med min pas// ji ltar zla ba mtshungs nyid yin// 'od kyang bsod nams ye shes
230b3(rgyud): che// rdzogs pa zla ba dang mtshungs bstan// legs byas tshogs ldan rang sems kyi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong nas ni// dga' zhing dgu pa skyes nas kyang // slar yang tshig tu rab
230b4(rgyud): smras pa// bcom ldan mgon po bdag gis ni// nyon mongs dri ma rnam dag cing // gzung dang 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i// rang sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong // sangs rgyas thams
230b5(rgyud): cad kyis gsungs pa// thog mar 'byung ba'i sems 'di bzang // dang por blo bur nyon mongs rnams// byang chub sems kyis dag par byed// dngos po thams cad rnams spangs pa'i//
230b6(rgyud): bdag pa ni snying po 'di// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// byang chub kyi ni sems la rtogs// oM b+ho de tsi ta ud pa ta yA mi// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// sems kyi dbus su rtogs pa na/ zla ba'i
230b7(rgyud): dbus su// zla ba ni// dkyil 'khor gnyis bzong ba ni// thub pa rnams la tshig smras pa// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa dag thong ngo // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// byang chub sems kyi rab
230b8(rgyud): bzhin bstan// bstan par bya ba'i ched du ni// de ni legs par bsgrub par gyis// khyod la snying po sbyin bya ste// zlos shing de ni bstan par dgong sa// mai ti shwa badz+ra dkyil 'khor gnyis
231a1(rgyud): rdo rje po#pa'i dbus gnas ni// rdo rje chen po sems byed cing // thang cig so sor brtags pas na// shin tu bstan pa mthong gyur nas// smras pa rdzogs pa'i sangs
231a2(rgyud): rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor dbus su rdo rje mthong // zlas pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ni// dbus na rdo rje dang ldan mthong // de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyi rdo rje che
231a3(rgyud): rdo rje dbyings ni bskyed pa yi// shin tu brtan pa 'di spros shig/ ya badz+ra yad ma ko haM// snying po dag pa blangs nas ni// rdo rje'i lus su rnam bsgoms pa// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tasta a
231a4(rgyud): haM/ snying po dag par blangs nas ni// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnams bsgoms pas// rnam kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/ kun 'khyen ye shes thob par gyur// sangs rgyas kun la rab btu/
231a5(rgyud): nas// smras pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// mgon po bdag la byin rlabs cing // bdag gi byang chub brtan par mdzod// grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rdo rje dbyings kyi tshig thos
231a6(rgyud): nas// mgon rnams thugs dkar zhugs par gyur// rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi sam b+he d+hi dri d+ha badz+ra ban d+ha/ grags chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// rig sngags
231a7(rgyud): thams cad brjod pa na// rdo rje dbyings ni shin tu brtan// de nyid ye shes mngon sangs rgyas// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje thugs dkar nas byung ste// chos kyi dbang bskur bzhi po yis//
231a8(rgyud): de tshe thub pa dbang bskur gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' byas pa yi// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur bas// 'bras bu byang chub sems ldan gang // rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin//
231b1(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum dag gis// sbyin dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bzang dang // mkha' mtshungs rin chen thob byed pa// nor bu'i rin chen dbang bskur yin// bskal pa grangs med gsum
231b2(rgyud): du ni// gzhan gyis dka' ba sbyang ba dang // brtson 'grus kyis ni 'bras na bsgrub pa// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur yin// de bzhin gshegs pa snying po dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
231b3(rgyud): tshul chen te// nyon mongs 'das kyis mgos pa// rdo rje pad ma'i dbang bskur yin// byang chub sems rdzogs rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi// dbang bskur bzhi po de rnams chos kyi dbyings/
231b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas rang bzhin yon tan dam pa'i tshogs// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// ngo bo nyid kyi ska ru 'dod// rdo rje chos
231b5(rgyud): kyi dbang bskur yang // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ru 'dod// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur bas// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes te/ mkha' tshungs
231b6(rgyud): chos kyi snying po che// rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas// sprul pa yi ni sku ru 'dod// gsang ba bzhi yi dbang bskur bas// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob// de nas ming gi
231b7(rgyud): dbang bskur bas// thub de rnam snang mdzad chen gyur// chos nyid kyang ni yang dag rtogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs par rtags// chos kun dngos po med pas te// mtshan ma
231b8(rgyud): med cing // gsal byed med/ mtshan nyid med cing mkha' dang mtshungs// dmigs pa rnam par spangs pa ste// rang bzhin med cing brjod du med// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min/
232a1(rgyud): rdokyi #/ gzhan yang gsang bar rtags pas ste// de phyir 'dir ni rtogs pa brjod// rtogs pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// bdag med dngos
232a2(rgyud): po yod pa min// chos rnams med cing rtog pa med// 'on kyang chos nyid yang dag rtogs// chos kyang longs spyod rdzogs par rtogs// rtog pa nyams su myong bar brjod// 'dir ni
232a3(rgyud): ngo mtshan nyid du rtogs/ chos kun gzugs can min pa dang // gzugs can du yang 'di ru bstan// chos kun tshig gi spyod yul min// sgra ru yang ni 'dir bstan to// de yang ngo
232a4(rgyud): mtshar chos 'di ru// rtog pa rtog pa yin par brjod// ci phyir 'di ni ngo mtshar chos// de nyid gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// las rnams drag pa nyid dang ni// gzugs can tshig gi mthu dag
232a5(rgyud): dang / 'bras phyir sdoms pa ngo mtshar chos// de phyir 'dir ni rtog par mdzod// de bas ngo mtshar chos 'dir ru// rtog pa 'ba' zhig rtog pa yin// 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu// sems
232a6(rgyud): can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// byang chub du ni sems skyed nas// pha rol phyin drug spyod pa dag/ rten pa rtog pa nyid yin no// bsgrub pa'i don ni ji lta bu// gang zag chos la bdag med
232a7(rgyud): dang // gzungs dang 'dzin baspangs pa yis// rab tu dga' ba'i sa bsgrub pa// de tshed sgrub pa'i don yin no// ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyim/ rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// 'kho/
232b1(rgyud): brgyud du 'dod pa yin// phyi ma zhes bya pha rol te/ rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin/ rgyud ni rgyun chags zhes bya ste// phyi ma snga ma las 'byung ba'i// de nyid gsang ba sbas zhes pa'i//
232b2(rgyud): rgyud ni phyi mar brjod pa yin// ci phyir rgyud dang phyi ma las// sa mthar phyin pa'i rgyal ba mchog/ srid pa'i brtson ra las rgal yin// yang na gang zhig rgal 'gyur ba/ rgyud ni phyi ma
232b3(rgyud): yin par bshad/ rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar 'byung // sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos longs spyod// sangs rgyas thugs rjes bskul ba yi// rgyud don/
232b4(rgyud): yang dag byung ba yin// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs phyung ba'i// chos dang longs spyod byung ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang chen ni/ rgyud don yang dag byung ba yin// rdo rje 'chad
232b5(rgyud): drag 'di ci zhig/ sangs rgyas gzugs kyis mi 'dul ba// sems can gdug tshogs de yi phyir// rang gi ye shes byang chub sems// rdo rje drag por yang dag byung // drag po'i don
232b6(rgyud): ni ji ltar 'byung // drag po drag po'i ming gis ni// drag po'i khro'o zhes su bstan// drag po'i las ni spyod byed rnams// 'chos shing zlog par byed pa yin// rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci
232b7(rgyud): zhig/ gdug pa de kun btul nas ni// slar yang zhi bar yang dag byung // de nyid rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // sems can don gyi thabs ston mdzad// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad ni/
233a1(rgyud): rdo rtse po #khro ba'i dbang phyug dag du bstan// de nyid zhi dang drag po dang // phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// sna tshogs gzugs can rnal
233a2(rgyud): 'byor che// sems can smin bya 'ba' zhig phyir// nyon mongs gdug la rtser dgongs shing // zhi ba'i don ni yang dag byung // phyag na rdo rje ci yi phyir// nyon mongs gdug pa des
233a3(rgyud): bcom phyir// byang chub sems ni rang bzhin bzang // rdo rje phyag na snams mdzad pa// de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod// dus gsum bdud rnams de bzhin du/ mi mthun phyogs kyis
233a4(rgyud): mi shig pa// byang sems rang bzhin rdo rje ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis brtan pa'i tshogs// de ni sangs rgyas kun dang ldan// gsang chen rdo rje de lta bu// phyag na rtags sku snams
233a5(rgyud): pas na/ de ni phyag na rdo rjer brjod// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// rdo rje gtum po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin shin tu bstan// nga rgyal nyon mongs zhags pa bzang
233a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rang 'byung ba// ci yi phyir na gtum por brjod// gtum gdug drag po chen po ni// rang 'byu de nyid kho na ste// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed phyir//
233a7(rgyud): drag po'i don ni gtum po yin// ni yi phyir na khro bor brjod// bsod dang krod dang drag pos ste// 'di ni khro bas don du brjod/ nga ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar// nyon mongs phyogs
233a8(rgyud): rnams bsreg par byed// rdo rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci phyir rdo rje brjod par bya// sra zhing snying po khong stong med// gcad dang gzhig par bya ba med// bsreg par bya min
233b1(rgyud): 'jig med pas// stong nyid rdo rjer brjod par bya// 'gro drug 'khor lo spong byed cing // sdig pa 'dral bar byed pa yi// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// nyon mongs thams cad
233b2(rgyud): sel bar byed// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes dang // byang sems brtertan pa gang yin pa// de ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// de bzhin
233b3(rgyud): gshegs pa kun gyi bdag/ de'i rdo rje ji lta bu// rtog pa thams cad brel zhing / chos su 'dzin pa rnams spangs pa// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin du// stong pa nyid la rdo rje brjod/
233b4(rgyud): gzugs sogs chos kyi rang bzhin gang // 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi brtan pa gang // de lta bu ni rdo rje yin// rdo rje rigs kyi don 'di ci// bden
233b5(rgyud): zhing don yod de bzhin nyid// 'gyur ba med cing skye ba med// ragag med de kho na nyid gang // de lta bu ni rdo rje yin// don yod 'gyur ba med pa yi// de lta bu rigs 'gyur ba//
233b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su brjod// de ni rdo rje'i rigs zhes brjod// thog ma tha ma med pa'i chos// byang chub sems dpa' zhes su brjod de// bden zhing slu ba med pa
233b7(rgyud): yi// byang chub seMs gang de rigs yin// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// phyogs rnams thams cad kun khyab pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni// rdo dbyings dang mnyam thug pa
233b8(rgyud): mid// rdo rje 'chang rnams de rnyed do// rdo kun gang gi yin/ chos kyi bdag po bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs sangs rgyas// mgon des yongs su bzungs pa de/ rdorje
234a1(rgyud): rdo rtsi rigs dkyil 'khor yin gsungs pa// ston pa gang yin 'di rnams su yi yin// rjes su ston par byed pa gang // de yi spyod las bya ba ni// gsang ba kun tu bsdus pa
234a2(rgyud): gsungs// 'di'i ston pa byang chub sems// rjes su ston byed shes rab thabs// phyag rgya rnams ni spyod lam ste// sngags rnams de yi bya ba yin// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags/
234a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang ba de kun gyi// rigs ni byang chub sems yin te// byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs bzang // sangs rgyas kyi yang de nyid yul// chen po gnas gang zhig na gan
234a4(rgyud): chos rnams kun la gnas med de// rtsa ba med sems spyod yul lo// chos rnams thams cad gzugs can min// chos kyi dbyings de spyod yul med// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod/
234a5(rgyud): rigs ni rnam pa brgya gsungs te/ mdo ru bsdus na rnams pa lnga// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // chos dang las dang rnam pa lnga ci'i phyir na rigs su brjod// mchog dang dman pa
234a6(rgyud): bye brag gis// rigs zhes bya ba de rnams gnyis// sems can las ngan zhugs pa yi// rigs ni dman pa yin par brjod// las ngan 'gro ba spangs nas ni// byang chub sems la/
234a7(rgyud): 'jug pa mchog/ de bas rdo rje rigs brjod pa// rigs de yang ni rnams pa lnga// rigs gdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ byang chub sems ni rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig pa
234a8(rgyud): med// mgon po chen po rigs kyi bdag/ de ni rigs kyang lnga pa yin// ci'i phyir na sems par brjod// sems dpa' zhes bya rnam gsum ste// byis pa de bzhin mkhas pa dang /
234b1(rgyud): de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang // rnams gsum sems par brjod par bya// yang gsungs pa// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// sems dpa'i bris pa ci yin brjod// sems
234b2(rgyud): dpa' mkhas pa ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// gnas gang zhig du brjod bya ba// de ni yi sems dpar brjod// chos sam yang na chos min dang // legs byas nyes
234b3(rgyud): bar byas pa la// mi shes mun pa'i bsgribs gyur cing // chos la nyon mongs bdag nyid 'dzin// dman zhing gti mug rigs can 'gyur// de lta bu ni bris par mdzod// nyon mongs kun
234b4(rgyud): la chags pa dang // de bzhin srid pa ngan song gsum// mi shes mun pa la chags pa// de 'dir bris pa brjod par bya// sems dpa'i mkhas pa gang zhig yin// dri ma las 'das nyon
234b5(rgyud): mongs spongs// rnal 'byor ldan zhing brtul zhugs che// mi shes ling tog 'joms byed pa// de ni sems dpang mkhas par brjod// 'dir ni byang chub sems dpa' gang // chos
234b6(rgyud): kyi de nyid rtogs gyur cing // 'khor ba'i gnas nas sad 'gyur te// sems can rnams ni sad byed pa// de ni byang chub de sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// de la
234b7(rgyud): byang chub rnam gsum ste// dman dang mchog dang bar ma'o// dman pa nyan thos sems yin te/ bar ma rang rgyal byang chub po// mchog ni byang chub sems yin te// de ni mi 'gyur rdo rje/
234b8(rgyud): yin// sku gsung thugs rnams bzhag pa gang // byang chub mchog du brjod par bya// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// byang chub mchog gi ye shes gang // de ni rdo rje nges par
235a1(rgyud): rdo rje po#brjod// ye shes rdo rje las byung ba// de ni rdo rje sems dpar brjod// rdo rje 'chang bkun gyi rgyal// ci yi phyir na sems dpar brjod// rdo rje sems dpa'
235a2(rgyud): mgon po che// dga' chen de ni chags sam ci// sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i phyir// sems can rnams la chags pa ste// de ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhes su bsgrags/
235a3(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi 'bras bu ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med gang / de ni rdo rje sems rang bzhin// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa'o// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje rigs kun rgyas
235a4(rgyud): po ste// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes su brjod// dgug dang dbab pa'i rdo rje ni// de'i rdo rje rgyal por brjod// bsdu ba yi ni dngos po bzhi// bcom ldan 'das kyi gang spyad pa// sems can
235a5(rgyud): dgug pa'i thabs shes rdo rje rgyal por yang dag byung // rdo rje chags pa 'di don cing // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed pa// rjes su chags pa zhes su brjod// rdo rje chags pa
235a6(rgyud): bdud chen po// de ni rdo chags par brjod// sems can smin phyir bcom ldan gyi// glang rje byang chub spyod pa spyad// byang chub spyod pa rjes chags pa// rdo rje rdugs par yang dag byung /
235a7(rgyud): rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // legs so zhes pa rab stor byed// byang chub sems dpa' kun mgu byed// de ni rdo rje legs par brjod/
235a8(rgyud): sems can dag pa mgu byed cing // rdo rje 'chang rnams bsgrub par byed// sems can khams rnams dga' byed cing // gsang ba 'dzin pa rangs par byed// chos dang longs spyod rdzog
235b1(rgyud): / sku'i phyir// bcom ldan 'di chos rnam pa drug/ gang gi tshe na sngon bsgrubs pa// rdo rje legs pa yang dag byung // rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha'
235b2(rgyud): mnyam rin cheni lta bu ste// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che/ de ni rdo rje rin chen brjod// sems dpa' chen po'i bskur gyur te// sems dpa' kun gyi dbang bskur ba// byang chub snying po'i
235b3(rgyud): dbang bskur gyis/ rgyal ba'i sras rnams 'dzin par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi sbyin pa gang // mkha' mtshungs rdo rje yang dag byung / de ni rin chen don yod ste// de ni rdo rje rin
235b4(rgyud): chen brjod/ rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// ma rig ling tog 'khor ba'i// mi shes mun pa 'joms byed cing // thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// ci phyir rdo rje
235b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan yin// rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin// thar pa'i lam 'gro rgyal mtshan te// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje bzhad pa ci yin brjod// rnal 'byor chen
235b6(rgyud): po rdo rje bzhad// sangs rgyas thams cad bzhad byed cing // byang chub sems dpa' kun dbugs 'byin// de ni rdo rje bzhad par brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rnal 'a 'byor chen
235b7(rgyud): po sangs rgyas chos// sangs rgyas sems can rtogs byed pa// dag pa de bzhin gshegs snying po// de ni rdo rje chos su brjod// rdo rje rnon po ci yin brjod/ shes rab rnon po ye shes
236a1(rgyud): #/ che/ shin tu rtag pa'i nyon mongs bcod// shes bya'i bsgrib pa'ang gcod pas na// de ni rdo rje rnon por brjod/ rdo rje d+hu yini ci// 'khor lo sangs rgyas ga
236a2(rgyud): shes pa// chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu brten// dam chos ro'i bcud las byung // de ni rdo rje rgyu zhes bya// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi chos chen po// mkha' mtshungs tshig
236a3(rgyud): dang bral ba ste// tshig med tshig las yang dag 'byung // de ni rdo rje smra bar brjod// ci yi phyir na rdo rje las// sems can smin dang grol ba yi// sangs rgyas kun gyi las gang dang // sa da
236a4(rgyud): rgyas las ni bdag med pa// de ni rdo rje las zhes bya// rdo rje bsrung ba ci yin brjod// byang chub sems dpa'i bsrung ba ste// theg pa dman las spongs byed cing / rtse mo nas rtul
236a5(rgyud): bsrung byed pa// de ni rdo rje bsrung bar brjod// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'di don ni// sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing // nyon mongs thams cad nges par gcod// srid pa zad byed gnod
236a6(rgyud): sbyin che// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// rdo rje khu tshur ci yin brjod// bden zhing gzhan min de bzhin nyid// 'gyur med de kho na nyid gang // sangs rgyas de bzhin nyid ye shes// de ni
236a7(rgyud): rdo rje khu chur brjod// sngon du byang chub sems 'gyur gang // rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'byung // bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// rdo rje rgyal po yang dag byung // sems can
236b1(rgyud): smin byed chags pa'o// byang chub spyod pa legs pas ste// de nyid ces bya dam tshig che// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag byung // sngon gyi sbyin pa'i spyod 'gyur gang // de ni rdo rje rin
236b2(rgyud): chen brjod// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ de ni rdo rje gzi brjid brjod// 'byung po kun la byams pa dang // rdo rje rgyal mtshan yang dag byung // chos kyi sbyin pa bzhad pa che// dbang
236b3(rgyud): bskur bzhi po brtan pa yis// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi ting 'dzin gang // rdo rje chos ni de las byung / nyon mongs gcod byed rdo rje che// rdo rje rnon po yang dag 'byung // mngon shes dang ni
236b4(rgyud): mthu la sogs// de ni rdo rje rgyu ru brjod// gzungs la sogs pa grub pa ni// rdo rje smra bar yang dag byung // ye shes chen po chos chen po// dam tshig ces bya dga' chen po// ye shes
236b5(rgyud): mngon par rtogs de dag/ rdo rje chos las yang dag byung // brtson 'gras pha rol phyid rgyal po// rdo rje las su yang dag byung // theg pa dman pa spong byed pa// de phyir rdo rje bsrung
236b6(rgyud): bar brjod// nyon mongs srid pa gdon chen po// rdo rje gnod sbyin yang dag byang // de nyid ye shes mngon byang chub/ de nyid rdo rje khu tshur brjod// las kyi dam tshig bzhi po de/ las
236b7(rgyud): kyi sems dpa' bdag nyid che// las kyi dkyil 'khor las byung ba'i// rdo rje las ni de las 'byung // gzhan yang byang chub sems ni bskyed pa'i las// rdo rje sems dpa' yang
236b8(rgyud): dag byung / rdo rje rang bzhin sems de yang / rnam pa bzhi ru byung bste/ 'dzin pa dang ni grol ba dang / dbugs 'byin mya ngan 'das 'gon byed// sems dpa' rgyal po tshogs pa che/ rdo rje/
237a1(rgyud): legs par yang dag byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis las// rdo rje rin chen rab tu bsgrags// bsod nams rang bzhin rin chen de// rnams bzhi ji/
237a2(rgyud): skad bshad pa bzhin// ye shes kyi ni tshogs brjod pa// de ni rdo rje chos zhes bya// ye shes rang bzhin chos de yang // rnams pa bzhi ni yang dag byung // brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa nyid// de ni
237a3(rgyud): rdo rje las su brjod// brtson 'grus rang bzhin de las yang // rnams pa bzhir ni yang dag byung // rtsom dang sbyor ba zhes bya ba// so sor rtog dang bsgrub pa de// brtson 'grus de bzhin/
237a4(rgyud): delas bzhi po// de las mthar gyis byung ba yin// sems dpa' 'di rnams gang las byung // rdo rje sems sogs bzhin du// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // pha rol phyin
237a5(rgyud): drug spyod pa las// rdo rje can rnams byung bar 'dod// de bzhin pa dang ma ni gang // ma ni shes rab po phyin// pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste// pad ma las ni sangs rgyas sras//
237a6(rgyud): rdo rje can rnams gang las byung // rdo rje rgyal po de bzhin chags// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje chos dang de bzhin no// de rnams shes rab rtse bor bstan// rdo rje sems dpa'
237a7(rgyud): rdo rje lags/ ga'i brjid de bzhin bshad pa nyid/ rgyu dang smra ba sems dpa' // de rnams thabs las byung ba yin/ rdo rje las dang do srung / gnod sbyin de bzhin khu tshur zhing/
237b1(rgyud): shes rab thabs su grags pa ste// brten pa chen po'i tshigs su bshad// rdo rje rigs ni kun gyi gtso// rdo rje lcags kyum ru bshad// rdo rje rin chen mchog gyur pa// rdo rje sems dpa' de
237b2(rgyud): bzhin pa// pa ni rdo rje rgyal po rgyu/ ba ni rdo rje rnon po ste// pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po yi// bad 'dzin gang las byung ba'o// rdo rje gzi brjid rin chen pa// rdo rje rgyal mtshan ni yin/
237b3(rgyud): brjod// nor bu rin chen bzang po yi// rin chen gang las byung ba'o// pha ni rgyal po rdo rje las// ma ni gnod sbyin bsrung ba ste// las kyi rigs can bzang po yi// las rnams gang
237b4(rgyud): las byung ba'o// dang po'i gang zhig yin ces na/ dngos kun dang po'i sa bon steng // rdo rje can kun dang po'i sems// 'dun dang dran dang ting nge 'dzin// rigs rnams kun gyi dang por
237b5(rgyud): bshad// yang gleng bzhi ci yin zhe na// rigs bzhi las ni yang dag byung // tshangs pa'i gnas chen dang ldan pa'i// snying rje bdag nyid can rnams kyi// snying rje chen po'i gleng gzhi yin/
237b6(rgyud): dmigs pa'i gang yin zhe na// rtog pa med cing dmigs pa med// dang po byang chub sems byung ba'i// pha rol phyin pa mchog drug ni/ de yi dmigs pa yin pa bshad// rkyen gang zhe/
237b7(rgyud): na/ rtags tu srid gsum mngon dga' ba/ sems can bsdug bsngal gyur bltas na// snying rje dang ni ldan pa yi// byang chub sems kyis bskul ba'o// gsang ba 'di ni gang nas byud/
238a1(rgyud): #'og min stug po nyams dga' zhing / stug po'i zhing khams 'jig med pa'i// de nas sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos// rdzogs par longs spyod tshul 'di byung //
238a2(rgyud): khyab bdag 'di rnams gang na spyi// rdo rje rin chen mchog chen gyi// gzhal yas khang pa yid 'ong zhing // sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ldan pa// de nas khyab bdag 'di rnams byung / thog
238a3(rgyud): ma tha ma med 'di cing // gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// sems can kun gyi shes pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang // chos dbyings rdo rje chen po ste// thog
238a4(rgyud): ma tha ma med par bshad// rab tu dga' ba nyid 'di ni// bde chen rab tu 'grub bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po chen// rab bzang nyid
238a5(rgyud): ni ji lta bu/ dngos po kun mchog rdo rje ni// byang chub kyi ni sems shes brjod// sangs rgyas bskyed byed bzang po yi// rdo rje rab bzang nyid ces bshad// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu/
238a6(rgyud): gdul bya 'phags pa'i skyes mchog nyid/ de ni rdo rje snying por brjod// de rnams bdag po rgyal po ni// rdo rje snying po bdag por bshad// ci yi phyir na kun tu bzang // byang chub sems
238a7(rgyud): dpa'i gnas ldan pa'i// 'gro bsrid pa'i skye gnas gang // de kun rtag du bzang bas na// kun tu bzang por brjod par bya// rdo rdo rje 'chang bgang / byang chub sems dpa'
238b1(rgyud): gang rdo rje// rdo rje gang de rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rdo rje rdo rje 'chang bar brjod// dang po'i rigs ni ji lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub kyi// grags chen rdzogs pa
238b2(rgyud): byang chub pa// da ni dang po'i rigs byang ste// de kho na nyid rigs la sogs// yang na rab tu mkhas pa rnams// bskal pa grangs med 'das nas ni// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob/
238b3(rgyud): gang // de nas dang po'i rigs byung yin// chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// de nyid shes shing rtogs pa dang // chos rnams thams cad rtog pa med/
238b4(rgyud): chos dang gang zag bdag med las// rigs de 'byung ba nyid du 'dod// chos rnams 'ga' yang skye ba med// chos rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba med// rnam par rtog pa nyer bzhi
238b5(rgyud): gang // de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen yin// byang chub sems dpa' ci yin brjod// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa dang // 'khor ba gnas la gsad gyur cing // sems
238b6(rgyud): can rnams kyis rtogs byed pa// de ni byang chub sems dpar brjod/ ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin nyid bden shin tu brtan// de kho na nyid gang rtogs nas// tshe
238b7(rgyud): kun rtogs pa zhes bya gang // de nyid rtogs pas rgyas brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// chos kyis de nyid yang dag gnas// slar yang gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing //
239a1(rgyud): nyid lam ni sngon byed pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs zhes bya// bcom ldan 'das ni ni yin brjod// las dang nyon mongs de bzhin ste// de bzhin yon stongs
239a2(rgyud): shes bya ba'i bsgrib// mi mthun phyogs kyi chos rnams gang // de bcom pas ni bcom ldan brjod// de yi bcom pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan de bzhin bcom pa brjod// 'dod pa'i
239a3(rgyud): 'dod chags gcod byed cing // nyon mongs 'joms shing 'pham byed pa// de ni de yi bcom par brjod// de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// nyon mongs bdud sogs gcod byed cing // skye
239a4(rgyud): dgu ma lus thabs chen gyis// ngan 'gro'i srid las skyob byed pa// ston pa'i ston par brjod pa yin// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// de nyid shes pas ye shes ste// slar yang chos su rtogs
239a5(rgyud): pa min// rtag dang chad pa spong byed cing // 'chi med de bzhin ye shes yin// shes rab ye shes yin brjod// rnams pa mang po shes byed cing // rtogs pas sdug bsngal las grol byed//
239a6(rgyud): kun nas nyon mongs chos spong ba// shes rab ye shes zhes su bshad// ci'i phyir shes rab brjod par bya// rab sbyor sbyor ba shes 'gyur zhing // khyabar du ni rtogs par byed// bden pa
239a7(rgyud): de bzhin nyid shes pa'i// shes rab shes rab zhes su bshad// shes rab pha rol phyin don cing // nyan thos rang rgyal phyi rol gyi// shes rab las ni bla mar brjod// de bzhin nyid de/
239b1(rgyud): bzhin pha rol phyin// shes rab pha rol phyin zhes bshad/ tshul zhes bya don ci yin brjod// na ni dgag pa'i don chen te// dngos med dngos po med min pas// gang du dri ma med 'gyur//
239b2(rgyud): pa// de ni de'i tshul du brjod// ting 'dzin don ni ci yin brjod// chos kan dngos po med ces pa'i// mnyam pa nyid du rab gnas pa'i// shes rab can gyis lhag par brten// sems
239b3(rgyud): la dmigs pa brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na bsam gtan brjod// sdug bsngal thams cad spongs byed cing // nyon mongs dra ba rab 'joms pa// shes rab bcas par sems dpar ni//
239b4(rgyud): srid pa 'joms par byed pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor don ni ci yin brjod// chos rgyal chen po dam pa dang // zab mo'i mchog du gyur pa des// kun shes kun rigs ldan gyur pa'i// rnam
239b5(rgyud): 'byor du ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor pa ni ci yin brjod// shes rab kyi ni nges sems dpa'// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor don sems pa// sems can kun gyi don sems dpa'//
239b6(rgyud): de ni rnal 'byor pa don brjod// nga ni kun gyi rgyal po che// thams cad rig cing thams cad ster// rdo rje 'chang chen dang po ste// bde ba yi ni rgyu 'di yis// de bzhin nga ni 'jig rten gsum
239b7(rgyud): khams gsum rnal 'byor rig pa mchog/ de bzhin 'khor ba mya ngan 'das bden 'gro dang ni ngan 'gro dang // 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod yin// srid gsum 'di don 'di ci zhig/ sam
240a1(rgyud): #can kun gyi sems gang yin/ srid pa gsum du brjod par bya// 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med las// 'di ltar thams cad rig pa'i mchog/
240a2(rgyud): bdag med byed pa po yang med/ chos kyang yod pa ma yin te// dge dang mi dge byed pa'i// bag chags kyi ni kun tu bsgribs// chos ni thog med dus can te// byed pa po ni yod ma yin//
240a3(rgyud): tog pas nyams pa'i sems ldan pas// rgyu dang 'bras sa bu mthong bar 'gyur// kun bzhi sa bon thams cad pas// de ni chos kun skye ba byed// bsgos shing bag chags dang ldan pas/
240a4(rgyud): de ni srid pa gsum zhes bya// 'dod pa la skyes khams gsum gyi/ rgyur ni kun bzhi de nyid snang // gzugs dang gzugs med 'gro ba yin// chos rnams kun gyi gnas kyang yin// chos
240a5(rgyud): kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// nyes pa kun dang bral bas ste// thog ma med 'byung chos snying po// spro bur dri ma nyon mongs gyur// nga nyid kho na chos chen po// de ni chos kyi snying por bshad//
240a6(rgyud): de bas nga ni rgyal po che// da ni srid pa gsum du bsgrags// 'jig rten gsum ni ci yin brjod// 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs dang ni// gzugs med pa'i skye dgu rnams// 'jig rten gsum
240a7(rgyud): po zhes pa de// rang 'byung nyid kho na yin// 'dod pa zhes bya chos can te// dag pa btsal bar bya ba'i phyir// gzungs 'dzin chos rnams zhes bya ba'i// de bzhin nyid la so sor rtog/
240b1(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir// nga ni chos de dag par byed// de bas nga ni rgyal po che// 'jig rten gsum kyi bdag por bstan// ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin gzugs// de bzhin gzugs
240b2(rgyud): med rab tu bsgrags/ stong pa nyid dang dbyer med pas// nga ni snying po bdag por bshad// khams gsum pa'i don 'di ci// 'dod khams bzhin du gzugs khams dang // gzugs
240b3(rgyud): med pa ni nyid dag dang // khams gsum bzang po 'di dag ni// rang 'byung ngang nyid kho na yin// 'di ni khams dang rgyu dang don// khams gsum gyi ni rgyu sems dpa'// stong dang mtshan
240b4(rgyud): ma med bshad cing // smon pa med pa nga nyid bshad// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yid// byis pa rnams ni kun tu 'byung // de bzhin yang dang yang du 'khor// 'khor bdag pa'i bdag
240b5(rgyud): nyid ste// rang 'byung nga nyid kho na yin// gang la 'khor ba yod pa'i// chos ni rdul tsam yod ma yid// yang dag ma yin kun brtags phyir// de ni thog mtha' med pa'i yin//
240b6(rgyud): med gang de ni stong pa che/ stong pa gang yin deng nyid do// de bas 'khor ba de nyid ni// rdo rje 'chang rgyal nga nyid bsgrags// mya ngan 'das pa ci yin brjod// gang zhig de bzhin nyid
240b7(rgyud): rtags stong // bden bzhi'i rang bzhin bzang po nyid// mtshan nyid dang ni dngos po gzugs// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam par spangs// tshig dang bsgra'i gzung bya min// rnam par rtog pa yod ma yin//
241a1(rgyud): rdortse po#de bas mya ngan 'das pa ru// nga nyid kho na rab zhes bya// de ni rtogs don ci zhig yin// rtags nyid rtags la 'byung gnas te// rnam par rtog pa dang bral gang /
241a2(rgyud): gang la de nyid kho nar ni/ mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra ru bsgrags// 'jig pa yang ni ci yin brjod// gang zhig 'khor bar mi 'jug cing // thams cad mi rtags pa nyid de// sdug bsngal
241a3(rgyud): 'byung ba 'gog med pa'i// 'jig pa mya ngan 'das sgra yin// dag pa yang ni ci yin brjod// yod pa ma yin med pa'ang ma min// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// brjod byed
241a4(rgyud): brjod byed ma yin min// dag pa mya ngan 'das nyid yin// theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// sangs rgyas thams cad gshegs 'gyur cing // theg pa kun las nges rgyal ba// yang dag
241a5(rgyud): gyur pa'i sems can ni// theg pa chen po zhes su bstan// mthu dang las dang 'jug pa dang // tshogs dang rnal 'byor ngo mtshar rnams// rgya che zhes pa theg chen te// sangs rgyas kun
241a6(rgyud): kyi ngo mtshar mchog/ na mkha'i don ni zhig yin// sa nyid kyang ni ci zhig brjod// 'byung ba med cing rdzas kyang med// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// dus gsum dngos po dang bral
241a7(rgyud): mchog/ rnamakha' zhes pa'i sla ru bsten// yang dang yang du skye ba dang // de bzhin nyon kun bdag nyid// grangs med dpag tu med dang bral// de ni sa nyid brjod par bya// 'byung
241b1(rgyud): ba chen po gang las 'byung // 'gog pa ci zhig gang gis byed/ ma rig nyon mongs la sogs pas// 'byung ba chen po yang dag byung // sa bon kun ldan kun gzhi ni// byi dang nang /
241b2(rgyud): gi bdag por 'dod// gnas ni yongasu gyur pa dang // kun gzhi sa bon mi 'byung zhing // rtog pa chen po dang bral ba// 'byung ba chen po 'gog pa yin// rtog pa chen po'i rgyal
241b3(rgyud): rgya po'i mchog du gsang zhing sbas pa rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo las// shin tu gsang ba stug po'i tshogs kyi las thams cad bsdus pa ste// drug las sems dpa'
241b4(rgyud): bcu drag gi bshad pa zhes bya ba'i bshad pa dang po'o// / rdzogs s+ho// ci'i phyir na phyag rgyar brjod// gang gis phyag rgya cings
241b5(rgyud): gyur pa// des ni srog chags gdug kun dang // 'gro ba sdig can thams cad dang // rtag du rgyas ni btab par 'gyur// ci phyir sngags su brjod par bya// gsang sngags rnams la/
241b6(rgyud): 'bod byed cing // gdug pa thams cad skrod par byed// nyon mongs sngags rnams 'joms byed cing // sangs rgyas chos ni spyan 'dren yin// ci yi phyir ni rigs sngags brjod//
241b7(rgyud): 'dod chags mun pa rnams 'dul zhing / nyon mongs rnams kyang rnam par 'dul// ma rig pa ni zlog byed pa// de ni rig sngags nges par brjod// gzungs sngags rnams ni ci yin
242a1(rgyud): rdo rje #brjod// chos rnams kyi ni brten byed cing // srid pa'i phyogs ni rab 'joms byed// sangs rgyas chos rnams thob byed cing // dge ba la brten sbyin/
242a2(rgyud): pa'ang yin// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun dang rtul zhugs ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bdag/ spyod lam
242a3(rgyud): phyag rgyas mtshon par byed// sngags rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// sangs rgyas kun thugs yin te// chos kyi snying po bsgrub byed cing // chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag ldan//
242a4(rgyud): sngags kyi mtshan nyid yin par brjod/ rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// 'khor bar myong ba'i sdug bsngal dang // 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa'i tshogs//
242a5(rgyud): rigs dang bcas pa zhi byed pa'i// rigs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags kyi// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dzin byed cing // chos rnams
242a6(rgyud): 'dzin par byed pa dang // dge ba zhes bya 'dzin byed pa dang // gagazungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid brjod// rtsa ba'i phyag brgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing ba'i thub chen po
242a7(rgyud): phyag rgya dag ni bcing ban// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes/ dang po kho nar khrus byas shing // de bzhin phyogs dag bcing ba dang // log 'dren rnams dang bcing bya ste// gos
242b1(rgyud): zong dang yul 'khor dag dang ni/
242b2(rgyud): dag gtsang ma mgo bya zhing // grong khyer dang ni grong rdal rnams// de'i dbus su phyag rgya rnams// nam yang bcing bar mi bya ste// lha khang yang na dgon pa 'am// ri bo yi ni phug dang /
242b3(rgyud): gam/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bden zhing // 'du 'dzi med pa'i gnas gtsang mar// der ni dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya// bkra shis dkyil dkrung nyid bya// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
242b4(rgyud): yis// byang chub snying po bcings pa bzhin// der ni mig dag ba bcum bya zhing // sol sa ni bzhag par bya// mchu gnyis dag ni ma'am sbyar zhing // dran pa rtse gcig byas nas kyang / sbyor/
242b5(rgyud): med sbyor ba'i sngags bzlas shing // phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya// phyag rgya'i rnam pa de lta bu'i// bcings pas rdo rje can kun gnyis// rigs sngags ji ltar bzlas par bya// dbang
242b6(rgyud): phyug chen po gsang ba gsungs// rigs sngags dag ni bzlos pa ni// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dkyil dkrung ji lta ba bzhin bya// dran dang yid ni ma yengs pas// rig sngags
242b7(rgyud): dag ni bzlas bya zhing // sku nyid kyang ni bsam par bya// mchu'i sa ma yin ces kyang min// rkan nyid kyis kyang ma yin te// lce dang zhog mas kyang ma yin// rtag tu snying ka nas kyang
242b8(rgyud): min// shin tu phra ba'i yid kyis ni// sems ni chos nyid nang chud bya// de ltar bzlas par byas nas ni// yid kyis rdo rje bzlas pa yin/ oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad//
243a1(rgyud): rdo rje mo@#mchog dang nor ster dpal dang dbyangs/ bskal bzangs rnam pa dang ldan zhing // dam bca' ba dang bkra shis don// nor bu 'dzin pa'i snying po yin//
243a2(rgyud): yi ge hUM ni ci yin brjod// sdug bsngal chos nyid 'joms par byed// srid pa'i zhags pa gcod byed cing // gdug pa bsngags shing gsod byed pa'i// huM gi phyogs su dran par bya/
243a3(rgyud): yi ge phaT ni ci yin brjod// gdug dang sdug bsngal 'joms byed cing // bde ba dag ni 'gugs par byed// phaT ni 'joms byed sgra yin te// grogs dang bcas par 'jobs
243a4(rgyud): par byed/ swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// sdig pa thams cad zhig byed cing // dge ba'i tshogs ni phel byed pa// nyes par bya ba 'phrog byed cing // sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms
243a5(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ mchod pa'i phyir brjod par bya// mchod par byed pas mchod pa ste// gang du bsad bya mi 'jigs pa'i// de'i mchod pa rnams ma 'gyur// phyi rol gyi ni mchod pa
243a6(rgyud): min// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod// de bzhin du ni thar pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i mchod dang de rnams ni// 'jigs byed rgyal srad rnams kyi ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang gi dang
243a7(rgyud): nyid kyi sras kyi mtshungs med pa'i/ cho ga grub pa'i gsang ba yi// rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // zhugs pa gang dang gang yin pa// de ni dam
243b1(rgyud): tshig shes pa yin// dam tshig gom par byed pa yin/ dam tshig shes pa yin par brjod// bskal pa grangs med 'das pa yi// byang chub sems dang mtshungs par 'gyur/
243b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i dam tshig legs zhugs pa// de'i dam tshig shes par brjod// ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin/ dam pa'i chos kyi bcud snying po// 'byung ba de ni dkyil 'khor brjod//
243b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba che// chos chen shin tu bstan pa'o// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// cho ga chos dang rnal 'byor ste// thar pa'i gsang ba yang dag 'byung / skye ba 'di nyid
243b4(rgyud): kho na la// rab dga' bsgrub par byed pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs pa'i// skyes pa 'am yang na bud med kyis// bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i
243b5(rgyud): dbang phyag che// dkon chog gsum la skya bas 'gro dang // byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // de bzhin du ni sgrub pa'i mchog/ shin tu brtan par byas pa yin// thub pa'i
243b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor zhags pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bya// khyod kyis srogs chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang blang mi bya// 'di 'dod pa log par g.yem mi bya// brdzun
243b7(rgyud): du yang ni sgra mi bya// nyes pa kun gyi rgya ba yis// 'chang dag 'thung ba spangs par bya/ bya ba ma yin thams cad dong // mchog tu sems can gdul bar bya// dam pa rnams la rim
244a1(rgyud): #'gro bya// rnal 'byor ba rnams bsnyen bkur bya// rnal 'byor rig pas bsgrub pa'i phyir// mkhas pa rnams la brten par bya// lus kyi las/
244a2(rgyud): ni rnams gsum dang // ngag gi yang ni rnam pa bzhi// yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag dang // ci nus par ni bsrung bar bya// slob dpon bskas par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas
244a3(rgyud): kun dang mtshungs// sngags dang phyag rgyas rnams la yang / nam yang bskas par mi bya'o// 'khor lo rdo rje pad mo sogs// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gang yin pa// mgon po
244a4(rgyud): nyid du mi bya shing // bza' bar yang ni bya ba'o// de bzhin sman ma lha yi grib// rkang pa dag gis brdzi mi bya// de'i steng du 'dug mi bya// slar yang gzhag par mi bya'o// lhan
244a5(rgyud): gzhan pa mtshan ma rnams// 'gom zhing bsdus par mi bya ste// sems can la yang gnod mi bya// de yis srog gi phyir yang ni// 'dor bar mi bya gang zhig yin// 'tshe ba'i sros
244a6(rgyud): gi phyir yang ni// byang chub sems ni 'dor mi bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa 'am// rnam pa kun tu gtang mi bya// sdom
244a7(rgyud): pa gtang bar mi bya zhing // bdag nyid gdung bar mi bya'o// 'khrus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// mi dge bcu ni spangs nas su// dge ba bcu ni brten bya cing // 'byung po rnams la phan
244b1(rgyud): 'dod pa// nang gi bdag nyid khrus sus 'dod bdag nyid rab tu dge bya ba'i phyir// bdag nyid phyag rgyas btab bcing // phyag rgya thams cad yin dag bcing // rnal 'byor pa/
244b2(rgyud): yi khrus su brjod// gsang ba'i spyod ldan khas len pa'i/ chu yi khrus ni bya ba ste// las 'di rnams par rtog pa'i khrus// rdo rje slob dpon dag gis bya// yang na cho gas khrus bya ba/
244b3(rgyud): mchog tu ngo mtshar bshad bya ste// dang po bdag nyid go bgos zhing // khro bo yang ni dran par bya// don kun rab tu bsgrub byed pa'i// yig ni tshe go cha bzangs po yin// rdo rje gnod
244b4(rgyud): sbyin drag chen dang // khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste/ oM badz+ra ka li ki li badz+ra hUM phaT// a tu go cha'o// oM hUM a rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi'o// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT// bdud rtsi khyil pa'o// rdo rje
244b5(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di dang ni// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yi// rdo rje 'bar rab bzod dga' bas// bdag nyid dag ni 'bar bar bya// oM du pi dA pi ka ya du pi pra dza la ni swA hA// chu'i nang du
244b6(rgyud): 'jug pa dang // snyim pa gsum ni glugs pa dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs dag la// rigs sngags 'di ni 'dod pa yi// rigs sngags mngon par bzlas pa yi// sa'i phung po
244b7(rgyud): gsum dag ni// bdag po bstod dang rmad dang dbus// rab tu dag byed mchog yin no// oM bur bu dza la huM// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes dran nas// rigs sngags thams cad
245a1(rgyud): / don nas pa'i mau rdzug na bathang rigs gas 'drin pas dang madz+ra/ phyog skye byung ba stis la ded shang phyo//
245a2(rgyud): su// lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang / nub du rlung lha nyid dang ni// byang du chu lha gzhom par 'dod// rnal 'byor pa'i gzugs bzhi ni// phyogs bzhi dag ni nges par bcing /
245a3(rgyud): nas steng 'og 'tshams rnams su// rdo rje nag mo nges par bcing // bgegs bcad pa ni ji ltar lags// rdo rje khu tshur 'bar ba dang // rdo rje nyi ma ltar 'bar dang // rdo rje spun gyi
245a4(rgyud): phyag rgya yi// bgegs bcing ba ni brtan par 'gyur// rab tu gus pas phyag dag bya// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyogs bzhi ru// lnga partsigs pa'i phyag rgya yis// stengs dang 'og dang
245a5(rgyud): 'tshams rnams su// bstod dang bcas pas phyag bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon bskal chen gyis// mchog du gsang ba'i dam pa yis// brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'kho du//
245a6(rgyud): de bzhin du ni bcing bar bya// mchod pa ji ltar yin zhes na// rigs sngags mngon par bzlas brjod dang // phyag rgya bcing ba lhur len dang // rnal 'byor bsgom pa'i mchod pa
245a7(rgyud): dang // bsgrub bdag gis mchod pa'o// sbyin sreg las ni ji lta bu// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum po dag/ bsreg
245b1(rgyud): bya sbyin bsreg mchog yin no// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba'o// de nas rdo rje rigs 'dzin gyi// snying po gsang ba kun bsdus pa'i// shin tu sbas pa dam pa'i mchog/ de kho na
245b2(rgyud): nyid bshad par bya// rdo rje slob dpon spyod chen ldan// dkyil 'khor gsang bar rab tu zhugs// slob dpon las ni dbang bskur thob// gsang dang gos pa kun shes shing //
245b3(rgyud): dpa' zhing brten pa brtson 'bras che// yid gzhungs 'dzin cing gsang bar ldan// dul drang bshes gnyen can dag gis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// dang po ji ltar
245b4(rgyud): tshogs pa ru// zla ba 'am yang na zla ba phyed// yang na lo yi bar du ni// rig pa'i brtul bzhugs spyad par bya// gal te de ni sangs rgyas kyi// rigs 'dzin bsgrub pa rnam
245b5(rgyud): gsum mo// ci ste rdo rje can gyi yin// rnam pa gsum du nges pa yin// nor bu'i rigs can bzang po dang // rnal 'byor bzhi po nyid bya'o// ci ste pad 'byung dag pa la/
245b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor bzhi ni rab tu bsgrub// ci ste las kyi rang bzhin bzang / las rnams kun gyi rigs las ni// sbyor ba bzhi ni yang dag byung // rnam pa bcwo brgyad dag du 'gyur//
245b7(rgyud): snga dro phyi dronya phyed dang / nam gyi steng skad gung la ni// bya ba chen po kun bya ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rigs// dang po re zhig rnal 'byor ches// chen pos phyogs kun phyag byas ste/
246a1(rgyud): #/ rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga yis// rdo rje slob dpon nyid bya'o// shes rab chen pos sangs rgyas kun// yang nas yang du dran byas te// bdag nyid chen po/
246a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun// rdo rje'i sngags kyis bskul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tse pa sta na yad mnapa byir r+ya// ta ya myi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sod ya ti sta sa mam// shar gyi phyogs
246a3(rgyud): song nas ni// yan lag kun kyis phyag byas te// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis shing // bdag nyid dbul bar bya yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa a bi shi ka ad mnam byir r+ya ya myi//
246a4(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ra da na a b+hi Shi na rtsa maM// rdo rje gsang sngags 'di yis ni// lho phyogs su ni phyag byas te// sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad la// bdag ni dbul bar bya ba yin//
246a5(rgyud): de nas nub kyi phyogs su ni// sngags 'di yis ni phyag byas te// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tso pra ba ra ta ya ya dam nam byir r+ya ta ya myi// sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra ba ra ta yi maM// dag pa'i
246a6(rgyud): chos can slob dpon zhes// nub phyogs su ni phyag byas te// rdo rje'i sngags 'dis bskul bya zhing // bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa karma na ma ni r+ya myi// sarba
246a7(rgyud): ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru mam// mchod dang dbang bskur las ldan zhing // byang du chos la ngos sbyor bas/ byang phyogs su ni phyag byas te// bdag nyid rdo rje las su 'gyur// shar
246b1(rgyud): du mchod pa'i las yin te// lho phyogs su ni dbang bskur bas// nub phyogs su ni chos chen po// byang du lasaM la nges par sbyor/ thub pa kun gyi nyid ma yi// mgon po rab tu /
246b2(rgyud): nas// phyogs rnams kun tu sngags 'di yis// phyag ni rab tu btsal bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya waMg tsi ta pra na me na badz+ra ban d+ha na ma ka ro myi// de nas ji skad bshad pa'i
246b3(rgyud): phyag bya ba// sangs rgyas la migs sems kyis ni// rab tu gus btsas phyag rgya rnams/ myur du bsnyen pa'i sgrub pa yin// phyag byas 'og tu langs nas ni// bdag nyid dbul
246b4(rgyud): ba bzang po ni// sangs rgyas kun la dbul bya te// ma lus phyogs bzhags mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// 'di ltar nye ba zhi pa bdag/ ci nas
246b5(rgyud): rdo rje nyid 'gyur brjod// rdo rje rigs kyi mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad la// rtag tu rnam pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid dag ni dbul bar bya// rdo rje gsang
246b6(rgyud): sngags de yis ni// bdag nyid dbul bar gyur pa ni/ sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad ni// yang dang yang du rjes dran te// sdig pa la sogs nyon mongs kun/ mya ngan 'das
246b7(rgyud): la bshags par bya// skye ba 'di 'am gzhan dag gi// sdig pa thams cad rnams spangs nas/ sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyis// bsod nams ye shes tshogs bskyed dang /
247a1(rgyud): de bzhin sems can kun gyis las// rjes su yi rang bya ba yin// byang chub ngan mi 'da' bar// sangs rgyas kun la gsol ba btab// byang chub
247a2(rgyud): sems ni thabs chen gyis// sems can thams cad rjes dran bya// shin tu ngo mtshar mchod pa ni// ci nus par ni sgrub par bya// yang na mya ngan 'das sogs dang // rnal 'byor
247a3(rgyud): dge ba sogs pa la// ngo mtshar gyur pa'i mchod pa'i sa// mchod pa'i sprin dag dbul bar bya// gnas 'di 'am gzhan dag na// lha sogs bdag gir ma bya ba'i// me tog chus/
247a4(rgyud): skyes thang skyes rnams// thabs chen sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de yi 'od kyis dkyil 'khor nas// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor 'di yis ni/
247a5(rgyud): me tog mchod pas rab mchod cing // phyag rgya rnal 'khor bcas pa'i sa// phyogs rnams kun tu nges rab bros// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa s+pha pu tsa me ka sa mu tra s+pha ra na sa ma ye hUM// ga
247a6(rgyud): dag spos kyi shing bzang po// thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la dbul// lha yi spos sogs rmad byung ba'i// phyogs rnams kun tu spro bar bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+hu pe pu tsa me ka sa mu tra s+pha ra
247a7(rgyud): nas ma ye huM// de'i shing rnams bzang po ni/ thub pa'i dbang phyug rnams la 'dul// phyag rgya'i bcas rab bskul nas ni// phyogs rnams kun tu spros par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga
