377a3(rgyud): dang gdon dang 'byung po dang // mkha' 'grom mo 'byung po dang // gdug pa rnam pa kun du khyab// 'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni// gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// thugs rje dag ni/
377a4(rgyud): bskyed par gyur// kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal// de la rjes su brtse byed med// de nyid kho na rang byung ste// de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog/ nga la log par rtogs pa
377a5(rgyud): med// skye dgu de la brtse bar bya// dbang phyug rgyal po gang yin ngapa // gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// yang dag byang chub rab byung gyur// skye dag ma lus bskyab par bya// thams
377a6(rgyud): cad dag ni dgug bya zhing // de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya// gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni// skye dgu 'di dag rnam par dkrol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan
377a7(rgyud): 'dogs pa// zhes byedade 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// 'di ltar bka' ni nod par byed/ de nas sangs rgyas thams nA
377b1(rgyud): kyi// de bzhin snying po phyung bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra su b+ha ni suM b+ha hU phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' ni bzung nas kyang // phyi rol dkyil 'khor gdug pa'i phyir// lhag
377b2(rgyud): klu'i snying po rab tu phyung // oM badz+ra sa ma ya a kar sha ya// sarba man d+ha na// badz+ra d+ha ra ta ma ni kra ma hUM phaT// rig pa brjod par gyur pa yis// rdo rje lcags kyu shin tu brtan// lcags kyu'i
377b3(rgyud): bdag nyid che mchog ni// brgya phrag grangs med phyung bar gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rims bzhin rab tu thim par 'gyur// gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru// gdug
377b4(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba bkug/ gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang // de bzhin gong bu gcig du bya// rdo rje me yis kun tu gdungs// ri yi rtse mo rababs nas ni// tshad med bgrang
377b5(rgyud): du med pa rnams// phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ongs// rdo rje'i dbang po gnas kun tu// 'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor
377b6(rgyud): ba so nas ni// ske gdug skye dgu rnams la ni// rnam par 'tshe bas spangs par bgyis// khyed rnams kyi ni dam tshig long // srog chags thams cad gsod pa longs// min na khyed
377b7(rgyud): rnams g.yas 'bar ma// de bzhin nga yis thal bar bya// gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis// tshig gcig du ni zhus 'gyur ba// mgon po bdag cag sha za ste// ji ltar bgyid
378a1(rgyud): rdo rtsa ma/ #ba bka' bsnol cig/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos// ma bsdams pa yi tshig gsan nas// rdo rje khro 'os rab bzod bka'// snying po drag po gsungs
378a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+hi sa ya mu tra man d+ha la// ban dz+wa ban dza mar d+ha mar d+ha// pa ra man tran 'dza sa ma ya hu phaT/ khro bo chen pos 'di brjod pas// rab drag gdu
378a3(rgyud): pa de dag ni// gcig gcig rab tu 'gyel gyur cing // dam tshig phyag rgyas nyams par gyur// 'o dod 'bod cing ngu bar gyur// gcig la gcig ni smras par byed// ji skad smra ba bzhin bya
378a4(rgyud): ste// 'on kyang bden par smra mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' drab po che// rang bzhin gyis ni sangs rgyas dag/ stobs chen gsang ba dbang po'o// bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsung
378a5(rgyud): oM ni suM b+ha ha na da ha pa tsa g+hih+NA ban d+ha d+ha hUM phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' la rab gnas pas// rdo rje khro bor ba za byed// snying po drag po brjod par gyur/ oM ma
378a6(rgyud): hA badz+ra ku ru kro d+ha ba ta ya sarba dus sh+yA mne Da la bi na sha ya sarba duSh+TAn sa ma yan// bi ki ri d+hi sa ma ya// s+pho ta ya ban dza ya// ban dza ya sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya// sarba duSh+TAn sa ma ya/ mu
378a7(rgyud): tra ban d+ha g+h+ri sna rga na da ha pa tsa// sirba du sma sa ma yas twa badz+ra sa me ya hU~M phaT// de nas 'di ni brjod tsam gyis// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// gtum po drag po shin tu 'jigs// rdo rje
378b1(rgyud): khro bo rab tu byung // rigs bcas dpung bcas dang ldan pa// dam tshig sdom pa gzungs nas ni// shin tu 'jigs pa skrag gyur cig/ rgya mtshor yang ni rab tu bsgyur// phyag rgya
378b2(rgyud): rab 'jigs de dag gis// rnam par bcom zhing zil gyis mnan// rdo rje me yis bsregs nas ni// thams cad du ni thal bar byas// byang sems las byung rdo rje can// ji ltar
378b3(rgyud): sems can bsreg par byed// 'di ni bzhugs pa'i tshig yin te// phan pa'i rigs can rgyal ba dag skyes// 'dod chags skyon la sogs lta ba// nyon mos dri ma gang shes nas// rdo rje
378b4(rgyud): can gyi dri ma 'di// bzungs nas shes rab me yis bsregs// sems can shin tu 'jigs te skrag byang chub spyod pas byang chub nas// mi bskyod pa'i gnas skyes shing // rdo rje can
378b5(rgyud): ni mchog du gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes
378b6(rgyud): sbyangs phyir// rgyal ba la ni bka' snod gyur// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na ha na badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag pos/ sangs
378b7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyis gsungs bzung nas// 'jigs pa 'gugs pa rdo rje ni// rang nyid kyis ni sngags 'di brjod// oM badz+ra a ka ra sha ya shi graM// sarba duSh+TAg+ha ha na badz+ra sa tan hUM dzaH/
379a1(rgyud): de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor rigs dang phyag rgyar bcas// ri rab tu ni kun tu 'dus// rdo rje lcags
379a2(rgyud): kyu bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar 'gyur// spyi bo thal mo sbyar nas nas tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pa skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyis gsungs// kye gdug tshogs
379a3(rgyud): chen myu ra ba ru// gsod pa spongs la bka' nyon cig/ de dag re re zhing smras pa// bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste// gang gis rtag tu gson gyur pa// bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol//
379a4(rgyud): de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de'i thabs ni 'di gsungs so// zla gcig lo nas shi ba gang // de ni bza' bar blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas// khyed dang
379a5(rgyud): lhan cig yang dag sbyor// de bza' ba ni gnas par gyis// phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di// rtag tu bcang bar bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa
379a6(rgyud): bsrung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pra ti grih+Na hri d+ha ya a ka ra sha yaM tsa ta yaM me d+ho d+he mi na ya te// ta s+ya d+hi d+ha yaM ni sa ma sa ya huM dza// de na sa rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rang gi sngag sa dang phyag rgyar
379a7(rgyud): ldan// khro'i spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis sngo// gal te dmatshig las 'das na// khrob bdag nyid chen 'dis// rtag tu mgo bo 'ges byed cing // rigs bcas che
379b1(rgyud): par bsreg par byed/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes// bya ba de 'dra ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhags nas// nad kyi don du tshol bar gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
379b2(rgyud): bka' bstsal pa// oM badz+ra hUM phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sems can thams cad 'jigs pa byed// nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// gus pa yis ni snying po brjod
379b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya// sarba daSh+Ta dza ra d+hi na na sha ya hUM phaT// de na sa brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // na da dang gdon gyis tshegs kun dang // rim sa sogs kyis ni de thos nas/ sted
379b4(rgyud): du rkang pa 'og du mgo/ 'bar ba'i me dang yang dag ldan// ha ha zhes sgogs 'jigs par byed// bdag cag rigs ni ma gzhom par// khro bo chen po bka' ba stsol cig/ rdo rje rnal
379b5(rgyud): 'byor chen pos gsungs// nga yis bka' ni rab tu nyon// sems can nye bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa// kye rgyal
379b6(rgyud): po rdo rje bdag cag gis// srog ni bsrungs par mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid za// thabs ni cung zad gsal du gsol// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de
379b7(rgyud): nas stobs can gyis smras pa// nga'i sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ gang zhig bsrungs la gnod ma byed// oM badz+ra karma bi sho d+ha ya// sarba a ba ra na ni bud d+ha se ta na sa ma ya hUM//
380a1(rgyud): de nas phyag rgya chen po kun// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// yongasu bshad pa thams cad kun//
380a2(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu sbyor byed pa// gnas de ru yang rtag pa ru// khyed rnams shin tu gnod ma byed// de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni// hi hi
380a3(rgyud): zhes ni sgrogs par 'gyur// spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtad// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyis dbang phyug gis/ sdig
380a4(rgyud): ba dral ba'i phyag rgya ni// blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs// ngan song bcings par bya ba'i phyir// mgon pos bdag la bka' nod byed// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad
380a5(rgyud): kyis// kun nas snying po brjod par 'gyur// oM ka pa ya badz+ra sa ha// sems dpa' chen po thabs chen po// snying rje las ni yang dag byung // sems can rnams la brtse bya'i
380a6(rgyud): phyir// sdig pa thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur/ oM sarba pa pa a na ni bi shi d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT// de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches// ska cig gis ni ngan song bkug/
380a7(rgyud): ri'i rgyal po nye ba ru// dung 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches// ngan song sems can la smras pa// dkon mchog gsum dang nga'i brtan la/
380b1(rgyud): myur du bstan par skyabs su song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ stobs chen bdag cag bskyab du gsol// gtso bos ji ltar bka' bstsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyid
380b2(rgyud): par 'chatshal// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sdig pa dral la nges bcings pa// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// mchog du gsang ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra pa ni
380b3(rgyud): pra mo k+Sha yaM sarba pra ga ti bya// sarba sa twa tAn sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma trad// sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams// rig pa 'di yis dbang bskur ba// ngan song 'khor lo
380b4(rgyud): bral bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho ru ni rab tu lhang // de bzhin ngan song 'chi 'phos nas// de kun rab tu grol bar 'gyur// sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// rdo rje dbang po'i
380b5(rgyud): gnas 'thob 'gyur// de bzhin thub pa rnam pa snang gis// zhabs drang du ni skyes par gyur/ rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de bzhin mi khom zad par 'gyur// de nas ska
380b6(rgyud): cig des zhing thob// rmad 'byung sna tshogs gsang chen po// cho 'phral dag ni skyes par gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas// rin chen
380b7(rgyud): bdun gyis rab tu byas/ rdo rje rin rkyen gyis rab mdzes// de'i rigs kyi ngan song kun/ sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs// sems can 'de bskyes pa gyur/ rdo rje
381a1(rgyud): rdo rtse mobade ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po yi zhing 'di na// dag pa'i zhing du rab tu gnas// sems can dag pa kun tu khyab// de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor
381a2(rgyud): rang bzhin// slar yang shing gi nags la sogs// rmad 'byung chen po snang ba med// rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun// nags dang rtswa la sogs pa mchog/ mthon dman dag dang
381a3(rgyud): rnam par bral// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang // ka tsa lin d+ha ltar reg pa de// stong gsum rab tu gnas par 'gyur// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyur// dang po ngan
381a4(rgyud): song nye bar zhi// bkres skom me'i sdug bsngal dag/ kun tu 'gags par rnam par gnas// rgya mtsho kun tu thim par gyur// ri'i bo'i gzugs kun kun du khyab// gzhan 'phral
381a5(rgyud): gyis ni lha rnams dang // mtshungs pa ru ni mi rnams gyur// slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo ni// ri rab na ra dag kyang med// lha'i 'jig rten gnas kyang med// rgya mtsho med cing lha min me/
381a6(rgyud): klu'i gnas gzhi dag kyang med// mi'i khyim dang khang pa med// grong khyer ljongs dang yul 'khor dang // phyogs dang bcas par rnam par bral// mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid// chu chu'i
381a7(rgyud): phyag dang lung ba med// mi yi dag ni lus kyang med// sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang // ngan song 'khor lo dag kyang med// mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med// bud med skyes pa
381b1(rgyud): sogs min med// glang po rnga mo lus kyang med// dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing // ri rab sna bdun rab tu mdzes// spos kyi chu'i rgya mtsho dang // rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis
381b2(rgyud): brgyan// shing ni yid 'ong thams cad las// rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par phyung // ro mo chos kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongs su gsal// ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas/
381b3(rgyud): ri rab ri'i rtse mo ltar// de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'bar bar 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// glu bzhi rab tu gnas par 'gyur// kun
381b4(rgyud): nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni// kha khyer du yang gnas par 'gyur// slar yang nyi ma zla ba med// skar ma med cing lha yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du'ang rung // lha rnams nyid
381b5(rgyud): kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyis yongs su gsal// 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa// gang gis zhing ni rnam par sbyang // rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ba// rdo rje dbang po'i
381b6(rgyud): gnas nyid kyang // slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnam 'phral po// stong gsum 'di ni 'jig rten 'di// lha'i pad ma
381b7(rgyud): yong sugs la// rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes// ri yi rigs ni yid 'ong rngan// bskal pa chen po zhing gi dbus// dkyil 'khor chen po sdug stengs su// dpag chad stong phrag
382a1(rgyud): / brgyabacu 'i// rdo rje mang gA 'i 'i Sh+Ta rtsupa kun tu phyogs rnams bzhi dag tu// dpag da dbyung drug drug bcu dran// rdo dzo na na rang bzhin padzes sa
382a2(rgyud): ge'i khri ni bzhi byung 'gyur// rdo rje bla re rnam par bri// dar gyi mtshun po rnam par 'phyang // dril bu'i dra bas rab mdzes pa// zhing ni kun nas rab tu spras// me tog sna tshogs kun tu bkra/
382a3(rgyud): sna tshogs sprin gyis kun tu g.yogs// sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras// dpag bsam shing ni yid 'ong ldan// rdo rje'i rol mos mdzes
382a4(rgyud): pa dag sgra ni mngon par 'byin par byed// 'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing // sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar gyur// slar yang 'jig rten gyur pa
382a5(rgyud): med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gang ga'i bye snyed grangs med pa// shi ni tu phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// til gyi gang ba bzhin//
382a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// phyogs rnams kun nas ma lus par// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur// dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la// chos dbyings
382a7(rgyud): 'jigs pa med pa la// rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po// ston pa bcom ldan bzhugs par gyur// shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa// rno ru rin chen 'byung rngan te// nub tu 'dod pa/
382b1(rgyud): med pa yin// byang du don yod 'grub pa ste// mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs// phyogs bzhi'i phyogs 'tshams dag du ni// mnyam du dmigs nas rnam/
382b2(rgyud): par gnas// chos dbyings ni brtan par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos dbyings ni brten par mdzad// sangs rgya
382b3(rgyud): grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs// phyogs ni re re khyab gyur pa// sangs rgyas gcig nyid yang dag bzhugs// 'tshams dang steng dang 'og dag ni// rnam par
382b4(rgyud): snang mdzad kyis brtan par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa// dbus kyi chos kyi dbang phyug bzhags// de nas sangs rgyas rnams 'phrul pa// chos dang longs spyod pa rdzogs
382b5(rgyud): snying po byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rang nyid kyi// seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhags// grangs med tshad ni med pa ni yi// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa'i//
382b6(rgyud): ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs pa// stong gsum dag ni ma lus pa// byang chub sems dpa' dga' chen po// pad ma'i steng du 'dug par gyur// dbus kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan/ bye ba dag ni
382b7(rgyud): grangs med lnga// bzhugs par// sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje can ni thams cad bzhugs// shar gyis chal yang dag brten// bye ba dag ni grangs med rdza/ rdo rje'i
383a1(rgyud): rnam 'phral ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhags par gyur// lho'i phyogs na yang dag gnas// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// rin chen rnam 'phral
383a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhags par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// nub kyi phyogs na yang dag gnas// pad ma rnam 'phral ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhag
383a3(rgyud): par gyur/ bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// byang gi phyogs na yang dag gnas// las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// gsang dang mchod pa
383a4(rgyud): gang yin pa// lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med tshad med pa dag/ bcu gnyis kyis ni dkyil 'khor gang // sgo bsrungs bye bgrangs med pa// rnal 'byor mchog du ldan pa
383a5(rgyud): bzhi// rgyal po shar dang lho dag dang // nub dang bya ni yang dag gnas// chos kyi sku las yang dag byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skar gyur pa// sems dpa' chen po 'di dag
383a6(rgyud): kun// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi yang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// rnal 'byor chen po sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang 'di ru
383a7(rgyud): 'ongs// sangs rgyas zhing ni gang ga yo// bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pas// yongasu gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyis mthug
383b1(rgyud): ni zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur// yul rnams thams cad bya ba nga // gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i// ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa// sangs rgyas byang
383b2(rgyud): chub sems rnams ni// bar med par ni de bzhin gnas// gang na sangs rgyas mi snang ba// phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dag sa
383b3(rgyud): ni bzhi bcu yi// yang na chos las byung ba nyid// sangs rgyas sras ni grangs med pa// rigs lnga 'byung ba la sogs pa// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul bstan pa yang // 'di nas byang
383b4(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sogs// mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams mthong // sangs rgyas zhing ni grangs med kun// lha rnams yang gnas par gyur// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong
383b5(rgyud): bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas dgra bcom ma rtogs par// zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong ma gyur// rdo rje rigs kyis 'khor lo med/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshogs kyang min// dbus dang
383b6(rgyud): phyogs na yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i// rdo rje khro bo mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du/ khro ba
383b7(rgyud): drug bdun rnam par gnas// tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang // ngo mam ro dag ni skyes par gyur// 'jigs shing zhwag nas lnga de dag/ gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed/
384a1(rgyud): bo ci zhig mthong gyur shing // shin tu ngo mtshar ci zhig snang // slar yang lha'i 'jig rten dag/ srid pa'i nang du mthong bar 'gyur// 'gro ba lnga'i sems
384a2(rgyud): can min// ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min// zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing // ri dang khang pa dag min// ji ltar bdag cag myos gyos gyur tam// yang na mig ni long bar gyur// yang na bdag
384a3(rgyud): cag sems g.yengs pa// sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di ci zhig/ bdag cag gis ni sngangs 'jigs mthong // drag cing bkugs par thal bar bya// ri rab ri'i rtse mo ru// sdug
384a4(rgyud): bsngal chen po gzir bar gyur// slar yang ri rab yod ma yin// khro'o rdzu 'phrul chen po byed// gzhan du khro bo chen po gcig/ dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed// gnas ni chung ngu
384a5(rgyud): gyur pa yang // rgya chen po ni 'di ru snang // stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste// bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa// gcig la gcig ni snang bar byed/
384a6(rgyud): mi smra bar ni gnas gyur na// rdo rje can la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun kyang gnod sogs kyis/ mun pas khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'di
384a7(rgyud): ni mthong bar gyur // gzhan ni rlung bad ma mthong ste// gzhan du phyogs dag phun par khyab// rdo rje khro bas 'khrul gyur cing / sgyu ma yis ni rmongs gyur cing / kun tu rlos bzhid gyur cig/
384b1(rgyud): gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur// ha ha zhes ni sgra sgrogs shing // bdag cag 'di ni gang du phyin// tshig ni rab tu brjod byed cing // gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su
384b2(rgyud): zhig bdag cag gang // 'di ni su zhig gang du phyin// bdag cag rang gi gnas nas lhung // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// rdo rje khro bos bsad par gyur/ 'o na 'di
384b3(rgyud): ni ci zhig yin// lha'i gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje can dang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor 'khor min// bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// kun tu rmongs
384b4(rgyud): pa nyid gyur cing // rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min// skar ma zla ba nyi ma min// bdag cag thams cad gang nas
384b5(rgyud): 'ongs// yul gang zhig du 'gro bar bya// 'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin// 'jig rten med cing ma mo med// med dang mi ma yin pa gda'// rnam pa kun tu mthong bar gyur// sngon ni ji
384b6(rgyud): ltar de bzhin phyis// rmad du byung nyid mthong bar gyur// gzhan du sa ni g.yos par gyur// rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod// 'brag gi sgra dang grog chen po// sdug bsngal thams
384b7(rgyud): cad yang dag ldan// bkres sgom la sogs sdug bsngal dang / bral min kun tu sdug bsngal dang // de ni lha chen rdzu 'phrul dag/ cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yid
385a1(rgyud): rdo rje mo/ @#tags dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams shing bshin par gyur// sdig pa bral ba'i phyag rgya yis// ngan song gsum ni nges par zhi// lha gang 'du shes
385a2(rgyud): med pa dang // gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas// phung po lnga ru'ang bdag nyid// ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong bar gyur// rang bdag nyid kyang rtog byed cing // gcig la gcig
385a3(rgyud): kyang blta bar byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs// ngo mtshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal pa chen po ru// bdag cag dad pas gnas par gyur// bdag

385a7(rgyud): 'gro ba lngar bcas de bzhin du// ring ba dang ni rgya mcher bcas// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyis lha rnams ni// 'ga' zhig kyang ni mthong gyur/
385b1(rgyud): gzhal las khang dang sems can ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i ngo mtshar sna tshogs pa// gnas 'di ru ni mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyis rnam 'phral 'di/
385b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yin// gang zhig stong gsum 'di yi ni// rang rgyal ba dag mchog gyur pa// de yang kun tu rmongs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa ma mthong gyur// sa ng+yas
385b3(rgyud): nyid kyang mthong ba min/ rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras bcas min// sems can dag dang khams gsum min// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba// gnas de ru mthong ma gyur// gzhan du
385b4(rgyud): stong gsum po 'di ni// rnam pa kun tu mthong ba nyid// sa dang me rlung chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang min// 'khor ba lnga'i sems can min// zla ba nyi ma dag
385b5(rgyud): kyang min// skar ma bza' dang rgyu skar min// sems can dag kyang khams gsum min// 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du na mkha'i dkyil 'khor min// de nas dzad
385b6(rgyud): 'jigs skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob// gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnams// byang sems rdo rje can chen pos// de dag kyang ni
385b7(rgyud): skrag par gyur// rang rang gi ni zhing dag du// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// 'dus pa chen po dag kyang ni// chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi ni sems can
386a1(rgyud): min// lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing zhing yang med// sa dang me dang chu yang med// rang gi zhing nyid ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jig
386a2(rgyud): par gyur// skrag cing yid ni mi dgar gyur// thang cig du yang rmongs par gyur// de lta bu yi rnam 'phral du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang // sngon gyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam
386a3(rgyud): par 'phrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor pas/ de lta bu yi byin gyis brlabs// sems can gang dag 'di na gnas// nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes 'gyur// de nas de nyid
386a4(rgyud): gsang ba che// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i tshogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'di lta bu yi rnam 'phral byung // stong gsum yongs su bsdus pa yi// lha'i gnas
386a5(rgyud): ni bkod par gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sa gnas gcig dus// chos dang longs spod rdzogs sprul pa// la lar sngon po sngon che// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu mdzes// sa'i phyogs ni rab tu
386a6(rgyud): bsngo// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu brgyan// la lar gser gyi mdog du snang // kha dog ser pos yang dag brgyan// sa'i cha yang rab tu ser// rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan/ la lar kha dog dmar
386a7(rgyud): bor ni// b+hu r+ya lta bur rab tu mdzes// sa'i cha yang rab tu smras// rdo rje dmar pos rab tu brgyan// la lar bcag gis mdog can ni// bai dUr+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa'i cha yang
386b1(rgyud): rnam par spangs// rdo rje bcod kyis rnam par mdzes// la lar shel gyis mdog can gyi// shel du snang ba rab tu mdzes// sa'i cha yang rnam par spangs// rdo rje shel gyi rnam par brgyan/
386b2(rgyud): shar du sngon po chen po ste// lhor ni ser por yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni bcod dang yang dag ldan// shel gyi mdog ni bla na med// rdo rje chen po yongs su dag/ chen rtsi/

386b4(rgyud): phyi rol yang dag ni// rdo rje kha khyer rab tu ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing // sgo'i kha khyer dag gis spras// ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang /
386b5(rgyud): kha dog dmar po mdog dang ni// gzhan yang she la ni bzang po dag/ rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa mchog/
386b6(rgyud): rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyi mchog/ dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// zla ba phyed dang nye bar mdzes// g.yer kha'i dra ba rab tu khengs// dril bu mchog ni kun tu 'phyang // sna tshogs shing ni chen po

387a2(rgyud): gtor// sna tshogs dri yis kun tu khyab// drag po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams nga ba dag byung // shing dang pad tshogs thams cad las// chos rnams 'byung bar thos
387a3(rgyud): par gyur// chos rnams kun tu rnam byung nas// dag pa'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rna bar sgra ni gang zhig grag/ chos kyis bde bar byung bar gyur// yaM laM raM baM// oM badz+ra
387a4(rgyud): satwa kro ta hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya// a ka ra shA ya hUM phaT// oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha sa ga ya hUM phaT// oM badz+ra d+hasti kro d+ha sa du ya// badz+ra rad na a mu kro d+ha huM hUM phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin

387a6(rgyud): ma la kro da dza la ya sarba hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ke tu ma ha kro d+ha d+he ta hUM phaT// oM badz+ra ya ta ta ha sa kro d+ha ha ha ha ha ha hUM phaT// khro bo chen po rdo rje chos// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pas/

391b3(rgyud): seMs can gdug pa gdon la sog/ rims dang 'byung po sha za dang // mkha'agro 'byung po ma mo dang // lha me tshon cha dang ldan kun// ji ltar mngon par byang chub bri/ phyi rol kha khyer gan su ni/
391b4(rgyud): rdo kha khyer mdzes pa rnaMs/ de na sngon la slob dpon rjes// dkyil 'khor dbusu 'dug nas ni// rdo dkyil mo dkrung bcas te// ti nge 'dzin la smos pa zhag bya// ji ltar rdo rig byung ba/
391b5(rgyud): de bzhin bdag nyid rnam pa bsam// rdo'i rig mchog rgyal po ni// bdag nyid yA dag byin gyis brlab// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po mchog/ zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin las// rje seMs dpa'
391b6(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// skal ba chen po snyom zhugs nas// ji skad gong du bsgrub pa bzhin// shes rab can gyis dzad bsam// ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs byung ba/ de ltar dkyil 'khor rdzog
391b7(rgyud): nas ni// rgya mcher gsang bachen po dang // de rje slob sngon chog chog/ rgyud chen gsang bzhi bya ba// dog pa 'di las rab tu bshad// de da dbus su 'du byas pas/ rje mo ba bad 'bung ces/
392a1(rgyud): khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcing // khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang zhing // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad
392a2(rgyud): dam pa ni// lan gcag tsam na brjod par bgyi// rdo rje me tog stsogs mchod pas// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba drug rgya thams cad yongs su bci /
392a3(rgyud): phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan// de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid// phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun// cho ga rab tu ldan pas dbul// rdo rje dril bu bkrol bya zhing // gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor sdigs
392a4(rgyud): par bya// gdug pa'i sems can gdul bya zhing // nyon mongs mchog du bsad par bya// dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya// rdo rje mtshos pas mchod par bya// glu dang mchod pa yang dag
392a5(rgyud): ldan// rdo rje gla ni blang bar bya// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag/ blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya// 'dud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// sha ta sha tra sha ma ta sa
392a6(rgyud): ta ra ta ta ha bi ha ha ta Ta ma ta sha ta twa ta kra ta ku Ta ta bi ta ha be Ta i ti ta Ta ka ra ta ra ta ra ta ra ra ra Ta// rdo rje ti ri ti ri'o// phyag rgya bdag nyid dbang bskur te// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bka'
392a7(rgyud): mnos nas/ rdo rje'i rjegs ni rab tu bskul// rngon pa gos kyis stong g.yogs bya// sngon po yis ni mig bka' la// rdo rje tir tiri'o// phyag tu na rje slobs 'acing / o b+hi hA badz+ra
392b1(rgyud): ma ye hUM ba// ci rigs par ni gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni bskul bya zhing // rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra be shes mi// rdo rje dbyings
392b2(rgyud): sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas pa ji ltar snga ma bzhin// ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni// mkhas pa dag gis bya ba nyid// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// rdo rje can gyis sngar
392b3(rgyud): gsungs bzhin// shes rab can gyis kun 'aslab cing // bdag nyid kyang ni rab dang bya// rdo rje mdzad phyag rgya yis// shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun//
392b4(rgyud): bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor bslab bya zhing // bdag nyid klang ni gzhan yang rung // rdo rje phreng bas dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ma yis sbyor ba yis// sngon la mna'
392b5(rgyud): ni bsgag par bya// rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// ye shes sbyor ba rab bsgrub bya// lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung // rdo rje sngags rab bsgrub par bya// rdo rje yis
392b6(rgyud): ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pa ni badz+ra karba ka ro b+hA ba// de nas ming gis dbang bskur zhing / rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul/
392b7(rgyud): rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bya/ oM badz+rakro d+ha ta ya b+hi'i ny+tsa ma~M// badz+ra na mas br-I she ga te ge batshan ma// ye shes byung ba phun chog pa/ mkhas pa yig
392b8(rgyud): 'dag nyid kyang ni ba / shaka ta 'dzinam/
393a1(rgyud): ni 'asgomasu pa bya// shes rab mchog gis bsgrub bya zhid // rdo rjen la 'gyur rab tu bsgrug// skyeg ra rdo rje rje nas /

393a5(rgyud): nyid rdo rje rin chen te/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// rdo rje pad ma'i mgrin bcings nas// lkog ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri// bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms nas ni/
393a6(rgyud): des ni nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// spyi bo rdo rje bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dag/ bdag nyid rdo rje las bsgoms nas// gdug pa thams cad bstsal bar bya/
393a7(rgyud): byor dan badz+ra kro d+ha ro// dri 'adz+ra d+ha ma kro d+ha ShiT/ hr-ig sa kro d+ha rak+Sha/ skal sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// phyag rgya dang bcas dgug par bya// ye shes blang zhi
393b1(rgyud): de nas bzung // de bzhin kho nar yang blang bya// lag par rdo rje lcags kyu bri// sdigs 'dzub ye ge hUM ldan pas// khros pa yis ni sor mo bskyod// ho ni blugs par
393b2(rgyud): byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kar sha ya hUM phaT// de bzhin 'og tu rkang mthil la// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bri// de yis lha ni gang zhig mnan// de bkug
393b3(rgyud): pa'i mchog yin ni// oM badz+ra a kra ma aM ku sha kro d+ha ma a kar sha ya hUM phaT// dpung pa brkyang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje lcags kyang yang dag bri// lha ni gang dang
393b4(rgyud): gang la babs// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha dan ta a kar sha ya hUM phaT// bstan la rdo rje lcags kyus ni// yang dag bri nas de mnan zhing / lha ni
393b5(rgyud): gang zhig kun du mnan/ de dang de ni dgug bya'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a san yag tsha ya a kar sha ya mi he he badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sma ra hUM phaT/ phyag rgya dbab pas yang
393b6(rgyud): dag ldan/ mkhas pas ye shes bslab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyis// bsgrub pa dag kyang rab tu brtsam// g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas nas su// bdag nyid
393b7(rgyud): khro bor bsgom par bya// myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni// ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ka ya a b+hi sha ya hUM phaT// rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor/
394a1(rgyud): bar bdag dag bsgos par gyu/ sa sa rnas byung chub yang dag dgrag/ de thugs ra 'phrul// sa badz+rad ci

394a5(rgyud): de nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// sems can gang rung kun tu chags// yid kyis gzugs ni bsgoms bya zhing /
394a6(rgyud): yi ge hUM ni rab tu brjod// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dang ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yis// sems can kun la yongs su chags// de ni nyon mongs rnam par nyams/
394a7(rgyud): rtag mimam la la ba ma ma ga rdzam ba/ 'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang // kun nas nyan mongs su zhi gso// tra ka~M dza/ sems can gang gi rgyu pa na// de rje
394b1(rgyud): yi ni blta bas lta// rdo rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos// de'i sdug bsngal nyams par 'gyur// tra ki hUM/ yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las// nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa/

396a1(rgyud): rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// de ni de'i ska cig 'grub// hUM/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya lan gcig bcing // mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pa brjod// gzhan
396a2(rgyud): du khro bo bzung bar bya// yid kyis kyang ni brjod bya zhing // lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// dkyil 'khor dbus ni mnyam sbyor bas// skad cig de las mkhas pas 'grub/

397a4(rgyud): mchog dag gis lha las shin tu 'das// rdo rje'i mtshan rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grags// dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang bcas spyan mnga' ba// gzhad cing sgeg pa
397a5(rgyud): dang bcas zhal ldan pa// tshangs sogs rigs rnams kyi ni lha'i lha mo ste// yid 'ong dga' ba chen po rgyal gyur pa// lha mo rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang // 'khor lo'i
397a6(rgyud): dbus su gnas nas rtog byed pa// de'i rigs bsdus mdzes shin yid du 'ong // rdo rje can chen rmongs byed pa// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ra ga mo ha na ya hi// snying po sang
397a7(rgyud): rgyas rmongs par bya bas gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog kyang rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed deg/ sangs rgyas gzugs
397b1(rgyud): dag yongs su bsgyur ba'i mchog/ rnam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog de ni// bud med gzugs kyis sprul pa nyid du gyur// dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul mchog de ni/
397b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor srid mo gang yin bzhi por gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye s+thi// de nas gsang ba'i tshogs zhi ba// tshogs dang longs spyod rdzogs skus kun khyab pa//

397b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu dag tu gsal// lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams// zil gyis mnan cing shin tu rgyal bar 'gyur// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lnga
397b5(rgyud): mo'i tshogs// de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ba yi// dbang ba'i dbang phyug 'dren pa ste// rdo rje dga' ba chen
397b6(rgyud): po rnam par dgod// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge smra// snying po las byung chos nyid dge pa'i brda// rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga// dkyil 'khor
397b7(rgyud): tshogs kyi shar gyi cha la gnas// mi bskyod pa'i dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs can las byung ba// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil
398a1(rgyud): de #/ 'khor bcas// mi bskyod dam pa bdag nyid can de yis// snying po bskul ba mchog tu gsung bar 'gyur// snying po mchog rab 'byung
398a2(rgyud): ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi// oM badz+ra ro sha aM ku sha a na ya sarba dzI// oM badz+ra ro sha ka ma ba ni ba sha ma me a na ya hi dzi// oM badz+ra ru shrI kro d+ha
398a3(rgyud): to sha ya sarba dzI// rin chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong de// 'khor gyi srin mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs// oM badz+ra bri ku ti kre d+ha ha
398a4(rgyud): ra ha ra sarba ya s+thA dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA la pra be ma hA kro d+ha/ ag ni dz+wa la ya sarba ra bi ro te dzi// oM badz+ra ra dza dza ma kra ke yu re ma hA kro ha de ha sarba dzi/ oM badz+ra yad ta sa
398a5(rgyud): ha sa ma ya ad ta ha ra ha ra dzi/ yi ge dzi ni shin tu brtan par gnas// snying po shin tu mchog tu 'gyur ba gsungs// rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni// snying po

398a7(rgyud): dam pa byung ba'i mchog/ snying po thon po dag ni gsungs par gyur/ oM badz+ri shud d+ha kro d+ha gan duSh+Tad+hi/ oM tog byu badz+ra kroH/ tsin d+ha 'adz+ra gro she nas / mo brda
398b1(rgyud): kro d+ha he du ma hA kro d+he pra be sha ya sarba d+hi/ oM badz+ra dzi ha ma hA kro d+he ba she ba rtse ud ga ra ya d+hi// snying po rigs mchog dam pa phyung bar gyur/ pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang
398b2(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i mchog/ 'od dpag med pa'i gsang ba'i chos can de// snying po bskul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung // don yod
398b3(rgyud): grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas// las la shin tu bskul ba dang ldan te// 'khor gyi srin mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs/ oM sarba mu ke karma badz+ri ni ma hA kro d+hi ku ru sarba
398b4(rgyud): ni/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+hi rak+Sha ba ni/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ma hA rak+Sha ni badz+ra dam sh+tsa ka ra le bi kha ba ya sarba ni/ oM badz+ra muSh+Ti badz+ra kro d+ha ni/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna
398b5(rgyud): tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang ba dga' chen po// dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor bskal byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying mchog 'di gsungs hUM// dbus kyi
398b6(rgyud): snang ba sna tshogs 'byung gyur pa// gtso mo 'di dag rnam par mdzad gsungs/ oM badz+ra shA ri hUM/ oM badz+ra rad na shA ri hUM/ oM bad ma shA ri hUM/ oM karma shwa ri hUM/
398b7(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal mo bcas pa bskul ba las byung gang yin pa// rdo rje btsun mo de dag rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos dang
399a1(rgyud): las ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa// 'di na gsang ba'i tshogs las gzhan du rnal 'byor ma mchog gzhan ni dga'
399a2(rgyud): yang med// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de ni nang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs// des ni rtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje
399a3(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas// khams gsum rnam rgyal rgyal ba'i bdag nyid des// rdo rje
399a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri// grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang dag bri// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su
399a5(rgyud): sbyor bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'diru 'ongs pa dang // yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri// de yang phyag rgya dag ni tshogs dang bcas// bsgom par 'os
399a6(rgyud): po rdo rje yang dag bri// yang na gsang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim pa rdo rje sems dpa' bzhugs/
399a7(rgyud): 'gras pa dang ldan 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas// rdo rje 'bar ba nir bu bdam las// 'bar ba dang bcas mo dang ldan 'ar gnas// shar gyi dkyil 'khor lnga mi 'dag
399b1(rgyud): nyid de/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor gang du mi bskyod brtsol// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang rol par 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan don mchog/ de nas phyogs bzhi
399b2(rgyud): gnas dag tu/ rdo rje lcags mda' dang ni dga' dag/ 'bar ba'i 'od zer yang dag ldan/ 'barda ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga// de nas rin chen rigs
399b3(rgyud): ni yid 'ong ba// dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya// de bzhin pad ma yi ni yid 'ong la// rdo rje pad ma'i phyag rgya ste/
399b4(rgyud): de nas phyogs bzhi tshogs dag tu// pad ma ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin smra/ de bzhin las kyi bya ba'i rigs de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de'i phyogs
399b5(rgyud): bzhi'i tshogs ni bstan pa ru// las dang gnod sbyin bsrungs pa khu tshur rnams// de nas rgya chen gzugs kyi tshogs dag lnga// rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog dran mkha'
399b6(rgyud): 'gro ma/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba chen po 'jigs rung ba// dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan// sa bdag bsrung ba'i cho ga bcas// rgya chen gzhung mchog
399b7(rgyud): dag tu lta bar bya// spyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// yan lag mchog ldan dam pa las bzung bya// de nas phyag rgya'i yan lag brlab
400a1(rgyud): rdo rtse ma
400a2(rgyud): mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog gi byug rgyu brjod// de nas so dang 'ams da rtul gyur du// rgyan po
400a3(rgyud): lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor 'jug pa'i tshogs la ni/ badz+ra dza dza/ 'gugs pa'i pheg rdob sprin ni rgya che ba// badz+ra hrI hUM/ de bzhin bcing
400a4(rgyud): ba'o chos ni ster byed ma// badz+ra baM baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa/ badz+ra a aHde nas gsang ba sgeg pa dang bcas mchod// badz+ra hAM dI /
400a5(rgyud): de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs brgyan// badz+ra hUM/ de nas glu blang ba dang rol mo dag/ badz+ra hU ni/ de bzhin gzhan dag dkyil 'khor dbang phyug mchod//
400a6(rgyud): badz+ra hUM ste/ de nas phyi rol me tog rgya chen pa// badz+ra ha d+ha/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pas/ badz+ra di ta/ spos dang dri ldan ri mo dag bris pa/
400a7(rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ru/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu 'gro// badz+ra kro d+ha/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyis dgug par bya// dga' bas mnyes ldan rdo rje yang dag ldan/
400a8(rgyud): oM sid d+ho badz+ra/ yan ya badz+ri/ de nas tshogs pa'i yid ni 'dod chags pa// rag pa badz+ra/ a hi badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la blta bar/ dza la badz+ra/ rgyal mtshan
400b1(rgyud): gyi ni/ de hi badz+ra/ gzhad pa'i/ ha sa ha sa badz+ra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni/ ka ma ya badz+ra/ ral gri bzung bar bya ba ni/ tshe da ya badz+ra/ gzhan yang
400b2(rgyud): bskor ba'i ni/ pra ma ya badz+ra/ de nas tshig gi tshogs byung ba/ b+hu he badz+ra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i tshogs// sa twa badz+ra/ de nas go/
400b3(rgyud): cha yi ni/ rak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du ni bza' ba'i ni// ba'i badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni bstan par bcing bya ba// ban d+ha ya badz+ra/ de nas ye shes kyis ni
400b4(rgyud): de bzhin brkyang / de nas khros pa'i yid kyi bskul bar bya// so dag gis kyang mchu ni bsnam par bya/ de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsun par bya// de nas
400b5(rgyud): khro bo'i ting 'dzin bsgoms/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis bdud gzhom bya// de nas rdo rje'i tshig gis snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs
400b6(rgyud): bslab// lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus las/ rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du// rgyas ba ru ni yongs su brjod/
400b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i mchog gro// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyis dbang phyug ni// rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas// rdo rje phra mo brjod par 'gyur/
401a1(rgyud): mo#oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra su shA badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// phan pa'i don du rnam bsam bya// rdo rje
401a2(rgyud): phra mo 'di yis ni// sems ni zhi ba nyid du 'gyur// oM su~Mg shwa badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgoms par bya/ rdo rje
401a3(rgyud): phra mo 'di yis ni// rang sems skad kyis 'dul 'gyur ba// oM sug shA badz+ra rad na badz+ra kro d+ha ad ma ka ta hUM// rdo rje rin chen rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis
401a4(rgyud): ni bsgoms par bya// sangs rgyas chos ni myur 'thob cing // rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur// oM suMg sh+ma badz+ra d+harma kro d+ha karma hUM/ bdag nyid bdag ni rdo rje
401a5(rgyud): chos// bzod nas rnam par dag par bsgoms// gsungs gi phyag rgya 'di yis ni// rdo rje chos dang mtshungs par 'gyur// oM badz+ra sug shwa badz+ra karma kro d+ha ka ma hUM
401a6(rgyud): phaT// bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni// yang dang yang du bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje sngags kyis bskul nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// dbang skur ba'i
401a7(rgyud): sems dpa' rtse// 'khor lo bsgyur ba ba ni 'o du// rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas nas/ dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur/ oM badz+ra sug shwa dz+nyA na kro d+ha s+t+wa~M/
401b1(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal po rong bdag nyid// rnam par bsgoms nas nges par 'gyur/ snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kun du 'gugs// oM sug shAM badz+ra ma
401b2(rgyud): ku sha a kar sha ya ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT// mda' 'gengs pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chags pa bsgoms par bya// snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams
401b3(rgyud): cad rjes chags pa// oM sug shrI badz+ra kro d+ha a nu ra ga ya hUM phaT// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya zhing // bdag nyid dang ni rnam par bsgoms// rdo rje dga' ba'i
401b4(rgyud): bdag nyid ste// rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM sug shwa badz+raSh+Ta k+Sho d+ha hUM phaT// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po dang // dbang bskur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje
401b5(rgyud): sngags kyis bskul byas nas// rdo rje rin chen mtshungs par 'gyur// oM sug shwa badz+ra bri ku ti kro d+ha ha ra ha ra hUM phaT// rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu
401b6(rgyud): bdag nyid 'bar bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu rab spyos nas// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu sprul// oM sug shwA badz+ra dza la man Da la kro d+ha su ru dz+wa la hUM phaT// sbyin
401b7(rgyud): pa'i rin chen rgyal mtshan du// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam// sems can thams drid dga' bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// oM sug shu
402a1(rgyud): kro d+ha kro d+ha sarba a hUM me pra yats+tsha hUM phaT// chos chen po yi bzhad pas gzhad/ rdo rje bzhad bdag brtan pa po// rdo rje sngags kyis bskul
402a2(rgyud): bya ba zhing // bdag nyid kho na chos kyis gsungs/ oM sug shwa badz+ra ha sa kro d+ha ha na hUM phaT/ ha ha/ bzod nas skye ba zhi ba med// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa/
402a3(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po// rdo rje tshig gis lan gcig brjod// oM sug sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha ya sho d+ha ya hUM phaT// shugs can ral gri dag gi tshogs rdo rje rnon po shin tu
402a4(rgyud): ston// chos kyis 'khor lo bskor byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sug shwa badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA tsin d+hi pa ta ya sha raM pra be sha hUM da yaM tshin d+ha hUM phaT// nga ni
402a5(rgyud): brjod min brjod bya min// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan// chos 'dod pa ni bstan byas nas// rdo rje smra ba 'thob par 'gyur// oM sug shwA badz+ra hA ka ra kro d+ha ha ra pA ta wa
402a6(rgyud): ya ga ma tre na hUM paT// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje las ni brtan pa bdag/ rdo rje tshig gis chos bshad na// rdo rje las ni 'thob par 'gyur// oM sug
402a7(rgyud): shwa badz+ra ka ma kri d+has thaka ma ka rod byas rbag ma hU~M srad da la hU~M phaT// bdag ni rgyal po byams pa che/ rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid bsgom byas
402b1(rgyud): nas// ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur// oM sug shwA badz+ra ka ba tsa ra sha kro d+ha hUM phaT// sdig pa thams cad bza' bya zhing // rdo rje bsrung ba bsgom par bya//
402b2(rgyud): rdo rje sngags kyis bskal byas nas// rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// oM sug shwa badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha ha ra bag sha yas da stan badz+ra yak+Sha hUM phaT// rdo rje khu tshur
402b3(rgyud): rgyal po dag/ byang chub sems ni rjes su dran// bgegs rnams thams cad bcings byas nas// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM sug sma badz+ra mu shrI/
402b4(rgyud): bAn d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT// sna'i rtse mor sems de ni// brtan par byas nas yang dag brtsam// yi ge hUM nyid sbyar byas nas// nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur//
402b5(rgyud): hUM/ dang po snying kha sna rtse ru// brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin// mtshan ma de ni spangs byas nas/ nad sogs dgra'i 'jigs par 'gyur// na sha ya badz+ra hUM/
402b6(rgyud): sems de brtan par byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor 'dzin pas spo bya zhing // shes rab can gyis khro ba dag bsams// gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jigs/
402b7(rgyud): bi sha na ye ta sarba badz+ra hUM// rnal 'byor rig pa ji srid 'dod// mtshan ma de ni bsdus byas nas// ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni// nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro//
403a1(rgyud): @#/ oM sug shwa badz+ra pra tan sa shi grA h+na// gsal ba'i phyogs rnams ma lus par// sems can kun la byams pa 'gro// ji srid
403a2(rgyud): rdo rje spros byas nas// de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur// be ra badz+ra kro d+ha hUM badz+ra// kye ma'o mgon med sems can 'di// 'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag/ snyed
403a3(rgyud): rje sems ni spro bar bya// rdo rje ye shes 'thob par 'gyur// ku ru na badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT// de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po// sems can thams cad bzod nas dag/ e ma
403a4(rgyud): bde ba ye ma'i chos// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs su s+ho// hU~M ka ra na shud d+ha g+ha d+ha hU~M phaT// 'khor ba'i sems can la dmigs nas// bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms
403a5(rgyud): bya// btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems can rnams la yongs su spro// hUM bi sho d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT// rdo rje gzugs ni yang dag bri// gang gi steng du nges
403a6(rgyud): bzhag pa// de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshogs// thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis 'joms// hUM badz+ra pra ba ta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni/ rjes su dran pas rab ba
403a7(rgyud): na sems can de yis sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur// hUM bi des twa pra ba ta// phyag na rdo rjes dran nas// dag pa'i chos nyid pab byas
403b1(rgyud): na sems can de yis bde ba ni// dam pa thob 'gyur the tshom med/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra pra ta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par
403b2(rgyud): bsgom// sangs rgyas chos rnams phab byas nas// 'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur// hUM b+hU pra ba ta// zla ba rdo rje'i rang bzhin dngos// bskyed pa bzhin du
403b3(rgyud): bsgom byas na// blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs// myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// bud hi kr-i bri ba d+ha ya hUM// zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid// bsgom zhing

403b6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgom bya zhing // rdo rje de ni gar phab pa// rdzu 'phral rgya ni chen por 'gyur// nud ta pra ba ta ya hUM// rdo rje khro bo snyoms zhugs pas// rang gi
403b7(rgyud): lus ni yongs bskor ba// gang gis byas pa the tshos med par byang chub thob// oM badz+ra ba li ti kri dam ya hU~M phaT// dbugs ni 'byung dang rngub pa dang // yi ge hUM na
404a1(rgyud): rab sbyar zhing // rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom// oM badz+ra shA sa bi ba ba ta ya hUM// rdo rje lta bas blta bya
404a2(rgyud): zhing // rdo rje khro bo rab sbyar bas// sems can gsang ba blta byas pas// de ni 'khor ba las grol 'gyur// oM badz+ra d+hi ni bi na sha hUM phaT// lus can dag ni bdag
404a3(rgyud): nyid nas// rang sems 'gro bar gyur pa dang // byang chub sems ni rjes dran nas// des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// hUM d+hi a yu kar sha badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/

404a5(rgyud): po kun gyi snying po'i rigs ni gsungs par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'chang ba yi// rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzod// gdul bya min pa shin tu 'brog cing gdul bya/
404a6(rgyud): la chags blo// sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang po bslabs pa yi// rnam par rol pa yis sdug ma// gsang ba'i ska cig ma'i nyi zla ste// rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya/
404a7(rgyud): rnam rtog gyis brtags mdzes gyur pa// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni// sangs rgyas rnam phrul rab tu bsgog// dang pa
404b1(rgyud): sbyor byung ji skad bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma sha ri hUM// rang gi snying khar byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyis
404b2(rgyud): tshogs bsags nas// mchod pa yis ni tshogs 'di yis// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya/ hUM/ dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad
404b3(rgyud): dgug bya zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yis// khro bo'i mchod pa rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu tsa kar maM sa ma ya b+hi d+hiSh+Tha ti ti lo ka badz+ra ye shwa sarba duSh+TAn
404b4(rgyud): da ma ya badz+ra hUM/ khro gnyer can kun rang bdag nyid/ khro bo'i rin chen gyis bsgom bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing / rin chen mchod pa rab tu mchod/
404b5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka sha sa ma ba sa ra na ma pu tsa a kar sha bi d+hi bi sta ra sa ma ya hUM/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos ni bstan pa bdag/ chos kyis
404b6(rgyud): mchod pa rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+ha du ya ra na ma hA pu tsa bi sti ra sa ma ye hUM// bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid du/

405a1(rgyud): bu tsi ba d+hi bi sti ra sa ma ye hUM// phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas/

405a4(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas// bsgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar// oM badz+ra ra ti ra ga ya sa ma ye hUM dza// rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid// bsgom zhing
405a5(rgyud): rgyal ba mnyes par bya// rdo rje legs pas rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad mgu bar bya// oM badz+ra sa du karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che/
405a6(rgyud): rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun du dbab// oM badz+ra b+hi ku ti ba shi ku ru hU~M// rdo rje nyi ma rang bdag

405b1(rgyud): bdag ni rgyal mtshan sbyor ba che// de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// rin chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/ oM badz+ra

405b4(rgyud): mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad ma ra ga ra ga ya hUM// bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa bstan// bdag ni nyon mongs bcad bya zhing /
405b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya// oM badz+ra ti shA ra ga ra ga ya hUM// lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma bdag// chos kyi 'khor lo ra ba bskor ba// bdag gis rdo rje can
405b6(rgyud): mnyes bya// 'dod chags brtan pa rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra man ra la ra ge ra ga ya hUM// nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba// brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid brtan/
405b7(rgyud): dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya// mo 'adz+ri bgar ge ra ga ya hUM// bdag ni rang nyid las yin te// phyogs rnams
406a1(rgyud): rdo rtse@#kun tu rab tu grags// bdag ni na mkha'i mdzod kyang yin// mchod pa'i char gyis rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma sa ma ye hUM dza ya hUM// bdag ni rang
406a2(rgyud): nyid bsrung ba ste// sangs rgyas byams pa brtan bdag nyid// bdag gis sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra ka ba tsa ba ga d+hi

406a5(rgyud): mchod// oM badz+ra karma mu sti si d+ha ra ya badz+ra hi ste hUM phaT// de 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun// ye shes gsang sngags rab thob byed// pa lus lha mo sems par yi// rgyal

406b2(rgyud): yi// gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad// rig pa 'dzin pa rnam 'phrul ba// ji ltar byin bsreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba// mdor
406b3(rgyud): bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin bsreg las ni rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam pa mang / zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod kyang ni gsum pa ste// dgu pa yA

406b7(rgyud): ru bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las// zhim phyed na mngon spyod kyi// drag po'i las ni nges

413a8(rgyud): sogs sbyor ba yis/ mkhas pas yang dag bri zhing dgod// gru bzhi mnyam pa'i rim pa ni// de nyid kyi ni nang du bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs
413b1(rgyud): ni dgod par bya// de'i phyogs rnams thams cad du// ci rigs par ni yang dag bri// ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum cu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas
413b2(rgyud): kyi ni phyogs kun du// yi ge bcu drug yang dag br-i/ yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni/ phyag rgya tshogs dang 'od bcas par/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// yi ge rnams ni
413b3(rgyud): yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu ni// phyogs rnams kun du dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs kha'i dbus su ni/ yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar bya// gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming
413b4(rgyud): can gyis// sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje'i yi ge rab sbyor byed/ shes rab can gyis yi ge rnams bri/ rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa yin// dbus su rdo rje rdo rje bzhi//
413b5(rgyud): shar du yi ge sum bcu bri/ yi ge sum cu de bzhin lho// sum cu byang gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya/ yi ge bcu drug yang dag brjod// dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya/ rdo rje
413b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin rnal 'byor che/ rnal 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che// dpal ldan 'jig rten rnon por ldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa// smra ba las byung rgyal po che/ sangs rgyas rnam
413b7(rgyud): 'byor 'jug par bya// ro te ko te ma hA ro yo d+ha t+yo bir te ma ne// de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// ha ha ho hi gsang chen po// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa/ rgyal
413b8(rgyud): chen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje thig gis yongasu bskor// slob dpon chen po blta byas nas// yi ge rab tu brjod par bya/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi/ rdo rje 'khor lo kun du spro/ a A rnal
414a1(rgyud): 'byor yang dag bzung // i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'od/ u U rnon po 'chang ba'i tshe// e e sgra dbyangs rab bskul ba// oM o bskyed byed rtsib chen po// aM A shes
414a2(rgyud): rab spyan bzang ba/ rdo rje lcag kyu 'di yis kyang / rdo rje 'chang ni bskul bar bya// ji ltar 'khor lo ji ltar rig/ ci 'os ji ltar rdo rje'i tshogs// de bzhin 'khor lo yongasu dgod// rdo rje slob dpon
414a3(rgyud): dka' thub che// bskal pa chen po gsang ba 'di// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag sbyor// rnam 'phrul de ni rab tu bskor// 'khor lo dbab dang gzhug pa dang // cho ga ji bzhin 'jug
414a4(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji skad bshad pa bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'khor
414a5(rgyud): lo gnas ni dbang du 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'gugs dang skal ldan pa// nges pa rin chen gzi brjid dang // rgyal mtshan bzhad pa yang dag ldan/
414a6(rgyud): chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog/ rgyad dang gsum po drag po che// las dang bsrung ba gnod sbyin grub// sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa byung // de lta bu'i
414a7(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun du bri// rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma med pa la// gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya//
414a8(rgyud): gzhan du skal ba dang ldan pa// gzhung 'di khyod kyis ci bder byen// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba// mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor// mchog tu
414a9(rgyud): gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las// rdo rje'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid du gsang ba'i bshad pa ste// le'u bzhi pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam
414b1(rgyud): bar snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa las// slar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis
414b2(rgyud): gsol ba btab par 'gyur to// rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje mnga'// rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje lus/ rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje
414b3(rgyud): bdag/ rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin du rnon// rdo rje 'khor lo bzlas pa che// las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po// rdo rje phyag
414b4(rgyud): rgya sgra chen po// rdo rje khu tshur brtan pa che// rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che// las chen po ste mnga' chen po// rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che// rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa// rdo rje 'od zer
414b5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje'i sems ni rab dga' ba// rdo rje pad ma shin tu gcod// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje rigs// rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs chen po skye dgu
414b6(rgyud): mnga'// gau cha chen po rdo rje'i sku// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje bsdams pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen po// zhags pa chen po
414b7(rgyud): dbang chen po// rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'bebs pa che// rdo rje dbab pa 'jug byed pa// yi ge dza ste yig hUM// yi ge hUM ni dam du 'ching /
414b8(rgyud): yi ge ho ste yi ge sa/ rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' khro bo che// lcags kyu sdigs med rdo khro// rdo rje 'dud ste bdud kyi mchog
415a1(rgyud): @#/ bdud kyi bdud ni rab 'joms pa// rdo rje dga' bzhi 'che// rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa// rdo rje drag po shin tu gdug/ rdo rje rang dbang rdo rje mdzad// rdo 'dod
415a2(rgyud): 'khrobo che// rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po// sangs rgyas du mdzad yi ge hUM// yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa// yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i dga'// yi ge sAhA rang bzhin med// gtso bo gcod
415a3(rgyud): dang slob mdzad pa// dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khro bo che// khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo khro bo khyod
415a4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin re bzhin du lan gcig ni// gang zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de dag la ni 'jigs pa me
415a5(rgyud): phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin brtan pa// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul dang /
415a6(rgyud): de bzhin sems can no bya'i phyir// tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud// rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen
415a7(rgyud): po karba 'dra yi zhal ldanas dang // lo tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la pha' ba'o// dge'o// rgyung 'di nyid kyi phyi rol rdo rje'i rigs kyi dum bu dang /
415b1(rgyud): 'gro 'dul dang // don rgya ba dang // mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyal me tog pa bsdus pa byed dang lngamatshang bar 'jug pa rdzogs te/ dpa' go khyod la gsol ba 'debs/ gdug pa rnams ni
415b2(rgyud): 'dul ba dang // de bzhin sems can don bya ba'i phyir// tshul chen bskyed par mdzad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab pa'i 'phrol las nas 'dug go// 'di yan chad la dkyil 'khor
415b3(rgyud): brgyad bstan la// khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi gzungs dkyil la gnyis su phyen dgu dngos su gsungs shing gzhan dngos su brtan pa medado// bod kyi bla ma rnams kyi 'di la/ rtsa rgyud kyi gzung
415b4(rgyud): dkyil la gtso bo 'phro ba yod pa'i rigs pa bsgres nas// dkyil 'khor brgya dang nye dgur bshad do// rgyud 'di nyid gsungs pa'i gnas ni rang rgyud nyid las gsal bA ma gsungs shing / bla
415b5(rgyud): marnas rtsa rgyud dang 'dra bar lha gnas gsum du gsungs par 'dod do// bshad rgyud rdo rje phreng ba'i 'grel bar// ri rab kyi steng su gsungs pa bshad do// gsungs tshul yang / bla ma rnams de
415b6(rgyud): nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'khor lo can ni brtags byas nas// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsungs bzhugs// zhes gsungs pas// rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs
415b7(rgyud): par gsungs pa'i rjes su 'khor los bsgyur cang mi gsungs par bzhugs pa la// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas rgyud bshad pa gsol babatab// de nas gsungs par bzhed do//
416a1(rgyud): rtsa ba'i rgyud de nyid bsdus pa dum bu dang po rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor// dum bu gnyis pa khams gsum
416a2(rgyud): rnam rgyal// dum bu gsum pa 'gro 'dul// dum bu bzhi pa don grub ste// dum bu bzhir gnas pa ni// longs sku rnams
416a3(rgyud): snang chen po 'og min las mi g.yo bar rnam snang sbral skras re// rab kyi rtse mor khang rtsegs rdo rje rin po chen la byas par
416a4(rgyud): byon nas gsungs so// 'di la dkyil 'khor gnyis brgya bcu gsum yod do// po ti 'di la rtsa ba'i
416a5(rgyud): rgyud de nyid bsdus pa dang // bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo gnyis bzhags pa yin no// 'di 'bris dge bas
416a6(rgyud): 'gro ba rnams// rnam snang chen pos rjes gzung ste// ting 'dzin gsum gyis sbyor yis//
416a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa'i gnas thob shog/ maM b+ha la b+ha wa nu// shud rnam// dge'o// bkra shis// zhus dag/
